camps.name: Dusty Cobra Art Car / UCBR
camps.description:
Come learn more about our exciting Art Car and Camp!
www.DustyCobra.com

camps.name: Gypsy Witch Camp
camps.description: Gypsy Witch Camp brings in virgin burners and lone travelers and we offer survival help, games, homemade salsa and chips and witches brew and juice

camps.name: Pretty Pickle Camp
camps.description: A relaxed outpost on the road to nowhere featuring cold pickle service to passers by 12pm-2pm daily. Also offering hand-crafted pickle warmers, pickle pasties, and pickle rings, stickers, and bottle cap pins while supplies last!

camps.name: "Scar Bar" aka Bermuda Triangle
camps.description: You will be rewarded greatly for showing us your scars! Talk, drink, relax, and brag at the Scar Bar!

camps.name: Tropical Treehouse
camps.description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of aloha!  Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.

camps.name: BAR MACTROPOLIS
camps.description: BAR MACTROPLIS the disco shower bar at 3 o'clock and K plaza THE BEST BAR ON THE PLAYA open day and night for your pleasure A TRUE OASIS IN BLACK ROCK CITY welcome!

camps.name: Shamandome Camp
camps.description: SHAMANDOME CAMP birthed out of Heebeegeebee Healers Camp in 2006.  40 workshops, healing 1200 burners by core shamanism drumming journies. Our Find Your Power Animal workshop twice daily across the week  trances to DIRECT ACCESS TO SOURCE. and Wake Up the Shaman in You. We address war, sustainability, individual crises, harem management, soulretrival, extraction of neg energies, by CHANGING YOUR DREAM. We get you back on playa opened to epiphanies you flew in for.

camps.name: Lip Bomb
camps.description: Lip Bomb is about the celebration of celebration in all of its naughty light heartedness. We do this through a chill environment of deep house, Down tempo, chill and fun lounge house music. Our camp is open daily for our coffee and tea social and our bar is open nightly for our signature drink The cherry Lip Bomb.

camps.name: Dragon Camp Armory
camps.description: Make your own Bikini Armor!

camps.name: Twisted Swan
camps.description:
Stop in for a cold draught beer, fine Irish whiskey, hot Irish coffee, and wonderful Celtic music. Recite a limerick and get a Guinness, get your 
Who on at our Doctor Who night or show your best knees on Kilted Thursday, and thrill to our music seisiun featuring the playa's finest celtic musicians!

camps.name: STAMP IT! CAMP
camps.description: STAMP IT! Camp is back to for the third year.  Come get your Burning Man 2015 souvenir stamped on any item or body part of your choice.

camps.name: Sun Guardians
camps.description: A spiritual temple honoring Hanuman: "House of Tea and Yoga" taking you on a journey of your past, present and future. Your soul is timeless and our space is awesome.

camps.name: Northwest Mist
camps.description: Providing a soothing Northwest atmosphere to escape the mid-day heat with misting, music and body paint artists. Step through the Northwest Mist portal and transcend the heat of the day for a momentary refreshing encounter.

camps.name: The Yogi Bears
camps.description: DJ guided yoga with the Yogi Bears! Daily DJ guided yoga, tea offerings and an occasional dance party at night.

camps.name: Declusterfuqerization
camps.description: Here at Declusterfuqerization we strive to fuq your burn! Fuq it long and hard and straight and true. Any way you like. Soft and cuddly, we've got you. Hard and vigorous, you are at the right place. Dirt nasty? Always. Dirt stars? Yes please.  Fuq yer b3rn.

camps.name: Kampersia
camps.description: Kampersia melds traditional persian culture with modern burner ideas. Like tea and middle eastern food? We got you covered. How about traditional rose tobacco hookah and live acoustic music? Us too. We love persian culture, but we'd really love it if we could share it with you!

camps.name: Club Neu Verboten
camps.description: Club Neu Verboten provides our usual retro avant garde parties under the massive star tent.Depeche Mode Night returns! See you all there and thanks to those who made 2014 our best year ever.

camps.name: Front Porch Sitters
camps.description: Come learn a new Ballet (dance beginners encouraged).  We will perform it for the city on Thursday and Saturday. All day parent / child classes on TuTuesday.

camps.name: Camp Deep C
camps.description: Camp Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. With our flagship art project, the Deep Pentaphonica, we let the viewer mold the sound and light to their will amidst a variety of other collective and creative arts and activities, from karaoke to body painting.

camps.name: School of Safe Sex
camps.description: The School of Safe Sex is a casual environment inviting guests from all corners of the globe and all walks of life to come together for an amazing burn. Our relaxing, judgment free, venue features shaded space to take a break from the heat, scheduled classes with various sexual topics, class time school snacks, class time prize wheel for free sex toys and hygiene kits, 1920’s style mutoscopes with tasteful yet sultry rated adult movies and dispensers with free condoms. This is our way to unite the community through a positive and educational experience involving love and sensuality regardless of gender or sexual preferences.

camps.name: Battlestar Erotica
camps.description: Ladies and gentlemen, all and sundry, welcome to Battlestar Erotica: Black Rock City’s very own confectionery and bar where you’ll be served from our finest selection of sexy snacks and sultry drinks, provided for you by our resident host of space freaks. Join us Thursday at 2:00 PM to compete for a prize at the Asstravaganza, our annual celebration of all things posterior, or stop by any time to take a spin on our stripper pole!

camps.name: Hooker Support Camp
camps.description: Support camp for a webby playground of epic proportion - crocheted with love from rope - creating a place to dream, play and open yourself up to possibilities.

camps.name: Chainsawmargaritaguys Camp
camps.description: It's the 12th anniversary for the ChainsawMargaritaGuys. Stop by for our happy hour. Daily from 2-3PM Mon-Fri. At 12,000 rpm, it's the frothiest margarita on the playa. This year we will be serving our 12,000 drink. 12th year,,,12k rpm,,, 12k drinks,,, 12 million year old ice,, Coincidence? As in the past years, we will be using our Northern Canadian glacial ice that is over 12 million years old. 21 and over please. check this site out. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LngEInjk8HI

camps.name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
camps.description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye, home of the Official Black Rock City Garnish fire and circus arts, Toolsday and The Suck 'N Fuck Saloon!

camps.name: Pussy Day Spa
camps.description: We will amuse, entertain, and exhilarate you as well as compliment your shoes.  We are the perfect place for your pussy to visit to be pampered, refreshed, relaxed, and rejuvenated.

camps.name: Mudskippers Urban Decay Cafe
camps.description: The Mudskipper Urban Decay Cafe is a close knit gay-friendly diverse camp with a history at burning man that goes back to 1993, Come chill out in our cafe or make a handy dandy craft in our craft lounge, all are welcome!!!!

camps.name: Miracle Wonderland Carnival Comp.
camps.description: The Miracle Wonderland Carnival Company is the firm that employed the Wizard of OZ as a balloonist prior to his being whisked away to OZ.

camps.name: Awkward Hug Camp
camps.hometown: San Francisco, Sacramento, LA, South Africa
camps.description: Need a hug  - hope you're ready for an awkward one, 'cause that's the only kind we give!   Stop by for your awkward hug and sit a spell with our resident huggers.

camps.name: Camp Sweaty Betty
camps.description: Friendly neighborhood misting Parlor, Spa and Bike shop, so stop in and experience an overall cooling sensation from head to foot as you stroll through the mist (is that vanilla?) and watch the smiles emerge while body temperatures drop; got crunchy hair, feeling a bit beat...You many qualify for an emergency hair wash, perhaps there is an opening in the massage room...Stop in and chill while your bike is being fixed with new tires, maybe need a new chain or if your lucky you might be gifted a bike. Open 11:00 to 4:00, Volunteer opportunities.

camps.name: Dye With Dignity
camps.description: Dye with Dignity provides silk, dye, wine, margaritas, snow cones and lots of love to help you create your own piece of playa magic. Come dye a silk scarf (or sarong during our surprise event!), spin the Wheel of Shame, entertain the neighbors and feel the love!

camps.name: Suspended Animation
camps.description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage and BDSM rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture!

camps.name: Spanky's Village and Wine Bar
camps.description: The infamous crown-jewel of Burningman Bars.  Your heart may belong to The Man... but your ASS belongs to Spanky's!

camps.name: PolyParadise
camps.description:
PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from  '2:00 - 10:00'  for the past 16 years.

We are a group of Polyamorists seeking to live our dreams, and this camp is one manifestation of that. Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. 

Join us in a variety of events - Come in from the sun....take a load off your feet...

camps.name: Mobility Camp /BRC DoA
camps.description: Mobility Camp is an accessible Camp Providing Mobility services and Accessibility education in Black Rock City.

camps.name: P3: The Princess Party Palace
camps.description:
Our camp hosts Wedding Dress Wednesday with the Princess. We we invite the participates of BRC to come play dress-up with Prince S. Stephanie. We offer a parade that will begin someplace and end someplace. We will offer playa marriage ceremony officiated over by Reverend Mike. Is it leagal? - You may ask... Our answer... well meh... it could be. 

You can also grab a drink in our bar, spin the wheel of Safewords, and/or get a new pair of panties.

camps.name: New York Dangerous
camps.description: Well, you can't say your mother didn't warn you!  Join New York Dangerous for our annual Running With Scissors race 3pm Wed, plus our Strangers With Candy snack machine, Put Your Eye Out Shooting Gallery, Talking To Strangers discussion series, Playing With Fire medallion burning station, and Dangerous Liaisons social yurt.

camps.name: Camp Make Good Choices
camps.description: At burning man one must make good choices. Let us offer you sound advice about how to make the most of your burn! Participation, spanking and games are all good choices! Come play with us in our dome and see if your interaction produces gifts!

camps.name: Sparkle Love Oasis
camps.description: Come share some Sparkle Love with us and be rejuvenated with a refreshing cool beverage in our luxurious lounge. Bootys and Boobies appreciated playfully ALL WAYS!

camps.name: Camp MisBeeHive
camps.description: Bumble, Buzz and Humm in our Hive of savory art, expression, collaborative painting, and dance your pants off snuggle parties!  Bee-friend our swarm over sweet nectar refreshments, and we’ll bee sure you get some honey:)

camps.name: Cereal Thrillers
camps.description:
We are the Cereal Thrillers  Breakfast Cereal Bar.
We serve sugary breakfast cereal your mom would not let you have as a kid.

camps.name: Barbie Day Spa
camps.description: Barbie Day Spa - Pampering on the Playa - Massage, Bodywash, Fingernail painting, and Wine.

camps.name: Soho Gardens
camps.description: Soho gardens provide daily Ashtanga Yoga sessions, morning Chillits parties, relaxtion session, English Tea Time, projection of old back & white movie and a 60 feet observation tower.

camps.name: Totenkitten
camps.description: Totenkitten is a fascist demagoguery devoted to crushing all opposition and imposing our will on the masses; initially conceived as a reaction to the decadent weakness of other organizations, Totenkitten quickly took on a life of its own.

camps.name: Barbie Death Village
camps.description: Barbie Death Village is back for its fifth year on the playa with its subcamps of BDC&WB,  Barbie Day Spa, Dye With Dignity, Cantina Vida, Meercats, and Dread Pirate Barbie all ready and willing to offend even the most seasoned burner.  Drop by for a glass of Barbie barbera or an Otter Pop and see what the buzz is all about; no doubt, the Barbiebarians are the sickest bastards on the playa and we love them for it!

camps.name: Intense Intents In Tents
camps.description: A collection of intentional communities bring the spirit of artist expression, radical collaboration, and collective hospitality to the playa!

camps.name: Home Brew 4A Home Brew
camps.description: A Home Brewers community hub where brewers of the Playa come to meet and share. Enjoy a cold home brewed beer, mead or soda served daily from noon to dark. We have a pool table, games and daily events including our world famous pickle party! Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it.

camps.name: Midnight Ridazz Camp
camps.description: Bike repair and F.U.N from Los Angeles and Oakland.

camps.name: Run Free Camp
camps.description: Run Free is a clean and sober Burning Man camp for folks whose common goal is enlargement of spiritual life through new adventures in being human and living life to the fullest.

camps.name: Bad Ass Buddha
camps.description:
One of Buddha's famous quotes: "Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most" 
We Follow Buddha's believes and celebrate Birthday to everyone at burning man. we believe that in burning man you reborn so we here to celebrate it for you. No event creations or friend requests, we going back to basics and you'll love it.

camps.name: Beans, Beans, the Musical Camp
camps.description: Come join us for live music and beans served daily.

camps.name: Orgy Bus Camp
camps.description: We host a variety of adult themed play parties in a safe and consensual environment. Must be 21 years of age to attend. Identification is required.

camps.name: Yard, The
camps.description: Our big ass board games bring all the burners to the yard, and they’re like, “hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop. Don’t worry, we’ll make time for recess.

camps.name: Settle This Like Men
camps.description: A place to express your feelings and work through issues in a more direct, face punch-y way. Camp Settle This Like Men brings you their own brand of Kinetic Dispute Resolution Workshops, hosted in our very own fight ring.

camps.name: Playa Choir
camps.description: Connect with the Something Other often overlooked at Burning Man. Your Playa Choir welcomes all Burners to come and participate in a fun 4-part harmony of classic sacred and secular songs. Rehearsals are Tuesday through Saturday 11:00 a.m. to 1:00 p.m. To listen, please join us for the Sunday SUNRISE Performance at the Temple, or the Full Choir non-denominational, non-religious but entirely welcoming, spiritual and moving “service” at 11:00 a.m. in our Dome. Singers of all skill levels, and persuasions are welcome :) Also looking for Musicians! Contact maids_service@yahoo.com for more information or swing by our camp on the Playa!

camps.name: Shibumi
camps.description:
Shibumi - n. - (shi-boo-mee)

1. A rare kind of personal excellence.
2. A state of effortless perfection.
3. Where's Andrew?

Serving craft cocktails, good music, and great people, Shibumi is a relaxing stop-off to dance, sing, and revel. Join us for a drink!

camps.name: Mangueira
camps.description: We are the first Brazilians to bring art to the Playa, with a support camp for artists and friends! Come stay with us! We will provide a Shower area, Kitchen Area, Dj Booth, Dancing Area, Bar, Camping area, Lounge / Chillout area, Dinning area!! Come along!

camps.name: Swish Embassy
camps.description:
The Swish Embassy. 
Themed extravaganzas costumes encouraged.

camps.name: Disco Dokie
camps.description: Chill vibes, good tunes and delicious ice-cold lemonade - We are a collective of open hearted human beings who dance a lot, build cool stuff, hug, play games, practice gratitude and love sparkly things! We welcome all citizens of Black Rock City to join us for our Disco Dokie Happy Hour - everyone loves Dokie Lemonade.

camps.name: PlayaWaste Raiders
camps.description: PWR features a visually appealing frontage reminiscent of an apocalyptic wasteland outpost. A return of our grisly street games, including Interactive Post Apocalyptic Reader's Theater, The HATE Bar, The Church of the Children of Atom, Tuesday Morning Church services for the Army of Shirt Cocking Elder’s of Latter Day Saints,  The Prophet in the Desert Tower, NERF Wars street raids, A Mutant Nerf Shooting Gallery, Radiation Aversion Therapy, and of course, RAIDERBALL!

camps.name: Dusty Nuts Tavern
camps.description: Join us daily 5pm - 7pm for the Dusty Nuts Tavern happy hour.  Come leave your mark on The Scroll and get your night started with Remix, The Master, Undecided Douchebag, 101, and Dusty Nuts himself.

camps.name: Dia De Los Muertos
camps.description: Viva Los Muertos is a fun and friendly camp to don candy skull makeup, drink margaritas and sangria , break pinatas and dance.

camps.name: Camp Asterix
camps.description: Camp Asterix with our new TURBO BAR dispensing Magiacal Illuminated Elixher that starts the night off with fun magical times.

camps.name: Crackwhore Camp
camps.description: Bring out your inner Whore at Lil' Crackwhore Camp. Learn to work the streets, dance a lil' dance, and gain a tattoo if you do it properly.

camps.name: North Bay Freakshow
camps.description: The North Bay Freakshow is in full effect in our city of dreams in the high desert plain. Come play with us! We are fire spinners and midway performers from the San Francisco North Bay and we'd love to get our freak on with you.

camps.name: Contraptionists
camps.description:
Stop by the Contraptionists for Our afternoon Snowcone Parties from 1 until 3 each afternoon Monday through Saturday, as the ice lasts.   Children are always invited to the front of the line to cool quickly.

     Guests who wish to power our human powered shaving bike may do so, so we may split the crystallized H2O into a fine feathery powder of flakes ready to fully accept the flavors of Our choice, and encapsulate them into the jewel colored crystals that are so desired by the weary travelers visiting our humble establishment and we know you will enjoy.

 Come chill in our shade and check out the art and events schedule for more Contraptionists talks and activities.

camps.name: Discordia
camps.description:
Discordia presents some of the best Kiwi, British and Aussie music available in an evolving environment integrating light and mirrors with misting fans and varied, interesting light effects inside a huge public pyramid.

Discordia's chosen art theme 'Reflection, Light and Illusion' merges art and technology to create illusion and encourage participants to question their perception of reality and self.

camps.name: Down Low Club
camps.description: An enclosed, discreet and air-conditioned play space for adult men of the Playa seeking to meet other adult men and/or engage in tactile and erotic manplay. Whether self-identified as gay, bi, trans, questioning, curious or straight, this non-judgmental and away-from-prying eyes space is open 24/7 all week to adult men.

camps.name: Face of Venus
camps.description: harmonize your mind and body with yoga and essential oils. Ornament your epidermis with ancient or modern art, or create your own facial feature disguise to fit your mood.

camps.name: Jipangu
camps.description: The best green tea on the playa available daily 10am-1pm... served one freshly-brewed cup at a time! Learn the difference between matcha, houjicha, and sencha. We'll have cold sake for those who can't handle tea in the morning.

camps.name: PLAYA 54
camps.description: PLAYA 54, An Afternoon Delight, spins the best of the 60s, 70s, 80s, House and so much more! COME DANCE!!

camps.name: LightSweeper
camps.description: Star in your own 80s-style arcade game! Step into our console and onto the light-up dance floor where you can play fun games like giant Minesweeper! Experience life-size, 8-bit immersion!

camps.name: Tar Pits
camps.description: At the Tar Pits, take a load off in our dinosaur themed camp.  Come by to say hi to Tracy Crea Tops! We will be playing old stop animation dinosaur movies in our hammock chill area nightly.

camps.name: Barbie Death Camp
camps.description: Barbie Death Camp- 17 years of serving fine wine in a cheap paper cup. Oh Yeah- and killing Barbie.

camps.name: Wonder Camp
camps.description: "Wonder Camp" is where we fix the broken burner and all their stuff. You can also get your tee shirt silk screened at "Splinter the Printer" and your attitude adjusted at the "Siren Salon"!

camps.name: Ibiza Camp
camps.description: Ibiza camp, a replica of a bedouin camp at black rock city.

camps.name: IN DUST WE TRUST
camps.description: Come by, enjoy the chill space, choose some sexy lingerie for your playa night pleasure, exchange stories, join in the organized chaos.

camps.name: Genital Portrait Studio
camps.description: Genital Portrait Studio, the playa's premier genital photography studio since 2000, celebrates genitalia as glorious and beautiful. Welcoming to all genders, we invite you to capture your most intimate side in a keepsake laminated ID Badge. www.genitalportraitstudio.org

camps.name: Camp Suburbia
camps.description: The grass is greener on the other side of the fence, cause it's certainly green over here at Camp Suburbia Come see for yourself!

camps.name: Freedom Lounge
camps.description: Freedom Lounge is a mystical day spa for the soul. Dreams interpretations, destiny readings and healing through sound. Home of the Burning Man organic spiritual alignment and cleansing.

camps.name: SwagMart
camps.description: SwagMart is an Oasis of creativity located in the heart of the Black Rock Desert. Our Swag Pins, Earrings, Necklaces, Patches, Post Cards are collected and cherished each year while our nightly Branding of your Belts, Boots, Hats, etc are a must have of the Playa. Special Swag and Trophies for our Costume Appreciation . Stop by for a creative fun positive experience and meet Burners from all over the Planet. SwagMart Celebrating out 7th Year.Always close to Center Camp.

camps.name: Cult of the Magic Lady
camps.description: Cult of the Magic Lady contains entertainment for all comers!  Deep fried tofu, tasty jelloshot fetuses, massages, and a relaxing environment provide an oasis of class and refinement for all.

camps.name: Camp Touch This
camps.description: This misbehaving camp has fun planning adventures and misadventures all week. Do you have any naughty or misbehaving friends? If so, stop by and lock them up in the Camp Touch This Jail where you can get your mugshot and the full locked up experience. How will you post bail? CTT is the place to visit if you want to be locked up, take home a souvenir photo, or check out the creative kinetic bike sculptures.

camps.name: Home Sweet Dome
camps.description:
Home Sweet Dome is a public chill space at the heart of Hushville, nest to the Town Round.
We offer shade in the daytime, lighted area at night, solar powered battery charging, bike repair, various activities by Hushville residents, and general merriment.

camps.name: White Bronco
camps.description:
White Bronco is a culmination of over 25 years of connectivity, honesty, and creativity.Think,  "unrelenting spirit that has no choice but to take things FURTHER".

To that end, we host DJ sets, Movie Nights, and other interactive events throughout the week. If you DJ, play live music, or do some form of physical performance art please contact me so we can put you on the event schedule. Or you can just stop by and we'll work something out.

Hope to see you out there. CONNECT

camps.name: Camp Peace of Ass
camps.description: Camp Peace of Ass supports the vulnerable, sumptuous, cheeks of biking Burners as they travel the vast, course playa environment. The repetitive motion propelling your steed, up and down, fast or slow, hard or soft over and over again demands the protection and shield available only from Camp Peace of Ass; colorful, hand-crafted fleece bicycle seat covers that are guaranteed to soothe and caress your precious assets all day and all night long! Free installation included!!

camps.name: Organization
camps.description: The Organization: Espresso Martini Parties 1-3pm Tuesday-Saturday

camps.name: Tarwater
camps.description: Tarwater, home of the Rat Taxi, returns with The Tarry Night Bowl, the Ladder Toss game and the inaptly named Corn Hole game.   Have your fortune told in the Hit or Miss Fortune Booth.  You can pick out clothes at Lady S’ Boutique where you don’t have to do anything in exchange.  The Labyrinth will be lit for your nocturnal wanderings.

camps.name: Big Puffy Yellow
camps.hometown: Charlotte, Dallas, NYC, San Francisco, Seattle, Denver, and many more.
camps.description: What began as a Burning Man Theme Camp in 1999 has grown into a collective of Burner's, Artist's, DJ's, Performers and general Badasses who love all things Big, Puffy and Yellow!

camps.name: Dusty Goats
camps.description:
It is the year of the Goat!

Dusty Goats- Come and get f***ked up like a goat with dancing in our dome and showing us your goat golfing skills.  Stick around and recover with our yoga sessions, massage and rest your hooves under our huge shade structure. Come by and have a goat-tastic time!

camps.name: Red Bar
camps.description: Red Bar (formerly Cornhole Bar, Farmopolis, ...), an oasis popping out of the desert, red and glowing at night, invites weary travelers to float through our halls to find the inner sanctum of libations and live music at the piano.  Sit down and play, or listen and sing.  Bring your instruments and see what develops.  We are always open and will have daily drink specials plus games and entertainment.  You will also find nooks to create art and walls to hang it on.

camps.name: Duckpond
camps.description: Best dive bar on the Playa - 10 years running.  Join us in celebrating a Decade of Ducks!

camps.name: DeMentha
camps.description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You'll find music from out DJ line-up, enthusiastically prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you've got the perfect recipe for a awesome time. 1-6pm daily.

camps.name: Rat Trap
camps.description: The bar that never closes.

camps.name: Mr. Peepers Closet
camps.description: Need to spruce up your playa attire? We have wedding, prom, and casual dresses, hawaiian shirts, tutu's, tie dyes and lots lots more stuff. We have Body Painting too. Let Mr. Peepers help you find your Playa persona. We gladly accept clothing donations.

camps.name: Nothing Butt Art
camps.description: We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks, together, we will create nothing butt art. We also feature body stamp temporary tattoos . Stop by, make some art and get a tramp stamp.

camps.name: Bike Gods
camps.description: Come visit the Bike Gods where we practice holistic bike healing;  We treat both the bike and the owner. Simply take a number, grab a refreshment, chillax, socialize in our lounge/day spa, and let our attentive staff spoil you.

camps.name: Que Viva! Camp
camps.description: Migration is Beautiful!  A mix of Carnaval and Mardi Gras, Que Viva! (Celebrate Life!) camp will roll with Latino and Cajun music, migration stories, and butterflies, symbols of metamorphosis. Come paint your wings to wear around the playa!  Tell your migration story in our video photo booth!  If you do, you'll get your BRC "Permanant Residency" green card.  Check What, Where, When for wing-making times.  No art experience necessary.  Hammocks, chairs and tables create a welcome respite in the shade. Que Viva! emphasizes bringing artists, change makes, and social justice advocates from communities not traditionally represented at Burning Man, people of color, immigrant folk, and activists – to create a more inclusive BRC where everyone’s voice and spirit are uplifted.

camps.name: Desert Chai-Wallah
camps.description: Desert Chai-Wallah serves hot, homemade, Indian chai every evening as the weather cools from 6:00-7:00pm. Come recharge before the night's adventures with a cup of tasty masala chai in our Indian Lotus dome.

camps.name: Catification
camps.hometown: Phoenix, San Diego, Los Angeles, San Francisco
camps.description: Come get cat-ified! Create your very own cat ears & collar, then get your cat nose and whiskers painted on; communicating in meows is enthusiastically encouraged. We will have a giant scratching post for you to scratch, rub up against, or enjoy in a manner befitting a cat. BYO Cat Toys and/or Cat Nip. Reminder: the playa is not a litter box, please use the porta potties.

camps.name: Orbital Landing
camps.description: A stopping place for wayward travelers - for a year or forever. Diverse group of eclectic friends with a shared appreciation for good vibes.

camps.name: Hellfire Society
camps.description:
We are a Burning Man Theme camp made
up of fire performers and friends. We host
classes on the playa to teach everyone what
fire spinning is and how to learn new tricks.
This will be our third year on the playa.

camps.name: Icy Hands CHILLZONE
camps.description: Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!

camps.name: Dusty Bumm
camps.description: Trade in your dusty tookus for a warm drink and a cold slap in the face or plow it up with a snowboardski or three, then try your hand at Giant Beer Pong or relax under hundreds of G-Strings!  Face it, out here, there's no escaping a Dusty Bumm!

camps.name: Camp Hot Mayo
camps.description: Come visit Camp Hot Mayo, we have nice cold daily drink specials with a fabulous bar, with comfortable seating and the most amazing people to meet. Thursday is our famous Irish Car Bomb party, and we have a B-Ball hoop that shoots flames w/ some 3 on 3 action and fun giant Jenga game.

camps.name: 7 Sins Lounge
camps.description:
Come Embrace the Heat as the Playa's Friendliest Little Slice of Hell returns for the 15th straight year!

Daytime brings what Sinners need - shade, chill music and slushy drinks.

But NIGHT brings what Sinners want - Flaming Libations and the ever popular WHEEL of SINS! Our highly skilled and dedicated staff will happily deliver absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand! 

So come earn your "Get Out of HELL Free" card and remember: 
Start your SINS at 7!

camps.name: DESERT PEARL CANTINA
camps.description:
THE DESERT PEARL CANTINA AND SCULPTURE GARDEN IS A CHILL CAMP WHERE FOLKS GATHER TO ENJOY THE PLAYA'S BEST COFFEE & TEA IN A SERENE SCENE. 
MUSIC, DANCING, STORYTELLING, ART MAKING DEMONSTRATIONS, AND QUIET CAN ALL BE FOUND HERE. 
WE ARE AN INT'L CAMP HAILING FROM BRITISH COLUMBIA, RUSSIA, FRANCE, BROOKLYN AND THE BAY AREA.
WE LOVE CREATING A SPARE, SPACIOUS DESERT HOME WHERE FOLKS CAN COME AND CHILL AND EXPERIENCE AN ART FILLED PIECE OF THE PLAYA.

camps.name: Sake II Mi
camps.description: Visit Sake II Mi Camp for sumo wrestling mania and spectator joy!

camps.name: Kindergarten Kamp
camps.description: Kindergarten Kamp is bringing it's playground out for your enjoyment - kids of all ages (families, friends and all playa peeps) are welcome to enjoy our swings, trampoline, and teeter-totter, mini teeter totter, tree fort, sandless sandbox with toys, a one-hole miniature golf course, self-portrait tent, and carnival art adorning the camp - Kindergarten style!  In the Gnome dome, hookah time and Swag poker will happen two nights - bring lots of swag!  You will also be able to relax in our carnival styled Monkey-Hut complex.

camps.name: The Love Muscle
camps.description:
My World, My Rules

https://www.facebook.com/groups/189548531179275/

camps.name: Burning Man Studios
camps.description: Burning Man Studios is a diverse group of crazies from across the country and across space and time that love movies, bad writing, and self-expression in all its forms.  Come by for a drink, some shade, or just to tell us a story.

camps.name: Universe University
camps.description: Universe University "We put the U in yoU". Come chill with some creative characters and participate in some imaginative activities all while celebrating this beautiful universe and our shared place in it.

camps.name: Spice N Vice
camps.description:
Spice N Vice - offers bedouin hospitality every day from 12-4 p.m. Visit us for some hot or cold chai tea or Arabic coffee. Talk to one of our travel sages for stories about life abroad and travel advice.
https://www.facebook.com/SpiceNVice

camps.name: Fish Out of Water
camps.description: Fish Out of Water Camp, serving bacon tamales.

camps.name: Moonwalk Mission
camps.description: Moonwalk Mission is a station for Playa explorers, space cadets and anyone set for out-of-this-world experiences.

camps.name: SHIFT
camps.description: SHIFT provides the ‘set and setting’ for you to have a shift experience; a shift in paradigm.  How can you create this for others and how can you engage and create this space for yourself?  We ask you do things you would not normally do.  Get dirty, get involved, participate, pick up trash, fill your own RV and ‘wipe your own ass’. This is not just another weekend at the disco. www.shift-bm.com

camps.name: Catch and Release
camps.description: We catch the wandering burner and share without being asked. We feed those who don’t expect to be fed. We provide shade and water to those who pass. We give friendship, company, and safe space to those who are lonely or overwhelmed. We laugh and play with those who join. We welcome all in to our family for a minute, an hour, or a day, and then release them back out to the playa to have a spectacular burn. We welcome new campmates if they're also overachieving care givers.

camps.name: Mighty Misfits
camps.description: Throw your pecker, challenge your tit-tac-dic, toss your vagina, paint your body, have your fortune read and savor a photo with the Oracle. All games hosted from 2:00 to 4:00

camps.name: Ego Trip
camps.description: At Ego Trip we want you looking and feeling your best! Get pampered at our beauty bar, capture that stunning playa outfit at our photo booth, check out all your good sides in the EgoNOMitron, dance to our sexy beats and get drunk on your own vanity (and our delicious drinks) until everyone looks as good as you!

camps.name: Cafe Nëgrø - Funeral Edition
camps.description: Cafe Nëgrø provides aural and oral transformative rituals for your morning, featuring the finest in black coffee and black metal. Come for our 1 PM hour of darkness and ready yourself for the new day.

camps.name: Shamanic Journey
camps.description: SHAMANIC JOURNEY - A place to learn, grow, share, interact. Explore shamanic practices, energy, and exercises.

camps.name: DUSTFISH Village
camps.description: DUSTFISH VILLAGE BELIEVES IN THE POWER AND GLORY AND BEAUTY OF LOVE. This year, as DUSTFISH Village, we include Sextant and Sk8Kamp, to join with DUSTFISH to bring Tesla Coils, a Zip Line, Vünderbar, a Skateboard Park and Sidewalk and a Ramp into a Foam Pit, a live stage featuring music, performers and other live acts, our Fortune Teller's Bar, chill domes which are always open and inviting, all with the ambiance of a traveling circus.

camps.name: #Octothorpe
camps.description: Come # with us!

camps.name: Ludus Symposium
camps.description: Come by our spot on the playa for a beer and a great view of the playa off our deck!

camps.name: Camp Yaaaaas!
camps.description: Come spin the Wheel of Reflection to win self satisfaction and even a prize! Then dance it off in the Reflection Zone!

camps.name: ABC Alphabet Block Camp
camps.description: Manifesting your thoughts to the citizens of Black Rock City, one giant wooden block at a time. We'll help you have a great time on the playa. It's easy as ABC!

camps.name: Stardust Lounge Casino & Spa
camps.description: Go all-in at the Stardust Lounge Casino and Spa! Double down on some dirty martinis and dirtier games of chance and skill at the Casino, get your playa wedding on at the Chapel, then clean up and cool off with rejuvenating treatments at the Spa.

camps.name: Camp Scatter
camps.description: Go ape shit at Camp Scatter!

camps.name: M*A*S*H 4207th
camps.description: We’re not Doctors. The least disciplined military unit on the playa. Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show. Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis at Rosie’s Bar. Praise the lord and pass the sauce!

camps.name: Camp Pickleback
camps.description: Do you like pickles? Then this is the place for you!

camps.name: Dr.Baron von Realz esq. Steampunk
camps.hometown: We are spred all over the world but based in Newark CA.
camps.description: Come join our circus of freaks and be a part of the shenanigans of our camp.  Flaming girls, tattoos, body modifications, piercings, carnies, performers, freaks, geeks and other oddities fill our ranks.

camps.name: Got Sparkle?
camps.description:
Got Sparkle? is a Portland based theme camp!! 
We specialize in kindness, compliments & glamour! & bringing wonder, joy & sparkles to all the lil' ponies!!

camps.name: Spank Bank
camps.description: Spank Bank- we are your playful, sensual playa spanking experience. We tease & torment your bottoms while satiating your thirst with a cold drink in our commemorative cups!

camps.name: CampDIY
camps.description: CampDIY is an assemblage of thinkers, tinkers, makers and dreamers.  We welcome all visitors particularly those with a preference to self reliance and self sufficiency.

camps.name: Curiouser & Curiouser
camps.description: Camp Curiouser & Curiouser invites curiosity and curiousness to our curiosities. Are you curious?

camps.name: Yayflags Care-nival!
camps.description: Snacks Snack Snacks! We are passionate about merging optimal snacking with maximum party, come by our camp to indulge in our healthy secrets, groovy beats, and be showered with snack related gifts! All dietary restrictions welcome!

camps.name: Vines Without Borders
camps.description: Vines Without Borders is an international wine bar and lounge serving fine wine from around the world nightly. Starting at sunset a different wine region will be celebrated in our cool LED illuminated venue furnished with vintage couches and chairs and a 16' back-lit bar.

camps.name: Vinyl Bunker
camps.description: Ice cold hard lemonade, lawn games, and 50s music. Come relax in our front yard from 11 AM to 3 PM daily.

camps.name: Confessions Of A Burner
camps.description: Come by and confess your secrets to us in our private confessional booths. While you are here, play some games and dance to the music from our DJs. Don't forget to stop by at 4pm daily for our costume contest and special confessions book giveaway.

camps.name: Ignited States Ski Patrol
camps.description: Ignited States Ski Patrol welcomes all Black Rock City Suckers.... er, Citizens... to come on by!  Try your luck at the Ski Patrol Fun n Games Center, relax with us on our Front Porch, or stop by for a drink at the Ignite Your States Ski Lodge!

camps.name: LED Dinosaur
camps.description: LED Dinosaur is Burning Man's best preparty destination.  Come by to grab some glowsticks & drinks while you paint our giant dinosaurs and dance to some house beats.

camps.name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
camps.description:
Disc Golf! Frisbee Golf! Come play or learn 24/7 with giant glowing mushrooms and more for obstacles!

Want to participate or camp with us?  Email at BlackRockDiscGolfClub@gmail.com or find us on Facebook.

See you on the playa!

camps.name: Lucy B
camps.description: Aldo at Camp Lucy B! Come say hello to your favorite Suave Ride and check out the Little House of Hoarders. Bet we have something you need...

camps.name: BRC WEEKLY newspaper
camps.description:
BRC WEEKLY newspaper
Black Rock City's favorite independent newsweekly
http://BRCWeekly.com

camps.name: Abstininthe
camps.description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa, providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millennium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambiance and conversation of our neighborhood bar.

camps.name: Conception
camps.description: We highlight that moment when ideas become tangible:  the birthing of whim, desire, and emotion into art and performance. We believe in everyone’s innate creativity and we foster and celebrate that inner spark, providing a fertile (play)ground for it.

camps.name: Mimosa Sunrise
camps.description: Mimosas at every sunrise. Join us at our Bar as the sun rises for good drinks, great stories and awesome people before you call it a night.

camps.name: Voted Best Camp
camps.description: Come get schooled by a bunch of busted down punk rockers who are smarter, funnier, and better looking than yourself. Each with one foot in their graves, they will show you how to do fucking Burning Man.  Skateboarding? Check. Live Rock and Roll played on ACTUAL instruments? Check. Booze? Check. This is the unbreakable magic triangle that has defended the city against electronic misery and drug induced delusion since 2005. The rumors are true. Now come see it for yourselves.

camps.name: Totem of Confessions
camps.description: Totem of Confessions.  We support art!

camps.name: Heart of Reflection
camps.description: The Heart of Reflection. A contemplative labyrinth in which to walk an intertwined path and pledge your love to yourself or your partner for a night or forever.

camps.name: Uniclan Presents: Carnie Cult
camps.description: Carnie Cult is a fantastic gypsy band of quirky characters - heckling peddlers, fortune tellers, eccentric inventors, wizards, riveters, and talented freaks and beauties from far-away lands, led to Black Rock City by their mysterious leader, Margaret. Come have your fortune read, create your own sideshow, or burn your money in our decommodi-fire!

camps.name: Virgin Hooper Camp
camps.description: Can't keep it up? Want to learn how to hoop or master new tricks? Visit Virgin Hooper Camp. We have a 99.7% success rate in teaching hula hooping.

camps.name: The Space Baggers
camps.description:
Our big ass board games bring all the burners to The Yard, and
they’re like, “Hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop.
Don’t worry we’ll make time for recess.

camps.name: Parasol Mafia
camps.description: The Parasol Mafia is dedicated to helping you energize and sustain your body, heart, and mind. Enjoy our shaded self-care station with essentials like sunscreen, earplugs, chilled water, electrolyte drinks, and other sustenance; groove with us at our reggae/ska happy hours; decorate and keep a paper parasol; revitalize yourself in our covered dome with guided workshops; get funky at our night time dance parties; Love yourself, it’s an offer you can’t refuse.

camps.name: Playa Court
camps.description: Playa Court - A place to argue, laugh, and learn.

camps.name: Stellar Dusty Moon
camps.description: From the makers of SpinCycle comes Stellar Dusty Moon! Where the drinks are out of this world, as are the workshops and the fun!

camps.name: Camp Pickled Monkey
camps.description:
Mirror Mirror has fucked with thee
Have your eyes had simply too much to see?
Playa dust has parched your throat 
Don’t let Chimpy get your goat.
Soft Keys you hear
So you draw slowly near.
Find the secret passage way 
Come inside and Drink.
We a Piana Bar.

camps.name: Titicaca
camps.hometown: Lake Tahoe, Reno, Austin, Sun Valley, Eugene, Bozeman, Jackson Hole
camps.description: Ah... delightful Lake Titicaca, high in the Andes Mountains, and with such an interesting name with so many meanings.  Come frolic!

camps.name: 404:// Village Not Found
camps.description: Void where prohibited.

camps.name: ToneAge - CARNivAL PLEASURES
camps.description: ToneAge - CARNivAL PLEASURES, a great mix of new and old alike, primarily from Vancouver, Denver and San Francisco, but always happy to see and welcome new participants from wherever they call home.

camps.name: Scrabble Camp
camps.description: Scrabble Camp, Come play Scrabble on our big board.

camps.name: Eridu Society
camps.description: An explorer's club for time travelers, creators, makers, designers, and thinkers.  We take our name from Eridu, the first city in ancient Sumer, and we gather in Black Rock City to share stories, ideas, art and passion.

camps.name: Primate Playground
camps.description: Step right up to the nonstop carnival at the Primate Playground. We have events with Monkey Carnival Games, Flying Monkeys, 80’s Dance Party, Viking Ice Hugs, BubbleTron (It’s SCIENCE!!!), Bacon and Jimmy Buffet hour. OR just come be a lazy monkey and meet some Primates on our luscious astro-grass under the shade of the flying monkey hut, SizzleVille style!

camps.name: Art Car Camp
camps.description: Art Car Camp is where “Daily Driver” licensed and insured full time art cars are displayed. These are vehicles that work their magic all year round, in the communities they hail from. Come see the M-Used Car Lot and meet the artists! Also showing films.

camps.name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
camps.description: Hidden in the palms behind the ack ack gun at the end of the runway is a sandbagged hideaway run by misfits, stocked with shanghaied liquor and torpedo juice. Air raids and shore patrol be damned, we're still alive so tonight we're gonna party like its 1945. Merry Christmas Tulagi 1945!

camps.name: Camp SPF
camps.description: Camp SPF has been providing Sunscreen during the day and low key evening entertainment since 2007.

camps.name: Death Guild Thunderdome
camps.description:
Death Guild Thunderdome
The dark beating heart of the playa since 1999.

camps.name: Black Rock Roller Disco
camps.description: Where people come to get their roller disco groove on @ BRC

camps.name: Champs and Tramps
camps.description: Been making Poor Life Choices lately? Stop by Champs and Tramps for New Year's Re-Do! Fresh starts served daily with a champagne toast, a ball drop and chance to leave those PLCs behind...it's always midnight somewhere!

camps.name: FurBallz Village
camps.description: FurBallz Village, home to Cats!Cats!Cats! and Debocceri. Join us Thursday afternoon for the Cats & Balls Block Party or anytime for feline frolicking or a game of bocce. Come by for the Kitty Porn Film Festival, our Scandinavian "Wife" Carrying Contest, our Bocce Ball Tournaments or some down home bluegrass tunes.

camps.name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
camps.description: We are an eco camp that runs on solar power, we specialize in educating others in repairing their bikes and more. Our lounge is a great place to hangout and wile away the hours with a drink or two with friends old and new.

camps.name: Camp Half Ass
camps.description: At Camp Half-Ass we have a GIANT swing. Interactive Art Installations and a Beer Garden Happy Hour on Tuesday, Wed, & Thursday afternoons. Come enjoy an "ICE COLD beer" and fun company. Don't forget to try your hand at our Stool Surfing and Beer Bobbing

camps.name: KazbusKamp Transformation Station
camps.description: Kazbus Kamp Transformation Station! Let us work some mirror magic! Come to our big top for a three-ring circus of top-to-bottom transformation and a new you: Saturnalia Salon for face and body painting and hair mutation; Atelier of the Absurd for carny costumery and outrageous accessorizing; and Psychic Parlour for some affirmative encouragement to discover your playa gifts. Let our talented team of image alchemists tease out the beautiful, bodacious Burner in you!

camps.name: Boo Boo City
camps.description: Boo Boo City is a teeming borough and twisted version of Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood that incorporates a deli (Mikey’s Hug Deli) and a grand desert lounge. Camp hosts pirate yoga - arrr, a place to get lost in your mind (Brain Wave Escape), and the biggest, most sweetie-pie stray cat (Boo Boo Kitty).

camps.name: Gypsy Nebula Village
camps.description: Welcome to our interstellar cloud of fortune tellers, minstrels, monkeys, coffee slingers and fools. Bonded by playa dust, come visit at any time of day to discover your true destiny or just sit out of the sun while some stranger fondles your palm.

camps.name: Decadent Oasis
camps.description: A glowing multicolored oasis in the dark of night, a windswept grove of white palm trees by day--our magical oasis and sheltered lounge welcome you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Slack lines, trampoline, giant twister, other games, DJ's, day/night dance parties, hula hoops, and friendly folks all around--in an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials.

camps.name: Fire Conclave Convergence
camps.description: Fire Performers who have been accepted into the Fire Conclave will register and receive information.  Also available is information of fire performances on the playa during the week.

camps.name: Burner Buddies
camps.description:
Who's your Burner Buddie?

Ever have someone say you were gonna lose your Gay Card only to realize you don’t have one?  Get one @ Burner Buddies.

camps.name: Darwin Fish Tank
camps.description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill within the waves with some liquid joy.

camps.name: Emerge-n-See  Sparkle Pony Corral
camps.description: "Emerge-n-See In-Tents-IV Care Unit and Sparkle Pony Corral" are two camps joined in the common cause of caring: ICU is a spoof on the real BRC med tents; we play doctor; Sparkle Pony Corral provides similar but more specialized care for those "special" camp mates. Together, we're BRC's preferred alternative health care providers (DOUBLE money back guarantee!!!).

camps.name: D B Copper airport shuttle lounge
Sin City
camps.description: Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced and "What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City." There is always something happening and there are many things to see and do at the Party Naked Tiki Bar, BRC Airbrush, Sin City Day Spa, Sin City Costume Exchange, Sin City Art Center, Sin City Volleyball, photo opportunities and much more.

camps.name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
camps.description: We’re back serving morning Bloody Mary’s at 9:00am and cold Tiki Punch for ages 21 and over starting at 11:00am (ID required). Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get “leid”. Come party with us for our 7th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly.

camps.name: Sin City Costume Exchange
camps.description: Donations of new or gently used costumes are welcome starting Monday. Come browse our selection of playa costumes that we’ve been collecting starting on Wednesday. Let our girls make you over and leave with a fun new costume for the playa and you can even pay it forward when you donate a gently used costume that no longer suits you. Come early for the best selection.

camps.name: Sin City Day Spa
camps.description: Have a mini “MIRACLE SHOWER” and learn how you can “shower” on playa with two glasses of water and feel squeaky clean. All you need to do is bring your own towel. Other services include foot massage/moisturizing, sun screen or aloe vera application, manicures and more. Come by and check for hours of operation and full services list.

camps.name: Sin City Volleyball & Rec Center
camps.description: The Sin City Volleyball Rec Center is where you can go to get your game on. Our enclosed volleyball court is perfect for games of volleyball, badminton, disk soccer, dodge ball, hooping and more. Check out our matches or come enjoy free play time with friends or even join a game and make new friends.

camps.name: Sin City Art Center
camps.description: Come by any time to enjoy our collection of Burner Art created by camp members and local Burners. See what creative minds have made for you to enjoy. Please, be respectful of the artists that have contributed to create this display and do not vandalize or steal from the art center.  Thank you.

camps.name: Black Rock City Airbrush
camps.description:
Black Rock City Airbrush is back!
This camp resides within the Sin City Village and offers the finest custom airbrushed T-shirts and body art made just for you! “You-say-it-we-spray-it"
We are creating MAXIMUM participation from gifted patrons!
Expect to participate, and/or take a guerilla course in airbrushing! You may even find yourself running our booth while we sneak away.   
Enthusiasm, Curiosity, Compliments, Flirting, Patience, and Cold Beer go a long way at our camp!

camps.name: MegaBounce
camps.description: Chill place for past, present, and future friends.  We have a bounce house!  Come for a bounce, then stay for the fun!  ;)

camps.name: Synapse Conduit
camps.description: Synapse Conduit is a place where you will interact with a number of Burners who will tell your fortune, read your tarot,  play mind games and interact in a fun and silly manner. Our goal is to help you relax, discuss the hip happenings of life and the playa and ensure you leave with a smile somewhere on your body.

camps.name: hi! hi!
camps.description: camp hi! featuring the light lunge, Morrissey Temple of Sad, and sunrises with Chopin.

camps.name: Russian Roulette
camps.description:
Russian Roulette? Why the heck NOTsky?

We will turn people in to Russians and turn Russians in to people.

camps.name: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome
camps.description: Every human being can manifest their ultimate potential and live a life of true happiness through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo. Come learn and play with us at the Lotus Dome.

camps.name: Back To Camp
camps.description: A hybrid between Dirty Dancing and Wet Hot American Summer, Back To Camp is a place where the spirit of Tuolumne Family Camp will be continued through a theme camp at Burning Man.

camps.name: Mayan Warrior
camps.description: Mayan Warrior is both a camp and a massive moving stage.  After years of collaboration and inspiration, a group of artists, designers, musicians, builders, wanderers, lovers, and festival designers created Mayan Warrior to bring an underground culture from Mexico City D.F. to the Playa.

camps.name: Black Rock City Municipal Airport
camps.description:
Black Rock City Municipal Airport is the air gate to the event. 
Information is at 88NV.burningman.com

camps.name: Inappropirates
camps.description:
The inappropirates are... 1) Inappropriate. 2) Pirates.

Oh. And we serve coffee.

camps.name: Dome on the Range
camps.description: An East meets West Saloon-of Sorts; combining the spices, silks, and teas of the east with the spurs, saloons, whiskeys and wagon trains of the west. Cowboy hats meet Saris. Tea ceremonies meets tumbleweeds. Banjos meet Sitars. Where one sun sets, the other rises!

camps.name: Media Mecca
camps.description: Media Mecca is home to the members of the Media Team that volunteer to assist press, filmmakers, photographers and other members of the media in the endeavor to document the cultural story of Black Rock City and Burning Man. Come on by to register your media project for publication or to meet up with other photographers, videographers, or journalists.

camps.name: aLittle
camps.description: aLittle something for everyone! Join us at dawn for sunrise mimosas. While you're there chat us up about our other activities, including yoga, bike jousting, playa marriages.  Join us for discussions about finding meaning (Tuesday @ 3PM) and dealing with loss as an atheist/skeptic (Thursday @ 3PM).

camps.name: Calico
camps.description: Calico brings traditional tap and jazz dancing to the playa. Come join us for instruction and rock out sessions!

camps.name: 7 Sirens Cove
camps.description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, gypsy lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground.  Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren’s call!  Now also including Fuego Karyoke Bar!

camps.name: N-Toxicade
camps.description: We are a twisted arcade dedicated to messing with your perception of video games as an art form by either changing how you play the game or even the game itself.  Plus Booze... N-Toxicade!

camps.name: Red Lightning
camps.description:
Red Lightning- Arrow to Evolution
Red Lightning was born out of a desire to bring balance and healing between the masculine and feminine on Earth as a first step towards a cosmic consciousness.  To learn more about who we are, what we do and what we are bringing to the Playa, visit us at www.redlightning.org
See you in the Dust!

camps.name: Jerk Church
camps.description: We gather at our cathedral to Break Bread, Share a Cup, and a Song. Sometimes we have weddings. Sometimes we run a bar. Sometimes we like to sit quietly and contemplate the true nature of the Jerk. All are welcome.

camps.name: Tiki Hammock camp
camps.description: Tiki Hammock Camp - Have a drink and relax in our climbable hammock art, meet and visit with other awesome burners!

camps.name: Alternative Energy Zone
camps.description:
The AEZ is a generator free zone. If you like alternative energy, then welcome, you are invited to join our village of friendly folks. You will see and learn about solar panels, wind generators, solar ovens, solar showers, water cleaning,

and meet people who can show YOU how to do this.

camps.name: South Bay HardCORE Camp
camps.description: South Bay HardCORE - the home of the South Bay Burners region.  Join us for our on-playa Meet & Greet and hear how to connect with fellow South Bay Burners year-round!

camps.name: RhythmWave
camps.description:
Proud to return to Black Rock City for our 9th consecutive year, the RhythmWave theme camp is dedicated to the practice of Conscious Dance as a moving meditation. With no experience necessary and no "steps" to learn, Conscious Dance provides a path - the destination is the discovery of ourselves and a return to our center.

Facilitators from around the globe offer multiple daily sessions of Conscious Dance and movement on our 2,000 sq. ft., fully shaded and easily-accessible bamboo dance floor. RW also hosts morning yoga and meditation, as well as workshops and intention circles throughout the week. All citizens of Black Rock City are invited to bless the bamboo at RhythmWave. Please join us!

camps.name: Camp Luminoso
camps.description: Camp Luminoso is a place where you can create your own lanterns.

camps.name: Cirque Gitane
camps.description: Cirque Gitane is an intergalactic, nomadic traveling circus comprised of dreamers from all over the globe who create for a living and who support the creative arts.

camps.name: Wulf Den
camps.description: The Wulf Den is where you can come heal your mind and body in the morning, then ruin it again in the evening! Come Dance in the shade to our groovy beats, and craft a wulf cock in our lounge area

camps.name: Kentucky Fried Camp
camps.description: Kentucky Fried Camp - proudly serving the finest breakfast on the playa with the sweetest southern hospitality since 2000 something. Fried Baloney Sandwiches and fine Kentucky bourbon served up daily by gingham clad Kentuckians.

camps.name: COHESION
camps.description:
Come to Cohesion to get weird with us!

We love to party and get silly and make new friends. Always someone to hang out with and a drink to be served from our amazing bar made out of recycled material. Come lounge in our hammock dome or get extra sparkly at the pussy pop lock and drop it station.

camps.name: People's Art Congress
camps.description: People's Art Congress welcomes Burners to 3 exciting Interactive Art Projects: Black Light Portrait Painting, Black Light Marionette Theater, 3D Kaleidoscope. Come paint our faces, pull our strings, and have a 3D view of your surroundings. Open day and night, after dark viewing is enhanced by UV lighting, accentuating the 3 ring circus effect.

camps.name: Cranky and Sons Bike Repair
camps.description: Come to Cranky and Sons for assistance, education and advice for those "Oh shit!" cycling needs, from a flat tire to exploded derailer, and we'll help you get back out onto the playa. If you’ve got some free time and can lend a hand, grab a beer and a wrench and help us help those in need!  Mechanics on duty mornings until 1pm – DIY tools available any time.

camps.name: VooDoo Soup
camps.description: Hot soup, live music,homebrewed sodas. Sousaphones welcome.

camps.name: Arctica Ice Sales
camps.description:
Arctica Ice Sales is your center-of-town resource for ice.  Bags of crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag.  During the event, ice sales hours are Mon-Sat 9am-6pm, Sun Noon-6pm and Mon (Labor Day) 10am-Noon.

Pre-event ice sales are Thurs-Sun 9am-3pm AT THIS LOCATION ONLY.

camps.name: Ice Cubed
camps.description: Ice Cubed is the ice sales igloo located in the 3 o'clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag.  Ice3 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm. (No pre-event or Labor Day sales at this location).

camps.name: Ice Nine
camps.description: Ice Nine is the ice sales igloo located in the 9 o'clock plaza.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3/bag .  Ice9 sales hours are Mon-Sat, 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm.  (No pre-event or Labor Day sales at this location).

camps.name: Cotton Candy Camp
camps.description: We serve pink, sticky, delicious cotton candy every day during the event!!!!

camps.name: So Far So Good
camps.description: Possibly the only mini-golf course in all of Black Rock City! Come and putt around with or against your friends and prepare to go head-to-head in the Wednesday tournament.

camps.name: Friendzied Serenity
camps.description:
A Chill Lounge in the Suburbs
Come relax in the shade and try one of the special "Kiwi" drinks away from the hustle & bustle of the Esplanade

camps.name: Captain Billy's Karaoke Bistro
camps.description: Sing for your supper, feeling hungry or have a craving for attention? Got some talent you want to show off?  Come to our tiny cabaret and show us what you got and you will be rewarded with a great breakfast in the AM or cocktails and tasty food in the evening

camps.name: Blacklight ObstacleCourse Croquet
camps.description: The Through the Looking Glass Cosmic Black-light Obstacle Croquet Course is a miniature golf style course played with croquet mallets and balls.

camps.name: Playa Pete's Plaza
camps.description: Playa Pete's Plaza / The Monaco's home port.

camps.name: Paradise Motel
camps.description: Paradise Motel, established in 2008 with members hailing from our Default World locales of SF and LA, is the most garish of roadside motels; yet the best of the "no-tel" genre, where weary travelers are invited to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy some progressive beats while lounging by the "pool".   Join us for snow cones, a chill place to relax and to find out what other fun things there are to do in the Gayborhood at our Concierge Desk every afternoon, Sunrise yoga most mornings, and our “Gypsy Mirrorball” event on Tuesday.

camps.name: A Shack of Sit
camps.description: A Shack of Sit - Where Sit Happens!

camps.name: GYST CAMP
camps.description: GYST Camp is about Getting Your Shit Together! We bring our little piece of the playa to life with a bit of everything. If you want FUN, or need to Get Your Shit Together, you will want to stop by this neighborhood bar and see what is happening!

camps.name: Tectonic
camps.description: Come bask in the shade of our fire spewing volcano, or dance to our ground-shaking beats while we serve you a tec n' tonic.  Don't forget to bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano gods!

camps.name: Music Savages Camp
camps.description:
We classify Music Savages as a Lounge Camp. This is a hybrid between your traditional Sound Camp and Relaxation Area. By blending hand selected music provided by international talent with art, comedy, comfort, and an intense lack of drama, we create a unique oasis off the beaten path. We prefer to stay out of the limelight - making it a pleasant surprise to stubble upon if you’re exploring without a set destination. 

Experience the 360 sound system and sound-2-light installation for performances, relax to ambient music after-hours, bounce around on Kangraoo Shoes if your timing is right, motorboat some titties after a fresh shotgun to the face, and toss the bocce or baggo with your homies - ALL at Music Savages Camp.

camps.name: The Lost Boys
camps.description: The Lost boys is a fun interactive camp where you can come for an event like Naked bacon and stay and hang out for hours.

camps.name: Twilight Spaghetti Theatre
camps.description: Perform for your chance to slurp our hot wet noodles. This is your chance to show off your under-appreciated talents on our custom built stage for a spaghetti dinner!

camps.name: Chomp and Stomp
camps.description: Camp Chomp and Stomp - a team of makers and shakers. Find us in camp for decadent leisure and merry making.

camps.name: Bang Bang
camps.hometown: Sydney, Australia with strong ties to New York, London and LA
camps.description: Camp Bang Bang is a community of open hearted Life Lovers and we welcome you to our playground of meditation, music, dancing and romantic dinners. Climb into our Harmony Hammocks to create unified song with your fellow Hammockers or Dance for your Dinner each night for the chance to be treated to dinner for two featuring live entertainment by our world class performers of nursery rhymes and finger puppetry.

camps.name: Risa
camps.description: RISA is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, beaches and friendly atmosphere. Our main attraction at RISA during the afternoon is our Snow Cones.  Evening Mutant Vehicle rides on the Mistress Amadee and the Dancing Peacock.

camps.name: Airstreameri and What Not
camps.description: Airstreameri and What Not; come join us Wed evening for dusty scientific talks from a Geologist or Botanist or even a guyno talk by our resident Gynecologist. We have the Best Playa Post Card Table to misinform the folks back home where you are.

camps.name: Cyberia
camps.description: Cyberia - the coolest place on the playa, with a chillax dome and snow cone machines churning out frozen treats. Step out of the heat and join us for daily meditation, yoga, and Shabari classes.

camps.name: Cheezy Porn
camps.description: Cheezy Porn returns to Burning Man 2015, now featuring the Draft Punk bar! Stop by in the afternoon for a cold drink, participate in our "Pornival" games, build your own Bad Decision Bear, or dance at our RW dance floor!

camps.name: Kamp BrewHaHa
camps.description: Kamp BrewHaha - from 7-11 each morning we provide freshly brewed coffee, banter, good humor and even better people; old school coffee house of the first order, out in the peaceful suburbs of BRC.

camps.name: Elliot's Bicycle Service
camps.description: Elliot’s Bicycle Service operates daily Noon to 6, plus do-it-yourself 24/8. Please bring your own spare parts if possible.

camps.name: Cabana Club
camps.description: Come and enjoy The Favorite Vacation Destination for the hard working citizens of Black Rock City!  The Cabana Club is an oasis of hospitality and friendship. We serve up a refreshing array of nosh and cocktails for your Afternoon Delight and a variety of late-night themed events.

camps.name: KashyyyK
camps.description:
Wookie Juice, Wookie Hugs, Wookie Art & Wookies dancing like... 
Well... like Wookies.

camps.name: Nåårsførtown Village
camps.description: Everything your parents warned you about.

camps.name: S'mores N Amour
camps.description:
S'MORES!  Come roast a marshmallow and we turn it into a delicious S'more.  Kids of all ages are welcome.  Campfire singing and storytelling is highly encouraged.  Marshmallows will be burned!

Also, Dr. Who visits Camp S'mores N Amour....come see his TARDIS and the PANDORICA.  Come find out if Time Lords eat marshmallows.

camps.name: Fun Yay Fun
camps.description:
By day, we provide the fun in our interactive kiosk, The Fun Booth. 
By night, we’re Black Rock City’s only solar-lit Patrick Swayze Memorial Alter and Life Celebration site.

camps.name: MINSTREL CrAMP
camps.description:
Feeling the need to blow, beat or stroke on something?   
Come to MINSTREL CrAMP and get your creative "musical juices" flowing.
Stop in, Listen in , Join in, to some great live acoustic, jamming with our house band "THE BURNING SENSATIONS".
Check the schedule board out front to see what's happening or sign -up for a slot to perform with your own band (or ours)
It's all good!   
Listeners welcome!

camps.name: MerKaBah
camps.description: We at Merkabah Camp are committed to doing the deep evolutionary work, as individuals and as a tribe. Our community is coming together to curate transformational experiences, where in programming is dedicated to bringing in the most profound healers, doctors and experts to share knowledge of holistic health and wellness, earthly stewardship, and shamanic healing.

camps.name: BLM Interpretive Camp
camps.description: The goal of this years exhibit will be to educate and involve Burning Man participants in understanding the important role BLM plays in the protection and management of America's public lands and to promote safety in and around the Black Rock Desert and surrounding areas.

camps.name: BLM/Pershing County LawEnforcement
camps.description: Bureau of Land Management and the Pershing County Sheriff's Office will have a substation in Center Camp.  Stop by to report a crime, fill out a crime report or just to show your appreciation for the law enforcement professionals who work so hard to keep Black Rock City safe.

camps.name: FANDANGO!
camps.hometown: San Luis Obispo and San Francisco, CA, Seattle, WA, Missoula, MT, among others.
camps.description:
Sexier than you appear in your most vivid dreams, Scuzzier than a French Quarter gutter on Fat Tuesday.

We are your Neighborhood Dive Bar, complete with a piano and pool table. Serving strong cocktails and playing music with words, all day and all night.

camps.name: Camp Whisker Biscuit
camps.description: Calling all aerialists, cocktail enthusiasts and fun-loving freaks!  Swing by Camp Whisker Biscuit for a cold drink, delicious shade and inverted adventures.   Daily Happy Hour is from 2pm-4pm.  Don't forget to check out the city views from the top deck of our beloved burner bus Birdie.

camps.name: Earth Guardians
camps.description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come, volunteer and participate in our daily yoga, talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!

camps.name: WeScream
camps.description: Camp WeScream plans to serve ice cream to all who wander by, lost or not.  We invite people to relax in our shade, churn some old-fashioned hand-cranked ice cream, hang out, and interact with us and others.  We expect the lure of cold ice cream in the hot desert afternoon to sing its siren song to return people to a time where a community would gather together to provide for all.

camps.name: Red RubberTattoo
camps.description: Red Rubber Tattoo - Lavishing temporary rubber-stamp tattoo art or your personable topography since the last century.

camps.name: West Lake
camps.description:
http://www.jozphoto.com/daying

Come to learn the art of Taichi Fan

camps.name: Rock Star (Camp Rock Star)
camps.description: Camp Rock Star hosts multimedia rock concerts every evening, complete with a magical stage, psychedelic lighting, video projections, and, of course, incredible musicians and bands. Our goal is to infuse the Playa with the incomparable energy of the live concert experience, and inspire other burners to take the stage.

camps.name: Recycle Camp
camps.description: Monday through Sunday, 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. you can stop by to crush and recycle your aluminum cans at Recycle Camp. Be sure to come by before they close Sunday evening! Recycle Camp can be found at 6:00 ON THE INNER CIRCLE OF CENTER CAMP, just behind the Center Camp Café.

camps.name: Burning Man Information Radio
camps.description:
BMIR - Burning Man Information Radio.  Live on the playa at 94.5FM and streaming all year long at bmir.org

BMIR is the official radio station of Burning Man.  Tune into BMIR for a wide variety of news, information and entertainment including artist and participant interviews, burn times, weather and playa news.

camps.name: Camp Questionmark )?(
camps.description:
"A questioning mind does not always find satisfaction in what is effortlessly presented in mass...it seeks out what is needed for true fulfillment"  ~?
 
Instead of trying to bring a club out to Burning Man we are here to summon a desert experience. Filled with the collective creative energy of the burn. Music & atmosphere born from & inspired by the dust.  )?( 
+++Music Day & Night from Tues till BurnNight+++

Come (((feel))) the difference & Seek the answer

)?(

camps.name: Arcadia
camps.description: Art support camp for Hall of Mirrors Arcade and Macabre Penny Arcade.  "Arcadia" means"a quiet and pleasant place!"

camps.name: Camp Sass
camps.description: Camp Sass.. Home of the Lady Sassafras and NOLA funk!

camps.name: Gingerbread House Camp
camps.description: Gingerbread House Camp - For Ginger People.  A place for red heads to call home, eat gingerbread-man cookies and ginger chews, while receiving a sunblock lotion massages.  Non-gingers are welcome to attend, and evolve their existence in the Gingification Station.

camps.name: Acampamento HUITZIL HUITZIL
camps.description: Everyone is invited to transform into a tropical bird in an tropical soundscape. Come test out your wings on trampolines or occasionally even diving from sky high.

camps.name: Valhalla on the Playa
camps.description: Valhalla On The Playa, a Norse idea of heaven, we will be a place to take off the armor of life and begin to slip into the beginnings of afterlife. Our drinks will be cold, our men and woman lithe and cheerful, as we are all guided to our final resting place in our shady comfortable lounge.

camps.name: Wanderer's Camp
camps.description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, ice cold Gin/Tonic's, and Hot Dogs,  Come by every afternoon for a hot dog or veggie dog, a gin/tonic and enjoy the shade, great company and music.

camps.name: Camp 11:11
camps.description: Celebrate 11:11--11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It's a totally vertical moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11

camps.name: Taiwanderlust
camps.description:
Come on join us and get heart with us!
Come to night market and you will fun with sexy betel nut girls and hot Taiwan sausage! 
Can you imagine a goddess, Empress of Sea, Mazu, show up in Burning Man?! Come to see and welcome to join us! 
We love to share Taiwan temple culture with you at workshop.

camps.name: Bacon Oasis II
camps.description: Bacon Oasis. Chewy, Spicy, Sticky morsels of Playa Perfection. Please stop by Monday, Wednesday and Friday in the early playa morning. Try to see your reflection in your sticky fingers before you pleasingly lick them clean.

camps.name: Flying Falafels
camps.description:
Flying Falafels invites you to come experience and enjoy a Mediterranean oriented camp, offering great discussions, music, flavors - with awesome hospitality and great vibes .
As the tradition goes on don't miss our Falafel party on Friday 2 pm.

camps.name: KSA Disco Katz
camps.description: Pounce by for a furrocious pawty in our gLitter box disco pyramid, enjoy a meowmosa to some funky house on Monday morning, or perhaps bring your finest hat for Hatty Hour on Wednesday shortly before dusk, but for the Madonna fans out there who happen to have a soft spot for house and daquiri's we have just the thing: MaDaquiri Hour on Friday late afternoon will tie together your life! Purr... HISS HISS!!! Purrr......

camps.name: Enchanted Booty Village
camps.description: Welcome to The Enchanted Booty Village! Come enjoy a magical time.

camps.name: Camp Naughty Bench
camps.description:
The naughty bench is effective discipline for all naughty burners.  the punishment? More Fun!!!
Come visit Camp Naughty Bench and join in on a number of listed activities and enjoy the view from the naughtiest bench of all.

camps.name: Pair-a-dice @ The Beach
camps.description: Come see us at Pair-a-dice @ The Beach, It's where all the good stuff happens. The Beach, A Bamboo Bar and a Fish Tank…yeps!

camps.name: Hammock Beach Resort
camps.description: Come relax in our beautiful Oaxacan wedding hammocks at the Hammock Beach Resort.  Come listen and learn about computer science algorithms like sorting and searching on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday at 11am.

camps.name: Gerlach-Empire Bus Stop & Tickets
camps.description:
Dusty Black Rock Denizens! Help your fellow participants get to town and back on the fun-loving shuttle bus service. Our crew is responsible for selling tickets, answering questions, providing local info and chatting up drivers on the radio over the course of multiple, several hour, mid-day shifts.

The Empire-Gerlach Bus Ticket Office is located on the Center Camp ring road, and offers plenty of people watching, not to mention shelter and shade. We’re looking for people who can work during the day for a responsible job that’s also FUN.

If you’re interested, fill out the Volunteer Questionnaire and check the box Bus Depot.

camps.name: Pickle Joint
camps.description: Crisp, cold, brisk pickles - and so much more - from the generous wenches and noble studs who've been serving you for 13 years. Giving until it hurts.

camps.name: Nordic Space Camp
camps.hometown: Stockholm, Malmö, Göteborg, Oslo, Copenhagen, Helsinki
camps.description: The Nordic Space Camp let’s us reflect on who we are by seeing ourselves from space. Come experience the universe through three interactive art installations, and join us in establishing the first art installation on the moon.

camps.name: Jankytown
