camps.description: Live music, circus art, comedy, and performance art featuring artists from Cirque du Cliche, Samba Stilt Circus, Fou Fou Ha Clowns, and Ministry of Flow Fire Arts

camps.name: CAMPSTAR AKA EVEVOLUTION
camps.description: You are invited to enter a sacred space where we will be exploring our Divine Feminine and Masculine bodies as ONE. In line with the mission of the Burning Man community, we will have workshops on female sexuality, healing, shamanism, polyamory and love.  We welcome all, women and men, and we honor new and experienced Burners.

camps.name: Blue Lotus
camps.description: http://www.jozphoto.com/daying

camps.name: Department of Mutant Vehicles
camps.description: The Department of Mutant Vehicles licenses all mutant vehicles and disabled persons' vehicles allowed to drive during the event.

camps.name: Turkey Camp
camps.description: What key has two legs, two wings and can't open doors? A Turkey, that's right, welcome to Turkey Camp (it's not a typo).

camps.name: Gazoonie Camp
camps.description: Larry Harvey will write this

camps.name: Brand-UR-Ass N' More
camps.description: Brand-UR-Ass 'N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin post and get a temporary brand. Bathe in gong vibrations, do some cock ropin', enjoy tunes, belly up to the saloon, enjoy the giving tree, visit the Pink Fuzzy Monkeys and hitch a ride on our vehicles. Y'all come N play!

camps.name: Awesomesauce
camps.description: Most of what happens in our camp is spontaneous.  We have a nice shady people watching gallery on the street that might be a bar, a snack shack, a workshop, or whatever else the moment calls for.  Did you get a drive by spanking while on the go on E street in 2014?  Maybe you came by during one of our Awesomesauce Awesome Shots party hours?  We host Chow Time, a military ration mealtime event and we’re always glad to meet new folks.  Stop on by!

camps.name: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux
camps.description: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux will be again roasting coffee right on the Playa while serving the freshest coffee in Black Rock City.  Come join the fun and grind up your own special blend of coffees from all over the world, then pull up a chair or pillow and hang out under our shaded pavilion.

camps.name: Everywhere Pavilion
camps.description: The Everywhere Pavilion serves as a point of connection between Black Rock Citizens and off-playa worldwide Burning Man-related projects and culture. Come learn about the Regionals Network, Burning Man Arts' off-playa programs, Burners Without Borders, and Black Rock Solar as well as connect with other like-minded burners about your year-round efforts to bring Burning Man culture to the rest of the world.

camps.name: U.F.O.
camps.description: U.F.O. What is that? U Figure it Out…..

camps.name: Uhuru
camps.description: Come to Uhuru for soul nourishment at our desert oasis, the Dream Tea Lounge. Explore your dreams with other weary travelers looking to rest their feet and expand their minds. Climb our Sky Tipi for an adventure, and look for our Dream Catcher marking the entrance to our camp! For those among us seeking connection to past, present, and future, visit our Dream Ateliers and walk away with a piece of our history. Welcome!

camps.name: Census
camps.description: The Census has been collecting information about the population of Black Rock City since 2002. The results of the Census from previous years will be on display at the Census camp. The 2015 results of the Census will be presented in the Afterburn report accessible through the Burning Man website.

camps.name: Bad Asstronauts
camps.description: Bad Asstronauts, Burning Man's official galactic space port. Come explore Uranus and other interesting celestial bodies.

camps.name: Nipple Crime
camps.description: Camp Nipple Crime has the intention of crackin down on nipple crimes committed by the citizens of beautiful Black Rock City. We encourage all sorts of nipples and creatures alike to take part in the creation of their very own personalized pasties.

camps.name: TITTIES & PANCAKES MADNESS MUSEUM
camps.description: We have pancakes in the shape of animals, titties in the shape of titties, robotic creeptures, gaffs like the Fiji mermaid, reports of a live freakshow, mutated taxidermy/dried parts CHECK, body paint in the shape of mud CHECK two headed baby CHECK and now introducing... pancakes in the shape of titties!! Oh and did we mention DUTTCH? Come by and check in with RATS and DIANE!! New to DITCH? Everyone has to start somewhere. Nothing is what it seems, everyone is mad and the tea parties get you smashed.

camps.name: Caja Pedo
camps.description: Caja Pedo is a refuge for all those who wander, so escape the heat and join us for daily rejuvenation, unlock answers that only bananas and pendulums can reveal. The playa is full of dust, so bring your dusty Caja Pedo our way.

camps.name: Beach @ The End of The Universe
camps.description: The ultimate playa oasis!

camps.name: Cirque Brûlée
camps.description: Ladies and Gentlemen, Boys and Girls, Children of All Ages (so long as that ages is over 21)... step right into Cirque Brûlée - Black Rock City's Esplanade kinky circus at 7:45 and Esplanade! Best Püntang on the playa!

camps.name: Steampunk Saloon
camps.description: A nomadic 1880s style watering hole showcasing DJs, live music and performers of all kinds.

camps.name: Siberian Electric Company
camps.description: A Soviet era nuclear power plant somewhere in the back waters of Siberia. Come by for a cool drinkski. Our accents are bad but the drinks are tasty.

camps.name: Reno Housewives
camps.description: Helping costume BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered.

camps.name: Where Da Lady?
camps.description: Shaved ice during the hottest part of the day!

camps.name: Camp GTFO
camps.description: Camp GTFO!  Come visit us when it's time to GTFO of your own space!  Need a break from your peeps?  Hang with ours!  Anytime you stop by, you'll often stumble across random food and drink giveaways - be sure to BYOC!

camps.name: Breakaway Republic
camps.description: Strap it on, fuckers!

camps.name: Mystikal Misfits
camps.description: Everything your parents warned you about.

camps.name: OverFuckinRated
camps.description: RevoFuckinLution is back and we are OverFuckinRated as ever in this year's Carnival of Mirrors. Come daily and let us heckle the hell out of you while you enjoy a drink, or better yet, grab a megaphone and join us. We will provide excellent shade, libations, and heckling games during the day and a fire at night. Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday nights we will have the bar open all night till we run out of the Best Northwest craft beer!

camps.name: Camp Atlantis
camps.description: Camp Atlantis offers daily 9:00am "Wake up to wellness" breathing and spinal exercise program. Come and align your energy centers, get clear focus, flex your spine to keep young, and go deep within.

camps.name: Bubble Camp
camps.description:
Bubble Camp would like to return for the 3rd year!

We will be bringing back our magical, delicious Thai Iced Tea served in the lovely Bubble Dome. Tea is served daily from noon till sundown. 

We also will be bringing back the bubble-express: a radical mail delivery innovation: write a letter and we will send it to the person that needs it most. Compose the most magical letter possible on our antique typewriters, adorn with stamps from our wide collection and seal with a kiss!

Outside of the Bubble Dome we will be hosting out yearly Badminton Tourney! Even if its not going on we are always up for a game or two. 

So stop on by while the bubbles are popping!

camps.name: Salty
camps.description: We are salty, nautical, and play daytime R&B at home base..... and rove in Gracie-Pleasure-Pier by night for the best view of the playa.

camps.name: Armone Galaxy
camps.description: Armone Galaxy: Labyrinth of Armone: A fully functional modular labyrinth obstacle course with many hidden gems, corridors of art, treasure maps, along with Armonelan scripts to decode and expand intelligence, spaces of creativity, meditation, hammock-pillow-yogic lounge, geodesic dome junglegym, aerial silks, Library of Armone, and much, much more.

camps.name: Tender Heckles Porch
camps.description: 'Oops you dropped your smile...' come find it at Tender Heckles Porch.

camps.name: Black Rock Yearbook
camps.description: Since 2007 the Black Rock Yearbook has been making a Burning Man Yearbook.  Come by our camp dressed in your playa finest and get your yearbook photo.  We are open from 11am to 4pm every day on playa.   We also take submissions to schedule a shoot of your camp group photo on playa.

camps.name: Skrambles**!*
camps.description: Born from confusion and tempered by mild incompetence. Home of the world famous "Now we dance! Now we fight!" Dance/Fight party. Absolutely no eggs. All hail String.

camps.name: Gaylactic Invaders Village
camps.description: Gaylactic Invaders Village is landing on the playa in search of intergalactic love slaves. Out-of-this-world aerial performances, beverages, and workshops held throughout the burn.  Resistance is futile!

camps.name: Mission Country Club
camps.description: San Francisco’s Mission district outpost on the playa. Eleven years and going strong!  Beer, cocktails and pretentious coffees served daily. Monday night we host the 3rd Annual BRC Hip Hop Ball!  Tuesday at 3pm we host an Afro-Carribean Drum circle.  And...the tradition continues...come by on Thursday at 4:20 for our 11th Annual Sangria SoundClash Party: dance to Cumbia/Salsa/Merengue while devouring 50+ gallons of Sangria.

camps.name: Little Uncle Janis' Pizza Planet
camps.description: At the pizza planet, all of our nieces and nephews are welcome with open arms and love in our hearts. Come and grab a button but do not upset sleeping Little Uncle Janis, he gets cranky.

camps.name: Free Photography Zone
camps.description:
At the Free Photography Zone, come and be photographed as (hopefully) you have never been before which includes your Polaroid print done in a professional studio setting with studio lighting and cameras.

For 19 years, the longest running photography studio at BM (I think), has been welcoming the participants to come, be photographed, chill in the shade, look at prints and become part of this very interactive project.

johnbrennanphoto@yahoo.com

camps.name: Zen as Fuck
camps.description: Come Dance and Brush your Teeth =)

camps.name: Radio Electra 89.9 FM
camps.description: Radio Electra 89.9 FM. We put the ROCK in Black Rock City! Offering an eclectic array of music, mayhem, commentary and art. Camps, villages,and artists wishing to make radio announcements about events may stop in or contact us by email prior to the event. Please feel free to email us or drop off any prerecorded announcements you may have. You can even come in for an interview. We want to hear from you about what you do to participate.

camps.name: Honeysuckle Hood
camps.description: Honeysuckle Hood is a conscious village comprised of three interactive, playful and engaging theme camps: Heart Tribe, Camp Mystic and Chakralicious Camp. Together these camps form a trinity of sacred connection and exploration of the Heart through the elements of body, mind and spirit. Heart Tribe's element is the body, Camp Mystic’s is the mind and Chakralicious Camp’s is the spirit. As a village, we offer a diversity of highly interactive and educational workshops,gatherings, dance parties, art exhibits, healing sessions, performances and speakers.

camps.name: Holi High Camp
camps.description: Holi High Camp brings the madness and color kaleidoscope of the Indian festival of Holi to the boisterous masses of the playa through body-paint blasting cannons.

camps.name: Summer Camp
camps.description: We invite you to enjoy Summer Camp as an adult while still letting your inner child play! Be transported to our cozy forest where our talented Camp Counselors are here to provide fun activities like: the Ring Toss Drinking Game, 8-Bit scavenger hunt adventure, climbing up our two story Thirst Aid Tree House Bar, dream interpretation, painting on our art wall, playing spin the giant bottle, yoga, meditation, improv jam, poetry, performing in our annual Talent Show, dancing the night away at our Sexy Fancy Dancy Party, making out with that special camper, campfire stories, giant marshmallow S’Mores, or if you just want to chill, we have hammocks, hand misters, a comfy couch and a pillow tent, all for you to have the best Summer Camp of your life!

camps.name: Retrofrolic
camps.description: BDSM dungeon and experienced staff with everything needed to learn and explore your sensual desires, fantasies and fetishes.  LGBTQ inclusive environment full of  exotic games and sensual experiences and that cerification you never sought!

camps.name: 1 Million Dumplings
camps.description: Hot dumplings, cooking workshops, good music, yoga and chilling zone in "1 Million Dumplings" Camp on the Burning Man Festival.

camps.name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
camps.hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco and all corners of the globe
camps.description: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge - The Preferable Party Past the Porto-Potties. It's the neighborhood bar where burners come for a drink, stay for the mingle and leave with a positive spirit to be shared throughout Black Rock City and beyond.

camps.name: Dept of Experiment and Research
camps.description: The Department of Experimentation and Research (DEAR) will serve the community as an interactive outpost of conversation and humor. We also will serve as a stopping over place on the way to someplace else.  Stop by and visit in the shade of our large aluminet  structure.

camps.name: Disco Space Shuttle
camps.description: Join us in the late morning and early afternoon to confess your sins and rejuvenate your body with a tasty Bloody Mary and join us at night to do it all again and fly across the Playa on the Disco Space Shuttle.

camps.name: Dr. Placebo's Snake Oil Emporium
camps.description: Come try out strange cures to strange illnesses.

camps.name: Champagne Lounge
camps.description: Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge will be quenching your midday thirst with happy hours featuring ice-cold champagne. Not in the mood for bubbles?  Grab some friends and take a shotski! Bring your own cup, and be ready for booze, live music, and fun! Also check out Champagne Lounge Audio Programing, or the C.L.A.P, on your radio at 99.9 fm!

camps.name: So Much Yes
camps.description: Bringing you tropical deep house at our tropical theme camp! We are a group of fun positive people from all over the world, come and experience the tropics in the desert and see what all the YES is about!

camps.name: Iron Monkey's - Well of Darkness
camps.description: Home of the Iron Monkeys

camps.name: Apres Ski BRC
camps.description: Apres ski BRC: celebrations, libations and legendary ski themed camp and party.  Frolic with the ski bunnies in the only snow on the playa!  Wear your gear and goggles and come on up to the north to play!

camps.name: Bubbles & Buch Bouncy Bar
camps.description: Bubbles and Buch Bouncy Bar is all about bouncing on balls to bubbly music while sipping tasty champagne and kombucha.  Come check us out in the morning after the after party.

camps.name: Cameltopia
camps.description: Cameltopia is a Utopian society for camels where inconvenience and hydration go hand in hand.... or toe in toe.

camps.name: Yellow Bike Shop
camps.description: Black Rock Community Transit runs and operates the Yellow Bike Program. The Yellow Bikes are community bikes to mobilize all citizens of Black Rock City.

camps.name: Dusty Taint
camps.description:
The Dusty Taint Camp is born in the style of a 1940’s “Negro Juke Joint” featuring music, games and drinking. A nexus where people passing by and coming to the area can join us for the annual Ginger Appreciation Party, and rousing rounds of 'The Game”, in addition, drink and get to know their fellow burners in a multi-cultural and sensual adult space following an amazing day on the playa.


http://www.dustytaint.com

camps.name: Black Rock Center for Unlearning
camps.description: B.R.C.U. Black Rock Center for Unlearning: Washing all that knowledge right out of your head since 2009.

camps.name: Planet Earth
camps.description: Planet Earth...Black Rock Cities indoor New Wave night club.  two dance floors and a lounge in a 2,000sq ft building.  Open every day from 6pm to 4am.

camps.name: Pink Lightning
camps.description: Pink Lightning is a camp for runners, and home of the Burning Man Ultramarathon. Love us and all of our PINK PINK PINK lightning bolts. www.burningman50k.com

camps.name: Recess
camps.description:
Our big ass board games bring all the burners to the yard, and
they’re like, “hey, this is pretty fun.” Come for the games, stay to
get schooled in DJing, juggling, and the fine art of hula hoop.
Don’t worry, we’ll make time for recess.

camps.name: Rack em Up
camps.description: Rack em Up is back again! Located in the Black Rock City Science Center village, we won't be hard to find. Come have a drink and shoot some pool. You can use our sticks or bring your own. Have fun playing with our balls!

camps.name: Miso Horny
camps.description:
Miso Horny is all about refining ourselves and each other. We value humor, communication, playfulness, open mindedness, and creating strong meaningful bonds between one another. On the Playa we gift hot miso soup, sake, and herbal aphrodisiacs, as well as engaging conversations with our guests. 

There are camps at Burning Man that offer public spaces for sexual play and exploration. While we fully support those groups, we choose to instead explore sex positivism by creating a safe event space for healthy dialogue of human sexuality. Our mission is to share ideas and philosophies that aid in the discovery of our sexual selves. We have created, and are always improving, a dedicated workshop and event space that is a platform for our lifelong journey of learning.

camps.name: Destiny Lounge
camps.description: Come play Rock Yer Balls, Get a Free Blowjob, and experience the amazing Vortex of Destiny! You may never be the same again!

camps.name: Pigmalions
camps.hometown: San Francisco and New York City

camps.name: Porn and Donuts
camps.description: Porn and Donuts – Come for the Donuts, stay for the Holes!

camps.name: Rancho Sparkle Pony Rodeo of Fire
camps.description: Rancho Sparkle Pony: Rodeo of Fire.  A place to celebrate your inner Sparkle Pony.  We don't care how hard you've worked today, just come and be beautiful!  We've got refreshments, a cool place to take a break, and good music to keep you from sitting on your ass too long.  Check out our art cars, when they're in the chute.  And learn a thing or two from our wranglers and fire performers.

camps.name: 1001 Nights
camps.description:
1001 nights is a camp that offers a social setting every night to collect stories from burners reaching 1001 stories in the 7 nights of the burning man experience. the camp also collects stories every morning offering cheese and zaatar manakeesh (dough based pastries with cheese and Thyme) along with refreshing shots. 

Flow artists are welcome to flow in our space with hoops and pois for workshops or to jam on our flow tunes along with world renowned hoopers.

punch will be made every night.. music will playing for jams and every night for the social setting..

camps.name: Camp Not For Prophets
camps.description: Hot Holes and hot beverages.  We have the hottest (donut) holes and coffee on the Playa being served Tuesday thru Friday mornings 8:30 until their gone.

camps.name: Children of Chaos
camps.description: Chaos, joy, good conversation, parades and motherly advice.  Gold parade Wednesday, assemble at 5:30, parade at 6:00 pm, cocktails after the parade.  Illuminated Specters Thursday, assemble at 8:30, parade at 9:00 pm.  Also, meet the Jewish mother you never had - mothering in your choice of English, Yiddish, or Hebrew.  For good conversation, try our bar.

camps.name: Naked Human FussBall
camps.description: Naked Human FussBall

camps.name: Strange Gardens Bear Magical Frui
camps.description: Join us at sunset for our nightly Sunset Champagne Sing-A-Long, the bubbles will flow and so will the tunes! Stick around afterwards and you may be graced with pizza from The Fascist Pizza Stand-we fire up the oven and hand out hot fresh slices at our whimsy-how will you be made to earn a slice of this playa pie?

camps.name: Mo's Mini Martini and Erotica
camps.description: Mo's Mini Martini and Erotica Camp

camps.name: Feed the Artists
camps.description: Started in 2007 w/ Larry Harvey’s blessing and support, FtA has fed tens of thousands of burners, and actively modeled the concept of creating community through the sharing of meals at BRC and far beyond.  You never know when we’ll show up, but when we do, you’ll be treated to some of the finest food ever gifted on the playa!

camps.name: Martini Village
camps.description: Come visit Martini Village and enjoy cold refreshments, entertainment and much more!!!  Look us up for our scheduled events or just stop by and check out a random happy hour.  Be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.

camps.name: Illuminaughty
camps.description: Welcome to Camp Illuminaughty! Come by at dusk for our music and light-filled activities, then follow us and the Wall of Light out into the night to dance ‘til dawn!

camps.name: HARDLY
camps.description: HARDLY - Your place for handcrafted whiskey, Salsa dancing, and the Thriller Flash Mob.

camps.name: Asparagus Forest
camps.hometown: International- SF Bay Area and Sydney, Australia are the main points.
camps.description: Asparagus Forest is a beacon of LED art in a sea of sound camps. Visit us anytime to listen to music you won’t hear anywhere else on the Playa or stop by for one of our scheduled activities such as our Independence Day BBQ featuring backyard games and our DTF (Down Tempo Fiesta).

camps.name: Lamplighter Village
camps.description: http://burningman.org/event/volunteering/teams/lamplighters/

camps.name: L melon O P
camps.description: A totally serious, highly organized, completely childish camp of melon-lovers.

camps.name: The Boot Camp
camps.description: The Boot Camp (by Farrah and Chris)

camps.name: Firmament
camps.description: Meet the people who built the large, LED dome called Firmament.

camps.name: SizzleVille
camps.description: Stop on by for that extra Sizzle!! Revel in your Dusty Bumm while taking a snowboardski or 3, immerse yourself in fur at the Tookus Lounge, feel at home while you get to know your fellow South Bay burners, or just monkey around at the Primate Playground.  Official kickoff spot of the Busty Bacon Brigade, the Home Brew Tour & the Bubble Brigade.  We're here to cook you up some goodtimes!! )'(

camps.name: Queen Dick
camps.description: Lost? Tired? Thirsty? Looking for some company? Fancy a chin-wag? Want a good old knees-up? Don’t know what knees-up means? Doesn’t matter, step out of the desert and into our marvelous time and mind bending new-age-old-fashioned boozer the Queen Dick, and its village green, where anything and everything could happen, and maybe more.

camps.name: xXx Ardent Heavy Industries xXx
camps.description: Ardent Heavy Industries and its fire arts division Interpretive Arson's support camp for 2πr (part of the Charnival) and new project straightedge coming to Burning Man 2015.

camps.name: Prometheatrics
camps.description: Bringing the Gift of Fire to Humankind since the Dawn of Time! Come experience the fully immersive Tesseract Mirror Box (Put on the rainbow glasses and be dazzled by an infinity of strobelights!), enjoy edifying Flow Temple workshops during the day; then join us for full-on fantabulous fireshows at dusk and dawn.

camps.name: Camp XOXO & Camp Short Bus
camps.description: XOXO/Short Bus/Rawrtastic. Come to sip the unicorn blood and watch the freak show, stay for the hugs and heartfelt conversation. Burning since 2011, we're an eclectic and home-grown camp honoring the weird in all of us. Join us at one of our many events. Stop by in between for an icy beverage and entertainment on the big screen in our shaded social space.

camps.name: Healing Foot Wash
camps.description: Healing Foot Wash is an oasis where visitors can have their feet  lovingly washed.  Each visitor is also encouraged to try washing feet as an interactive gift they can then give and pass on to others.

camps.name: Illumination Village
camps.hometown: Primarily SF Bay area, across the US, and internationally (England, Australia, etc)
camps.description: "A Drinking Village with a Fire Problem:" Illumination Village is one of BRC's oldest villages, bringing classic fire art to the esplanade, and total mayhem to the people of Burning Man!

camps.name: Chakralicious Camp
camps.description: Chakralicious Camp is a camp dedicated to all levels of colorful diversity, with yoga, workshops, music, art, performances, spirituality, community, and more. This will be a 24 hour interactive camp with beautiful altars, chill spaces, visionary art, and colorful decor representing the rainbow colors of the chakras. Come take a class in Kundalini Yoga, Tantra, Thai Massage, or Non-Violent Communication, and at night, dance at our chakra themed parties with djs, live music, and fun interactive ceremonies.

camps.name: Gruvhaus
camps.description: Funky gruvs and tasty brus.

camps.name: Camp Mystic
camps.description: Camp Mystic  has a 15 + year history as a theme camp at burning man. We are a group of extraordinary thought leaders, authors, speakers, entrepreneurs, teachers, aritsts, musicians, and healers who provide visionary art installations, live music and performance from some of burning man's best artists, and a series of speakers and workshopw who offer their wisdom  to the playa on topics ranging from emerging civilization, human development, sexuality, relationship, post modern spirituality, the burning man ethos, and more.

camps.name: Camp Yes Please
camps.description: Yes: adv - Used to express affirmation, agreement, positive affirmation, or consent. Please: adv - Give pleasure to or to be pleasing to; give satisfaction. Yes Please is the answer to every question.  Come meet sexy, open-minded, international, friendly, dancing, writhing people.  And be sure to visit our infamous Non-Monogamy Advice Booth, occasionally staffed by real doctors!

camps.name: Random Pants
camps.description: Are you too big for your britches? Is your cod-piece not sitting right?  Did the sun go down and now your ass is freezing?  Stop by Random Pants get yourself a new look (on the lower half, at least).  From slacks to gators,  we've got you covered.

camps.name: Petersons Pink Pagoda
camps.description: Petersons Pink Pagoda - where the lost get found on Rod's Road

camps.name: French Maid Brigade
camps.description: Velcome tu zi 14th Annual French Maid Brigade Parade! Be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa. Stop by our camp anytime for official recruitment, or rendezvous with us on Thursday 2:00pm at 3:00 and Esplanade. We dust the filthy, the nasty, the new, the old, the sexy march throughout camps, reviving dusty oppression celebrating triumph! Please bring: non-feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, any other useful cleaning equipment, and your worst possible French accent.

camps.name: Life Rulez
camps.description: The life "ruleS" at Life Rulez is that life rulezzz!

camps.name: StarFist
camps.description:
Come and take refuge in our Eastern oasis, the Nargileh Tent. Turkish coffee or maybe a spot of afternoon tea? We are Stars when it comes to hospitality, whatever your pleasure.
Or come gaze at the stars with the Stars on our Star Tower – by day survey the city or by night the bright lights as BRC comes to light and life.

And last but not least, home to the infamous GO POSTAL! 	- independent message delivery service (at your service!). Our streetfront booth is open for you to send a message across the playa to the recipient of your choice. Our international fleet of mystery is at your service!

camps.name: Two-Stroke Transit
camps.description: Tired of that loud buzz from your two-stroke engine? Then stop by Two-Stroke Transit and learn how to quickly muffle this as well as improve the general function and environmental friendliness of your motor. While here, find out how you can help prevent playa damage from dripping oil, muffle the buzz, or just learn about two-stroke engines.

camps.name: Firebulb
camps.description: Art support camp for Firebulb's Axayacoatl. Come say hi to the artists, swing by to volunteer or join us for a meal, but please respect our privacy and need for rest if people are not in the public area.

camps.name: IMAGINEnation
camps.description:
IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.

Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa.

camps.name: Camp Cleopatra
camps.description: Interested in a delicious health drink with rum? Please come by our camp to experience a Cleopatra and the lively conversation that inevitably follows.

camps.name: Pixelstad
camps.description: International hub of Art, Music, Performance, Yoga, and Bingo

camps.name: Safety Net, The
camps.description: Come and get yourselves caught in our safety net! Be a silly-clown fish, crabby crustacean, or a try to be a high wire champion.  You will be lured, caught, and treated by semi-professional experts in the realms of circus-fishing.  If you're not into being fishy, come place your marks of art on our scrolls and get chill in our shady shack.

camps.name: Hiburnia
camps.description: Hiburnia , a desert dwelling tribe from the ancient island of hibernia manifests the gift of fine Irish whiskey tasting each day an hour before sunset.

camps.name: Hey! Wagon Ride Camp
camps.description:
The Hey! Wagon Ride Camp.
Come get a Hay Wagon Ride for a tour of the Playa Art and the Black Rock City!

camps.name: Hippocampus
camps.hometown: Various, hubs include Seattle and Minneapolis
camps.description: Hippocampus is the place to make your playa memories stick. Find our mobile cafe as the sun rises and sets over Black Rock City.

camps.name: Hamster Camp
camps.description: Are you tired of spinning your wheels in default world? Hamster Camp is back, promising to deliver millions of fucking hamsters (of course) and lots of completely random mischief! These nocturnal creatures, with their fuzzy and cuddly demeanor but razor sharp teeth and quick feet, celebrate random thoughts, booze, boobs, tea parties, staring contests, clouds, body paint and so much more!

camps.name: Bitch 'n' Tea
camps.hometown: Bay Area, San Diego, Los Angeles
camps.description: A place to share your trivial woes in exchange for some delicious iced or hot tea. Come steep your complaints in our cup.

camps.name: Camp Hot Cheeks
camps.description: The best body painting on the playa, and the Chinese Swear Word of the Day, what more could you ask for?  Come! Sit! Relax! Enjoy the shade and a cold beverage! Do you dare try our special fortune cookies?

camps.name: Black Rock Public Library
camps.description: Cool off and relax, read a classic novel, peruse our comic book collection, pull out a board game, or just hang out with fellow bibliophile Burners. The entire BRPL collection will be available for indefinite checkout starting Wednesday!

camps.name: Camp: Optimistic Cat Den
camps.description: Camp: Optimistic Cat Den

camps.name: Pair-a-dice
camps.description: Pair-a-dice is the place to come for good company, good tunes and drink at the bamboo bar. You just might not want to leave this oasis in the desert.

camps.name: PlayGround
camps.description:
'PlayGround' -  because most good games are dangerous and many are against the law...

Older children play vigorous games and must have places especially set aside for them.

Come to the PlayGround Experience.  Play is a fundamental need.

camps.name: Zendo
camps.description: Feeling out of sorts and looking for a place to recoup? Zendo volunteers are available 24/7 to offer psychological support and education for drug-related concerns. Come by one of our open-air yurts by the 9 o'clock & 3 o'clock ESD/RHQ stations.

camps.name: Midnight Poutine
camps.description: Bonsoir nos amis! Come and sample Québec's favourite late night snack at Midnight Poutine. Learn the awesome power of french fries, cheese curds and hot gravy. Embrace the joie de vivre of our french Canadian camp.  Lâche pas la patate!

camps.name: Amber Dust
camps.description: Add a little bit of magic to your burn this year with a sojourn to Amber Dust. Light up your world with our magic powder, partake in the merriment of a spiced honey elixir, shake what your mamma gave you learning some belly dancing moves, feast your eyes on magnificent art, and create something of your own to take with you. The earth juice will be flowing as well as the good vibes and the happiness. I sveikata!

camps.name: Plays Well With Others
camps.description: Plays Well With Others is happy to offer Burners Lavender Hand Wash, Wedding Services, Regression Therapy, and Jewelry. Our services will be available Tuesday-Saturday Noon-4:00. We also will host a cocktail party Friday night honoring the Carnival of Mirrors.

camps.name: S.N.A.P.
camps.description: SNAP stands for Silly Nerdy Act

camps.name: Empire of Dirt
camps.description: Empire of Dirt is a retro futuristic interplanetary mission base. It is the home of this year's Honorarium Project, EMPIRE.

camps.name: Ridiculicious fun house
camps.description: Drop by the fun house chill out, check out the illusions, discuss meteorites or just join the crazy clowns for a hold up.

camps.name: Last Flamethrower
camps.description: Last Flamethrower Art Support Camp. http://matisse.net/flamethrower/

camps.name: Red Nose District
camps.description: The Red Nose District is an interactive camp.  Come and enjoy our Pedal-powered bumper car track, sidle your stilted (or non stilted) self to our High Chair Stilt Bar and relax in the majesty of The Stoop in a friendly open community and a welcoming family for anyone who wants to be part of the fun. And what carnival-esque world wouldn't be complete without puppet shows?

camps.name: #porchlife
camps.description: #porchlife invites you to relax, take a load off, enjoy some conviviality, maybe a bit of pickin and grinnin, and just watch the world go by from our Old Timey 1880's era redwood storefront. #hashtagsareplayedout

camps.name: Mellow Mountain
camps.description: Come day or night for crazy swing and carousel play, cafe-table drinks at high-noon, stuffy fluffy toys, and a smooch and tunes from Kissy Fish mutant vehicle.

camps.name: Café Sŭrprïsé
camps.description: At Café Sŭrprïsé, we wish to delight your palate with an array of culinary triumphs. Come see us at camp for dinner at our formal sit-down French Cafe Mon-Fri, 3 seatings starting at 5:30pm; Pancake Brunch Saturday at 10am and daily French Fry Service at 2pm. If you can't come to us, we'll come to you with our mobile grilled cheese cart operating nightly around the city. Bring your appetite for sŭrprïsé!

camps.name: Camp Upsie Dasium
camps.description: Rising Up out of the Chaos of the Default World comes your Beacon of Hope:  Camp Upsie Dasium!  Featuring a 45 foot high climbable Tower, Silhouette Theater, over 900 sq ft of Shade, Live Music and Tastings. Come Climb the Tower and Enjoy the View of BRC on Platform Level 3. We are open to Burners who want to use our camp for small events.

camps.name: Bandan-Aroma and Bandana Brigade
camps.description: Bandan-Aroma and Bandana Brigade welcomes you into our camp with the opportunity to infuse aromatic oils onto handcrafted bandanas, to keep and wear as fun and practical accessories as you wander about the endlessly diverting spectacle of the Carnival of Mirrors, providing a bit of fashion flair while protecting against dust storms, and significantly improving your sensory experience during  porta-potty visits.

camps.name: F.A.R.T. Kamp
camps.description: Flatulence Amplification Research Team (F.A.R.T.) Kamp provides interactive workshops for wig and dreadfall making, paracord tying, pendant making, T-shirt slashing, and SWAG necklace organizers. Betty's Booty Boutique clothing exchange will be open for business 24/7, and J's Theatre will show films/movies/short subjects most nights. Fart into a megaphone if the timing is right, or stop by and learn to tie a shemagh!

camps.name: Floristonia
camps.hometown: Floriston, CA and our sister city, Toronto, Canada
camps.description: Floristonia provides a welcoming, nurturing environment with a place to relax, rehydrate and recharge while drinking a cold margarita and visiting with new friends.

camps.name: Playa Jazz Cafe
camps.hometown: San Francisco / San Jose / Santa Cruz
camps.description: Nightly Live Jazz Jam sessions and irish coffee.

camps.name: Bubbles and Bass
camps.description: Welcome to Bubbles and Bass where we rock you out from first light til midday with bubbly bass-tastic house music.  Dance the AM hours away, enjoy an interesting conversation with a new friend, and drink some bubbly while you watch the sun rise over the Playa!

camps.name: Shady Asylum
camps.description: Shady Asylum - 1600 square feet of shaded grass, providing evaporative cooling and iced tea for cracked-out burners. Open daily.

camps.name: Sunset Portal
camps.description: The best place to watch the sunset on the playa. Come join burners to say thanks for another great day and welcome whatever mysteries the night may bring

camps.name: Shady Lady Saloon
camps.description: A Western/Burlesque themed camp serving bourbon and bourbon inspired cocktails. Come enjoy a cool drink and learn about the history of bourbon, our National Spirit!

camps.name: AquaZone Healing Oasis Water Bar
camps.description: Come witness the magic of Positive Intention through the simple act of Drinking Water, revel in the heft of a replenished water bottle at our Self-serve Water Buffet, marvel at the healing powers of our Reiki Masters, succumb to the gentle ministrations of our Goddess Chiropractors and Massage Magicians, and recharge your electronic device through the Power and Mystery of the Very Sun Above! The magic happens when YOU show up.

camps.name: WickedLand
camps.description:
Have you ever wondered what happened to your childhood fairytale heroes after you left their lands? WICKEDLAND brings you face-to-face with them: all grown up, distorted and oh-so-very twisted. How have you changed? What fairytale archetypes do you still carry inside of you? We'll help you find out – come play, there are no spectators here!
 
WICKEDLAND brings your favorite childhood fairytale heroes and their archetypal stories back to life. But something has changed – this world isn't nearly as innocent as it was when you were younger, because you are it.
 
Climb up the castle towers that adorn the entrance to our camp. If you want to dig deeper through the world of twisted fairytales, you are welcome to sit with a book in our cozy lounge. But be warned – a transformation lingers behind every page you turn. If you're not careful, you may leave WICKEDLAND as Gay Donald Duck or Nymphomaniac Snow White.

camps.name: Yabba Dabba Do Me
camps.description: We are a fun interactive camp, featuring a plaything made from a combination of a trampoline, a metal frame dome, and 1500' of bungee cords. Every action has a reaction, every motion has an emotion.

camps.name: Camp Luminous
camps.description: Camp Luminous is an interactive Tea Lounge open randomly 24/7 for your enjoyment.

camps.name: Zerzura
camps.description:
Zerzura Camp
Home of XUZA Art Car
featuring the Rootist Lounge.

camps.name: Teddies on Teddys
camps.description: Take a slide down into the teddy bear pit!

camps.name: Dreamer's Playground
camps.description: We are Dreamers. Open minds filled with imagination and restless energy. Confronting fears and learned dogma to discover new realities patiently awaiting our return. The Playground is a cushion of comfort and warmth clearing routes for kinder experiences. Placed in a perfect position to enjoy the Burning Man Sunset - come by for juice and Vegan treats. A home built on Love and connection with a family of support for higher vibrational exploration of experience. Designed in colour for fun and flow. We are Dreamers and this is our playground.

camps.name: Platybus & the Band
camps.description: Black Rock and Roll! Come jam on the roof of the Galactic Crusader as the sun sets on our fair city. 6PM daily. Electric Guitars, drums, bass, banjo, and more noisy toys. Play or party, drink and be merry.

camps.name: H2OhYeahh!
camps.description: Come on by to get studio quality photos and a chair massage or even a couples massage!  We also have facilities to charge your electronics, top off your water bottles, and spray you down with a cool mist.  Ask for a hands on solar power lesson if you'd like to add solar to your camp next year.

camps.name: Brass Tax Radio Malibu
camps.description: Back by popular demand, tune in to our 24-hour coverage of Brass Tax shenanigans on Radio Malibu (or stop by the on-playa studio): music, sing-a-longs, live interviews, morning calisthenics, and intraplaya sunrise traffic cone sports reportage. Winners every day - you could be next!

camps.name: Kin-Dza-Dza!
camps.description: Camp Kin-Dza-Dza!, bringing Soviet dystopia and tea to the Playa since 2006!

camps.name: V-Spot
camps.description:
The V-SPoT is Burning Man’s official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where different projects come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your “special place” on the Playa.
http://www.burningman.com/participate/vrteam.html

camps.name: Dragon Ass Camp
camps.description: Dragon Ass Camp celebrates the wonders of Claude the Dragon, the 22′ fire breathing kinetic sculpture, made from 100% recycled scrap materials. Claude will be featured in the Dragon Master Presents "Wicked Art Piazza" near the Artery for 2015!

camps.name: Ashram Galactica
camps.description: Ashram Galactica - The Grand Hotel | Your Home Away From Home Away From Home

camps.name: Camp Orange
camps.description: Fruit lovers rejoice for Camp Orange (you glad we didn't say banana) is here!  Cool off with a refreshing treat from our enormous banana, relax in one of our  banana hammocks, enjoy a banana flavored cocktail all while hearing every fruit pun imaginable!

camps.name: Astro Cats
camps.description: We invite all burners to chill at the Astro Lounge with special drinks in the day and hot or cold sake at the Dragon Lounge at night Or challenge yourself to manipulate the LED Matrix and play the game of Dragon Says.

camps.name: Gears & Beers
camps.description:
Gears & Beers is back!  From rusted jalopies to busted beach cruisers, we are your one stop shop!   

While you're here,  stay for the ice cold beer,  or enjoy a game of chance dealing with one of our bookies as they accept all forms of bets on the gladiatorial combat happening within the world famed arena

camps.name: Debocceri
camps.description: Debocceri and Cats! Cats! Cats! are joining forces again to form Furballz Villiage. Debocceri be hosting public bocce ball tournaments and 24/7 open court, a costume-exchange rack, and a 5-piece bluegrass band which can be seen at center camp as well as live guerilla bluegrass attacks throughout the city.

camps.name: Struts & Bolts
camps.description: A unique dome experience.

camps.name: Time To Burn
camps.description: Taking over your devices, we help mirror your hopes and dreams on the Playa.

camps.name: Diva Nation
camps.description:
Diva Nation is about bringing out the Diva in us through experiences that trigger the artist, the lover, the dancer and the human in us. 
Come experience interactive art pieces and join in our live jazz sunset sessions.

camps.name: Flamin' Java
camps.description:
Small Gay themed coffee camp to nurse that morning hangover.
Located inside Home Rule Village.

camps.name: Camp Cuddle Cult
camps.description: Camp Cuddle Cult aims to foster a stronger Burning Man community through cuddling.  Drop by and immerse yourself in one of our famous (platonic) Cuddle Puddles filled with soft pillows, fuzzy blankets and warm bodies.  If you want to make some new friends on the playa this is the camp for you!

camps.name: Love Potion
camps.description:
Celebrating art, creativity, whimsy, fun, family, positive vibes , 'Luurve’ & our famous Love Potion. 
To learn more, go to http://www.lovepotioncollective.org

camps.name: Camp Martini
camps.description: Come see Camp Martini within Martini Village and enjoy a Dean Martin Happy Hour!!!  See you out there, Wednesday afternoon.

camps.name: Slutt Putt
camps.description: A round the clock nine hole mini golf course for everyone, even stilters! Come play a round and sip an Arnold Palmer.

camps.name: The Embassy
camps.description: The Embassy is the center for relations between Black Rock City and the Default World. Come by to ease into life as a burner, learn about the strange customs of the Default World, and prepare for inter-world travel.

camps.name: Nose Fish
camps.description:
Welcome to Nose Fish. Carpe Diem at the Un-Hammer Cafe. Get creative making Playa currency to exchange for your coffee. Don't forget your cup.Take a moment to meet the folks standing near you.  Start/end times vary.  

Stop by in the afternoon for a juggling class, EL wire electronic repair, a bike repair class. Check our schedule board for the activity of the day. 

Come back at night to dance before the MEZ interactive Video Mirror.

camps.name: Scarbutts Coffee
camps.description: Scarbutts Coffee wakes you up with a brisk spanking and a great coffee. We serve coffee from 9am to 1pm Tuesday through Friday. We wake your ass up.

camps.name: Pirate Ninja Training Camp
camps.description: We offer Pirate Ninja training to all that dare accept the challenge.  Learn the ways of the ancient Pirate Ninja masters.

camps.name: Pancake Playhouse
camps.hometown: Sacramento (and the greater San Francisco area)
camps.description: Pancake Playhouse feeds the dustiest, hungriest burners our world-famous pancakes while providing the antidote to oontz, oontz, oontz, oontz in the form of soft rock featuring Captain Flapjack and the Syrup Sisters.

camps.name: Banana Hammock
camps.description: Come enjoy swingin' days and sultry nights, with Camp Banana Hammock! We've got intimate places to start your heart-races. Sway away in our Banana Hammocks — a shaded oasis with almost a dozen hammocks suspended over a pool of stuffed animals. Relax as sexy, ambient beats, envelope you.  Swing in the breeze; rejuvenate your mind, body and soul; then head back out to the playa ready for whatever comes next.

camps.name: Banya Camp
camps.description: Explore the purifying and bonding experience of a traditional Russian sauna: dry and steam heat with birch twig lashings

camps.name: Camp Safari
camps.description: Home of the Safari Bar, where a spin of the wheel will determine your beverage fate.  Photo ops, animal hunting, and desert games... it wouldn't be a Safari without 'em.

camps.name: Essence
camps.description: Essence is home of the Essentia Card Deck and the Light Seed Lamps.  Look for our beautiful color changing lamps, and stop by to relax in our card room for a personal card reading.

camps.name: ShangriLa
camps.description: Welcome to ShangriLa a paradise on earth. Shade areas will provide a cool space for yoga classes, Enchanted Hand Jobs (hand-massage), energy work and a communal chill area. Our Weinkeller ShangriLaLa will host daily wine happy hours. Drink wine and get lit during Pimp & Wine where we will embellish your ensemble with gifts of light-art to keep you safe at night. Namaste!

camps.name: Slutgarden
camps.description: Cum suck down our Slut juice, wrap your body in our love and pound your hips to the rhythms of the playa.

camps.name: Flattery Camp
camps.description: BM blues got you? Self-worth heading out the door? Having a downer of a day? We got this. Swing by Flattery for your delicious daily dose of medicine for the soul. With sincerity, originality, humor, hospitality and shaded comforts, our trained and certified id-mechanics will fix up your psyche's flat tire, and have you whistling on your way in no time. And may I say just how ridiculously, spectacularly, lovely you are?

camps.name: Camp Electro-Therapy
camps.description: Camp Electro-Therapy is a theme camp offering solar recharging services to the Black Rock City community during the Burning Man festival. Recharging services will be available 24/7 while we are on playa.

camps.name: Om Bindi
camps.description: Om Bindi welcomes you with a frisky mantra and a bindi on your forehead to open your Third Eye (all the better to see the Carnival of Mirrors).  After you get your bindi, awaken your senses with a variety of irreverently pseudo-spiritual gatherings, such as panty-free 11:11 meditations, Hand Reflexology (aka hand-jobs), Cigar Appreciation sessions and Belly Dancing lessons (see our daily event schedule posted at our camp).

camps.name: Sideshow!
camps.description: SIDESHOW! Carnival of Smoke and Mirrors.  Looky looky! It's all on the inside!  Sideshow brings you a traditional old time sideshow experience with a decidedly BM twist.  See the strange and the weird... marvel at exclusive exhibits in the Odditorium of Playa Wonders, and gasp in awe at astounding magic performances by masters of the craft.  Put yourself in the show and be a freak of nature, or test your wits at games of skill. Daily performances at 1 pm, Monday through Saturday, and late night magic performances too! Check the WWW Guide for times and details!

camps.name: Shadyvil
camps.description: Shadyvil returns to 2015 Village style.

camps.name: WMICC Organic Fruit / Veggie Bar
camps.description: Offering the freshest and juiciest organic produce on the playa since 2011. Come by for a visit, your body with thank you!

camps.name: Sakenoma
camps.description: SAKENOMA, A Burning Man staple for sake lovers; where all are welcome to saddle up and get down

camps.name: The Buddha Lounge
camps.description: The Buddha Lounge Sound Camp & Chill Space Provides a Space for Artists/DJ's to Perform. Previous Artists include Govinda, ChrisB., Kalya Scintilla, Desert Dwellers, Emancipator, Kaminanda, Pumpkin & Buddha Bass.

camps.name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
camps.description:
Camp Delicioso & Creperie was born in 2006, and based out of Long Beach & San Francisco.  With campmates from all over the world, our international crew has evolved over the last 10 years to include friends from Monaco, New Zealand, Spain, Britain, Australia, Colombia, Argentina, France, Mexico, Morocco, Venezuela, Israel, Switzerland, Zimbabwe and...

We can truly say that our crepes are World Famous!

camps.name: FUR
camps.description: FUR is a group of furries from around the world coming together to create a camp on the Playa. Come see what this furry thing is all about, or just chill at our camp and visit like minded artists and costumers!

camps.name: HoloDreamers
camps.description: HoloDreamers are a small camp hailing from the Western USA. Drop by for our Poi Making and Spinning Classes!

camps.name: Tesla Camp
camps.description: Camp Tesla is the name.  Our camp has a couple of Tesla coils and some stuff about the famous inventor. It is also the home of the Big Friendly Fish.

camps.name: Heart Tribe
camps.description: Heart Tribe offers a Healing Sanctuary in which you can come receive healing from any of a variety of modalities. While you wait for your session, squish out with us in our spacious Squish Lounge, which features buffers, comfy mats to stretch and play, and lots of incredible people to drop in with.

camps.name: Gamelan X
camps.description: GamelanX, Providing performances of traditional and non traditional music of Bali, and community Monkey Chant Workshops.

camps.name: Shangri-Lawless
camps.description: A forgotten paradise to soothe the wary adventurer, or a lawless land of risk & reward? We are both.  A yin and a yang.  An amalgamation of two elements, each playing off the other.  Villaging with the prodigious Wet Dreams crew!

camps.name: Bearwhalea
camps.description: Once again the mighty BEARWHALE saunters forth from Kamchatka in search of migratory cucumbers, elk fairy dust, and playa shenanigans.  Stop by to bask in the glow of this evolutionary marvel!

camps.name: RECESS!!!
camps.description: Ever miss the third grade, when recess was the best part of the day? So do we - almost an hour a day of unfettered frolicking, chasing, tagging, hopping, skipping, jumping, so long as you don't linger too long over lunch! "RECESS!!!" will capture this magic - there will be an elaborate magical playground to inspire play, an daily unschedule of fourth grade games, and a grumpy lunch lady who will reward and resolve disputes with spankings by wooden spoon.

camps.name: Heroes & Super Villains
camps.description: Every Hero & Super Villain has experienced a moment of transformation – a spider’s bite, an emotional journey, a moment that transformed them from ordinary to extraordinary. This year, come celebrate your own Playa transformations with us at our 10th anniversary Soul Brunch. Eat, drink, dance and make new friends. Daily starting at 3pm-730pm. Friday, noon to sunset.

camps.name: Poles N' Holes
camps.description: Come and get your pole dancing groove on with Kefff and Fluffer or show off your skills on any one of our master shafts. Or just hang out and have a drink at our cozy oasis while enjoying the show.

camps.name: DISTRIKT
camps.description: Bringing art & beat together - A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ’s, original art, and luscious blended libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dancing & dutifully disorderly DISTRIKT.

camps.name: Vagabonds and Tagalongs
camps.description: A camp for lost and wayward travelers.

camps.name: Astral Headwash
camps.description: Greetings dirty desert dwellers!  We are Astral Headwash and we do the amazing!  We will wash your head for you again this year.  That's right, clean, fresh water warmed in the desert sun with wonderful smelling shampoo and a bit of leave-in condition to send you on your way!  Bring your happy selves to us Monday - Friday noon until 4 pm!

camps.name: Glitter and Rust
camps.hometown: SoCal (Glendale, Santa Ana, Garden Grove, Silverlake) and NorCal (Cotati, Novato).
camps.description: Where North, South, East and West collide. We are a group of friends with very diverse backgrounds and ethnicity, ready to tackle whatever the Playa throws our way - from amazing long-lasting new friendships to those pesky summer thunder storms. Bring it! We welcome all of it.

camps.name: Silicon Village
camps.description:
Ladies and Gentlemen, boys and girls of all ages open your eyes and your mind to the mysteries and wonders of Silicon Village (look for our tower and archway). Travel to the distant other side of our Stargate, travel at feet per second on our 200’ zipline, climb a tower, explore what is beyond this world with a tarot reading. Are you timid of heart? Then relax, have a drink, and enjoy a fire hooping show, choose a heart on to be painted on you, watch the bees dance. Early bird? Have a coffee. Feel the need for salt? Have a pickle. Feeling naughty? Have a cookie, but at a price (or pleasure). After all of this and you are still feeling blue then visit a Happy Spot. At the end of the day control light with your mind or sit in our sauna dome.

Is your mind blown? No? Well aren’t you the adventurous soul. Okay then, hop on one of our art cars or dance to a laser light show. If that doesn’t make your day then be a part of a game show or our Twerkin’ Fashion show.

camps.name: The Fun Fur Traders of Black Rock
camps.description: Where does fun fur come from? Come and visit the Fun Fur Traders of Black Rock and learn the story behind the fur! Help us celebrate, as we spread cheer through song, dance, and drink - guests of the Fun Fur Traders will be immersed in the culture of the fun fur trade, and a re-imagined era of exploration and discovery.

camps.name: Camp Manifestation
camps.description: At Camp Manifestation we encourage and explore the process of creation, acknowledging that power within each of us, in order to manifest whatever is in one's heart and to experience life as one desires. By discovering our innate ability, we put intention toward the coupling of the power of thought with the moving force of action. We then begin to ignite and catalyze these forces which allows us to create magical results in the world. Come explore with us!

camps.name: Happy Hour
camps.description: Hard day on the playa? Unwind at Happy Hour, where you’ll be greeted by one of a kind refreshing spirits served with smiles! Enjoy our lounge, bar, and gigantic jungle gym! Climb, dance on our Kaleidoshade structure or groove on tallest rotating “exotic dancing” pole! Start your evening with Happy Hour!

camps.name: Future (The Future)
camps.description: For Burning Man 2015 “The Future” is celebrating the one common future for every person, DEATH, as Black Rock City’s funky Funeral Parlor. “The Future” will provide experiences where death and afterlife may be reflected upon and celebrated among friends.

camps.name: Dragon Smelter
camps.description: The Dragon Smelter invites participants to learn and make art from recycled metal with us. The art changes every year, so be sure to keep coming back!

camps.name: MobQ Village
camps.description: MobQ Village is the home of BAAAHS Station, DivaNation & Adult Playspace.  Come on an adventure on one of our art cars or explore our public courtyard.

camps.name: The New Barbarians
camps.description: The New Barbarians and their band of human-sized dinosaurs are led by their massive, Tyrannosaurus-like steel ruler, Jurassic Pork, on its quest to spread its bountiful stock of barbecued flesh taken from pastured hogs.  The only hope for the few remaining survivors living amongst the playa is to join a never-ending feast suitable for King Horik himself as we share amongst the generosity of our humble leader, JP, and amalgamate ever closer to becoming one.

camps.name: Gigsville
camps.hometown: Highly distributed, clusters in San Francisco, Los Angeles, and Austin
camps.description: Gigsville is one of the oldest villages on the Playa having been in operation for 15 or 16 years, depending on who you ask and how drunk they are. We're dedicated to fire, fun, and good old fashion jackassery. You'll find us gathered around the car that's on fire in the center of camp. No ocelots or other violations of the Gigsville CoC are allowed.

camps.name: SK8 KAMP
camps.description: Every city needs a skatepark.  We bring one to Black Rock City for everyone to enjoy.  All skill levels. Ride anything.

camps.name: Bat Carnival
camps.description: Our camp is one part motley stable of stick ponies and one part ooky-spooky carnival games of chance. We have have bats in our belfry and tricks up our sleeves.

camps.name: Syncytium
camps.description:
Syncytium is an incubator, open to all who want to PLAY, we create beautiful experiences for others and ourselves.  We follow the burning man 
ethos, and we also believe in ACTIVE PARTICIPATION in our camp.

camps.name: Luxurious Vagrants
camps.description: Luxurious Vagrants is where sandy bodies come to get fancy! Enter our parlor to try on tattoos, bedazzle your bodies, and leave feeling special.

camps.name: Camp Faderade
camps.description: Come on down to Camp Faderade and try Doc Faderade's Amazing Elixir. gaze into the splendor that is our Infinite Tunnel bar, laugh at the hilarity that ensues from completing a Whizbang, and spin the Wheel of Destiny.

camps.name: Art Support Identity Awareness
camps.description: The Art Support Camp for Identity Awareness is the place were the artist and build team try and get some rest and stock up on pickles. We are not a big camp but we welcome you to swing by to talk about the art piece "Identity Awareness" or anything else you would like to share. We have a comfy 3-hammock stand for you to relax and contemplate your identity.

camps.name: Camp Lamp
camps.description: Camp Lamp brings Light, Art, and Music to the Playa, with a fire-spinning circle that is open to any skilled fire spinners.

camps.name: Sake To Me
camps.description: Sake To Me is your neighborhood sake bar! Stop by for a comfortable shady pitstop, some great chilled sake, and test your skills at a giant version of Jenga.

camps.name: Mansonian Institute
camps.description: Mansonian Institute of Urban Studies - Burning Man historical and educational society providing artist support services for large art projects on playa. Come on by and learn some interesting facts about Burning Man history and the art projects, both past and present.

camps.name: It's All Made Up
camps.description:
It's All Made Up (IAMU) has a reputation for manifesting some of BRC's most interesting events and gatherings, including dance parties, yoga classes, body painting, group meditation, spiritual exercises, large theme dinners, fire dancing demonstrations and more.

There will be improv comedy classes, a burlesque show, snow cone gifts, a mega Sunday morning pancake breakfast, a BRC farmer's market, self-awareness and spiritual development workshops with themes ranging from "Black on the Playa" to group forgiveness circles, and throughout it all, down-tempo boogie or deep house playlists will radiate through the air and prompt smiles and hugs all around.

camps.name: Camp Pendant
camps.description: Camp Pendant is back, and we've missed all your smiling faces! Come by and pick up one of this year's awesome pendants, rest your weary feet and tell us how your year has been. While you're here, don't forget to pay the Gifting Tree a visit. Whether you take a little something or leave a little something, she's here to make everyone's day a little brighter.

camps.name: You Got This!
camps.description: Feeling overwhelmed by the Playa at the moment?  We got you.  Each of the stone cold weirdos in our eclectic crew brings a unique talent that just may help you get back on track.

camps.name: Bitchin' Braid Camp
camps.description: Out of control hair taking over your life? Come on over to Bitchin' Braid Camp and K-Bar (or Bar-K)  to enjoy a refreshment, music, conversation while we braid your nappy locks in the shade.

camps.name: HOVerlandia - Burner Express Camp
camps.description: Swing by HOVerlandia and meet participants who traveled to Black Rock City onboard the Burner Express. They will tell you all about their great adventure from all over the world to the desert.

camps.name: Space Hole Mist Opportunity
camps.description: An interactive camp for some things that we have learned about making a great non-RV camp!  Be more comfortable for less $$ and meet great people without being stuck in a box!

camps.name: Simian Akademy
camps.description: Come one, come all to Dr. Googol's Simian Akademy and marvel at the advances made in the Anthropomorphic Sciences, the most astounding of natural philosophies!  See the Octopus Pavilion!  Marvel at the dexterity of trained monkeys as they demonstrate their industrious utility by repairing velocipedes of every sort and size!  And lest we neglect the fairer sex, consult with our resident Mistress of Olfaction who will concoct a custom perfume for you right before your very eyes!

camps.name: Kidsville
camps.description: Kidsville is THE place for kids and their families! We host a group of diverse families creating a unique space for play and other activities including the Black Rock Scouts program. Families with children 0-17 years of age are welcome to camp with us if they are pre-registered. Registration begins in March and ends when full. Note: Kidsville is NOT a baby-sitting service. All children must be supervised by an adult.

camps.name: Dare to be Rare
camps.hometown: SF Bay Area, Portland OR, Denver CO, Jacksonville FL, Sydney
camps.description: Dare to be Rare a unique camp of people for unique people. Come on and be different! Something we all like however is meat! And we love it rare!

camps.name: Pharos
camps.description: Pharos of Black Rock City: a beacon, a place for rest and reflection, an enclave of beauty and light. Create your own light show with our twenty-foot tall Wonderlamp.

camps.name: Penny Smashing Point
camps.description: Dear Burners! Bring you penny and we will smash it for you or take one we have for you.

camps.name: Ho-Down Village
camps.description: Ho-Down Village - home of the Cozmic Cowboy Art Car & Kegel Kommandos!  Come visit the Nambi Tower & Mechanical Bull!

camps.name: Spirit Dream
camps.description: 12 means established.  12 years of coming home to the playa.  12 years of spirit interaction, mothering, fathering, blessing, elevating, sowing, reaping, laughing and sharing.  Spirit Dream is our home, where our heart is and we hope you will join us.  Stop by and we'll fill your water, stay a bit and enjoy our expresso, a while longer and you will start to transform.  Feel the strength bubbling up from the land and the refreshing rain falling from above.  We will look to see your original design and embrace it with you.  We will speak life to that which was lost and bring healing to that which was broken.  We come to the playa to see you, to meet you, to embrace you, and to release you into something far greater.  Come and let us serve you and your purpose on the Earth.  We can't wait to see you...

camps.name: What Would You Do For A Pickle?
Altitude Lounge
camps.description: Are you interested in seeing Burning Man from a different perspective? Visit Altitude Lounge, when you can relax on a couch, meet cool people, and take in the views from the top of our 42 foot tall tower.  At night we will help you find your way home with our brightly lit navigational beacon. Our tower is open 24 hours a day, and when there are high winds, it is a great escape from blowing dust.

camps.name: Home Rule
camps.description:
Now in our fifth year on playa, Home Rule Village is committed to engaging BRC denizens in novel forms of expression, exploration, relaxation and connection.

Seven unique camps combine to offer a wildly diverse experience, including an array of workshops, seminars, dance parties, vaudeville shows, improve comedy classes, holistic healing, diversity-awareness events, yoga practice, body painting classes, blind taste-testing dinners, fire spinning and more!

camps.name: EleVant Rising
camps.description: Fresh, delicious, reservation-only dinners. A relaxing vapor lounge.  Balance boards and activities.  And sunset desserts from high above the Playa.

camps.name: Helioz
camps.description: Come to test your skill and your courage in the gladiatorial arena where you will battle friend and foe alike!  Stay for bocce ball, a dance in our giant inverted disco ball, and delicious drinks mixed and served by our very own analog, hand-crank robotic bartender!

camps.name: Camp Mind Eraser
camps.description: Super trill just come

camps.name: Philly Phreak Show
camps.description: Philly Phreak Show Midway project.

camps.name: Lunar Disco
camps.description: Lunacy with a Pinch of Disco.  Follow the sound, follow the moon.

camps.name: Vomiting Sparrows
camps.description: Come have some laughs with the Sparrows! Chirp Chirp Blarf!

camps.name: Camp...In Bed
camps.description: Camp...In Bed enters its eleventh year of feeding hungry revelers the famous "Philthy" salsa, the spicy brown that never lets you down.  Try it on a chip, smear it on your lip.

camps.name: Wet Dreams
camps.description: Facilitating the wettest dreams on the playa - come lucid dream with us. Villaging with the prestigious Shangrilawless crew!

camps.name: Gender Blender
camps.description: Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? You decide. Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender norms. We create safer spaces for Trans, genderqueers, & gender non-conformers. We provide a welcoming place for those curious about gender play, mixing up one's gender for the first time, and general discussions on how gender impacts our lives. We are a gender conscious open loving community that loves sparkles, theatrics, drag, running anti-oppression workshops, and making queer smoothies on playa.

camps.name: Electric Gypsy Coffee Oasis
camps.description: In the blink of an eye don’t let it pass you by experience the electric gypsy coffee oasis! Our space is an oasis for travelers to come enjoy coffee drinks and stroopwafles.  Experience with us stories of the past, energy of the present, and predictions of future in our yurt or shade structures.  Offering coffee, music, healing, fortune telling, tarot reading, and tea leaf readings, we have something for everyone.

camps.name: TAKOE
camps.description: We are  a mobile kindergarten for Your inner children.

camps.name: Anti M's Home for Wayward Art
camps.description: Come adopt wayward art, be a new forever parent, or commit your unhomed art to the Home! Anti M's Home for Wayward Art is the place for small art, found art, lost art, art gone wrong, art which needs love and a place to hang.

camps.name: Lazy Skool Daze
camps.hometown: New York City and far beyond
camps.description: Lazy Skool Daze is an intellectual and artistic haven for the sharing of knowledge, love, and adventure. We present a creative, welcoming space where playa-mavens can come to teach and learn, to perform and observe, to show and tell.

camps.name: Lost in Space Tribe
camps.description: Bringing the Sixties to the playa ... from the people who were there!  Who doesn’t love the music of the Sixties and where else on the playa can you find it ... come enjoy a Summer of Love experience!

camps.name: Camp Anostraca
camps.description:
Camp Anostraca
Port for The Anostraca ship. 
Home of the Anostraca Family.

camps.name: The Hive
camps.description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!

camps.name: The Phage
camps.description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth's living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads -- the phage are the needles of life's tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.

camps.name: Camp Fortuna
camps.description: Camp Fortuna, loyal subjects to the King of Fun

camps.name: Get Nailed
camps.description: Come "Get Nailed" to our Crucifix. Tell us your sins and what you will be remembered for after you burn.

camps.name: Common Ground
camps.description:
Common Ground is a collaborative community of individuals from all walks of life, seeking to enhance the profound Burning Man 2015 experience with a variety of spiritual practices, primarily yoga and meditation. 

On camp site will be a large yoga tent, equipped with props, singing bowls and sound system. Common Ground will host 1 sunset and 1 sunrise daily classes on camp premises, of vinyasa, kundalini and restorative practices. Our Deep Playa Yoga Project will send out the camp's art car, The OMobile, to pick up interested yogis out into the depths of the desert for one pop up class at a random hour each day. 

The yoga tent will be available for meditation throughout the day, and an additional tent equipped with essential oils and Ayurvedic concoctions will serve as a massage parlor for all to enjoy.

camps.name: Possible Project
camps.description: Swing by the Possible Project's Photo-Phunhouse for refreshments and photographs.  Our carny camp is the perfect backdrop to park your traveling show, featuring daily analogue instant PhotoDome events where you can strike a pose and take it with you.

camps.name: Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe
camps.description:
The name says it all. Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be on-site with a variety of tools and supplies to help build or repair just about anything on the playa. We are proud to have spent over 15 years serving Black Rock City in this capacity.
We have hand tools, power tools, nails, nuts, bolts, tape, string, wire, paint, bike tools, automotive tools, glue, rivets, and whatever else we can manage to fit on the truck. We enjoy helping people work on art projects and helping camps who have suffered structural difficulties, but we also help with minor automotive problems, generator issues, and fix an inordinate amount of bikes. Whatever people bring us, we’ll try and fix if we can. We do not have lots of raw building materials such as 2x4s, PVP pipes, or plywood, but do have a need/want bulletin board for people who have excess or are looking for such to communicate their needs. The Playa often provides!

camps.name: False Profit, Inc.
camps.description: As the most advanced company on the planet, False Profit's most valuable asset is our brand.  By harnessing the full potential of our top-secret American corporate technology, we will present an environment of delight that is guaranteed to throw the market into flux.

camps.name: LAFer Camp
camps.hometown: Sacramento. Salt Lake City. Los Angeles. Los Gatos. South Lake Tahoe. King's Beach (Lake Tahoe).Chicago. Yellowknife(Canada). Buffalo. Woodland(CA).

camps.name: BC Village
camps.description: The BC Village is the amalgamation of four separate camps hailing from British Columbia: Space Jam; The Troll Bridge; The Peanut Gallery; and The Return of the Daisy. All British Columbia based, all dedicated to bringing our unique blend of fun, function, and fundamental respect for our fellow burners and planet to Burning Man 2015. In addition to being polite, Canadian burners are known for their hospitality, generosity of spirit, and livers of steel. Come by and help us put the BC back in BRC!

camps.name: BRC HOA
camps.description: The BRC HOA prides itself on offering a wide range of options for any prospective Black Rock City homeowner. Hydration! Dehydration! Art! Craft! Heckling (the good kind AND the bad kind) and so much more!

camps.name: Space Jam
camps.description: Come on and slam, and welcome to the Jam! Space Jam hails from British Columbia and celebrates everything celestial! Come say hi and have a Caeser on us!  Watch out for those Monstars though, they're sly.

camps.name: BAAAHS Staton
camps.description: BAAAHS Station is the central depot and homo-licious home on the range to BAAAHS, the Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep - part mutant vehicle, part penetrable sculpture and part rolling disco. Weary travelers come set for a spell, kick up your hooves and dance, or begin a new journey as you slide through a pulsing pink sphincter into the luscious cocoon of his polyphonic peritoneum.

camps.name: gNarnia
camps.description: gNarnia is a camp providing delicious cold brew coffee every morning from 9am(ish) until noon or we run out for that day. Enter the wardrobe and find yourself in our very chill camp space. Note: The walls are even made from coffee sacks!

camps.name: Crystal Ballers
camps.description: The Crystal Ballers are a team of prop manipulating wizards dedicated to bringing magic to the playa. We host shaded daytime workshops and fire spinning circus performances at night.

camps.name: End of Line Club
camps.description: We are a camp that is Tron themed find info at fb.com/endoflineclub. We will be providing original music and equipment and a stage for any DJs that want to sign up and spin through the festival, as well as a Tron Lightcycle art car, and Tron themed gate and 3D End of Line Club stage backdrop.

camps.name: Iguana Chill Camp
camps.description: Iguana Chill Camp is a small camp of friends. The camp boasts a nice shade and an inviting wigwam chill space open to all, pleasantly outfitted with curtains and pillows, music and lights, hookahs and cold drinks, musical instruments and drums. Our goal is to radiating our groovy chill vibes by offering professional massage, tarot readings, ecstatic dance, yoga classes, sing alongs, and cooling sprays with essential oils.

camps.name: Gnome Camp
camps.description:
Gnome Camp is the home and refuge for an unheralded breed of desert-loving gnome. Hailing from shrinking urban green space on two coasts, we gather once a year to propagate our species through gnome
adoptions and conversions, and to share our traditions of mischievous merrymaking.

camps.name: Naked Heart
camps.description: Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the Divine Feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart your radiance your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome.

camps.name: Something Freaky This Way Foams
camps.description: Something Freaky This Way Foams combines the talkiest old time carnival you can imagine with an interblastive foam rejuvenation experience unlike anything on Earth!

camps.name: Shwar Town
camps.description: Shwar Town has been holding it down on the playa for over a decade. Come drink Kombucha to stay refreshed for all you other adventures.

camps.name: Camp Samovar
camps.description: Stop by at Camp Samovar everyday during sunset (7-8pm) for a little taste of Middle East with Persian Tea, Dates, world music and great company.

camps.name: Dr Playa's Ear Nose&Throat Clinic
camps.description:
Pesky dust packed into those openings in your head? We can help with that!
Our  NON MEDICAL staff is available Mon -Friday from 1-3 PM

camps.name: Booty Hunters
camps.description: Hunters of the golden bubblebutt, unite! Whether your bum is flat, bouncy, perky or juicy, saunter over to the Booty Hunters Saloon for some quality boozy booty appreciation - Share a drink, pick out a pair of fabulous new booty shorts, play a game, and shake your tail to some groovy booty beats!!

camps.name: Funk Pirates
camps.description: Funk Pirates provide classic funk music, hot fire filled performances, cold rum cocktails, and killer plays cruises.

camps.name: HUMANO
camps.description: HUMANO - A Mexican cultural experience.  Visit us and learn about Mexican philosophy, people, art, sound, and vibe.

camps.name: Burning Man Bike Course
camps.description: Come test your skills on the Burning Man Bike Course! A bicycle challenge obstacle course for all ages and abilities.

camps.name: Eyeland Oasis
camps.description: An eyedyllic retreat for soothing astonished eyes and dust weary feet.  We will provide a sanctuary to relax in, while your peepers and your creepers are being attended to by "doctors" without orders.

camps.name: Enchante Presents NDR
camps.description: Enchante presents the Next Door Ravers delights you with the finer side of nonchalance.
