art.description: The Dragon Smelter was originally designed and constructed by artists Daniel Macchiarini and Moises Luarte for the 2000 Burning Man event and has been used at various Burning Man events since. Its primary function is to promote recycling by facilitating limited art in action smelting and casting production events using recycled aluminum cans. The Dragon Smelter itself is a kinetic piece of sculpture which is made up of 60% recycled materials. It contains a propane-powered reduction furnace for the aluminum melting, has a rotation causable for safely pouring it into sand molds which contain designs by the artist and participants who learn to make casting molds through artist workshops. The Dragon Smelter also has fire effects which blow fire out the mouth and tail sections overhead.

art.name: City Lights
art.description: The City of Lights team provides artists with a basic solar light fixture and stand to create their own light sculptures with their own materials.  These sculptures are then mounted on the BRC's sign posts. Workshops during the event will provide  battery lights for folks to incorperate into their own gear.

art.name: Sideshow Sven and Professor Lena's Midway Spectacular
art.description: The Minnesota Midway booth, Sideshow Sven & Professor Lena's Midway Spectacular, occupies a 20 x 24 foot booth in the Midway. It has several large props including an ice fishing game, fortune teller box, wheel of fortune, raised stage, photo cutout booth and mosquito circus.  Participants are sporting Paul Bunyan inspired circus clothing, and the space has decorations to match.

art.name: WTF??  What, the Fork??
art.description:
WTF??  What the Fork?? consists of two sculptures.  The most prominent is a 16' tall shiny fork, stuck into the ground. It represents the fork in the road, a point of decision and departure.
Standing in front of the fork is a 10' tall obelisk in the shape of a turning post. Atop the post are motion sensors.  When activated, hands pop up pointing the way to a new direction.
Spiraling down the obelisk is a plaque which bears the conundrum: "If you don't know where you're going, any road will get you there."  This is synonymous with the seeker who has many roads to choose.  On the Playa there are no roads so the choices are limitless.

art.name: You are Who?
art.description: You are Who uses lighting mechanisms and reflected images to playfully challenge visitors conceptions of self, engaging them both visually and mentally in a illusory experience.

art.name: Bismuth Bivouac
art.description: Inspired by the geometry from the crystalline growth pattern of the element Bismuth, the Bismuth Bivouac is a playful pavilion celebrating the orthogonal geometries that exist in natural Bismuth crystals to form an intriguing cubic structure, with spiralling disruptions on each face, governed by the golden ratio. From a distance, it appears as a solid cube but intricate spaces can be discovered when you get closer. The iridescent colours of crystal translate into the proposal through coloured LED, built into the lumber structure, so at night the pavilion gives the same visually mesmerizing, colourful effect of the crystals in nature.

art.name: The Infinity Tree
art.description: Scorched, dry, barren, the desert wilderness sits silent, still, soundless, lifeless, only the pale whispers of the delicate fauna can be heard. Whispering, softly a whisper becomes a murmur, gently a murmur becomes a sound before the faintest of echoes can be heard, it begins. At first a drop, motionless. Weeks pass, slowly, a drop becomes a trickle, trickling, creeping, a journey begins, weaving, the trickle meanders. With time it grows, a small stream flows, filling the cracks of the playa. A sapling emerges, twisting and winding it grows high above the ground, encircling itself, entwining itself. A figure of our memories, a myriad of our existence, its infinitude transcends time and like the stream to the tree we breathe life into the playa. A rest for our minds, a shelter for our bodies, a place not only to remember, a place to never forget. The Infinity Tree is symbol of what can never be lost, what will always be found, and what makes us who we are.

art.name: Brickhead EARTH
art.description: Colossal ceramic brick human head reminiscent of the temple carvings of Angkor Wat or the great Olmec heads of Central America, a contemporary relic of a civilization not yet past. Site specific sound and light elements will be incorporated into the artwork.

art.name: New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow
art.description: Set in the middle of a bayou the backdrop from a long forgotten 10 in 1 Sideshow with entry arch framed by posters proclaiming assorted “freaks and oddities” presents a stage of assorted carnival acts, mischief and improvisational performances with something much more mysterious once you are lured into the inner sanctum

art.name: Lightstriker Trial of Strength
art.description:
The Light Striker Trial of Strength project is primarily inspired by the high striker game, which is most common to the circus sideshow and carnival setting.  The Light Strikers will stand at an imposing but approachable 10 feet tall and will vary in form.  Lighting will be embedded into the forms on hierarchical levels activated through the main track of the striker.  The ball struck by the force of the lever will trigger switches to these lights, so that if the ball is struck to the top of the Light Striker then all the lighting on the form will be activated.
    The main interactive component is the high striker mechanism.  Attention is focused on the person wielding the hammer, and the blow that lands causes an primal spike of energy which emanates upwards and outwards.  The goal of the Trials is to create a shared space of luminosity and exuberance on the playa. This would create a harmonizing space where and people can share these experiences and also forge new friendships.

art.name: Mazu Goddess of the Empty Sea
art.description:
You walk through the dust and heat of day, beyond the heart of the city, and from the haze before you emerges a shape that is both plant and place, flower and temple, both open and contained. No fence keeps you out, but one hundred and eight lanterns mark out the space, like a fairy ring in the forest, like the hundred and eight beads of the Buddhist rosary. 
   
Through the archway you walk. Up the long, low steps, the muffled sound of your tread meets the familiar clunk of wood; the music of a seaside pier rises from the dust, invoking the sense of some long lost place where water once stretched out to kiss the horizon. Below, the improbable sounds of water and the briefest hints of ocean blue tickle the imagination. From above, eight dragons of fire and steel peer down, watching you, or look out into the distance, waiting.
    
And again, the thing that is neither quite plant nor place seems to hover at the edge of defining, the green rooftop like a lily pad, the great lotus rising up out of the dried mud and the memory of water, each petal big enough to sleep in, open out from this improbable tree, this pillar of memories.
     
Inside, past and present blend and dance together. Old rites and new technologies bring fresh form to venerable, ancient practices. There is hidden circuitry here: casting the moon blocks reveals the will of the gods in a panoply of color and light. The breath of dragons explodes outward in answer to prayer. The goddess herself has been known to appear, if the moment is right.
          
You leave the temple, clutching message and map, and the sound of music finds your ears. Drums, gongs and shouting voices emerge from fantastical shapes, finned and spiny, nautilus-headed dancers and demons with a thousand eyes walk out of the dust, beckoning you to join them. You wonder, for a moment, if you are in fact in a desert, or in the memories of an ancient ocean, seeing the dreams of the sea floor dancing past.

art.name: Temple of Promise
art.description: A Temple's purpose is to provide a safe space where the diverse and essential needs of the soul can take root and grow or surrender and find solace. This year, the Temple of Promise welcomes participants through an archway soaring 97 feet overhead. Once inside, the structure curves in on itself, tapering in width and height down to just 7 feet tall. Along the way, alcoves formed by the supporting arches, as well as wooden sculptures reminiscent of stones in a stream, create altars and semi-private spaces for individuals and smaller gatherings. The lines of the curved wooden walls draw the eye inward and create a canvas for written messages and mementos. As the path continues to curve, it opens into the contemplative altar and the heart of the Temple: a grove of three sculpted trees. The branches are initially bare. Participants will write messages on long strips of cloth and attach them to the trees, creating the gentle shade of Weeping Willows, increasing as the week progresses.

art.name: Reflections of a Fire Sprite
art.description: Reflections of a Fire Sprite is a steel/wood structure made to rise and fall while set on fire. This segmented piece will be kept under tension via a spring-loaded base. A hand ratcheting mechanism will be used to drop the sculpture to the ground as well as erect it from a pile of burning debris. The project will be re-clad in wood and set on fire each night.

art.name: The Gallery of Infinity
art.description: The Gallery of Infinity is a sideshow attraction of reactive infinity mirror corridors. The LEDs within the infinity mirror panels change based on the movement of visitors. This art installation includes 3D sculptures built from multiple touch-reactive infinity mirrors and showcases infinity mirror paintings from Santa Cruz, CA artists.

art.name: 2pir
art.description: (Part of Charnival). 2πr. Two concentric rings. The inner ring detects movement and translates it into fire exploding up from the ground on the outer ring. Presented without any visible theme, it is a blank slate for the user to perform upon. It seems to lend itself to thoughts of magic, though it could just as easily be seen as a tool for a performer, a conductor’s orchestra, or any number of other interpretations.

art.name: Francis the Fantastic
art.description: (Part of Charnival). Francis the Fantastic is an interactive fortune teller. Participants can scry on his crystal ball to earn a fragment of his wisdom - and a display of his fiery power!

art.name: EMPIRE
art.description: Project EMPIRE intended to explore our tiny corner of the solar system in a secret interplanetary mission.  Instead, these travelers, not tourists, ended up traversing the wondrous universe and are finally able to come home with the help of alien technology.  The vehicle that arrives is equal parts sculpture and performance art.

art.name: Medusa Madness
art.description: Medusa Madness.  Dare to stare lest you be turned to stone.

art.name: Pentamonium
art.description: Pentamonium is an interactive carillon with 5 harmonious bells in its belfry. It is made of tubular steel and recycled bicycle parts painted in a variety of colors. A 16 foot column, supported by 5 arched legs, is topped with a mirror encrusted whirligig. Each leg supports a mechanism which rings one of the 5 overhead bells. Each mechanism invites interaction and the 5 notes encourage collaboration.

art.name: The Love Tester
art.description: Come and see the colossal Love Tester, whose fame folds in the great orb of this earth! The Glass of Fashion! The Mold of Form! The highest of high class attractions! Test your love, seek the truth! At last, the marvelous and wondrous Love Tester before you! An enormously expensive and endeared challenge, taken by over Eight Crowns of Europe, now awaits your touch! Carried by hunchbacks from the humid and violent swamps of Florida, the stupendous Love Tester seeks a great lover in you!!

art.name: Shrine of the Man
art.description:
10x10x16 shrine

laughing sal

art.name: Dr. Hyas Balze Boardwalk Soul Exchange
art.description: Deep in the back alleys of the carnival midway, the flickering lights of a forgotten marquee beckon you.  A hooded figure calls to you, offering you tokens in exchange for a glimpse at your soul.  Just beyond, behind the curtains, the colorful games appeal to your sense of whimsy and excitement, and all it takes to play is for you to weigh your soul.  Will you place a token on the scales and join the dark merriment?

art.name: Sparkade
art.description: The Sacramento Sparkade is an attraction that is designed to bring people back to the hot, dusty, shady, arcade of the annual Carnival.  When the lights went down, the carnival awoke. Carnies tantalized and promised, hemmed and hawed. "Passerby beware, but not over here!" was the promise. Behind the tents, the seedy and profane were flowing with ease for those that were willing to venture back. As participants approach the Sparkade the first thing they will notice is the Wheel of Misfortune Twister game wheel mounted to the informative and clearly labeled facade. As their eyes dart to the floor, the ominousness Twister pattern overtakes the entire floor space. Upon entering the stall, the participant will be drawn towards either the Self-Serve Selfie Station, Love Machine, Swag Glory Hole, or the Cock Ring Toss.

art.name: Macabre Penny Arcade
art.description: Baltimore’s Edgar Allan Poe themed penny arcade brings forth an era of the Carnival Midways of the past to the present. It is a place of interactive fun and spectacle; an asylum of playfulness, mysticism, arcana, and swinging pendulums.

art.name: Carnal Connections: Love is an Illusion
art.description:
Is it Love or Lust? Carnal Connections explores the duality of sexual desires, infatuation, obsessions.
Love has become an Illusion: quick hook ups, casual encounters, and religious condemnation.
Look in the mirror, see: true self, illusion, lust, limerence.

art.name: Pinball Machine
art.description: You enter a zone where your identity is fluid. Who are you? Alive or dead, male or female, popular or isolated?  It all can change.

art.name: Journey Into The Mind of the Man
art.description:
See what he sees,
Hear what he hears,
Modern technology has allowed us travel on a fantastic voyage into the very eyes, ears and mind of the Man.
No telling what you will find inside...

art.name: The Mask Factory
art.description: Welcome One and All to the Fabulous Mask Factory.   Enter the Magical Workshop to Create  a New Face with lots of Wonderful Artists.  You can Make a Face to fight your Fears.  Or Make a  Face to Change your Future.  Or you can Make a Face to Find Real Fun!  Enter the Workshop as one person and leave the workshop as another!  You can  Make a Mask that will become an heirloom for your grandchildren to make up stories about.  Yaaaaaay!!!  Meet new People!  Become a New Person!  Make the Face you want to become and walk out onto the Playa as That New Creature!  Come One and Come All......To the Fabulous Midway of Fun Filled Fantasy.....and Masks!

art.name: Wonderlust Arcade
art.description: Meandering along the Midway and you find yourself pulled into a vortex where time and space are one: Wonderlust Arcade! This impossibly long hallway lined with overly large childhood games is decorated in a 1920's style. Games like: Simon, Connect 4, Battleship are being played by others consumed with Wonderlust. Exploring this hallway of coalesced time, you feel as if you are getting larger! Space is also compressing! By the time you reach the hallway's end, you are GIANT! There you find a live Zoltar waiting! Searching for an escape, you enter a portal into another dimension ruled by the rich tones of a handmade organ performed by another chrononaut. This calmer world lacks spatial compression, the walls and floor are covered with curves, spirals and fun house mirrors, leaving you with the spins. You try your hand at the keyboard... As if your fingers were possessed, that tune you played as a kid fills the air. Your song ends and you make for the door, now with a sense of Wonderlust!

art.name: Philly Phreak Show
art.description: The Philly Phreak show is a museum of Oddities and a Phreak Show celebrating strange artistry, one-of-a-kind talents and stories that connect us with our humanity. Curiosity will lure the audience into our tent of rarities. Cabinets will be filled with "specimens" and a variety of artifacts in a spooky Victorian inspired atmosphere. Nightly a museum curator, evil scientist, creepy clowns, etc. will greet guests to enter for intimate performances and games. Our regional inspiration is Philadelphia's favorite strange medical collection, The Mutter Museum.

art.name: OraculTang
art.description:
The human mind resembles a monkey – constantly moving, lightly hopping from one thought and emotion to another one, stopping for long at one issue and in brief at another. We absorb the information in the quantities we are unable to digest, we "play monkey", share the information with other people in and out of place not always realizing the meaning of words. 
Such is OraculTang - hairy anthropomorphous eager to have any talk about life, God, love, currency rates but mostly about the conflicts of a modern human, primarily about inner and outer freedom.  
OraculTang is watching the audience acutely with his only eye reacting to their behavior, replying gesture to gesture, word to word. Its cage - covered with mirrors top to bottom - gives the impression of an endless abyss from which our oddish prophet is addressing us. The speech of the monkey first incoherent still reveals age-old wisdom.

art.name: Dr. Thelonious D. RUM Medicinal Thump Thump Magical Healing Excursion
art.description:
Dr. Thelonious and his family of Vagabonds each with peerless pedigree, through the use of rhythm making bait, captivate and inspire the clever and naïve.

Trawling the crowds, mesmerizing and enticing chumps and marks with peculiar oddities found, burners vie through games of chance for the opportunity to express their "unearthing" as they build their drum.

All candidates are gifted with carny totems and icons; only the courageous stay and build, those perennial souls who hurl themselves into the unknown of their personal darkness and light. 

This installation is a vehicle whereby intimate interactions are cultivated while supporting the burner making their own art on site. Ideally, this art is vital and poignant, illustrating the journey towards what lies beyond the mask with each drum being a personal canvas. Capitalizing on the "immediacy of the interaction" and the "possibility within the moment," the facilitation team acts as lead, rudder, usher and guide as both move towards their mutual unmasking.

art.name: Baltic Altar
art.description:
The room (15x24) has black external walls and mirrored clothing inside. To get into the room participants go through a narrow passage (5x24) that has black clothing strips hanging from the ceiling at all of its length creating a claustrophobic sensation. When a person finally enters the space they see a glowing platform (15x10). 
Participants are greeted by a Krivis (shaman) who leads them to a mirror altar in the center of the platform which comes alive as a musical instrument if you interact with it. The altar allows participants to compose music as easy as Lego pieces: sound loops of basslines, drums, melodies & vocals can be combined in thousands of different variations by placing special controllers on the instrument’s surface.  This includes recordings of Baltic folk artists using traditional instruments, electronics, hip-hop and more. Up to 4 people can interact with the cube at the same time, creating their unique melodies.

art.name: Mutant Tivoli
art.hometown: Nordic Countries: Sweden / Denmark / Finland / Norway
art.description: A traveling circus from the nordic lands has arrived! The frozen north hides humor and horror and requires you to be resourceful to survive. To make it through the winter you must preserve your food, your thoughts, and your experiences but you never know what will come back out of the jar. Come to our Tivoli where you can play a game to make a change, and winning will cost you an arm or a leg.

art.name: Cock 'N Candy
art.description: One game of skill, one game of chance, and one cone of cotton candy!

art.name: MYSTICAL MIDWAY
art.description:
Professor Grimaldi's TENT OF MARVELS & MYSTICAL MIDWAY makes a command appearance at this year's festival, called in from  realms both STRANGE & MARVELOUS!
The Midway opens its gates to those who would peer into its mirrors and encounter its Characters.
Guest may SPIN FORTUNA'S WHEEL and discover their ALLIES.
A "Mythopoetic, Commedic Ritual Initiation' awaits inside THE TENT OF MARVELS to those who would dare dive deeper into its mirror.
You may encounter such Midway Characters as:
PROFESSOR GRIMALDI: Who are you on The Mythic Stage?
LADY FORTUNA: How do you call upon the power of insight?
The DARK HARLEQUINS: How do you kill your own joy?
The SNAKEOIL SALESMAN: How are you fooling yourself and others?
The BLUE MYSTICS: How can you rewrite a better story? What inner Magic do you wish to share more of in the world?
Mr. NOBODY: What fear do you wish to release?
His HOLINESS SOCKANANDA: Do you wish to achieve SOCKHEAD?
ROYAL ORDER OF MYSTIC JESTERS: How are you or can you be of service to others?

art.name: Venus Lift - Mega Mikoshi
art.description: Borrowing some tradition from Japanese festive occasions, Mega-Mikoshi is a portable shrine that will carry the ideal beauty "Venus" in a giant flower bud as an idol supported by fans who physically lift the Mikoshi. As it goes out for a parade from the Midway booth, the flower will bloom at its climax when the music reaches its hype.

art.name: Reflection
art.description: Reflection presents this years burners with an intimate setting in which to share their inner most confessions, secrets and tales, with the option to do so both openly face to face, or retain the mystery of their identity by sharing with a stranger through the pavilions semi private screen.Created as a result of rigorous testing of origami the pavillion is made of eight Spiralhedrons mirrored along all axis in order to create the enclosing plywood form and subtly embody Burning Man’s theme ‘Carnival of Mirrors. By providing an interactive base for participation Reflection is never fully accomplished without the burners involvement. By sharing their stories, burners create a unique experience manifested through the ideals of trust and sharing, which facilitates a special bond between the burners. Upon its burning at the end of the festival, ‘Reflection’ becomes a resting place for the confessions, secrets and stories of its burners, allowing new bonds to be formed.

art.name: Hell Blazer
art.description: (Part of Charnival.) Hell Blazer the fire infused strength tester Charnival game. An eight foot pitch fork hand crafted by the devil for Earthly access to Hell Fire. This pitchfork spits fire when a human tests their strength to activate LEDs and blasts high above the Playa.

events.title: Astrobiology by Steve Vance
events.description: Hear from an expert about current issues in astrobiology and expand your idea of what life looks like. This talk might help you identify alien life on the playa during your trip to this strange land. Keep your eyes peeled!
events.print_description: Learn about extremophiles and possible life elsewhere in the Solar System!

events.title: Spankathon 2015
events.description: Everyone must get spanked.
events.print_description: Everyone must get spanked.

events.title: Black Light Twister
events.description: Open for everyone to play with each other.
events.print_description: Open for everyone to play with each other.

events.title: Afterburn
events.description: Dance until you die.
events.print_description: Dance until you die.

events.title: Wheel of Happy!
events.description: Spin the wheel and find out what happy gift destiny has in store for YOU. Is it a compliment? A hug? What does "something naughty" mean? Spin and win!
events.print_description: Wheel of Happy!

events.title: Light up your faith!
events.description: Christian Burner meet up.
events.print_description: Christian burner meet up.

events.title: Spin Jam
events.description: Come get your flow on.
events.print_description: Come get your flow on.

events.title: 2nd Bi-Annual Jalapeno Fisting
events.description: We'll provide the jalapeños.
events.print_description: We'll provide the jalapeños.

events.title: DIY Hens 4 Eggs & Compost
events.description:
Learn how easy it is to raise your own hens for fresh eggs and invaluable
compost.
events.print_description:
Learn how easy it is to raise your own hens for fresh eggs and invaluable
compost.

events.title: AC/DC Power Hour
events.description: AC/DC Power Hour-     What else needs to be said? 90 minutes of classic riffs for an early evening rave up. Fosters Beer by special compliments of DJ Edge and Club Neu Verboten. 8:30-10 PM
events.print_description: AC/DC Power Hour-     What else needs to be said? 90 minutes of classic riffs for an early evening rave up.

events.title: A New Form of Taxation
events.description: Teppy makes a case for Georgist style land tax, and presents an algorithm that is provably optimal, for assessing land value. This algorithm is immune to political manipulation. Computer science background helpful, but not necessary.
events.print_description: Teppy makes a case for Georgist style land tax, and presents an algorithm that is provably optimal, for assessing land value

events.title: Tit Painting
events.description: Glam your girls just in time for the Critical Tits parade!  Let us help them sparkle and shine. BYOC.
events.print_description: Glam your girls just in time for the Critical Tits parade!  Let us help them sparkle and shine. BYOC.

events.title: Bonobo Lodge
events.description:
Participate in a sensual network. Strengthen the bonds through a structured exchange of touch. All are welcome.

Named for our primate cousins, the Bonobo chimpanzees, who resolve the tension of conflict through intimacy rather than violence. We’ve adapted grooming practices seen throughout the animal kingdom to activate good-vibe hormones, which signal feelings of safety, belonging, and community. In our sensual network, each participant is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the bonds.

This was a hugely popular event when Craig taught this mini-workshop at Burning Man a number of years ago. There were over 80 people - standing room only - despite being located on the outer circle. Don't miss it!

"I 'see' more of the human energy field when I'm with Craig than at any other time. He 'pumps' up his own energy field to make it easier to see." - Mark Lorentzen

This event will repeat again at 11:00 am on Saturday.

Please help up by sharing & promoting this amazing experience :-)

events.title: Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart
events.description: "Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart:  Guided Meditation and Ceremony"  In this journey, Colby will guide us into our inner sanctuary within and deep into the recesses of our heart space where the altar of wholeness resides.  Here we will be given the opportunity to accept our injustices, reclaim our disowned aspects, and renew our awareness and devotion to wholeness and love.  As the Light of Truth and Divine Love radiates from our hearts we will share in group and anchor in our bodies with physical relating exercises and dance.

Yet more importantly it is A MAKEOVER FROM THE INSIDE OUT. The Art of Exotic Dancing lessons are a gateway to your most feminine self, your true essence. We believe this is where your Real Beauty lies. You will learn to transform your self, gain self-confidence, authentic self-expression, freedom, joy and real personal power, re-invent your body image and powerfully express your femininity through your individual, unique sensual body movement.

events.title: Playa Scavener Hunt
events.description: Feeling adventurous? Think you can handle a quest through the treacherous land of Black Rock City? Then the Vagabonds & Tagalongs Scavenger Hunt is for you! The rules are simple: pick up your quest from camp, complete the quest, return to camp to collect your reward. This quest line has a series of tasks and questions to answer as you go. Some quest items will be silly, some reflective, some outright ridiculous. This perilous journey will challenge your creativity, courage, and perseverance as you battle the elements and experience all that the playa has to offer. Those who survive and return to V&T will be compensated in gifts and cherished as champions of the V&T community!

events.title: 10 Principles Confessional
events.description:
You've only been at Black Rock City for a few days now and you've already violated several if not all of the 10 Principles.  Did you fail to chase down that moop headed to the trash fence?  Maybe you're all inclusive except for shirtcockers?  You probably can't name more than 3 of the 10 Principles.  If so, The Disciples of the Dust will be operating a confessional for those who have violated  the 10 Principles.  Confess your transgressions, accept your penance and receive absolution.  You can trust the Disciples...... we're trained professionals!    
We believe Larry will stop by and give us his blessing.  Have your picture taken with Larry or our facsimile of Larry descending the mount with the 10 Principles Tablet.
events.print_description: Failed to pick up some moop, not inclusive when it comes to shirtcockers,  then visit the 10 Principles Confessional for absolution.  Larry may visit.

events.title: 10th Anniversary Soul Brunch and Power Showers
events.description:
Soul food got its name in the 1960's from the commensality - or practice of eating together - of generations of Southerners who headed far from their family origins during the Great Migration. It reminded them of home.

Soul Brunch isn't just a party; it's like the backyard barbecues of home. It's like the cookouts of yesteryear. As your families invited your communities over, as the generations of soul families invited their communities over, so too does the Heroes & Super Villains family invite the Playa community over to eat together, drink together, get to know one another, dance with each other and uplift each other.

From morning until nightfall, our trained chefs serve up the freshest breakfast burritos on the Playa, accompanied by professionally made craft cocktails. Our collection of international DJs spin smooth beats until nightfall.

We also give revelers a chance to clean up with our Soul Power Showers; guests experience the rebirth and rejuvenation of cool, cleansing water sprayed forcefully from our pressurized washer system (imagine a water saving car wash inside our shower areas for guests). Baptized anew, heroes set out on their way spreading positive vibes.

DJ Lineup:
-Marques Wyatt
-Nicodemus
-Deep Woods
-Sabo
-Rafael de la Cruz
events.print_description: Breakfast burritos, craft cocktails, bumping bass, and power showers. A neighborhood block party from our family to yours.

events.title: 13th Annual Welcome the Sun Sunrise Cocktail Part
events.description:
Group W at Math Camp is hosting our 13th Annual Welcome the Sun
Sunrise Cocktail Party starting around 6:20 AM at Burning Man.

The bar will be excellent:  AWESOME Bloody Marys, Tequila Marys, maybe COFFEE (regular or Irish), Mimosas, bourbon, Scotch, water, Math Themed Drinks and who knows what else.

So whether you want a night-cap as you strut home in triumph or you need eye-open to start the day right, come on over!  Last year the final drinks were poured around midnight, so even if you sleep late Group W is
there waiting you.

Stop by any time for crunchy snacks or graham crackers!

Please be 21 years of age or older to be served
alcoholic beverages.
events.print_description:
Group W is hosting our 13th Annual Welcome the Sun Sunrise Cocktail Party starting about 6:20 AM.

events.title: 2015 Rock Star for a Day Celebration
events.description:
Nominees were accepted. Candidates were discussed. A Rock Star was chosen.
The 2015 Rock Star for a Day is Dani “Rat Lady” Moore!

Dani Moore has been the ring leader and endless spokesperson for Mobility Camp. Dani has helped spread word and expand knowledge about Mobility Camp’s goals and mission to build awareness and improved alternative abled access at Burning Man.

Dani is an incredible, living example of Burning Man’s radical inclusion principle. She is an inspiration and crates a lasting impact on our culture, maternally calling for inclusive accessibility and consciousness by us all.

Help us celebrate by participating in her Rock Star day with her! 

You can't make the event? 

* Search your local craigslist for Dani's Wish List items and drop them by Mobility Camp at Center Camp:

-- A gas powered golf cart with hand controls: to borrow for Burn or to own
-- Knee Scooters
-- Wheelchairs *with foot rests* all sizes, in particular XL/Bariatric
-- Crutches of all sizes; most needed size 4’6”-5’2” & 5’1”-5’9”
-- Walkers of all sizes
-- Handcycles to borrow for Burn
-- Photographer to capture Mobility Camp activities 

Dani will receive playa rock star treatment Thursday afternoon, including transportation and soulful beats via her "limo" the Charlie the Unicorn art car (Yay, thank you Unicorn Crew!) Come join in on the fun anytime! 

Radically Inclusive! Join Us! Everyone's welcome to hug the rock star, jump into the limo and participate! 

12:00pm Arrive at Mobility Camp, Center Camp 
Inner ring/6:00
Present Dani Moore with her Rock Star status.
1:00pm All participate in the accessibility obstacle course
1:45pm Transport Dani and anyone else to Kostume Kult
for rock star outfitting 6:45 & Esplanade
2:45pm Limo departs for an out on open playa adventure 
to be announced
3:00pm Special thank you surprise.
3:45pm Rock Star Charlie the Unicorn limo returns Dani 
and everyone else to Mobility Camp!
events.print_description:
Nominees were accepted. Candidates were discussed. A Rock Star was chosen.
The 2015 Rock Star for a Day is Dani “Rat Lady” Moore!
events.other_location: Beginning at Mobility Camp @ 7:30 & Center Camp Plaza & on Charlie the Unicorn

events.title: 2nd Annual Art Car Forum
events.description: Art Cars are an integral part of the Black Rock City community.  The 2nd Annual Art Car Forum celebrates the makers, creators, do-ers, supporters and enthusiasts who year over year pour themselves into this incredible creations.  Come listen to and celebrate these people and their achievements while looking at some of the most incredible art accomplishments on the playa.
events.print_description: Art Cars are an important part of Black Rock City.  The 2nd Annual Art Car Forum brings together this community to share their wonderful stories.

events.title: 4th Annual Brian Brunch
events.description: Brian McKnight, Brian Wilson, Brian Eno, what do these people all have in common? They all love brunch… allot. Join us for the 4th annual Brian Brunch as Brians, Brian lovers, and Brian spirit’s gather and regale one another with tales of great Brian adventures and debate the merits of the letter “y” with the inevitable and incorrigible Bryan. Enjoy a fare of Artisanal Bacon Quesadillas (Veg opt avail), Ethically-Sourced Southwestern Mimosas, Vietnamese Irish Coffee and more.
events.print_description: Calling Brians & Brian lovers! Your annual brunch with artisanal bacon quesadillas (veg avail), Vietnamese Irish coffee and more. No Bryans, please.

events.title: 4th Int'l BRC Beekeeper's Summit @ the BuzzInn
events.description: Beekeepers and wannabees come together for a hivemind discussion of all things bee. Want to be a beekeeper but don't know where to start? Have a theory on how to reduce varroa mite populations? Healthy Queen management?  A recipe for pollen patties you want to share? Then this is the place to bee. If a flock is to gulls, what's a group of beekeepers? An argument!   (Prior experience not necessary).  Beek out with us while enjoying our lavender lemonade.
events.print_description: Beek out & join other BRC beekeepers from around the world to discuss the methodologies & plights of the honeybee.  No previous experience necessary.

events.title: 5Elements Dance Activation™ - Malaika Darville
events.description: 5Elements Dance Activation™ is  a powerful ecstatic dance meditation to experience expanded states of awareness for both personal and planetary Awakening by transforming negativity into nectar! These tribal expression sessions are powerful activations of ones true essence and allow for authentic movement and connection using the breath as our your guide.This is Spirituality rooted in the bod! let the dance be your medicine and music be your drugs to take you higher! Every "body" Welcome just be prepared to move groove sweat and smile all over!

events.title: 5 Rhythms Dance
events.description:
The 5 Rhythms is a simple, but profound movement meditation practice. There are no steps to learn and this dance is accessible to everyone regardless of age, share or experience.

We will dance two waves, gently guided. Come discover the dance only you can do.
events.print_description: The 5 Rhythms is a simple profound movement meditation practice created by Gabrielle Roth. All ages & dance skill set welcome. Held in the Stage Dome.

events.title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Chloe Goodwin @ RhythmWave
events.description: 5Rhythms is an in-bodied, out of your mind dance experience not to be missed. It is a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious! Come "Sweat Your Prayers" the Santa Fe way with Chloe Goodwin at RhythmWave!
events.print_description: 5Rhythms dance is a simple, yet powerful moving meditation. Come "Sweat Your Prayers" the Santa Fe way with Chloe Goodwin at RhythmWave!

events.title: 5Rhythms for Freedom
events.description: Ever feel uncomfortable in your own skin, like you just need to break free? Or stuck in the same, endless mental loop? You're not alone. But all it takes to end this vicious pattern is one step, consciously taken, then another, and another - and before you know it, you're dancing! Old or young, novice or expert, afraid or unworried, join us in sluffing off some unnecessary layers one simple step at a time. You will dance your way to a new sense of self.  With Mackenzie Amara
events.print_description: Uncomfortable in your own skin? Sluff off unnecessary layers one step at a time and dance urself to a new sense of self.-Mackenzie Amara

events.title: 7 Sins Lounge proudly serving Flaming Blue Phucks!
events.description: You are cordially invited to attend the annual Flaming Blue Phuck Thursday at 7 Sins Lounge.  Guests are welcomed to the friendliest little lounge on the playa by one of our host sinners and guided through the crowds to one of our welcoming bartenders.  These chemists will be hand crafting the legendary Flaming Blue Phuck for each of our guests with sinful care and great precision.  These time travel potions are sure to warm you to the core and settle your mind and soul into a sinfully blissful state.  Settle in for an hour or the night among friends.  Take a spin on the Wheel of Sins and receive absolution from our skilled staff from all your misdeeds.  Many have said that the year is not complete on playa until they've had their annual does of this flaming blue potion.  If you've yet to try yours, come pop your Blue Phuck cherry with us this year.
events.print_description: The infamous flaming drink returns for 1 night! Spin the Wheel of Sins for absolution and then take the sting out with our patented flaming libation!

events.title: 7th Annual Irish Car Bomb Party
events.description: Camp HOT Mayo is so excited to hold its 7th annual Irish Car Bomb Party! Jump in your art cars, ride your bikes and enjoy an Irish Car Bomb w/ good people and make some great memories. We have music, games, comfy sofas, and an amazing shade structure to beat the heat. We will be serving up to 1000 Irish Car Bombs and you get to keep a souvenir shot glass. Also check out our Flaming Basketball Hoop. It will be another amazing year!
events.print_description: Camp HOT Mayo is so excited to hold its 7th annual Irish Car Bomb Party! We will be serving 1000 Irish Car Bombs and you get to keep a souvenir glass.

events.title: A Capella Chorus Jam
events.description: Like to sing? Come to our vocal jam. A few years ago, we had a blast when a spontaneous chorus broke out in our camp, covering classic harmony-rich songs like Billy Joel's "For the Longest Time," and a tradition was born. We will gather and sing popular, well-known, or timeless songs in harmony (e.g., folk, pop, rock, opera, blues, barbershop, and on and on), without accompaniment (a capella). Song title lists provided to spark your vocal chords. All are welcome - no training needed.
events.print_description: Like to sing? Vocally jam timeless songs with us, in harmony. We'll do well-known pop, folk, rock, &c. No instruments. Just title & lyric pages.

events.title: Activate Your Super Hero - Jennifer Partridge
events.description: Jennifer takes you on a journey in to the mystical realms of your super hero identity! Move, open and shine from your heart, as you are guided back into your ancient memory of why you chose to be here on Earth during this time. With a delightful recipe of music, primal movement, guided imagery, memory recall and visioning, your super hero will soon be awake in the dream and transforming your life.
events.print_description: Journey in to the mystical realms with music, movement, guided imagery and visioning. Your super hero will awake transforming your life.

events.title: Activating Your Creative Feminine Magic
events.description:
This workshop is about working with the magical, creative energy of Burning Man to create a plan-of-action to bring your unique offering to the world.  When you are holding onto your creative expression, your gifts, your particular genius, or pretending not to know what it is, it's gets very uncomfortable after a while. It will start itching inside of you to be created in physical form, it's deepest desire is to be born out of the dream space. You came to Planet Earth to share this, now is your time. Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. This workshop is broken down into four magical sections. 

1) Connection. How relating to others is the number one function of your business or passion project. We begin the workshop with getting connected on the soul level to your fellow sisters.
2) Reclaiming Your Unique Brilliance. Refining your message and creating something in the world that is unique, contributive, and that people will pay for. 
3) Healing Your Relationship With Money. Girl, if you want to start or expand your business, you've got to look at your drama and trauma with money. What would it be like if money flowed to you with ease? What would it be like if you could actually receive it? We will dive into this exploration together.
4) Closing Ritual. Our closing ritual will include a beautiful ceremony to hold each others intentions and desires as we go create in the world. You will be let into a "light-share" experience.
events.print_description: Calling all healers, conversation-starters, rebels, light-workers, and medicine women. Reclaim your feminine power and your boldest leadership.

events.title: AI, mans quest to invent God. w/ Professor Stone
events.description: The download has begun. We are increasingly intertwining with our technology. We are symbiotically joining our data-selves within the Great Machine. Companies and our government record so much of what we do, what does this mean for humanity? In this talk we will be exploring : What is Singularity and why are people talking about it? How does My Digital Life create a Virtual Data Version of You? How can we program the future to include humanity and our hearts? What will Sex, Love and Empathy look like in our Next Evolution? At the end of this talk you will learn how our community spiritual self is the force for change.
events.print_description: The current state of AI in todays society and how can we participate in shaping what might be the largest influence on life, culture and humankind

events.title: Ali Bar-Bar

Visit Ali Bar-Bar, the 'hottest' place in Silicon Village, to chill, drink, and dance. Our cozy Bedouin tent provides comfort and shelter day and night, while we serve drinks and entertain you.

Enter through the flashing Stargate to dance to our laser light show, watch or join in fire performances, and enjoy flaming cocktails that will burn you inside and out. Brave guests are invited to roll the dice and taste our 'burning balls'.

Sparkle Pony's Closet offers gently used Playawear in our Playa "store" where consultants will help you find your inner Sparkle Pony! 

Scheduled events:

Happy Hours: daily, 4pm-6pm, no cover, half price drinks. 
Flaming cocktails, ‘burning balls’, and fire performances: Tue, Wed, Thu 7pm-9pm, Fr 7pm-10pm. 
Late Night Blue Blazers: Thu, Fr, Sun, 2am-4am
Sparkle Pony's Closet: Tue, Wed, Thu, 10am-2pm.

Enjoy the "Friend Zone" hammock space 20 feet above the Esplanade in our ridiculously photogenic dome. Advice Mallard sa.......god. 5 years....... I have been doing these things for 5 years. Stupid line after stupid line. There is more to life them memes and pictures of fucking cats! I don't know what to write. Do you people even read these? I'm not a "clever man". Do You Have idea how long it took me to write the short description? Like any idea? I hate to write and that shit took me like 2 hours. Really! Like 2 entire hours. Trying to think of lame punchy puns just for your enjoyment. Trying to get The Burning Man Meet-Up "back to it's roots". I mean half you fucking people will still miss the event and be like "I meant to go, but 15 drag queens in an art car wanted to have mimosas at the trash fence". YOU HAD ONE JOB, make it to the meet-up and pretend to not hate people for like a couple hours, but no you couldn't get your dusty, sun burnt ass out of your hexayurt. I don't know what I was expecting. Honestly I don't even know why I bother. I'm just going to use the same description year after year and you wont even notice. Fuck you people!"
events.print_description: Come hang out with your fellow redditors IRL.  Pretend to care about the world beyond the sickly glow of your computer monitor.

On Tuesday the Queen Dick pub's Village Green will be the scene of a genteel tea party.  This is a quintessential British daytime party with outrageous games that will start on the Village Green and flow into the evening:
Knights on Bikes: 'Lance-A-Lot' - Amateur jousting,
Human fruit machine,
Blindfolded-roly-poly-cuppa-tea-relay,
Lemon and spoon battle,
Morris prancing,
Human snake,
Robbie Burns' Remix Reeling,
Alongside these lovely games we will also have some S&M thrown in for some naughty measure. Beneath the thin veneer of respectability, all is never what it seems; we’ll offer soft (and comfortable) slipper spankings, corduroy chaps and lavender scented latex. 
And of course all day banging party music that'll pushes the party up to an 11!  And don't forget, the Queen Dick will have cold beer on tap all day to refresh you throughout the day.
Come join us!!

Choose your favorite position/pose in our art studio: Stand, sit, or recline on either side of the “canvas” as the workshop artist or the on-stage model, and dwell in our Artists and Models moment. BYO drawing materials or any mediums you work  in, or use the pencils and pads we will have ready for you. All male and female models are welcome to participate. events.title: Art of Perspective Drawing Class
events.description: Ever wonder why we see the way we see? The way something looks to you, and to me?  Come learn how to draw, using proper perspective. It’s an art form to capture something long, or reflective.  Haven’t touched a pencil in years? Don’t worry my friend, I have guides, paper and tools!  It's a casual environment, so have no fear.  It's art we're making, and we're all learning here.  You'll go about your day afterward, with opened eyes and mind.  For perspective is the trick to viewing this trippy world correctly, you'll find.

events.title: ART TOUR - Bicycle Tour
events.description: See the Carnaval of Mirrors as envisioned by our artists!  This informal bike tour is hosted by volunteers from the ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). A curated group of art projects will be visited and discussed. This tour will begin at 10:00 AM and run approximately 60-90 minutes, weather permitting. The tours are flexible so feel free to join us on playa if you see a bunch of bikes traveling in a pack, or drop out if you want. The tour starts promptly at the bike racks across from the ARTery (on the Esplanade). Note that there are also ART TOUR - Guided tour (search Playa Events), and self guided tours (paper copies) available at the ARTery. Most of the art on the playa is self-funded, so be sure to check out your favorite art projects on the Burning Man website now, and then help fund them or volunteer through their respective websites. It takes every single one of us to make Burning Man happen...
events.print_description: ARTery hosted bicycle tour of curated art projects, Temple and The Man.  Bring your bike and join the fun.  Departs promptly at 10 AM at ARTery.

events.title: ART TOUR - Guided
events.description: It's all about the ART projects and the fabulous ARTISTS and their teams who create them! Ride in style on a bus/mutant vehicle as volunteers from the ARTery provide information on curated art pieces, as well as the Temple and The Man. Guided Vehicle tours run Tue-Fri and begin at 11:00 AM at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Vehicle tours are for people with mobility issues -- seniors, pregnant women, people with ongoing or temporary disabilities, accompanied children, and others who might face challenges in getting out and around the playa. You must have tickets in advance to get a seat on the bus. Tickets are available @ 10 AM the day of the tour at ARTery (6:25 & Esplanade). Also there are separate ART TOUR - Bicycles (search Playa Directory), or DO YOUR OWN TOUR! Self-guided (paper map) tours available at the ARTery (on Esplanade)
events.print_description: ARTery guided mutant vehicle/bus tours of the art.  For those with mobility issues, please.  Tickets given out at ARTery at 10 AM the day of the tour.

events.title: Ayla Nereo sunrise set @ Camp Mystic
events.description:
THURS morning at 6:30 AM ~ Join Ayla at Camp Mystic to sing in the wildness of the heart and greet the dawning sun. With an array of loop-pedals by her side, she builds layer upon layer of vocal melodies into fierce, sweeping harmonies and weaves syncopated threads of guitar, kalimba, piano, and percussion into each live performance. 

Her lucid storytelling and lyrical imagery are water for the thirsty soul; words and sounds that crack open the heart, and embody the many folds of our own selves. Crafting an immersive soundscape we can dive into, Ayla’s performance becomes a journey: an inspired, wondrous experience that holds you by the heart and doesn’t let go.

www.aylanereo.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ayla.nereo.music
LISTEN: http://soundcloud.com/ayla-nereo

events.title: BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS with SOMBREROS!
events.description:
*Be part of BOTH the BiGGEST gathering of BURNERS witH SOMBREROS on Playa and  take part in our funky BURNERS with SOMBREROS video... bring tequila and your AMiGOS!!! Arriba! Arriba!!

It is an undeniable fact: there are more sombreros than Mexicans on Playa! As a Mexican I just get giddy happy when I see my fellow Burners with colorful sombreros throughout Playa.... it simply evokes the festive nature of my culture: fiesta, spirits, baile, canto and some good food! I want to take it a step further and challenge 'cultural appropriation' stigmas out there by making it a WIN-WIN situation here: If you wear a Sombrero on Playa, you gotta KiSS A MEXiCAN! Come celebrate in the BiGGEST GATHERiNG OF BURNERS with SOMBREROS at Center Camp Cafe. Bring your SOMBREROS, your TEQUILA, and your AMiGOS... and together we'll go in search of MEXiCANS ON PLAYA and share the LOVE!!!

This year I am also gonna do something that IT'S SO OUT OF MY LEAGUE and make a ViDEO!!! SO come be part of the GIFT the GiVES and immortalize yourselves (and your SOMBRERO) in a funky video I got prepared for ya!! Arriba Arriba!!
events.print_description: *Bring your sombreros and be part of  our funky "BURNERS with SOMBREROS" video......... bring tequila and your Amigos! Arriba! Arriba!!

events.title: Bike Clinic
events.description: Funky brakes? Flat tire? Wobbly wheels? Pedals in a panic? Our on the spot bike clinic will help you get rolling in style.
events.print_description: Funky brakes? Flat tire? Wobbly wheels? Pedals in a panic? Our on the spot bike clinic will help you get biking in style.

events.title: Bike Mutation Station (formerly Pimp Yr Bike)
events.description: The Bike Mutation Station (formerly Pimp Yr Bike) is an interactive bike decoration station where we, the bioluminauts provide anti-moop materials and advice for bike decoration. It is staffed by us every day to help and assist the mutation and beautification of bicycles and other modes of personal human-powered transport. We also supply simple lighting for bikes in the interest of nighttime safety. Great for Kids!
events.print_description: The Bike Mutation Station is an interactive bike decoration station where we provide materials and advice for bike decoration. Great for Kids!

events.title: Bike Repair Services by The Bike Gods
events.description: We offer holistic bike medicine by treating both the bike and owner.  Take a number and chill in our waiting lounge while your bike is repaired.  Our attendants will ensure that your thirst is quenched and will be offering hand-jobs (massage!).
events.print_description: We offer holistic bike medicine by treating both the bike and owner.  Take a number and chill in our waiting lounge while your bike is repaired.

events.title: Bike Smut Screening
events.description: A collection of short erotic films made by inspired cyclists from all over the world.  Explore your bikesexuality and enjoy sexy bicycle movies!
events.print_description: A collection of short erotic films made by inspired cyclists from all over the world.  Explore your bikesexuality and enjoy sexy bicycle movies!

events.title: Bike Spray Paint Booth
events.description: Open all sun hours - come by to spruce up your bike.  make it special.  lots of spray colors available.  the booth is equipped with a filtered suction fan to protect the Playa from paint and help dry your bike fast!
events.print_description: Open all day - come by to spruce up your generic bike.  make it yours.

events.title: BILLION BUNNY MARCH TO PROTEST HUMANITY
events.description: The Billion Bunny March marches Thursday! We march to liberate all furry sentient beings from the treachery of humanity! Fluff up your ears and tail and meet Thursday 4-6pm at BMIR radio station on the Esplanade near Center Camp for Bunnification, socializing and HOPtails (bring cup). We take over BMIR 4-6pm and WE MARCH AT 6PM SHARP…like a really pointy carrot! (Email us if you have a mobile sound system to join in playing our march music. Thanks!)
events.print_description: The Billion Bunny March marches Thursday! Meet at BMIR on Esplanade near Center Camp from 4-6pm for Bunnification and HOPtails. We march at 6pm SHARP!
events.other_location: BMIR radio station near Center Camp

events.title: Bingo Fiasco
events.description: Submit yourself to the whims of chance at the daily OKNOTOK Bingo Fiasco. Each winner receives a fantastic prize and becomes the next caller.
events.print_description: Submit yourself to the whims of chance at the daily OKNOTOK Bingo Fiasco. Each winner receives a fantastic prize and becomes the next caller.

events.title: Biodanza:  From Instinct to Inspiration
events.description:
Biodanza has been baring hearts since the 60's. Developed in S. America it is now a world wide phenomenon bringing joy, pleasure, balance, health and healing through music, dance and sincere interaction. Contact and caress are tools of our trade. We deal in deep human intimacy, through touch, eye contact, movement and body language. Not verbal communication. We feel each other, letting the mind and its ways take a back seat for a change. We enhance our senses, our instincts and our state of consciousness. We perceive and experience ourselves and others differently when we do this. More authentically. More naked. 
The first hour is for interactive activation and expression, maybe getting a little wild together. The second half is for slowing down, relaxing, melting and harmoniously merging with one another, exercising the polarities of enhanced sense of self to oceanic experience.
events.print_description: Interactive dance-movement-contact workshop to stimulate residual potentials in vitality-creativity-sexuality-universal love.  With Niraj

events.title: Bismuth or Bust
events.description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. The process is fascinating to watch and the results are unique and beautiful.  Listen as we babble on about relevant topics in science or just make up facts as we go.  We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm
events.print_description: Extract unique Crystals by melting pure Bismuth Metal.  Watch as we make them and take one home with you.  Tue-Fri 2-3pm.  5th year running!

events.title: Bitch 'n' Tea Service
events.description: Have something to bitch about? Drama? Sweat in your ass crack? A bed full of playa dust? We'll lend an ear! Come bitch for some bitchin (iced) tea.
events.print_description: Have something to bitch about? Drama? Sweat in your ass crack? A bed full of playa dust? We'll lend an ear! Come bitch for some bitchin (iced) tea.

events.title: Bitcoin For Beginners
events.description: Learn more about Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Blockchain technology and the Greater Decentralization Revolution! (more info: bit.ly/CampDDP)
events.print_description: Learn more about Bitcoin, Dogecoin, Blockchain technology and the Greater Decentralization Revolution! (more info: bit.ly/CampDDP)

events.title: BJ Practicum
events.description:
This is an informative and participatory "mouth-on" workshop where we'll have a chance to ask questions, compare notes, share techniques, and generally learn from each other to be more skillful at this thing we love - or want to love - to do.  If you're interested in learning more about how to please a man orally, this is the place for you. . . . . . 

Come on ladies / givers, you know you've got some skills - and some questions!  Come share your favorite tips and techniques by words and demonstration.  If you're still exploring getting comfortable, or are curious about details you never dared ask anyone, come share questions that have been plaguing you. . . . . . 

	* How to protect yourself when the action gets intense? . . .
	* What about the gag reflex? . . .
	* Drool or dry?  . . .
	* How do you use hands and still go deep? . . .

And guys, you must have comments you'd like to pass on, other than simply "Yes, please"! . . . . .

	* Hate teeth?  Want teeth? . . .
	* What about deep throat? . . .

Here's your chance to make your requests - and pet peeves - heard! . . . . .

This is a participatory event open to couples of any combination, so long as one of them has some phallic protuberance and the other is applying lips, tongue, and maybe even throat to it.  No lookie-loos!  That said we also strongly welcome women still getting comfortable with giving oral pleasure, with or without a partner.  This is a really safe place to ask questions, in the group or in private conversation afterwards. . . . . .

This was a great fun event at previous Burns.  The presenter's been researching all year to find new tidbits and info to share.  (Hey, someone's gotta do the tough jobs.)  Come show off, learn stuff, and have fun. . . . . .

(Please bring a towel or sarong to lie on for your comfort.)
events.print_description: Fellate your partner. Watch others. Ask questions. Share tips. Enjoy yourselves in this couples-only workshop on giving better head to men.
events.other_location: Play Dome, in camp Playa 4 Play at 4:15 & G, within Sacred Spaces Village

events.title: Black Hole Black Light Party
events.description:
//BEGIN TRANSMISSION//
*********PHASE 2*********

We are The Bad Asstronauts, Colorado's sexiest, gayest, most bad ass space-faring camp. 

Having blasted off at the Bad Asstronauts Present: BLAST OFF - Up Uranus party, continue the journey through space with us as we battle gravitational forces and transport you to ultraviolet dimensions. YOU are hereby recruited.

Shake your UV-glowing cosmic ass to the beats of our own DJ ElectroFi!

MISSION SPECS: lasers! lights! music! oh my! UV-reactive body painting, black light chill lounge, blast off bouncy lounge, moonTANG (bring your cups!), cute boys dressed up like astronauts (need I say anything more?), lots of intergalactic fun 

MISSION REQS: YOU. 

MISSION TO BE CONTINUED...

//END TRANSMISSION//
events.print_description: Shake your UV-glowing cosmic butt! Continue the journey through space with us as we battle gravitational forces and transport you to UV dimensions!

events.title: Black Light Hamster Hoorah
events.description: Hamsters only wake up when the sun goes down and of course, they like to party like animals (because they are animals) after a full day's sleep. Come cool down from the hot sun in our night of blacklight body painting, music, and dancing under the illumination of black lights in our Sparkle Dome! Our hamsters will trade their spinning wheels for spinning limbs. We will trade our food pellets for power ballads. Instead of a sawdust covered floor, we've got booty shaking that'll leave you begging for more. You'll have more fun than a gerbil in Richard Gere's rear.
events.print_description: Cool down from the hot sun in our night of blacklight body painting, music, and dancing under the illumination of black lights in our Sparkle Dome.

events.title: Black Light Marionette
events.description: Make our Black Light Marionettes come to life. Pull their strings and watch them dance. UV lighting at night.
events.print_description: Make our Black Light Marionettes come to life. Pull their strings and watch them dance. UV lighting at night.

events.title: Black Light Painting
events.description: Interactive Black Light Painting of your favorite clowns and comedians. Paint and brushes provided. VU lighting at night.
events.print_description: Interactive Black Light Painting of your favorite clowns and comedians.Paint and brushes provided. VU lighting at night.

events.title: Black Lights-White Party w/Skye & Huggy Bear
events.description: Dance your way to a mid-week lightness of being at RhythmWave's annual under-the-blacklights White Party. Our 9th year running, the RW White Party is a BRC tradition. Join Huggy Bear and Skye for this carnival of mirrors in 2015. Wear your whites and show your glow!
events.print_description: Dance your way to a mid-week lightness of being at RhythmWave's annual under-the-blacklights White Party. Wear your whites and show your glow!

events.description: Drown your corpse in black metal and blackest coffee: worship at our altar of evil sound and reanimate with icily-brewed dark energy.
events.print_description: Drown your corpse in black metal and blackest coffee: worship at our altar of evil sound and reanimate with icily-brewed dark energy.

events.description: What does pop culture say about the Black American experience?  How does it celebrate or denigrate us? Come for open forum talk.
events.print_description: What does pop culture say about the Black American experience?  How does it celebrate or denigrate us? Come for open forum talk.

events.title: Black Rock Burlesque Basics
events.description: Learn to shimmy, shake, tease, and exude confidence and sexiness from our resident burlesque dancers.    No matter your gender, size, or age (18+ please!) we will show you how to flaunt your assets and start living your dream of being a burlesque star.
events.print_description: Learn to shimmy, shake, tease, and exude confidence and sexiness from our resident burlesque dancers.   All ages over 18 and all sizes and genders!

events.title: Black Rock Chamber Music
events.description:
Take a break from the techno and dub step and relax in our welcoming red domes with live classical music. Black Rock musicians will play string duets, trios, and quartets by Beethoven, Schubert, Bach, and more. 

If you are a violinist, violist, or cellist and you'd like to participate, please get in touch.
events.print_description: Take a break from the techno and relax in our domes with live classical music. Hear string duets, trios, and quartets by Beethoven, Bach, and more.

events.title: Black Rock City 5k
events.description: Come run 5k with us. We'll start at runner's HQ, Pink Lightning! Then we'll run to Esplanade, and then to the Man and turn around at whatever point it's a 5k! YAY!
events.print_description: Come run 5k with us. Start at Pink Lightning, head out along Esplanade and to The Man. No one is too slow!

events.title: Black Rock City Airbrush “You Say It We Spray It”
events.description: Black Rock City Airbrush has been a playa tradition for seven years with our motto of “You say it, we spray it”. Come on by and see us spray art on bodies, T-shirts (bring your own) and more. Even better, come by to learn to airbrush yourself. Everyone can learn and be a volunteer here. Have fun interacting by painting others. Are you already an airbrush artist? Come here to meet new people and gift some art.
events.print_description: You say it we spray it on bodies, T-shirts and more. Expect to interact or maybe learn to airbrush yourself. Volunteers are always welcome here.

Drink a beer
Run 400 meters
Drink a beer
Run 400 meters
Drink a beer
Run 400 meters
Drink a beer
Run 400 meters

Pls carry a large ziploc in case you puke (it's a LNT event!) and you have to drink a penalty beer if you do vomit!

https://www.facebook.com/events/754094798037067/
events.print_description: Bring your fave beer & ran the BRC Beer Mile. Drink a beer, run 400 meter, repeat 3x. Bring ziploc if you puke; must also drink penalty beer. Prizes!

Tours of 1st Camp outliers along K and L street will be included to show what we are up against.
events.print_description: Black Rock City Communist Party Playaburo meets to discuss plug and plays, commercialization, boutique hotels, and world marketing of Burn Culture.

events.title: BLACK ROCK CITY HIGH’S HOMECOMING
events.description: Black Rock City High School celebrates High School as it should have been, featuring all the freaks and geeks, jocks in jockstraps, cheerleaders, drama queens, lunch ladies and everything in between. Dust off your pom-poms, boom boxes, and neon shades as we take it back to the old school with a sunset dance party, a homecoming photo booth and some seriously spiked punch all to celebrate your Black Rock City Pride!
events.print_description: BRCHS celebrates High School as it should have been, featuring all the freaks and geeks, jocks and cheerleaders, and everything in between.

events.description: Join over 400 NAKED bikers at the end of the annual Black Rock City Pub Crawl for: (1) delicious cocktails (bring a cup); (2) cheerfully gorgeous, naked guys serving cocktails; and (3) enjoy the Afterglow Tent and our house DJs as we tear it up!
events.print_description: Join hundreds of NAKED bikers at the end of the annual Black Rock City Pub Crawl for cocktails, nudity and music in the Afterglow tent.

They're fetalicious! Remember our motto, "We Bring Out the Kid in You." C'mon in, relax, and have a thoughtfully prepared taste of the unborn. Coat hangers and other accessories available upon request.

events.title: Black Rock Playa Dust - what's in it?
events.description: Geologist George Davis will give a full explanation of the chemical and mineralogical data from a playa sample inside of BRC in 2010.  Find out the good and bad things about playa dust. Ever had trouble cleaning up after the trip to BRC? Learn a great recipe which involves simple household ingredients which removes playa dust once and for all. In addition, it's environmentally friendly and non-toxic. REAL 'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.
events.print_description: Geologist George Davis will explain what chemicals and minerals are in playa dust!  'Better living through chemistry' with a demo.

events.title: Black Rock Solar’s Solar Playa International
events.description:
Join Black Rock Solar at its annual event Solar Playa International. While sipping on a cool libation, you will get a chance to meet the staff and crew of Black Rock Solar as well as other Burners doing meaningful and innovative work around the country.  The purpose of this event is to bring together all of the different groups and individuals on playa doing work in renewable energy, climate change, environmental outreach, and policy.  Tell us about your projects and learn about ours. 

Since 2007 Black Rock Solar has been building solar arrays in Nevada and giving them away at little or no cost. To date, BRS has built over 5.5 megawatts of clean renewable energy.  BRS prioritizes installations for schools, hospitals, rural communities, non-profit groups, and Native American tribes.
events.print_description: Sip a cold drink, learn about Black Rock Solar, tell us what you’re doing in the world of renewable energy, climate change & environmental outreach.

events.title: BOOTIE BRC 10-Year Anniversary Mashup Party
events.description:
OMG! MUSIC WITH WORDS! Now in its 10th year on the playa, A Plus D bring BOOTIE BRC, the internationally-infamous bootleg mashup party, back to Black Rock City!

Bootie BRC celebrates (and satirizes) pop culture both past and present, keeping your brain guessing and body dancing with creative song combinations. Mixing and matching every musical genre, era, and style into one big dance party, it's the soundtrack for the A.D.D. generation -- with free mashup CDs given away like candy!

Launched by DJ duo A Plus D in 2003 in San Francisco, Bootie was the first club night dedicated solely to the burgeoning artform of the bootleg mashup, and is now the biggest mashup event in the world, with regular parties in several cities on four continents. Bootie BRC is presented in part by the BRC Weekly, Black Rock City's independent newsweekly. 

Bootie ... because one song at a time just isn't enough.
events.print_description: OMG MUSIC WITH WORDS FOR 10 YEARS! Dance to the best crazy mashups, celebrating (& satirizing) pop culture both past and present. Free CDs all night!

events.title: Bottom Like A Rockstar: A Guide To Basic Bottoming
events.description: Good scenes are more than just doing something kinky. We will explore how to prepare ourselves for play, including learning about yourself, your body, your desires, and establishing limits. We’ll teach you how to be safe and still have fun! Our class will  highlight how to process sensations and emotions from the scene for maximizing your BDSM experience. 18+ ID required.
events.print_description: Come learn how to negotiate, communicate, prepare for a scene, and process pain with Suspended Animation. 18+ ID required.

events.title: Boundaries, Consent, and Communication
events.description: It was all fun and games, until the oxytocin and dopamine wore off! Now you're wondering, "What the hell was I thinking?" Don't leave the playa wishing you hadn't done something, or conversely, wishing you had, but didn't have the communication tools to ask for what you wanted. Communication is sexy, consent is sexy, and good boundaries make all the difference between having a great experience and wishing you could, turn back time. SexPositive World has developed  fun and interesting exercises that help you get in the habit of feeling into what you really want, asking for that, and gently and lovingly saying no when preferable. If you're not sure, we've got great negotiation techniques to teach you how to get to a situation that is a win-win for all concerned. These are skills that will be with you, long after the playa dust settles: you will find yourself using them, not just in areas of sex and relationship, but with your family, friends, and employers too. Class size is limited to 30 participants. Join Gabriella and the other "sexperts" and love perveyors at Play4Play and get ready to have the experiences YOU want. Class recommended for women and couples, but good for everyone!
events.print_description: Saying, NO when you mean no, Hell Yes! when you mean yes, and explore, Maybe, in a safe and same way. Don't "play" on the playa, without this class!

events.title: BRC Gay Pride
events.description:
Join us Friday for an annual event with details to come. Celebrating our growing presence at Black Rock City and the unique and special dynamic of the LGBTQ++ presence. Honoring the Gayborhood and it history.

Be sure and read http://queerburners.com/news/burner-history-x when you can. There will be new information added to it through the year as already so many accomplishments have been made.

Queer Burner History and Burning Man History are very telling in the development of our vie of the 10 Principles and how we have brought them into our lives.

We are celebrating the special flavor lgbtq burners have brought to Burning Man and our refusal to be simply integrated by radically express our specialness and invite everyone to join us on the journey; and let's invite everyone to join us in the celebration, too!

More details to come!!!!! Join the BRC Gay Pride Parade Facebook group and share in the discussion!

We will lay a Hash House Harriers-style trail that you can run, jog, walk, slide, or bike that ends with a cold brews, silly songs and guaranteed debauchery. No red dress? So what! Anything red will do. Don’t run? No problem — bring your bike. Trail will be clearly marked with flags and there will be beverage stops along the way. On-on!

events.title: BRC Writing Marathon
events.description:
A writing marathon is a magical experience for anyone who loves to write, and the playa and BRC provide a wealth of imaginative material. This model was based on Natalie Goldberg's concept in "Writing Down the Bones," and developed into a moving art form by the Southeastern Louisiana Writing Project. In brief: we choose a location, sit and write for ten minutes or so, share what we have written, and move on to another location. The only response we give to each others' writing is "thank you." 
We will likely depart from the Midway around 3:50 after we get ourselves organized and sit down to "write out the cobwebs." Participate for as long as you wish. Depending on interest, we may even publish our work online after the event. Visit writingmarathon.com to get a taste of how we do this in the Big Easy!
events.print_description: Join us to write on the playa! BYO pen, journal, & wheels and meet at the New Orleans Sunken City Sideshow. Writers of all ages are invited!

events.title: Breakthrough Your Fear Closet (Arrow-Breaking)
events.description: Fear often gets in our way in realizing our life goals and achieving our highest potential. Fear sometimes get embedded deep in our psyche and will remain there until and unless we choose to address them. Granted it is easy to ignore our fears and stay in the comfort zone, yet imagine life's possibilities if we confront our fears. In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. It can be fear related to us growing up as queer individuals or any other personal fears that gets in our way to becoming our full two-spirit beautiful self. Participants must be sober to participate. Limited arrows available. Led by Blitzy.
events.print_description: In this workshop, we will breakthrough our fears by breaking an arrow with our throat as a metaphorical exercise. Limited # of arrows. Must be sober.

events.title: Bubbles and Bass Sunrise Parties
events.description: We'll be rockin' you out from 5am til Noon, Wednesday through Sunday mornings, with bubbly bass-tastic house music as you watch the sunrise over the playa and dance the AM hours away... and drink some bubbly while you boogie. We want to create a home of warmth and positive energy during the AM hours. Together with a team of artists, musicians, circus performers, dancers, planners, bartenders, builders, architects, thinkers, dreamers, and lovers, we are going to bring invigorating house music to the Burning Man community and a dance floor that gets everyone moving and shaking. We'll offer you champagne to relax and a comfy chill space to enjoy the sounds while resting your feet. We want to provide an environment conducive to connecting: spiritually, conversationally, and energetically.

events.title: Bucky Dome open-house
events.description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by two people in under an hour.
events.print_description: Did you just spend a few hours setting up a dome? Then you should check out this new method of dome building that sets up in under an hour.

Intermediate/Advance level.
