events.title: Build a Drum!
events.description:
Dr. Thelonious D. Rum and his Gypsies, Tramps and Thieves, each with their peerless pedigree, shall 
collude to captivate and inspire the naïve. Lured by the dark emotional caress of their own inner 
wisdom, not to mention the rhythm-making bait, (drums!) lying just beyond reach, players vie for a 
chance to build their own drum by playing 5 not-so-traditional Carnival games. They'll trawl the crowds,
 luring and enticing Burners with games of chance. This then shall determine who will be the lucky 
ones to express their creativity with skin, wood and rope. ALL candidates will be gifted with carny 
totems and icons, but only the courageous will stay and build a drum, those perennial souls who hurl 
themselves into the unknown of their personal darkness and light AND who aren’t too bad at tossing a 
ring.  * JOIN US any time during Midway hours, but the hours POSTED BELOW are ESPECIALLY auspicious 
today. (wink wink) Find our website here https://medicinalhealingexcursion.wordpress.com/
events.print_description: Build a Drum with Dr. Thelonious and Company but only after winning at their five games of chance and skill! Step right up! One at a time please!
events.other_location: On the Midway at the foot of THE MAN

DRUM BIRTHDAY PARTY
Bring the finished drum you made at our Midway installation (or in the Souk from 2014), and let's celebrate their rhythmic births! WE'LL HAVE CAKE!!!
events.print_description: DRUM BIRTHDAY PARTY Bring the finished drum you made at our Midway installation (or in the Souk from 2014), and let's celebrate their rhythmic births!

events.title: Build a Medicine Waterwheel
events.description: Open your 5th dimensional heart- then share your new heart with another- to all of Burningman- to the world. Ceremonially make a Medicine WaterWheel.
events.print_description: Open your 5th dimensional heart- then share your new heart with another- to all of Burningman- to the world. Ceremonially make a Medicine WaterWheel.

events.title: Build a Tiny Top Hat
events.description: Need a dashing accessory to complete your playa ensemble? Want to add some panache to an already excellent outfit? Never fear! Today you can stop by and decorate your very own, uniquely wonderful, tiny top hat with the lovely Bo Peep to guide you in all the most fashionable choices.  Be ready for the weekend with your stylish new accessory. Come early as supplies are limited.
events.print_description: Add some panache to your costume with your very own, uniquely excellent, tiny top hat. Supplies are limited so come by early to make one.

events.title: Build Your Own MacGyver Kit
events.description: All you need to defuse that bomb is... that foil gum wrapper you MOOPed this morning. Don't you wish you had a MacGyver Survival Kit? Stop by and get one - you custom stock it from our selection of extremely useful household objects, we tell you how to use them to fix a wide range of problems, on- and off-playa. (Guaranteed to defuse bombs or your money back.)
events.print_description: Custom-stock a MacGyver Survival Kit from our selection of common household objects and learn to use them to fix problems on- and off-playa.

events.title: BUNNY MARCH THURSDAY Modern Partner Dancing
events.description: Learn to New Style Hustle with Jason Lam - to jazz, house, you name it. Learn modern partner dancing with other bunnies on the playa!! ;) Bring your ears, tail, and a partner if you have one. If you don't, come anyway!! Here's a preview of what you'll learn: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZg_n50k-JI. After the workshop, join us for the pregame and camp hop for the Billion Bunny March Against Humanity. At the end of the March, our fire spinners will be spinning at The Man.
events.print_description: Learn to New Style Hustle with Jason Lam - to jazz, house, you name it. Learn to modern partner dance with other bunnies on the playa! Carrot juice!!

events.title: BURN2 Regional Member's Happy Hour
events.description: BURN2 is Burning Man's Virtual Regional out there on the net with real animated avatars in a simulated environment with real burners from all over the world.  Meet your BURN2 online friends. Bikeport yourself over and meet-up using your real-life avatar.  Enjoy a cocktail or mocktail but bring your own animations to this happy hour.  Never heard of us and BURN2 curious?  You're invited too.   BURN2 is a great place to decompress, precompress, and self-express your artistic side and your burner personality- all within the boundaries of the principles of Burning Man that you've come to know and love.  All the burn without the real-life dust.  Well, we do have dust storms on our virtual playa sometimes.
events.print_description: BURN2 Virtual Burning Man burners meet in their physical avatar on the real-life playa.  Landmark/Bikeport to  EBB and Glow Village happy hour.

events.title: BURN DEEP - Fire Circle at Comfort & Joy
events.description:
A dazzling fiery collaboration featuring fire dancers from Ministry of Flow and from all over the dusty plains burning deep to the beats of the BAAAHS Art Car (Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep). 

Fire dancers of all tricks and skill levels welcome. Fuel will be provided but feel free to bring your own so we'll burn brighter and deeper. Fire safety will be available on hand. Volunteers welcome.

Please contact Blitzy at blitzyburn@gmail.com to volunteer and/or collaborate.
events.print_description: A dazzling fiery collaboration of fire dancers from Ministry of Flow to the beats of the BAAAHS Art Car (Big-Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep).

events.title: Burner Bike Bellhop Service for Burner Express Bus
events.description: Burners Bus Bike Bellhop Service will offer random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the Burner Express bus stop to their camp…or to some camp. We have bikes with trailers ready to assist you with your travel needs. If you arrive in Black Rock City on the bus we can help you transport gear to camp. Look for our cheerful grifters with their grubby hands and dusty grins as you get off the Burner Express bus in Black Rock City. Feel safe as you allow some complete stranger in goofy clothes to carry away all your possessions needed for the week, secure in the knowledge that there are 70,000 people for us... I mean... them, to get lost in. Burner Bus Bike Bellhop Service; A lot of Bs an S.
events.print_description: Offering random newbs and rubes a lift for their luggage, coolers and tents from the BRC Burner Express bus stop  to their camp…or to some camp.

events.title: Burner Bingo
events.description:
The biggest collaborative game on the playa! 

Over 50 theme camps are participating in our game of Burner Bingo.

Visit Discordia to pick up a bingo card then visit the camps listed to complete challenges and get stamps. 

Return the card for daily prizes!
events.print_description: The biggest collaborative game on the playa! Get stamps from the theme camps on your bingo card to win prizes! Cards available from Discordia daily.

events.title: Burner Energize Thyself!
events.description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.
events.print_description: Energize yourself. Learn a 5 min routine of easy exercises to boost your energy health.

events.title: Burner Express Potluck/Happy Hour
events.description:
Hey Burner Express riders!!

Whether you decided to camp with HOVerlandia or elsewhere, ALL are invited for a potluck/happy hour to reconnect with old busmates and meet new friends who also HOVered in :-D

By 7pm, all the Wednesday buses should be in, the Burner Express staff should be off and ready to hang out, and it's still early enough that we all have the rest of the evening, if you want to tear up the night or call it a night.

So bring a friend, bring a snack, bring a bottle of something, and we'll see you at the shade structure! )'(
events.print_description: Hey Burner Express riders!! Whether you decided to camp with HOVerlandia or elsewhere, ALL are invited for a potluck/happy hour to re/connect!

events.title: Burner Portraits Studio
events.description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.
events.print_description: Fashion! Lights!! Action!!! Show off your playa fashion, get exposed by a professional photographer in a timeless moment to keep for years to come.

events.title: Burners Without Borders 10-Year Celebration!
events.description: Come celebrate Burner's Without Borders 10-year anniversary with us!  Daily music featuring live musicians and chill beats, alongside our annual 'Live Screen Printing' where you can adorn your clothes with custom graphics & select Burning Man  art projects.
events.print_description: Join us in celebrating daily with live musicians and chill beats. Come adorn your clothes with our custom graphics at our live screen printing booth.

events.title: Burners Without Borders Speakers Series
events.description: Our community is making a difference everyday, and you are invited to discover how you can make an impact in your community. Join us in discussing the resources and network that is available to you year-round and get involved.
events.print_description: Join us in discussing sustainability and community resiliency, and learn how you can make an impact in your community year round through our network.

events.title: Burners Without Borders Tea Service and Conversati
events.description: Join us for tea and conversation at our art space directly across Esplanade from our camp.
events.print_description: Join us for tea and conversation at our art space directly across Esplanade from our camp.

events.title: Burners Without Matches
events.description: Make your own necklace medallion with a magnifying glass. Every day 10 to 2 at DragonAss Camp, in the Sac Valley Alley.
events.print_description: Stop by DragonAss camp and burn one with us. We provide magnifying glasses and wood medallions for you to burn your own creation. Every day 10~2.

events.title: Burner Toastmasters Get Together and Speak-A-Thon
events.description: Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We have you covered. While there's some jargon in here we admittedly don't understand, we assume Toastmasters folks will get it. Note:"If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Vegas for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.Looking to join in? Cartoon Commune camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!
events.print_description: We’re back, so let’s do it again! Are you a Toastmaster? Bring your manual, friends. Join us for a great meet-up, photos, and fond memories!

events.title: Burning Dawn
events.description: Sunrise is a beautiful time to spin fire. Been spun all night but haven't actually done any spinning yet? Head on over to Prometheatrics for Burning Dawn! We still do it up every morning and it's totally a thing. You can even use our fuel. (Though extra awesome if you bring some.) Come start your day off right or finish up an epic all-nighter @ 2:45 and Esplanade.
events.print_description: Sunrise is a beautiful time to spin fire. Been spun all night but haven't actually done any spinning yet? Head on over to Prometheatrics!

events.title: Burning Ham
events.description:
Get your pork on! Since we've got a bunch of foodies over at Camp Calico, including a professional chef, we figured it would be fun to share our culinary escapades with our BRC family! Come and enjoy a whole pig roast on the playa! We will be working on it all day, so stop by before to get a look at what we're up to, or just head over with your plates when you're ready to eat! See you there! 

WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.
events.print_description: Get your pork on! Camp Calico is roasting a whole pig on the playa. Bring your plates, it might get messy. WARNING: Pork sweats inevitable.

events.title: Burning Man 2100 Planning Party!
events.description: It is never too early to plan for the day when even Black Rock reaches capacity and the BLM finally pulls the plug. Fortunately there's lots of empty space in outer space, and nuclear fireworks can be the very best kind. Join us for a relaxed discussion with appropriate libations as we figure out if Mars dust is worse than playa dust, if cometary ice delivery is practical, just when a rocket is a Mutant Vehicle, and what to do when you're on the moon and people STILL complain that the music is too damn loud!
events.print_description: Come help us plan our burn at Tsiolkovskiy Crater or Olympus Mons, where there really will be space for everyone. (Bring your own oxygen.)

events.title: Burning Man Arts cocktail hour & panel discussion
events.description: A panel discussion about possibilities for the "afterlife" of playa art, followed by a cocktail reception for artists and supporters.
events.print_description: A panel discussion about possibilities for the "afterlife" of playa art, followed by a cocktail reception for artists and supporters.

events.title: Burning Man & Buddhism-Robert Thurman/David Kittay
events.description: A deep exploration into the relationship between Burning Man and Buddhism.
events.print_description: A deep exploration into the relationship between Burning Man and Buddhism.

events.title: Burning Man Confessional
events.description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box to be burned at the Temple. Will your penance be something naughty, or something nice? YOU DECIDE!
events.print_description: Confess your deepest, darkest secrets about the Burn and beyond to Madame Mysteria, or write your confession and put it in the Confession Box!

events.title: Burning Manniversary Block Party
events.description: Celebrate your event with us: 5 or more burns, birthdays, anniversaries, engagements, weddings, divorces! Special IDs, contests, prizes.
events.print_description: Celebrate your event with us: 5 or more burns, birthdays, anniversaries, engagements, weddings, divorces! Special IDs, contests, prizes.

events.title: Calibrator College
events.description:
At the Wheel of Self Reflection, we will have Carny Calibrator College from 1 to 5 on Monday, leading up to the parade and party that night.

This is where we will share our riffs and steal from yours on the finer points of calibration.  It's open to all aspiring calibrators.  We have some notion of a cosmology boot camp at the same time in our chill space.  This is secret shit, so there will be gauzy curtains.  It's like OCS.  Not OCD, OCS (officer candidate school).  The coursework involves fortune writing, rolling and taping, then the bag toss that holds what is in effect the protoplasm that feeds the Wheel its raw material.  We capture these from the temporal ether space, the memes of the day.
events.print_description: At the Wheel of Self Reflection, we will have Carny Calibrator College from 1 to 5 on Monday, leading up to the parade and party that night.

events.title: Burningman Studio Open Mic
events.description: Release your inner star.  Bring your hidden talent down to burningman studios, step up to the mic, and show everyone your star power.
events.print_description: Release your inner star.  Bring your hidden talent down to burningman studios, step up to the mic, and show everyone your star power.

events.title: Burning Man Ultramarathon
events.description: Run 31 miles around the playa with your favorite friends. We'll do a loop course, and there will be tons of fun! Bring a gallon of water and running snack to share as we run ourselves silly in the funnest place on earth. Pre-register here: https://ultrasignup.com/register.aspx?did=29683
events.print_description: Come out and run 50 kilometers-yep, 31 miles!-with the craziest on the playa! Bring water & snack. Run what you can. Register on Mon/Tues if possible.

events.title: Burning Man Unicycles Unite!
events.description:
Our 11th year riding counter-clockwise around the esplanade. Meet at the 9:00 Plaza with your wheel and join our annual flock of Burning Man Unicyclists.
Off-Playa, connect with the Burning Man Unicycles Unite group on Facebook and keep in touch!
events.print_description: Our 11th year riding counter-clockwise around the esplanade. Meet @ the 9:00 Plaza with your wheel & join our annual flock of Burning Man Unicyclists!

events.title: BurningMUN: Burning Man Model UN
events.description: Announcing Burning Man's first ever Model UN! Debate BRC's biggest issues, like 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire, or Just Fucking Take Your Shirt Off Already', 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger Always Better?', and 'Turnkey Camps: Should they be Banned?' Prizes for master debaters and cunning linguists!
events.print_description: Debate BRC's biggest issues, 'Shirtcocking: Respectable Attire?, 'Dicks and Tits: Is Bigger better? Prizes for master debaters & cunning linguists!

events.title: Burning Salsa
events.description:
Hey YOU with the feet and the hips!

Bring that sexy body over here and join us for Burning Salsa, where the dance moves are hot but you’ll be cool.

We’re teaching a 3 day progressive salsa workshop on the Playa. No partner is needed and all levels are welcome. We'll show you some footwork, turns, and partner patterns and we start each day by going over previous material so no worries if you missed one. So come learn some new moves and stay to dance.

Take a break from the heat. Classes are taught on our shaded dance floor. We’ll also be serving delicious refreshments.

Groove On!
events.print_description: We’re teaching a 3 day progressive salsa workshop on the Playa. No partner is needed and all levels are welcome.

events.title: Burn Sleeve Mania
events.description: The Man Burn would be perfect if only you were rockin' a stellar tat sleeve.  We can make that happen with our rubber stamp tattoos.  Really.
events.print_description: The Man Burn would be perfect if only you were rockin' a stellar tat sleeve.  We can make that happen with our rubber stamp tattoos.  Really.

events.title: Burnt Art Tour (11th Annual)
events.description: Stay 'til Tuesday! We follow the yellow Joyism art car to the man platform, reminisce, eat 'smores, dance to '90s music, and use up our booze.
events.print_description: Stay 'til Tuesday! We follow the yellow Joyism art car to the man platform, reminisce, eat 'smores, dance to '90s music, and sue up our booze.

events.title: Burn Your Face 50th Celebration
events.description: Shadyvil and Camp HTFU welcome you to celebrate & reminisce about the times we've had and reconnect with spirit of the music.  Bring your favorite shows & jams, bring a story, bring your special lot food, bring some burgundy wine or just bring yourself and getaway from the wumpa wumpa.
events.print_description: Shadyvil, HTFU and the spirit of Papa Bear welcome you to celebrate the music of the Grateful Dead.

events.title: Busty Bacon Brigade & Bacon Bloody Marys
events.description: Are you achin for some bacon? Well get a gussied up in your finest pork belly attire & join us for the greasiest dust crawl of them all! Meet up at 9am and start Sizzling off to the Man at 10am.  Bacony Gifting encouraged!!
events.print_description: Achin for some bacon? Get dressed in your best bacon attire and join us for a dust crawl. From Dusty Bumm to The Man. Bacony gifting encouraged.

events.title: butoh (playful/resonation)
events.description: butoh is a japanese dance form~  a meditative movement form to play with your energies and experiences and resonate with those around you~
events.print_description: A meditative movement form to play with your energies~

events.title: Butoh Ritual Workshop
events.description: Butoh, improv, physical theater, and ritual allow dancers to foster deeper connections with themselves and community. All welcome, limited space.
events.print_description: Butoh, improv, physical theater, and ritual allow dancers to foster deeper connections with themselves and community. All welcome, limited space.

events.title: Butt-Cheeky Run
events.description:
Come get your burn started – with the sun's soft caresses on your butt cheeks!
The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) We'll do a warm-up at the camp and then run wild in the 'hood!
events.print_description: Start your Burning Man experience with an eye-opener: unleash your inner beast and run free! Naked!

events.title: Butterfly Wing-Making Workshop
events.description: Celebrate the beauty of migration by making your own Monarch Butterfly Wings to wear on the playa. Collaborate with artist/activist Favianna Rodriguez in designing a wearable statement that you support immigration reform.
events.print_description: Celebrate the beauty of migration by making your own Monarch Butterfly Wings to wear on the playa with artist/activist Favianna Rodriguez.

events.title: Button Down Da Hatch!
events.description: Kick off your week with a DIY button to commemorate the Carnival of Mirrors, or whatever you want. Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. We've got a prolific Badge-making machine for the magic to accommodate our materials, and you can add a photo or trinket for an extra special souvenir! Our able machinist will convert your creativity into a lasting memento for only you. Then pin your own, unique shwag on whomever. Light refreshments and other stuff are on us. Bring a cup!
events.print_description: Create a unique button for yourself and a friend. Materials provided, but you can bring a photo or memento for an extra special souvenir!

events.title: Button UP!
events.description:
Button for You, Button for Me, Button for the Playa Bunny!
To make your very own pin-on Burn Button, bring your button-making talent & a drink cup!
Button Experts, Button Machine and Art Stuff supplied ad libitum.
Let your Button enhance the entire Playa!
events.print_description:
Button 4 You, Button 4 Me!
Bring your talent & drink cup! Button Experts, Machine & Art Stuff ad libitum.
Let your Button enhance the entire Playa!

events.title: BYO Couch Party
events.description: Love to party, hate to stand up.  Let's have a dance party without getting off the couch.  BYO Couch.  Easy chairs also welcome.
events.print_description: Love to party, hate to stand up.  Let's have a dance party without getting off the couch.  BYO Couch.  Easy chairs also welcome.

events.title: BYOUke
events.description: Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop.  Learn a thing or two...or three about rhythm, harmony, and melody on this wonderful little instrument!
events.print_description: Come by with your Ukulele and share in some music and laughter at our BYOUke Workshop.  Learn a thing or 2...or 3 on this wonderful little instrument.

events.title: Cabernet Cabaret!
events.description: A Cabernet Cabaret! Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of live music, burlesque, theater, & more will be presented. And want you! And your friends! And your little dog too! Bring a cup for some cabernet! Musicians, clowns, jugglers, contortionists, dancers, magicians, burlesquers... whatever your talent or joy! Or send your friends in our direction! Let's put together an ALIVE, energetic, sexy, silly show! If you can do something entertaining for 15 minutes or more, WE WANT YOU!
events.print_description: Come join us for this live musical showcase at sunset, where various acts of music, burlesque, & theater will be presented. Bring a cup for cabernet!

events.title: CaesarBar @ LiL'CrackWhore Camp
events.description:
That's right! You heard it correctly; head to the Lil Crack Whores at 7:30 and B for your chance to get your 
v e r y o w n B l o o d y C a e s a r, 
compliments of the powers that be.

Best chances are during the great Hang Over hours of 12pm to 2pm but that's a definite playa time range.

Stick around and sample some puckered lips at the kissing booth or play a game of giant-Jenga!

oooooo ¡ Looking forward to seeing you all there ! xxxxxx

DON'T forget to also check out the Whore Happy Hour on Wednesday September 2nd, between 4 and 6!

https://www.facebook.com/events/1458470364477040/
---------------

Disclaimer:
Twenty one and over; please bring your own cup, please advise us of any allergies to seafood or shellfish or mollusks of any kind.
events.print_description: Head over to CrackWhore Camp for the great Bloody Caesar hangover cure!

events.title: Café Sŭrprïsé Dinner Service
events.description:
Bonjour mes amis! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Let our glowing chandiliers and soft french music soothe your dubstep-addled soul as our waiters cater to your every whim. Perhaps you will try the escargot, non? 
Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.
events.print_description: Bonjour mes ami! Dine with us in our fine French Bistro. Reservations can be made with our maître d' on playa and are recommended but not required.

events.title: Café Sŭrprïsé French Fries
events.description: Perhaps you need a little something this afternoon, yes?  French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh, daily. Get them while they're hot.
events.print_description: Perhaps you need a little something salty this afternoon, yes?   French fries, or as we like to call them Pomme Frites. 30 pounds made fresh daily.

events.title: Calming Touch for the non-verbal
events.description: Is there a person in you life who has difficulty communicating what they like and don't like about touch?  Then this workshop is for you.  Learn how to create a somatically based experience that lead to calm, peace, love that don't require a lot of verbal interaction.
events.print_description: Is there a person in you life who has difficulty communicating what they like and don't like about touch?  Then this workshop is for you.

events.title: Calm Inside
events.description: Wake up with a blissful dose of Live Music...yawn and stretch, breathe, meditate, set the course for your wonderfully, adventurous day. Calm Inside is designed to let you center your day, before all the hub bub and commotion...thumps thumps and sirens...the inescapable thrills of mayhem and delight. The Live Music will be of a more ambient, soul-filling, relaxation...happiness genre....so come and be at peace!!! After Calm Inside, enjoy our very popular Live Music Yoga in the Morning…where music meets the pose! On Wednesday and Friday, a portion of Calm Inside will include guided meditation.
events.print_description: Meditate, yawn, stretch, and breathe to Live Music...set the course for your wonderful, adventurous day. Stay for the yoga class after...

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Authentic Relating Games
events.description: Fun, highly-interactive exercises that explore new ways of seeing, connecting and appreciating each other on a deeper level. Expect fun, play, provocation, with just enough tension to make things more than interesting.
events.print_description: Fun, highly-interactive exercises that explore new ways of seeing, connecting and appreciating each other on a deeper level.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Carnival Games
events.description: In the 3rd Dimension- Carnival Games - house of mirrors, ring toss, air cannons, bean bag toss, darts and more! In this dimension we will be embracing our physical space and challenging ourselves and each other in feats of physical skill and laughter.
events.print_description: Carnival Games - house of mirrors, ring toss, air cannons, bean bag toss, darts and more!

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Clothing Optional Twister
events.description: Join us for some Twister Madness.  There will be good beats, some surprises and a whole lot of fun! Clothing is optional.
events.print_description: Join us for some Twister Madness.  There will be good beats, some surprises and a whole lot of fun! Clothing is optional.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - EVO Room Experience
events.description:
THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR. 

Once you step into THE EVOROOM, you are taken on a fun, transformative, and integrative journey to unleash your powerful potential and the unlimited possibilities awaiting you.

At the event, our featured guest speakers and lifestyle designers will share valuable tools and information to inspire growth in the areas of NUTRITION, PHYSICAL WELL-BEING, EMOTIONAL WELL-BEING, RELATIONSHIPS, and MONEY.

We've hacked the personal growth experience to accelerate the transformation process and made it more effective by making it easier to apply what you learn.
events.print_description: THE EVO ROOM is a portal taking you to the lifestyle you truly desire.  It is a fun way to practice personal growth and EVOLVE WITH FLAVOR.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Healing & Forgiveness Workshop
events.description: Self Love and Healing shared in a space of exploration. We'll redefine what Forgiveness is and create some major energy shifts together.
events.print_description: Self Love and Healing shared in a space of exploration. We'll redefine what Forgiveness is and create some major energy shifts together.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Kizomba Lessons
events.description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba. Kizomba is more like Tango mixed with other Latin dances like Salsa and Bachata. Whether you're a couple or alone, there's always room for everyone to learn the basics and show of some new moves in the playa or in the default world.
events.print_description: Join World Champion 'E' in learning the basics to this fast-becoming popular dance from Angola & Cape Verde called Kizomba.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Playa Workout
events.description: Bring gloves, two full water bottles and a canvas shopping bag w/handles. Our resident Ironman is going to make you sweat!
events.print_description: Bring gloves, two full water bottles and a canvas shopping bag w/handles. Our resident Ironman is going to make you sweat!

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Silent Disco
events.description: A surreal party experience where 3 channels of awesome music is shared through wireless headphones. A crazy sight to behold and even crazier to partake in.
events.print_description: A surreal party experience where 3 channels of awesome music are shared through wireless headphones.

events.title: Camp Awesomeness - Spoken Word, Poetry & Song
events.description: Poetry/spoken word slam and original songwriting showcase - Open Mic- come on by to Camp Awesomeness and sign up- there will be a sign-up sheet 2 days prior, Theme; Personal Transformation- in verse or song – prose, story telling a la “The Moth” or slam; We wish to create a safe place and platform for sharing our creativity and inspiring each other!! Bring an instrument, bring your poetry, and bring yourself.
events.print_description: Poetry/spoken word slam and original songwriting showcase - Open Mic - come on by and sign up- there will be a sign-up sheet 2 days prior.

events.title: CAMP HARDLY WAIT
events.description: Join Camp Counselors for an hour (or so) of your favorite summer camp activities. We will play games, sing songs and show camp spirit! (and make out?)
events.print_description: Join Camp Counselors for an hour (or so) of your favorite summer camp activities. We will play games, sing songs and show camp spirit! (and make out?)

events.title: Camp Make-up
events.description: Camp Make-up: Are you fighting with your Bestie, BF, or GF? Or do you just want do be done up like a Diva or Drag Queen?  Come to the Freestyle Palace for Making up or a Make-over. Non-licensed mediators and Make-up Artists provided & invited. On-going. Check-in at the Freestyle Palace Bar.
events.print_description: Camp Make-up: Are you fighting with your Bestie, BF, or GF? Or do you just want do be done up like a Diva or Drag Queen?  Come to the Freestyle Palace

events.title: Camp Questionmark's~Born Of The Desert~Experiences
events.description:
"An oasis in a dusty ocean of repetitive waves"
Come gather together and celebrate the true atmosphere of the desert. Celebrate the creativity born from the dust. Celebrate with music inspired by the playa that you can really (((feel))) 

Rather than recreating a default world 'nightclub', we summon a unique desert experience to stimulate the less mainstream dwellers of the dust )?( 

All Day / All Night - from TUES to BURN NIGHT (*with a special Surprise Party for Mama-M. on Burn Night) Come help us 'Surprise' her! 

Check at the camp on-playa for the most updated lineup of artists. *Also the Camp? website & alternate BM lineup outlets. 
Basically we like interesting beat patterned, well represented low end bass music. To accent & enhance the experience of celebrating together out in the desert. 

~ Enjoy something different ~ )?( ~ Keep Burning Man Weird ~
events.print_description: Gather @ Camp? Tues-Sat for a unique desert experience all day & all night."An oasis in a dusty ocean of repetitive waves" Keep Burning Man Weird )?(

events.title: Carnal Healing: The Circle of Sexuality
events.description: Come join Diva Nation for a night of Sexual Magic!  Cast aside your old hang-ups, self-doubts, and frustrations as we cast a circle to invoke and honor sexual deities from around the world and ask for their healing support both for ourselves and the world at large.  Our neo-pagan ceremony will take place in our interactive sacred art space called Sexual Babel which we welcome you to visit and be a part of at any time during the burn.  This is an opportunity to honor sexual deities and expressions of sexuality throughout history while increasing awareness of our personal relationships with sexuality for a hotter tomorrow.

events.title: Carnival of Smoothies - The Gayborhood Party!
events.description:
Come to our very own queerborhood carnival of smoothies and escape all those boring straight parties! 

The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dance, whirl the rabbit wheel of bar fortune for a magical beverage of your choice, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and all around queer love fest. Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Fe Boy Collective, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Summit, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest ever and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and tails! All genders welcome always. (and don't worry if your straight but not narrow you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will have both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

events.title: Cartoon Commune Green Reflections’ Eco Camp Tour
events.description:
Build up your eco-consciousness for Playa life. We’ll show you how we reuse, recycle, repurpose, and redesign. See our solar cooker, rocket stove cooker, solar power, evapotron, and much more. Consider the Playa’s ecosystem, and the gear and food that are right for a trip into this world.Be ready for your next vacation with Mother Nature.	Nothing seems more natural than spending time in nature, but it’s easy to forget eco-attitudes when away from concrete cities.
     We’ll discuss prepping for a trip, being alert to pack only what we need: e.g., first aid kit, weather-appropriate clothing/gear, water & food. We leave packaging at home to minimize trash on-Playa. If we can, we pre-buy local fruit, veggies, and nuts; pre-make dishes and seal them in lightweight reusable containers. Reuse these to avoid disposables. We seal our food well, store trash, compost and recycle our waste.
We’ll be happy to hear your own ideas and consider them for additions to our Playa eco-practices.
events.print_description: Join us to see the eco-components of our Camp. Add to your eco-consciousness. See solar power, rocket stove, evapotron, and repurposing.

events.title: Cartoon Commune’s Ninth Anniversary ’60s Dance
events.description: Our camp’s 9th Anniversary year rolls on as you join each other to enjoy those oldies but goodies, tunes from the 60’s, along with light refreshments and beyond. Bring your own cup to keep it so green, and enjoy your pleasure. Mix plenty of fun with a classic Cartoon Commune soiree of rock and roll dancing and good conversation as you meet new friends and old. A wide open dance contest just for the fun of it. We’ll have the music you like, light refreshments, and beyond. Guess what else? A few surprises to add plenty smiles.
events.print_description: Enjoy ’60s oldies but goodies rock & roll, lite refreshments and more. BYO cup. Mix plenty of fun with a classy dance soiree, and then some!

events.title: Cartoon Workshop
events.description: Cartooning is a powerful art-form that can entertain and influence, but is simple to learn and accessible to all.  Come learn from a professional cartoonist to practice this expressive and enjoyable skill.  All skill levels welcome; you do not need to have any prior training or experience.  Learn all the basic skills like character creation, layout, composition, perspective, and comedy writing.  Brush up on advanced techniques like human and animal figure drawing, proportion, and color.  We end with an improvisational art game using the cartooning skills we've learned.  Supplies provided, or bring your own.
events.print_description: Anyone can cartoon! Learn & practice an expressive, enjoyable skill. Any skill level welcome. Learn basic/advanced techniques of a powerful artform.

events.title: Castle Blocks
events.description:
Castle Blocks provides you the opportunity to design and build your own brick castle or other structure using many large cardboard blocks.

You can satisfy your architecture or construction interests by building structures that may be original, that represent real world architecture, or perhaps one that is as tall as you can engineer.

More importantly, you can then share the artist's childhood by spectacularly toppling your structure with your friends after it's determined complete, which is sometimes a matter of varied opinions ...

Awards will be named in several categories based on photos you submit of your work and its destruction.
events.print_description: Build imaginative structures using 200 "castle" blocks.  Share a thrill from the artist's childhood by knocking them down spectacularly!

events.title: Catching Out:  How to Hop Freight Trains
events.description: 35 year veteran railroad conductor and past boomer/hobo gives a tutorial on riding freight trains in the new millennium.  How to be safe on the rails, not get arrested, and enjoy a rugged adventure.   Hitchhiking sucks!   Freight trains don't go everywhere but they can get you far and fast toward your destination.  Having no destination is even better!   Learn what to carry with you, where to ride on a train, and how to keep a low profile.  Also learn how freight trains operate, where they stop, and how to find a 'friendly' railroad worker with whom to communicate.  Familiarize yourself with the 'Do's and Don'ts' of freight train hopping and discover the last shred of what real freedom means in America.
events.print_description: Hitchhiking sucks!   Riding a freight train can be adventurous, but dangerous.  Learn how to do it safely and get to where you want to go.

events.title: Chakraland Game!
events.description: Come play the adult version of Candyland...called Chakraland! The Chakraland game is a 22×30 foot vinyl flooring of a multicolored human sized game that participants play by rolling the giant dice and moving towards the different colored squares, each square representing a different chakra. The layout is similar to the child’s game “Candyland”. The squares will all have different quests written on them that need to be completed in a certain timeframe, or players have to go back to the previous square of the same color. There are some short cuts, wild pink squares, and black lose-a-turn squares. The winner makes it to the end of the colored path and gets loved up by the colorful game jesters. Yay, so much fun!

events.print_description: Want more power, passion and purpose?  Come to this deep dive into the evolutionary new Outer Body Paradigm.

events.title: Channeling. PhoneHome.
events.description: Meet a guest speaker from another dimension. Who wants to talk to you & why. Resolve issues beyond the grave. Get work done.  Hear from your lineage.
events.print_description: Meet a guest speaker from another dimension. Who wants to talk to you & why. Resolve issues beyond the grave. Get work done.  Hear from your lineage.

events.title: Chanting of the Lotus Sutra: Nam Myoho Renge Kyo
events.description: Join us in the Lotus Dome for the daily recitation of Nam Myoho Renge Kyo and morning gongyo (the practice of chanting two chapters from the Lotus Sutra). In the Lotus Sutra, Shakymuni Buddha revealed that every human being can attain enlightenment in their present form. Through chanting Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, an individual is able to awaken this enlightenment the Buddha revealed and reveal their own Buddha nature. A practitioner of this Buddhism, through chanting and study, can transform their life and create a state of unshakable happiness, overcoming the sufferings of birth and death. Buddhism is a practice and everyone is welcome to join. Each day after chanting, together we will study a Buddhist concept, answer questions, and share experiences about the practice and its application to our daily life. All are welcome to join us. Novices, new practitioners, and curious souls welcome.
events.print_description: Join us in the Lotus Dome to chant the Lotus Sutra. Chant, meditate, reflect, and reveal your inner Buddha. Novices and curious souls welcome!

events.title: Chanting the Gayatri Mantra - 108 Repetitions
events.description: The Gayatri Mantra is one of the oldest known mantras in human history. It was forbidden to women for a long time. It is said that chanting the Gayatri Mantra purifies the chanter and purifies the listener, it removes all obstacles in our path to increase wisdom, happiness and spiritual growth. Come and chant with us this mantra for 108 repetitions. Why 108? It has been said that the number 108 has been a sacred number in the yoga world. We believe by chanting this mantra during Burning Man, you will find what you are looking for!
events.print_description: It is said that chanting the Gayatri Mantra purifies the chanter and purifies the listener. It removes all obstacles in our path to happiness & growth

events.title: Chant Your Way Into the 5th Dimension
events.description: Chant your way into the 5th Dimension with Broadway and the Bhakti Brigade
events.print_description: Chant your way into the 5th Dimension with Broadway and the Bhakti Brigade

events.title: Charlie The Salsa Dancing Unicorn!
events.description: Come witness Charlie the unicorn turn into Carlos, the salsa dancing pink fucking unicorn!  Charlie the art car will be parking its hoofs in front of The Man from 4:30pm to 6:30pm.  At that point, Charlie will transform into Carlos where nothing but Latin beats will be blasting for 2 hours!  Salsa, merengue, bachata, you name it!  Come dance your hoofs off and don’t worry if you can’t salsa, you’ll learn in no time cause nothing is impossible when you’re moving to the beats of that mythical pink fucking unicorn!
events.print_description: Charlie the art car will be parking its hoofs in front of The Man from 4:30pm to 6:30pm on Saturday for a salsa, merengue, Bachata throwdown!

events.title: Cheap Beer Tasting
events.description: "A refined palate is a certain path to disappointment" - H. E. Homes, 1862. You may be an expert at discerning craft brews and flavorful hops, but when presented with a generic beer, how well do you do? Do you know your PBR from your MGD? Your Tecate from your Tecate Light? Come to camp L Melon O P to test your cheap beer taste test skills! No microbrews or complex cask-conditioned ales here. Only the cheapest of beers for your tasting - and drinking - pleasure.
events.print_description: Come test your cheap beer taste testing skills with a highly scientific quiz! No fancy microbrews, only the cheap stuff.

events.title: Cheesy Poof Tasting Party
events.description: Come sample some cheesy, poofy goodness. Bring something poofed to share. Anything cheesy will do. The event will be in the bar area.
events.print_description: Come sample some cheesy, poofy goodness. Bring something poofed to share. Anything cheesy will do. The event will be in the bar area.

events.title: Cheraki- Live Soulful Feminine Music
events.description:
Come enjoy a set of soulful feminine music with Cheraki weaving electronic and live music into a heartmelting fusion of activation through sound.

A budding west coast musical artist, Cheraki collaborates with the top producers throughout the bay area and beyond. Best known for her work as the lead singer of Feral Fauna, Cheraki also works with live performance artists to incorporate multiple expressive arts modalities into her music.
events.print_description: Cheraki- Live Soulful Feminine Music

events.title: Childhood Abuse & Healing Circle
events.description:
There is a lot of hidden abuse in our country and only a few outlets that offer a safe environment and tools for healing. 
OmHuSaaRa went through a lot of abuse as a kid, both physically, verbally and sexually. He was able to find ways to overcome and heal  his trauma and the resulting PTSD. In this workshop, you will learn tools that help one overcome trauma or at least introduce one to the possibility of healing these wounds. 
 
Let's face abuse together and heal together as one. 
One person at a time.
events.print_description: A discussion and exercises for people to discuss past abuses: physical, emotional, and sexual. Held in the Chakralicious Temple Dome.

events.title: Chill Spot
events.description: Stop by our sacred Chill Spot! ShangriLa is known as an imaginary remote paradise on earth, utopia so to speak. Also known as a distant and secluded hideaway, usually of great beauty and peacefulness. Our group is very much looking forward to create an ambiance and space where people from all over the world can spend the entire day hanging out.  A “ShangriLa,” by extension, is an ideal refuge from the troubles of the world...also known as Burning Man / Home :-)
events.print_description: Stop by our sacred Chill Spot! Our group is creating a space where people from all over the world can spend the entire day hanging out!

events.title: Chris Hadfield Moustache Appreciation
events.description: Canadian astronaut superstar Chris Hadfield is beloved by his nation and revered by moustache-growers. Come and admire him up close and personal.

events.title: Chris & Teegan's Playa Wedding
events.description:
Chris and Teegan met at the 2013 burn and in May this year they tied the knot officially. You may have heard the story of their wedding rings made from nails dug out of the man burn ashes. 

They're going to be swapping burner inspired vows on Monday night and YOU'RE INVITED! 

Come celebrate the magic of the playa that brought these two lovebirds together and get the week started on a celebratory note. The newlyweds would love to hear your stories of playa joy and share a glass of bubbly with you. Following the ceremony there will be a procession to the open playa for a fire spin jam.
events.print_description: Come help Chris & Teegan celebrate their love for each other and the playa. There will be flow arts, dancing, drinking and maybe even cake...

events.title: Christmas Caroling, Burning Man Edition
events.description:
Does your love for Christmas tunes extend far beyond the holiday season?  Come in your holiday best and get ready to dispense some Christmas Cheer to the neighborhood! 

Instrumentalists and people who can actually sing are welcome, though the organizer is neither.  All are welcome!

(If you're wondering why this is being hosted by Time Colony--well, Santa was definitely a time traveller to have reached all those houses in time. Santas from all times welcome, even you, A**less Chaps Santa!)
events.print_description: <3 Xmas 4rlz? Spread some holiday cheer and candy canes with Santa, world time traveller! Instrumentalists, singers, & Santas of all levels welcome!

events.title: Cigar Appreciation Cabaret Lounge
events.description:
Freud said, “Sometimes a cigar is just a cigar”. 

Your host HolyMan says, “Sometimes a cigar is an entryway into an underground culture filled smokin’ men and women!” 
Join host HolyMan for a cool cock-tale and a hot cigar. He will show you how to choose, cut, light and smoke a stogie. Beware, just like Burning Man, your life may never be the same afterwards!
events.print_description: Join host HolyMan for a cool cock-tale and a hot cigar.  Learn to choose, cut, light and smoke a stogie.

events.title: Cinematic Automatic-Recall Wall
events.description: From the campy to the badass, the riské to the lame, these are not your every-day "Here's looking at you kid" quotes. This is a delicate collective, from carefully selected, films done in the past 30-or-so years. A flick-o-phile you call yourself! Ha! We’ll see, young child. See if your brain remembers ‘that quote from that one movie, remember?? I haven’t seen it in a while.’ These are films that have grown in cult-like fashion, among people who enjoy their cinematic art with passion. Complete as many as you want, it’ll be there all day. Through the night, and the week, pass through or come stay!
events.print_description: You a movie buff? Test your skills and guess the film on this MASSIVE wall featuring some of the most iconic quotes from the past 30 years of cinema.

events.title: Circling
events.description: Circling is an organic, in-the-moment interpersonal process that's equal parts art form, meditation, and group conversation - all designed to allow a visceral experience of connection and understanding of another person's world, celebrating who and where they are right now. It's practicing using our genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person's world through present moment awareness while breaking through the assumptions and projections we have about each other. Different than sitting on a meditation cushion by yourself, Circling is a relational practice. And though it works exquisitely in intimate relationships of all kinds, it can be applied in ALL areas of life because it's so organic, non-analytical, effective, and fun.
events.print_description: Use your genuine curiosity to better understand and become a connoisseur of another person's world through present moment awareness.

events.title: Clarity and Consent
events.description: "Clarity and Consent" is about clearly stating desires and boundaries, how to arrive at consent, and how to handle problems with consent.
events.print_description: "Clarity and Consent" is about clearly stating desires and boundaries, how to arrive at consent, and how to handle problems with consent.

events.title: Clashing With Cash
events.description:
Money Shadows: Creating Abundance by Dancing with The Unconscious.
 
The Playa is a magical place where the gifting economy reigns. Yet, some of us spend big bucks preparing and getting to Black Rock City. So, even here money talks even if we pretend not to listen.
 
Still some of us struggle off the Playa with not  having enough,  wrestle with “it is never enough” or believe financial issues are too taboo to explore out loud, 
 
Perhaps for the first time, we will really listen to the voices we hear in our heads or the ones we don’t even know exist which block us from creating abundance and banishing scarcity.
 
So, in a safe and supportive environment come sing with your shadows, dance with the almighty dollar  and wake up to where you are financially   so you can return to your life away from Burning Man ready to make money your ally and not your enemy.
events.print_description: Come ready to make money your ally and not your enemy. Move towards creating abundance while banishing scarcity. Cash Not Provided.

events.title: Classical Journey w/Thomas Harter @ RhythmWave
events.description: Midday, moving, in-bodied meditation. Let the music of ancient masters pick up our bodies however they may be... lazy, ecstatic, curious, sizzling with the midday heat or wafting on the wind. Melding the sounds of the classics with the rhythm of the playa and the energy of our bodies, as all move through the Wave. Please join Thomas Harter for this Classical Dance Journey at RhythmWave.
events.print_description: Melding the sounds of the classics with the rhythm of the playa and the energy of our bodies, as all move through the RhythmWave.

events.print_description: Meet the Beaver babes! Enjoy some delicious Clit-tails, make new friends, and possibly find a date for the Strap-on-a-Thon. Open to all!

events.title: Clit Talks Hosted by Camp Beaverton
events.description: Misogyny is rampant in the queer male culture and we have become a self-segregated community. As the only Lesbian-focused theme camp on playa, Beaverton will offer an important perspective as we start the discussion on unifying the queer community.
events.print_description: Discussion on misogyny - it is rampant in the queer male culture and we have become a self-segregated community.

events.title: Closing Blessing w/Feather & Visudha @ RhythmWave
events.description: Please join RhythmWave as we cleanse the bamboo and ourselves, and say farewell to another amazing year in Black Rock City.
events.print_description: Please join RhythmWave as we cleanse the bamboo and ourselves, and say farewell to another amazing year in Black Rock City.

events.title: Clothing-Optional Qi Gong With Nogoodnik!
events.description:
QI: The life energy that flows through and permeates all things, according to Ancient Eastern Medicine (AEM).  Their version of The Force, essentially.  According to AEM, slow or weak qi is the reason we feel weak.  Stagnant qi is the reason we feel PAIN.

GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting something.

QI GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting your qi.

CLOTHING OPTIONAL: If you don't know what this means, I won't be the one to tell you.

AEM teaches us that sweat is chi leaving the body, so if there's anywhere you need this, it's on the playa.  Come build that nourishing life energy every morning after breakfast with your favorite Seattle burner!

(This event is DAILY from Tuesday to Sunday, from 10:30 am to 11 am.)

DISCLAIMER: I am not, and don't claim to be, any sort of qi gong master.  I'm just someone who knows a thing or two about it and would like to share it with the playa.
events.print_description: Move.  Stretch.  Stimulate pressure points.  These easy, super-low-impact techniques from Ancient Eastern Medicine will help keep you strong all week!

events.title: Clown Orgy Bar Takeover!
events.description: The Clowns take over Sunset Lounge and Bar. Clowns, Clowns and more Clowns, come all Clowns and join us for drinks. Bring your nose, rubber chickens and get ready to get cream pied!
events.print_description: The Clowns take over Sunset Lounge and Bar. Clowns, Clowns and more Clowns, come all Clowns and join us for drinks. Get ready to be cream pied!

events.title: Clown Trauma Support Group
events.description:
It has happened to us all.  You're having a great time, easy and happy, dancing through the weeds of your own small life, and suddenly -- a clown.  He's trying to be funny at you.  He's a burlesque.  Or a Bozo.  Or a body comedian.  You can't punch him because that would be wrong.  You can't cry because you're terrified.  And you can't laugh because the life has been sucked out of you.  So you push it down, deep inside.  Where the clown trauma festers in its own silent and pressurized tank of suppressed rage and fear.

These incidents have been seen with increasing frequency as clowning has infiltrated our community.  Clowns are easy.  Clowns are anonymous.  Clowns are everywhere.  And clowns are dangerous.  They are the death knell of participation culture, just as the deadbeats were the death knell of hippie culture.  They embody the cheap, the quick, and the easy, and they should not be allowed to take over.

Come to our shaded bar and snack on our snacks with us.  Learn the story of clowns, past, present, and future.  Drink your health in a clown-free zone.  Crush the red nose of clown oppression.  And embed a new mantra into your soul: 

I will never be clowned again.
events.print_description: Clowns are anonymous. Clowns are everywhere. Clowns are dangerous. Drink your health in a clown-free zone. Crush the red nose. Shaded bar & snacks.

events.title: Clues to the Cleu
events.description: In this Carnival of Mirrors, it is easy to get lost in all the swirling colors and lovely distractions of all kinds. The Cleu pendant is a prize you won't want to miss, and the Cleu brainwashing is an ecstatic experience that is both relaxing and exhilarating.  To find CleuCamp, you may want to first visit the "Include the Cleu" labyrinth on the playa where you can walk the circles of the Universe, Earth, Life, and Consciousness. Look inside the magic box for a clue to our address. You may also want to find the "Clue to the Cleu" waystation kiosk in the theme camp area, another way to follow clues to our location. If you've never been to CleuCamp, you'll be glad you made the journey. Time to get dusty, playa pilgrims! Got a clue? We'll be waiting for you.
events.print_description: Visit CleuCamp for a Cleu pendant & brainwashing too! For more clues, visit  "Include the Cleu" labyrinth or find "Clue to the Cleu" waystation kiosk.

events.print_description:
Engage the phallus of our three super heroes, swallow the product thereof, and become a Card Carrying Cocksucker!
21 and older only!

events.title: CockTalks: Putting action to the default world
events.description: Hosted by GlamCocks. We will close our series with panel discussion on how to put the concepts we covered to use. Including how to be a responsible member of the community with practical harm-reduction and talking points, and building a unified queer community.
events.print_description: Discussion on how to be a responsible with practical harm-reduction and building a unified queer community. Hosted by GlamCocks

With a special focus on HIV prevention and PrEP and well as shaming within our community.

events.description: As the sun scorches, servants of Pink Heart gift you cold coconut ice cream bliss. Delicately lick your frozen desires into disappearance or reality while relaxing in the shade on our pink fuzzy couches.

events.title: Cocoona Matata: Guided movement ritual
events.description: The Cocoon is sheer, stretchy enclosure made of colorful spandex and a zipper. From the outside, the Cocoon embodies architecture as a live, morphing sculpture, based on the forces of the body. From the inside, the Cocoon is a blank slate, out of which you have the freedom to create and stylize your experience. In order to go through great transformations, we must let our out-of-date stories die so a new paradigm can be born. In this workshop we will re-enact that experience of death and re-birth, emerging through a "birth canal" with the support and assistance of the group to guide us towards a transformed self.
events.print_description: Re-wire for more positivity! Using props to fortify the body-mind-spirit flow, shed your old skin and see a worry-free butterfly emerge

In this workshop we will re-enact that experience of death and re-birth, emerging through a "birth canal" with the support and assistance of the group to guide us towards a transformed self.
events.print_description: Re-wire for more positivity! Using props to fortify the body-mind-spirit flow, shed your old skin and see a worry-free butterfly emerge

events.title: Cocoon Workshop
events.description: The Cocoon is performed architecture. Inside the Cocoon we physically create the space and structure with our bodies. Chanting, dancing and other ritualistic strategies will generate a massive collective energy. No experience necessary!  For the generally creative and outgoing. It manifests a collective spirit as we create a sacred space for transformation and rebirth. Inspiration, identity and rebirth take morphing, sculptural form. The Cocoon is a hand-crafted stretchy fabric enclosure created by Sherry Aliberti, an architect and performance artist based in New York City. Structurally, these postures represent a scale model of an architecture and materiality based on the forces of the body. The Cocoon Project is a multi-disciplinary collaborative performing the Cocoon with movers, live projected visuals and soundscape. The performed-installation conveys a primordial one-ness of many bodies within the sheer membrane. CocoonNYC performs site-specifically in galleries, music venues and alternative spaces. The Cocoon experience can be emotionally powerful for every age and/or background.
events.print_description: get inside, emerge rejuvenated! Cocoon is an architecture life-form. Experience energetic freedom of movement expression, transformation and rebirth

events.description:
Are you interested in exploring burlesque? Are you ready to just explore a new edge?  Come create an original burlesque dance with Madame Merci!

Join camp Emerge-n-See Sparkle Pony Corral in an exploration of body, shadow, connection, and more through the art of Conscious Burlesque. This workshop will be offered by Madame Merci, founder of Conscious Burlesque, she will guide you in creating an original burlesque dance- solo or duets (with a dance buddies and lovers) are welcome. The dances will be "Let's Play Dr." themed to go along with our ICU camp theme! Naughty nurse and Dr. attire is encouraged. 

You will have an opportunity to perform your original dance piece the day after the workshop at a "Let's Play Dr." burlesque show to be held at 7:00pm Friday (the following day) at the Emerge-n-See Sparkle Pony Corral Camp!

You will explore: 

Uncovering your secret fantasies
Birth your alter ego via your burlesque burlesque character
Learn & create original choreography, playing with humor, sass and the heart of seduction.
Learn the art of performance (for you/ and or another).

BONUS: Do’s and Don’ts video of costumes, avoid costume disasters and mishaps
BONUS: How to own your audience

BONUS: How to remove special clothing like a pro

events.title: Cory Doctorow on The Internet of Things
events.description:
"The Internet of Things: Poisoned at Birth by the Inkjet Printer Business-Model."

The computers that engulf your body (cars, planes, houses) and that
you insert into it (prosthesis, pacemakers, hearing aids) are subject
to a ridiculous Clinton-era copyright law that lets their
manufacturers lock them so that you can't use app stores or
replacement parts of your choosing -- but worse than that, to keep you
locked in, the law criminalizes telling you about flaws in the devices
that you depend on for life and limb.

events.title: Cristal Happy Hour with the Millionaires
events.description:
Come join us for an ultra exclusive happy hour with the playa's best millionaire featuring Light beverages by Cristal. 

We understand you - you are a millionaire. People complain about you. You're vilified in burner media, and you just don't get it. Well, good news...*we get you*! You've paid your $15,000 camp dues, flown into the desert, and want service dammit! We at millionaire camp understand your expectations and are here to provide you with the amenities you deserve while you are out here in the desert.

Millionaire lounge is open 24/7 to provide you the latest in playa pampering. From our exclusive reserved seating, complimentary fragrances, Segway parking, free wifi, phone charging stations, and secured location only accessible by wristband, Millionaire lounge offers the amenities you deserve while you are in the desert.

Please stop by one of our exciting hosted events over the week, or join us for a cocktail anytime, day or night. You never know who you'll meet at Millionaire Lounge!
events.print_description: Come join us for an ultra exclusive happy hour with the playa's best millionaires featuring Light beverages by Cristal.

events.title: Critical Sticks Stickman Parade
events.description:
COME JOIN CRITICAL STICKS!

Feel like there's less to you than meets the eye? Have only just enough artistic skill to draw a stick figure? You may be one of us! If you have one of these costumes, or want to make one, then get to it! We need you to join us as we dance across the darkness and spread joy throughout the land. Stickman BRC has been illustrating our EL wire childlike magic on the Playa since 2004, bringing art to life. Over the years, we've seen others infuse their creativity into the ranks of Stickhood and we think its time we unite. Nothing sadder than a lonesome Stickman.

Meet at (6:30/Esplanade) at 9:30pm Tuesday night, September 1st; at 10pm, we venture out to the Playa. We'll be on foot, route tbd, so wear your walkin'/dancin' shoes. We hope you can play with us!

Join the FB page (and check the files) for info on how to make one.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/StickmanBRC/events/

Need some inspiration?
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vEX1PghxkJY
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D_xSyoqRY_k&playnext=1&list=PLA7CCE3A2EAC0C945&feature=results_video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHqiRBeGdkk&feature=relmfu
http://www.youtube.com/watch?NR=1&v=LxyjhofF6Lw&feature=endscreen

events.title: Crossroads Presents "Prince" - Epic Live Music!
events.description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Friday night we celebrate one the greatest artists of all time-- Prince! We will be celebrating our fifth year on playa by going back to our first year roots and throwing down the most awesome Prince jams of all time. Come sing and dance with songs that you simply cannot resist! We'll also be playing some of our greatest hits from previous theme nights! You won't want to miss it!  Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever! Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!
events.print_description: Come get your groove on with songs by the one and only Prince! Our live 15-piece band of SF/LA's best is celebrating Year 5 by going back to Year 1!

events.title: Crossroads Presents "The Club" - Epic Live Music!
events.description: Crossroads is back! Our epic live band is returning for our fifth year with the best live music on the playa, bar none! In that sea of EDM that swallows you on the playa we offer a soulful and funky alternative played by some of the best musicians, singers and dancers on the West Coast. Thursday night is all about getting your asses on the floor, so welcome to "The Club" our night of the best dance music of all time!! We know some of you love your EDM so we're gonna funk up songs by Disclosure, Bassment Jaxx, Depeche Mode and others and mash them up with the greatest dance hits of every decade of the past century by artists such as Missy Elliot, Janet Jackson, Outkast, Benny Goodman, Calvin Harris and more!  Before the show come enjoy our friendly bar and just hang out with the sexiest folks ever!  Afterwards stay for delicious grilled cheese sandwiches served up in many tasty varieties by our village-mates MoonCheese!!
events.print_description: Come experience the dance jams of yesterday & today at the best party ever, thrown by our pro live 15-piece band from SF/LA! Your life will change!

Bring something to cobntribute to the bar/grill and festivities. Booze, international meat(or faux meat) for the grill, a fact, or a great travel story. Meet other CSers, surf the BusSofas together, break in our human fooseball court and giant pool table, play some international games, and make new and lasting connections all over the world. Participate in making the world a better place... one couch at a time. See you there with love, lust, and playa dust!

events.title: Daily Snow Cones at Paradise Motel
events.description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Keep your peepers peeled for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which indicate you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge while enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).
events.print_description: Enjoy a snow cone and music while lounging in our shade. Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice welcomed. Remember, if you show your junk, cut to the front!

events.title: Dance of Liberation
events.description:
movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism.
 a hands-on, physical experience of the ritual celebration.  The workshop begins with a ritual purification, connecting heart, body, mind, and spirit. Then it moves you into a deeper state of consciousness and closer to your individual and collective soul’s purpose. Utilizing dance, contemporary shamanism, hands on healing, drumming and global music, this powerful and beautiful soul work sheds inhibitions and heightens inner awareness in a safe and carefully monitored group setting. Dancers are blindfolded in the shamanic tradition and step beyond their conscious fears and limitations and allow their innermost creative sides to break free. Dancers tune in to sound and movement to take an inner journey exploring a trance-like state of self-discovery and self-realization.
events.print_description: movement therapy that heals and frees physical, mental, emotional and spiritual blockages through ritual dance, breathwork, and contemporary Shamanism

events.description: Each day Reverbia will once again bring Dancing before Noon workshops to indulge your thirst for knowledge and Dance!  Our qualified teachers enjoy their work and love to get the best out of your rhythm and movement.  This years workshops will feature: Sacred Yoga Dance, Brazilian Samba, Belly Dancing, and Afro Brazilian.  So get your groove on…always before Noon.
events.print_description: Popular live music dance workshops taught by our professional, energetic instructors.  See each day listing for style. Beginners most welcome.

events.title: Dancing Before Noon: Sacred Yoga Dance Journey
events.description: Sacred Yoga Journey is a dance workshop that you will want to attend, surrender, move, and be free.
events.print_description: Step into the world of a Sacred Journey through Dance, Kirtan, and finding one's true being of light, energy, and movement.

events.title: Dancing Freedom
events.description: A moving prayer space for people who want MORE LIFE. We dance an alchemical wave of the elements in sacred community as a way of inner and outer connection, deep transformation, and a great deal of FUN! Accessible to ALL. Come dance the sweet, authentic, hungry truth birthing in every breath of your beautiful human life. Dance your gratitude, your pain, your joy, and the beyond imaginable awesomeness of your deepest desires. Give it up! Sweaty prayers liberate our lives. Let your body make your prayer.
events.print_description: Dancing Freedom

events.title: Dancing Freedom-Samantha Sweetwater
events.description: Heaven on earth is available the moment you become fully resident in your body, on the earth.  The biggest, most life-y life is waiting for you right here, just on the other side of your armors and clever designs.  Join Dancing Freedom founder, Samantha Sweetwater, for an sublime movement journey to shake things up, free your body, mind and spirit and give wings and roots to your soul's design.
events.print_description: Get your Sweetwater flowing, your light body glowing and your soul juices going with Ecstatic Sacred Dance Prayer.

events.title: Dancing Freedom with Samantha Beers
events.description: Join Samantha Sweetwater for her signature ecstatic, somatic & shamanic movement journey.  Unlock your full capacity for embodied awakening, authenticity, creativity, empowerment, intimacy and JOY.  This is the Happy Hummingbird Medicine you've been seeking to balancing your Eagle Visionary Mind and your Condor Heart.
events.print_description: Dance Medicine to unlock your full capacity for AWESOME.

events.description: Looking outside it may seem as though Wednesday is sunny and clear but out on Ziza, the Roving Tea Cart, the weather will be decidedly "Dark and Stormy." Join the luscious lupine lovelies of Raised By Wolves from 1-5PM for ice-cold Dark and Stormy's and the best hip-hop tracks for you to shake your ass. Leaving from 9 and D, to an art installation TBD, but will be posted at camp. BYO cardboard for break-dancing.
events.print_description: Fresh beats and fresh dark n' stormy's served from 1-5pm on Wednesday. Location TBD but WILL be posted at our camp on the day of.
events.other_location: Art installation on playa/deep playa, to be determined

events.title: Dark Sparkle Burlesque Extravaganza
events.description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation. Contact: srodenburg@gmail.com
events.print_description: An exploration through performance, storytelling, and tease, featuring DS performers and guests from the BRC. Come ready to participate!

events.title: Darktard Hunting
events.description:
We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING BLINKIES TO GIVE AWAY (I order 200 extra for my hunting adventures). Hunting party goes out at 8 pm. Join us at 9 pm to share your victories. My record so far is 50 darktards and 2 unlit police officers. 
Our prey are invited to become next year's hunters (asked to bring extra blinkies to give away next year). A true Darktard Hunter cannot help but hunt their prey throughout the event. 
Darktards are dangerous to themselves and others and MUST SEE THE LIGHT!
(Do not ask for handouts, this is a 'bring your own blinky' event)
events.print_description: We hunt dark and unlit burners in deep Playa and give them blinkies! BRING LIGHTS TO GIVE AWAY. (Don't ask for handouts='bring your own blinky' event)
events.other_location: Meet at green ATV sortof near front of Planet Earth (4:30 and Esplanade). Ask for Leslie.

events.title: DATA BASH!   Diversity on the Playa
events.description: “Diversity on the Playa”  will be led by Vernon, who led the “Black on Playa” event last year and Scribble, who has done research on Playa on economic and racial diversity.   You’ll have a chance to hear about, discuss, and ask questions about our team’s research while mingling with other Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.
events.print_description: Hear about and  discuss, the Census team’s research on diversity while mingling with other Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.

events.title: DATA BASH!  Play & Transformation at Burning Man
events.description: Learn about research on the Power of Play and Transformative Experiences at the Burn.  Conversations will be led by Isabelle, who has done extensive research on play in the bonobo populations, and Countess, who is an anthropology researcher focused on play.  Learn about their research while mingling with fellow Burning Nerds and sipping mixed drinks.

events.title: Decompression Detox
events.description: Come to the gardens and join our Shaman for an informative one-hour lecture on how to restore and heal the body naturally using herbs and supplements. After this incredible week of extremes, you can use these tools to adapt back into the default world, lessen decompression time, and keep your physical and emotional bodies operating at their fullest. Or if you're struggling and need a second wind to get through this last weekend, learn some tips and try some herbal remedies that will give you new life! - Taught by Clinical Herbalist Joshua Farahnik

events.title: Defining a Planet
events.description: Talk by Ben Burningham, an astronomer with a penchant for remote sensing the atmospheres of brown dwarfs and giant planets. His talk will be about the difficulty of defining a planet which is directly related to his research and close to his heart. Discussion may lead into the mind boggling diversity of extra solar planets we’ve become aware of in the last decade.
events.print_description: An astronomer describes what makes a planet and how we define the term planet with the incredible diversity discovered in recent years.
