events.title: Developing "Sense of Place"
events.description:
an investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. 
How do we Identify with where we are? In a globalized world it becomes easy to view the beauty and Majesty of a place as an observer. This workshop will give you tools to develop a "sense a place" through pattern identification to be present in mind, body, spirit and location. To understand and view the world as a series of patterns that apply anywhere is to unlock the language of the natural world. Discussion led by Jesse Hernreich
events.print_description: an investigation into pattern analysis and permaculture. Discussion led by Jesse Hernreich

events.title: Devi Flow Yoga w/ Juju Namjai
events.description: Devi Flow is a strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements (mudra-asana-prana-bhakti dance) set to undulating world rhythms and the sounds of the ocean. Devi Flow is a power class that strengthens the core, uplifts the spirit, calms and focuses the restless mind.  Devi Flow is an evolution of intentional movement and yoga blended soulfully to ignite the warrior spirit. Using simple mudras, heart opening dynamic movement and a traditional vinyasa flow, Devi Flow awakens the inner warrior/goddess within all Yogi’s - while receiving therapeutic benefits from the practice. Together we will explore as a collective and express as individuals, creating harmony with breath, beauty with movement; all to the sacred heartbeat within unique original music and the sounds of nature.
events.print_description: A strong vinyasa practice with elements of dynamic heart opening movements to uplift the spirit, calm and focus the restless mind.

events.title: Discus-ish Throw in the dark... and in the buff
events.description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood). Bare your body, but wear lights! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) This is our only night event, but don't worry about cold – movement will keep you warm!

events.title: Discussion with John Gilmore, co-founder of EFF
events.description: Join entrepreneur and activist John Gilmore for a lively discussion ranging from freedom in cyberspace to drug policy reform. John Gilmore was the 5th employee of Sun Microsystems, the co-founder of the Electronic Freedom Foundation (EFF) and Cygnus Solutions, and he serves as a member of the board of directors for the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies and the Marijuana Policy Project.

events.title: Divine Feminine Empowerment
events.description: Come participate in a sacred womens circle. Join together with your sisters as we explore the theme of violence against women and how to heal from trauma, find our voices and unite in our power. This particular focus is on recovering from violence and understanding the oppression of the feminine in this age. And by understanding that past we can more consciously choose our future as empowered goddesses. This class integrates group and partner activities, reflections and sharing, learning and movement, indigenous spiritual wisdom to help heal women.

events.title: Dusty Justice Court
events.description:
Everybody loves to sue everybody else in the good old U.S. of A!  So we here at Camp Dusty Justice are celebrating that practice and bringing an open, slightly impartial, fun venue for Burners of all stripes to get their dusty dirty day in court.  

Bring your case!  You will be heard!  Is it your noisy neighbor? (we had one!)  Did your best childhood friend make out with your girlfriend? (a real issue from last year)  Did a campmate drink your last cold beer?  Maybe it was just your turn to drive the art car.  Whatever the dispute, our jurist will sort it out.

We will hold court three times during the week or if an emergency arises.  Join us Monday afternoon, Wednesday afternoon and Friday afternoon from 4:30-6:30 for fun, laughs, and some serious judgments and some wicked punishments.
events.print_description: Dusty Justice Court

events.title: Dusty Poon @ Noon - Get Wobbly on Wednesday
events.description: Git on over to the Dusty Poon Saloon for a gun slingin' good time! Park your pony, check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for one of our signature Poon-Tang libations! Come dressed in your best Western gear or get gussied up in what we provide and we'll shoot your photograph, but hopefully not you! You’re bound to have a shit kickin' good time here with dancin', drinkin', photo taking, and patent pending body buffing station and hell, maybe even a wild western showdown! And don’t forget to Download your pictures after the burn on our Facebook page.
events.print_description: Check your pistol at the door, and belly up to the bar for our signature Poon-Tang libations! We'll shoot you in our Wild Western Photo Booth!

events.title: Dye Day at Dye with Dignity
events.description: We provide the silk, dye, wine, snow cones, stilt walkers, entertainers, instructors, you provide yourself and the willingness to try something new! Spin the Wheel of Shame, become a part of the entertainment and come create your own one of a kind piece of functional art. A silk scarf! Silk is also an excellent dust mask.
events.print_description: Come create your own one of a kind work of art. Silk, dyes and supplies provided, along with wine, snow cones and the famous Wheel of Shame!

events.title: Dynamic African Dance- Malaika MaVeena
events.description:
Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village.
Malaika MaVeena brings a wealth of Earth Wisdom for personal and Planetary awakening having walked the Shamanic Path for a lifetime. She has over 25 years as a Global Movement facilitator and is the founder of 5Elements Dance Activation™- a powerful ecstatic dance meditation taking groups deep into the core of their soul, and transforming negativity into nectar! These expression sessions are Spirituality rooted in the body! Malaika is a qualified ISHTA yoga teacher, Water Dance practitioner, African Dancer and performer, speaker, Lomi Lomi practitioner, musician, and DJ -true Earth Goddess
events.print_description: Experience the ecstasy and joy of dancing and singing together to the beat of live drums! Come and express your inner village!

events.title: Dynamics Bike Tour
events.description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. Join an expedition searching for clues to the processes that constantly reshape the surface. How does our temporary city and art affect the environment? See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace
events.print_description: Join us searching for clues to the processes that constantly reshape the surface.; how does our temporary city and art affect the Black Rock?

events.title: Dynamic Therapeutics - Partner Yoga
events.description: This is a partner based workshop that will lead participants from two person poses all the way through four person postures! By lending a helping hand (or foot!), we can attain the full potential of our practice while being supported in our growth. This playful practice is based on human connection, supported growth, and active release techniques to bring you deeper into harmony not only with your own body, but the bodies and hearts of those around you.

events.print_description: Come run 2-4 miles with us as we taper for the BRC50k. Number pickup for ultra after. This run is open to everyone, and we'll run SLOW!

events.description: Come sit and relax with us as we spin 70's soft rock and serve up ice cold lemonade. It's as simple as that! You will hear wonderful hits such as ... Brandy, Summer Breeze, Dancin' in the Moonlight and more!

Take a journey this evening with DJ Zephyr (aka Breezie Cross) through a World Beat mix to stimulate movement and transformation, on the sacred bamboo vortex of the RhythmWave dance floor.

events.title: Ecstatic Shaking
events.description: Ecstatic Shaking is an ancient tantric tools used to raise our life force energy from earth to heaven. Our frustrations, resistances and blockages become rocket fuel for our transformation and awakening! This technique, based on teachings from a guru in Bali, raises the kundalini energy, raises our vibration, raises our consciousness. It is the place that orgasm becomes prayer and we can expand to touch the universe.
events.print_description: Discover the way to reach an orgasm with the Divine! Using our life challenges as rocket fuel, let your energy reach the heavens!

events.title: Ecstatic Voice Workshop
events.description: Practice the ability to let your voice express the euphoric energy that is surging through your body as you revel and party on the playa! Exploring the full range of sounds possible with the human voice, we will make Primal calls, Animal sounds, Celebratory shouts, Chanting, and Sounding into the Body- with the perspective that all sounds and vocal qualities are acceptable and worth being heard. (1.5 hr workshop)
events.print_description: Express the euphoric energy in your body! Explore full range of sounds in the human voice. Primal calls.Animal sounds/Celebratory shouts Chanting

events.title: Effective Communication of Emotions and Boundaries
events.description:
Puma will share how to express your emotions with "I statements", so that you can let your camp mates know how you feel without starting World War III. A simple extension will add how to set boundaries so that other people know when they are crossing over one of your comfort barriers.

"It's your responsibility to let other people know how you feel when they're stepping on your toes" - Rosalyn Bruyere
events.print_description: Simple technique of how to express your emotions without making other people responsible - a great model for how to deal with issues past & present.

events.title: EFT with Sonya Sophia - Soul Shine
events.description: Tap into inner BEAUTY & inner POWER. Burn brightly from the get go! Leave RADIANT & READY to PLAY & ATTRACT at the next level!
events.print_description: Tap into inner BEAUTY & inner POWER. Burn brightly from the get go! Leave RADIANT & READY to PLAY & ATTRACT at the next level!

events.title: Einstein, the Universe and You
events.description:
Explore the infinite nature of your humanity - journey out to the edge of the universe and into yourself. Why it all works.The art and practice of being human.
Being Present. Being Everything. Just Being.
Through immediate hands-on practice, shared experience and discussion, you'll discover simple ways to focus and engage your infinite self.
events.print_description: Explore the infinite nature of your humanity - journey out to the edge of the universe and into yourself. Why it all works.

events.title: Einstien and Dr. Suess Yoga Class!
events.description: Join Roni Elissabeth, owner of Bella Prana Yoga studio in Florida for this flow style yoga class with the wisdom of the enlightened beings Dr. Suess and Einstein. Sweat, breath, expand and relax. Roni is a  life coach, meditation coach, and published writer who brings a unique combination of challenge, fun, and inspiration to every class!
events.print_description: Roni Elissabeth leads this flow style yoga class with the wisdom of the enlightened beings Dr. Suess & Einstein. Sweat, breath, expand & relax.

events.title: Electric Lazy Lounge
events.description: Come take one last visit to LazyLand before you return to the default world. In case you miss us throughout the week, our annual last night event is always 12' O'clock of the temple burn and straight on til morning. We will open after we are satisfied that the temple has sufficiently burned.
events.print_description: Come take one last visit to LazyLand before your return to the default world.

events.title: Elements of BDSM Scene Design
events.description: So you’re kinky, but now what? How do you figure out what to do? In this class, we’ll explore ways to mix kink into your bedroom or into your life in creative ways. We’ll discuss how to stay inspired and keep things fresh. You’ll come away with tricks and tools for designing BDSM scenes that will keep you and your partner(s) connected, entertained, and aroused, time and time again. Lecture & Demos. 18+, ID required.
events.print_description: Learn tricks & tools for designing BDSM scenes to keep you & your partner(s) connected, entertained & aroused. Lecture/Demos. 18+, ID req.

events.title: EL Wire Clinic
events.description: Ready to roam at night and lost that glowing feeling? EL Wire not blinking? We can help with on the spot soldering and quick fixes. No need to be a Darkwad!
events.print_description: Ready to roam at night and lost that glowing feeling? EL Wire not blinking? We can help with on the spot soldering and quick fixes.

events.title: Embark on your Identity Expedition
events.description: “We contain multitudes,” wrote Walt Whitman, referring to our sense of self. Join us in this interactive workshop as we explore these questions of identity through individual and small group exercises and what it means to accept, embrace, and celebrate our genuine selves.
events.print_description: Explore questions of identity through individual / small group exercises and what it means to accept our genuine selves.

events.title: Embassy. Dance. Memes. (EDM)
events.description: Redefining EDM: Embassy. Dance. Memes. Dress up as your favorite internet meme (eg. nyan cat, condescending wonka, asian dad) and celebrate Default World culture. Don't have a meme costume?  Make one from our bin of excitements.
events.print_description: Redefining EDM. Dress up as an internet meme (e.g. nyan cat, Wonka, asian dad) and celebrate Default World culture. Some costumes provided.

events.title: Embody Your Sexuality: Yoga and Meditation
events.description:
Are you in your body? Is your inner sexy, free to play, to explore, and to find expression? Gabriella and Alex will help you unlock the authentic expression of your sexuality. Become present to desire, aware of sensation, and connected to your own sexual rhythm, with just 90 minutes of simple meditation, breathing, and yoga practices. 

If you are thinking about being sexual as part of your Burn, why not start by tapping in to the most authentic expression of your sexuality possible. Pleasure, connection, love, and joy, are all possible, but you will likely need to move through layer upon layer of story and conditioning to access that. Breath, meditation, and yoga are some of the keys to unlocking the vast treasure that is your sexuality, and in this morning session you will be shown the way.

This session is highly recommended for women and for couples, however, no one will be turned away.

Alex is a full-time yoga teacher in Venice, California. She is a surfer and a total love. Gabriella is a tantric teacher/sex-positive ambassador/and event organizer, who spends her time between Portland and Malibu.
events.print_description: Are you embodying your authentic sexual self? Are you connected to that part of you that longs to be desired and desires. Get your sexy on, yoga!

events.title: EmergeInSee InTentsIV Care Unit (ICU)
events.description:
Thanx to YoMama Care, the Playa now has an alternative to the western medicine practiced in those "med" tents. The "Emerge-n-See In-Tents-IV Care Unit" (or just "ICU" for short) is here for all your health dare needs.
ICU is staffed for all sorts of procedures from Beerthing to Sexy Change Operations. And of course, all our staff is certified in CPR (Cocktail Party Resuscitation).
But wait, that's not all !!! ICU offers a 200% money back guarantee !

Are you a certified Moctor or Curse?
ICU presently has openings for those who want to play doctor.
Please contact Doc Holiday via the listed email address.
events.print_description: The Playa's alternative for your health dare needs: Emerge-n-See Beerthings, Sexy Change Operations, +more. We play doctor. 200% money back guarantee.

events.title: Enchanted Handjobs
events.description: Back by popular demand, Enchanted Handjobs. Hand massage and tête-à-tête with camp ShangriLa are scheduled Sunday, Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 2-3pm. Discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften the hands while our mystic healers work away your troubles and cares using a combination of techniques along with the right amount of pressure. Last year over 100 attended and we had people literally purring in our hands. Stop by and explore this amazing treat for yourself at ShangriLa! You will receive and give a Handjob! The best free gift for you and your playa friends is a hand massage. Our hands do a lot of work from the minute we wake up until we go to bed. When was the last time you gave a loved one a gentle hand massage? It always surprises people when they discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Come and explore this amazing treat for yourself and others @ ShangriLa!
events.print_description: Discover the delights of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften your hands. People are literally purring in our hands - a treat!

Come join us for fun, laughter and learning. 
Orgasmic Meditation (OM) is a mindfulness sexual practice that is designed for singles and couples to experience more connection, vitality, pleasure, and meaning in every aspect of their lives.

events.title: Exploring the 9 Fluid Systems of the Body

Come discover the 9 fluid systems of the body as we explore different music and movement.  There will be a brief warm up, and then, through guidance, be given open space to move and discover how the body moves in certain environments/circumstances.  Find new ways of movement, listen to our bodies, and connect with a deeper understanding of what is moving us as creatures.  Bring water.

events.title: Eye of Argon - Comedy Reading/Group Performance
events.description:
Greetings mortals, welcome to the world of Grignr the mightiest of barbarians. Come and join us on the Silicon Village stage for a group reading of the funniest and most terrible pieces of fan fiction ever produced... 'The Eye of Argon." Bear witness to the near impossible to read dialogue without bursting into laughter as other readers and members of the audience act out the scenes from this story regardless of inconsistencies, spelling errors, grammar errors, capitalization errors, tense errors, and made up words that make no sense! Do you have the stomach for dialogue such as this?

"The vile stench of the Shaman's hot fetid breath over came the nauseated female with a deep soul searing sickness, causing her to wrench her head backwards and regurgitate a slimy, orange white stream of swelling gore over the richly woven purple robe of the enthused acolyte."

If so come to the reading of the "Eye of Argon" written 35 years ago and has yet to be forgotten in the sands of time. The dialogue may seem impossible, but the terrible show will go on!
events.print_description: Join us at Silicon Village stage for a group reading & acting out of the funniest & most terrible piece of fan fiction ever produced, The Eye of Argon

events.title: Fags & Fathers - Ritual/Ceremony for Men
events.description: Most gay men struggle with father issues. These wounds often prevent gay men from being completely intimate, often feeling rejected, not good enough or abandoned. It’s impossible to live authentically when your internal relationship with your father is compromised. This ritual serves to transform those wounds into sources of strength and compassion, allowing participants to fully embrace themselves, live authentically and experience deep, committed intimate relationships with themselves and other men. Led by Coop.

events.title: False Profit's Tuesday Night Party
events.description:
False Profit, Inc., sent shock waves through the stock market with its recent announcement of current plans for its annual Tuesday Night Party (TNP) at The Burning Man Arts and Culture Festival. In a move outside experts are hailing for its boldness and freshtasticness, False Profit, Inc., released news that it would be holding the event not at its desert research field campus proper, but “out in the open.”

“For 14 years, we’ve invited shareholders to our desert campus to celebrate with us,” said Jef Pearlman, Senior VP of Auditory Logistics. “This year, we decided to think ‘outside the camp.’”

Citing ever-increasing attendance, bicycle parking challenges, and the desire for attendees to experience high fidelity sound “en plein air” as forces pushing the party into the open playa, , a spokesperson for the company enthusiastically predicted that this year’s TNP would be “the best evar.”

Referring to the unanticipated relocation, an unnamed insider also hinted that the main research facility is so filled this year with mad science projects--which shareholders will undoubtedly wish to keep a watchful eye on as conditions evolve--that the decision to shift was “easy peasy”.

The party will be held on the open “playa” approximately 300 feet out from the company’s primary campus location of 5:15 and Esplanade. This location was chosen due to the giant deep sea fish that will be located there, which analysts expect will protect attendees from wandering shirtcockers, newbs, darkwads, those rich people who are destroying Burning Man, and other unsavory characters. Known as Illumacanth, the fish will delight and astound party attendees with its spikes, lights, and fire. Sound for the event will be provided by the legendary Dr. Brainlove, a project of The Phage, a long-time affiliate company and co-conspirator of False Profit.
events.print_description: It's Tuesday.  Again.

events.title: Fear, Inner Critic, and Risk-Taking
events.description:
What stops you from giving your gifts and following your true calling? Let's find out together in this experiential workshop. You'll uncover the voices, mindsets, and narratives that block you from taking risks and expanding to new levels. We'll also go over some common pitfalls (e.g., perfectionism) that prevent people from starting their most meaningful work today. 

// Maria Molfino is a women’s leadership coach who helps women gain the creative confidence to lead. With a Masters in Design from Stanford, she has worked with top managers and executives working at companies such as Facebook, Twitter, and IDEO. She has 10+ years experience empowering individuals to manage their stress, and has spent the last five years running leadership programs and social initiatives for women. She believes a woman’s creative ability is her greatest asset – the key to leading a deeply satisfying career and life.  When she isn’t coaching, she’s sipping on tea and writing poems in the redwoods.
events.print_description: What stops you from giving your gifts? Uncover the voices, mindsets, and narratives that block you from taking risks and expanding to new levels.

events.title: Feldenkrais-Finding Alignment
events.description:
Ready to free yourself from all those playa aches and pains and find your inner alignment?  Feldenkrais is a gentle, subtle and effective approach to healing.  It helps with blood flow, the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. 

Be prepared to lay down, relax and attune to yourself as you are guided through gentle simple movement sequences guaranteed to shift your nervous system to a place of more serenity, comfort, and peace.  Please bring a mat or blanket if you have one.

A great way to rejuvenate your tired playa body!

events.title: Find Your Power Animal
events.description: Awaken your third eye to see beyond the Consensus Reality, and into the Shamanic State of Consciousness. Learn how to awaken into and navigate through the space Jung called the Collective Unconscious. It all starts with finding your power animal - architype subconscious entities that have been with you throughout your life. Learn how to tap into the wisdom of the ancients alone, in pairs, and in groups.
events.print_description: Intro to the ancient healing art of shamanism. Learn how to journey. Connect with your inner healer. Tap into your innate wisdom.

events.title: Find Your Power Animal
events.description: Find Your Power Animal: Wake up the shaman in you. What wants to happen now? Ask your spirit guide. Transformation Trance Healing. Wisdom of circle. Direct access to source! We drum fifteen minutes and you experience COSMOS and your lineage as a healer.  and your best friend spirit guide who has been with you for decades, a blind date but she knows your heart and spirit and soul and body that well. crossing the corpus colossum... from Right Brain to Left... as in dreaming at night. but now we are attended by your very own doppelganger! who can interpret these wild unruly dreams which have RECONSTITUTIVE FUNCTIONS, THEY FIX THINGS. as Jung said.
events.print_description: Wake up the shaman in you. What wants to happen now? Ask your spirit guide. Transformation Trance Healing. Wisdom of circle. Direct access to source!

events.title: Find Your Spiritual Guide with Ed Savay
events.description: Find your spiritual guide and learn how they communicate with you.  Develop a relationship for ongoing co-creation. Workshop designed to open awareness to spiritual guidance in a sacred space with clear intention.  Participants are guided to ground into and fill with Earth and Source energies to become fully present and embodied.  Intention is set through discussion regarding what each of us is seeking in the context that we are already equipped with the ultimate guidance system within ourselves.  Spiritual guidance is accessed, the form it takes identified, and lines of communication established.  Several breakout groups used to digest the experience.
events.print_description: Find your spiritual guide and learn how they communicate with you.  Develop a relationship for ongoing co-creation.

events.title: Fire and Desire: 5Rhythms Ecstatic Dance

Bring your body and soul to the practice of Gabrielle Roth's 5Rhythms where we will share our sparks with each other, creating a bonfire of surrendered desires. Come to express your true self and connect with others through our dance of breath, body, sweat and spirit.

Come one, come all to Pam the Albino Mastodon's Tattoo Parlor! Burners are invited to take refuge from the heat and decorate themselves with silver-and-gold flash tattoos that will last the entire week of the Burn. We will definitely be around Monday-Friday 10am-2pm, but feel free to come by any time and say hello.

events.title: Flatulence Amplification Research Team (F.A.R.T.)
events.description:
Flatulence Amplification Research Team (F.A.R.T.) Kamp, established in 1999 using olive drab military surplus, will expand its noxious cloud to encompass a variety of interactive activities, workshops, gifting, and (f)art installations. Radio station K-F.A.R.T. at 107.3 FM will be broadcasting 24/7 its delightful, if somewhat tasteless transmissions, answering machine messages, and public service announcements.

Workshops include wig and dread fall making, pendant making, T-shirt slashing, SWAG necklace organizers, and more. Betty’s Booty Boutique clothing exchange will be open for business 24/7. Fart into a megaphone if the timing is right, or stop by and learn to tie a shemagh!

Overdosing on a feast of edits and originals (no cover versions permitted), this is an unadulterated, tunnel-visioned event, paying homage to the incredible musical journey that is Fleetwood Mac. From blues to rock, from country to stadium pop – the back catalogue is an endless source of delight to revisit and revel to.

events.title: Flirt Camp Lounge & Bar with Flirty Games
events.description:
Flirt Camp is a lush and sensual lounge space with music, benches, pillows, an alter and a bar. We have a nice backlit Flirt Camp sign on the front of our lounge space that brings folks in. Just park the bike in the provided bike rack and come on in!

Once at the bar, roll the Flirt Dice or have a spin of our Flirt Wheel to "break the ice" and enjoy a refreshing cocktail. Mingle in our well-shaded lounge with lots of sensual color and creature comforts.

The lounge area is open 24 hours a day. The bar area is open for most of the day while a camper is available. 
During the week, we hold guided meditations and yoga at the camp, a couple really cool dance parties and a flash-mob in our front yard.

The foundation of our interaction with the Burning Man community is a commitment to having amazing relationships and keeping the chemistry alive and hot.

xoxoxoxox

events.title: Flowers in the Desert
events.description:
For brief moments we will to make the desert bloom. On our giant table we will serve eatable flowers (candied, dried or pickled) and other very special tiny food suprises.
 The idea of the giant table refers of Gullivers travel to Brobdingnag - the country of the Giants. In contrast to the huge table set, we will serve tiny food suprises.
Food is one of most obvious things we enjoy or miss while travelling to foreign countries. To taste something unknown, you have to be open, brave and curious. Missing food from home makes us treasure, what we have in everyday life.
By serving very tiny suprises most people never tasted before, we want to create a very special, emotional and reflective moment for our guests.
events.print_description:
Flowers in the Desert
 
For brief moments we will to make the desert bloom. Be a guest at the Giants table and get a special taste of another world.

events.title: Flying High and Being Spiritually Grounded
events.description:
Walking the human path while being able to fly at will throughout the higher realms is part of our natural design. From gazing mindlessly out through the window in elementary school classrooms, to blissful meditations, or exploring the universe via medicine journeys as adults, we need to be free to consciously travel out-of-body. We are residents of many dimensions. To function and contribute in the everyday frequencies, we need to be grounded but not limited. If we can achieve even a brief moment of higher consciousness we have the ability to recall the experience, regenerate it via appreciation, and reenter these same spiritual realities using creative imagination. This also means that we can dial our conscious awareness back down in order to focus on the physical world and appreciate its finer aspects. 
This is the life of the “householder” who visits the Mountain Temple of higher consciousness and brings its wondrous vibrations into the local village or city as a balanced human being. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
events.print_description: Come by for some perspective after the Man Burn and before the Temple Burn...with Craig Junjulas

Special guest stars are sought after & highly encouraged. Just hunt down Panda Bear Extraordinaire or leave him a message. 🐼

events.title: For the Kids!! Science on the Playa...
events.description: Here at Camp Make Good Choices we like to be inclusive. This year we will be doing a science fair for KIDS! We'll have snacks, drinks, and hands on science education. We'll cover several different topics and have interactive stations staffed with CMGC engineers and mentors! Given the breadth of ages, we'll do our best to cover as many age groups as we can with our science stations. We'll also be screen printing a custom Science+Kids+CMGC graphic! Bring over a shirt or other material to receive the print! (cotton/poly blend is good and it needs to be fairly clean) Parents, come over and take a seat. We'll chat with the kiddos for a while so have a refreshing adult beverage, relax for a bit, and get to know your friendly CMGC crew. (psss... we have a lot of adult oriented events as well, come back at 4 pm!) We're commonly found in the 7:45ish area between B-D, but be sure to check the camp placement roster before heading over.

events.title: Fostering Healthy Visionary Community
events.description:
What makes a community visionary or transformational? What roles do these communities play in our lives? And how can we create models for sustainable growth in the digital age? 

In this talk Chris will explore the nature of visionary communities, both internal and external threats they face, and forward-looking strategies for their sustenance and growth. Chris will draw on his real-world experience organizing Palenque Norte and Psychedelic Society of San Francisco to highlight the opportunities and challenges ahead.
events.print_description: In this talk Chris Pezza will discuss the nature of visionary communities and forward-looking strategies for their sustainable growth.

events.title: Free Photography Zone, Portraits on the Playa
events.description:
My camp, the Free Photography Zone, has been doing portraits of the participants of Burning Man continuously for the past 19 years.  Each person, or group, is photographed in a studio setting and given an instant print as their tangible reminder of their Burning Man experience.  I then photograph then on medium format black and white film so that, if they wish, they can get prints at a later date.

These are not a re-do of your high school yearbook portrait just in Burning Man attire.  I try to give each person enough time to help me make a lasting photograph.  On our gallery walls in our shade structure there are black and white prints ranging in size from 16x20" to 4x5' that I hope will be of some inspiration to you.  Though I try not to duplicate what I have done in the past they may serve as a jumping off point for our photography session.  Not the easiest thing given the approximately 47,000 black and white negatives done so far.  I have never counted and see no reason to start now.

I consider the people I photograph as the most important part of any photograph and always try my best to make a photograph that will be of lasting value and interest well beyond the moment of its creation.

Come, join me, and together we may make something wonderful.  

I usually begin each day about 10 or 11 AM and continue into the night till I can't keep on my feet any longer.  Weather permitting I'll begin on Sunday August 30th through Saturday September 5th.

I do look forward to photographing you.
events.print_description: My 19th year making portraits of the participants.  Get your print and be photographed in a real studio setting.  Every day and night.

events.title: Freestyle Adventure Games
events.description:
FREESTYLE ADVENTURE GAMES
hosted by Fluidgirl and Mystique

FREESTYLE: 
Your own style of dance, with us as your guides, bringing more consciousness to the capabilities within your movement.

ADVENTURE:
Exploring concepts to provoke creativity and imagination, which is always an adventure! Character play, props..

GAMES:
Theatre and Improv games to enhance the connection with yourself and the group as a whole.

VISION FOR THIS CLASS:
To bring a LIGHT heart and laughter into the energy of the group and class overall.

For you to get inspired by the activities to bring forth a new version of your dance/movement capabilities!

Supporting you into the realization of new potentials within your creativity and imagination.

Provoking a new sense of play, imagination and confidence in your movement.

To forge different dance styles so we are all inspiring one another with our creativity.

events.title: French Maid Brigade Parade
events.description:
What is this? A carnival of dusty disco balls? We’re not just here to clown around—we make the playa safe from dust so that all of the citizens and rubes of Black Rock City can breathe freely. Rendezvous with us! Please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. 

You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!

Wear yours (or ours) and we’ll serve those who are 21 and over free booze during the dance party that follows. Perfect.

events.title: Gabriel Wolfchild
events.description:
Gabriel Wolfchild is a nationally touring singer songwriter with an earnest heart that evokes the last of the Romantic Troubadors.  Sincerity is only a real as the fragile heart exposed…and Gabriel is in tune with this channel…taking us into time and space when we were submerged in love…as the reality of our existence. 
Gabriel will be performing at Reverbia's Concerts in the Shade Series on Wednesday at 2:15 and at Reverbia Jam and Chai on Friday/Saturday morning at 1am.  You can also see Gabriel daily at Song, Dust, Sing…Reverbia's popular singer/songwriter showcase and open mic.

events.description: BRC's LGBTQQ community & friends kick off the week in festive rainbow colors w/libations, music & info exchange on the week's Gay/Queer-oriented events. This official annual opening-night gathering is hosted by Down Low Club Camp @ 7:45 D in memory of Mario Cisneros, founder of the event. Come meet new friends, reaquaint with those from past Burns, spark a new Playa romance or rekindle one from the past. Gather with your LGBTQQ brothers & sisters to learn where they're camped & what's planned for the week on the Playa. Bring a flyer or other info about your Gay/Queer-oriented events to post on our LGBTQQ Community Bulletin Board.

events.title: Gemini’s 3rd or 4th Annual Bacon & Bloody Marys!
events.description: Whether you’re just coming back from seeing Daft Punk at the trash fence, or fighting off a giant hot dog in the Thunderdome, or maybe you just wandered around all night with your girlfriend in deep playa riding unicorns and doing karaoke with the Man (OK, you miiiiiiiight have something stronger than a brunch cocktail for that one)… how do you end your night or start your day?  That’s right! It's baaaaaaack! How hot can you take it? Spicy, savory, and DEFINITELY alcoholic, join us for even more bacon, even bloodier marys, and some lovely bottoms for all to view (ask before you fondle!)! Bring your own cup to Camp GTFO (location TBD) for the best*, hottest*, and TASTIEST* bloody marys and goodies on the Playa! . (* dustiest; let's not kid ourselves.) There are usually other food goodies available, as we see fit and depending on how drunk we got the night before/that morning. We'll also have our famous Hydration Station for those who aren't drinking or for those under 21 (because they can all still eat BACON, right?! Shush, it's a rhetorical question.) . Also revisit the ARE YOU A BLOODY PUSSY OR WHAT? bar, and see how hot you can take it when Gemini pours whatever the hell she damn well feels like into a shot glass for you to drink. Want to earn YOUR red wings?! Have a seat in our living room, dance the morning away in Tiny Club, play on the trampoline (clothing optional, of course!), or write in the shared journal! Bring your ID, bring your friends, bring your family, and BRING YOUR OWN FREAKING CUP!
events.print_description: Join Gemini for the return of bacon, bloody marys, & bottom biscuits! BYOC! Toast a great night or a good morning! Hot, spicy & full of (s)ass.

events.title: Gender Blender’s Dusty Snuggles Cuddle Puddle
events.description: Join us in creating a safe, non-sexual space for everyone to enjoy no-pressure platonic intimacy! Spooning, nuzzling, and all styles of cuddling will abound. Whether you want a creative new way to make some friends, are asexual and want to explore non-sexual intimacy, just need a sweet way to de-stress, or are simply chasing that lovely oxytocin buzz, come check it out! To facilitate creating this safe and non-sexual space, we ask that participants keep their pant[ie]s on and save the sexiness for our Thursday Sexploration Party at 9pm. This event is respect and consent oriented - ALWAYS ask before touching someone else in any way. As always, this party is a safe space for trans, genderqueer, and gender variant people, and any and all genders/orientations (or lack thereof) are welcome at this event.

events.title: Gift Exchange and Love-Triangle Bazaar
events.description:
We're offering an automated gift exchange service and a crowd-sourced kissing  booth that distributes gifts and kisses among a web of people. The person giving the gift/kiss is almost never the person the receiver exchanges their item with. 

Participants can come and list what they want or may have to gift/kiss. If a participant doesn't have something, we'll provide a gift of their choosing. Then using a trade-loop algorithm a web of exchanged items is created that pairs participants with gifts they want.  For those who only wish to give, we photograph them and give their item's recipient their photo/information to potentially interact with later. 

All exchanges/kisses are executed daily at noon. Please come before or after to browse/list or join in the chaos of the exchange!
events.print_description: Want to make a gift economy work? Exchange gifts using a trade-loop algorithm with no hassling or haggling. No gift? No problem, we'll provide you one

events.description:
Many rumors exist about redheads. Having been described as gods, vampires, premium-valued slaves, as well as being emotionally un-housebroken, lustful, promiscuous and wanton. This is a party celebrating redheads, "the Ginger", "the firecrotch" and those bespeckled with freckles in all their glory!  Redheads are less than 3% of the global population. Here, they become the 99%. Bigger, better and redder than last year, still serving “redheaded sluts".
Starts some time around sun down, when the sun hits the mountains and the UV drops
events.print_description: Redheads, less than 3% of the global population. Here, they become the 99%. Bigger, better and redder than last year, still serving “redheaded sluts"

events.title: Ginger Party
events.description: Join the Lamplighters for Classic Rock and Ginger Appreciation Happy Hour and then stick around to help us light the city at 5pm. BYO Cup!
events.print_description: Join the Lamplighters for Classic Rock and Ginger Appreciation Happy Hour and then stick around to help us light the city at 5pm. BYO Cup!

events.title: Girl Power Happy Hour
events.description: Celebrating the strong beautiful girl in all of us! Music, food & dancing! Come get your girl on! Everyone welcome.
events.print_description: Celebrating the strong beautiful girl in all of us! Music, food & dancing! Come get your girl on! Everyone welcome.

events.title: Gladiatorial Combat With Medieval Weapons!
events.description: Hail champion! We have padded longswords, short swords, shields, battle axes, warhammers, spears, and the net-and-trident.  Come beat the crap out of friends and foes at our very own fighting pits.  We'll be running this Monday through Friday all day.
events.print_description: We have all manner of padded medieval weapons for you to beat your friends with.  Come and test your skill against the finest champions in BRC!

events.title: Glittercamp!
events.description: Join us for a Black Rock tradition of lovey dance tunes and warm welcoming vibes, sharing the finest bodypaints on the playa.  Glittercamp will cover your body in shimmery polyester magic.  Naked and shiny as nature intended!
events.print_description: Join us for a Black Rock tradition of sharing the finest bodypaints on the playa.  Glittercamp will cover your body in shimmery polyester magic.

events.title: Global Art Grants program discussion and Q&A
events.description: Meet selection committee members and past grantees and learn about how to a grant for an off-playa art project from Burning Man Arts.
events.print_description: Meet selection committee members and past grantees and learn about how to a grant for an off-playa art project from Burning Man Arts.

events.title: Glow & Flow Dance Party at The Family Jewels
events.description:
Tuesday at sunset wear your brightest dayglow duds and bring your poi, flags, hoops, fire and staffs out to the Family Jewels in the playa and dance under our UV lights. Booming music by BAAAHS (the Big Ass Amazingly Awesome Homosexual Sheep), everybody's favorite sheep mutant vehicle. 

Bring all your glowing friends.
events.print_description: Tuesday at sunset wear your brightest dayglow and dance under our UV lights at the Family Jewels. Music by BAAAHS!

events.title: Gnome Adoptions
events.description: Come adopt a gnome of your very own from the Gnome Adoption Agency! But first you'll have to prove yourself a worthy gnome parent via our rigorous interview process.
events.print_description: Come adopt a gnome of your very own from the Gnome Adoption Agency! But first you'll have to prove yourself a worthy gnome parent.

events.title: Gnomish Mischief
events.description: Become a gnome and be trained in the ancient art of gnomish mischief! Gnomes are friendly and devious, spreading joy and confusion across the playa. We will turn you into a gnome with a (mostly) painless process and give you all the tools you need to mystify and delight your fellow burners. The transmogrification and training will culminate with gnew gnomes being escorted off into the wild of the playa to practice their new mischievous skills.
events.print_description: Become a gnome & be trained in the ancient art of gnomish mischief! Training will culminate with gnew gnomes making mischief across the playa!

events.title: Go Bananas with Camp Orange!
events.description: We're gifting chocolate covered frozen bananas from our big yellow banana stand! Grab a banana, cool off, and swing in the largest known hammock!! Take a break from the techno with our 90s jams, and come monkey around with us!
events.print_description: We're gifting chocolate covered frozen bananas from our big yellow banana stand! Grab a banana, cool off, and swing in the largest known hammock!!

events.title: Goddess Puja - the Art of Adoration
events.description: Tantra Puja - an authentic sacred ancient sensual ceremony in adoration of the Divine Feminine. Profoundly moving and filled with love.
events.print_description: Tantra Puja - an authentic sacred ancient sensual ceremony in adoration of the Divine Feminine. Profoundly moving and filled with love.

events.title: Godzilla Camp Presents:
events.description:
Inspiring interactive spiritual talks focus on Buddhism. With over 1 million worldwide subscribers, internationally acclaimed podcast host Jason Jarrett will lead a discussion on: 

- Life and Death (Monday)
- Oneness of self and the environment (Wednesday)
- 3000 opportunities in a single moment of life (Friday)

Whether a practicing Buddhist, or just spiritually, or intellectually curious, all are welcome.
events.print_description: Inspiring interactive spiritual talks focus on Buddhism.
events.other_location: Godzilla Camp (formerly known as Sloth Camp)

events.title: Godzilla Camp Presents: Small Camp Power Workshop
events.description:
Small Camp Power Workshop
How to power your small camp (1 to 15 people). This information can also be applied for those emergency situations at home when you lose power for more than 8 hours or have an off the grid get-away place. The emphasis will be on:
- Minimal basic electricity for the neophyte,
- Determining your needs,
- Understanding your alternatives,
- Designing a power plan,
- Seeing what it takes to implement that plan and power your camp,
- And above all else SAFETY.
events.print_description: Small Camp Power Workshop
events.other_location: Godzilla Camp (formerly known as Sloth Camp)

events.title: Go Fly A Kite!
events.description: Go fly a kite with Lip Service to kick off the week. If there’s no wind, well, we’ll dispense our best bad advice and gift you lip balm!
events.print_description: Go fly a kite with Lip Service to kick off the week. If there’s no wind, well, we’ll dispense our best bad advice and gift you lip balm!

events.title: Golden Cafe 750 Club
events.description: DRINKERS! Its the 12th year of the 750 Club! How does it work? Everyone brings a 750mL bottle of an interesting beverage, and we all share. It could be a bottle of cheap wine, or a bottle of expensive beer, or a bottle of snake venom liquor from Bangalore, or a bottle of generic cinnamon whiskey from Vons. Be a part of history. Be a part of the 750 club!
events.print_description: For 12 years we come together with a 750ml bottle of anything drinkable to share. Cheap wine? Expensive beer? Strange whiskey? Snake liquor?

events.title: Goldfish Bowl
events.description: Get advice on your social enterprise. An expert will walk you through the practicalities of your idea for a business that will make a better world.
events.print_description: Get advice on your social enterprise. An expert will walk you through the practicalities of your idea for a business that will make a better world.

events.title: Gold Parade
events.description: One more time for the Gold Parade.  Wear your golden finery or we will dress you.  Assemble at 5:30, we leave Children of Chaos at 6:00 pm Wednesday for the late afternoon light.  Cocktail party following the parade.
events.print_description: Wear your golden finery or we will dress you.  We leave Children of Chaos at 6:00 pm for the late afternoon light.  Cocktails after.

events.title: Gong Journey Sound Healing w/Visudha @ The Temple
events.description: RhythmWave is honored to support Gong Journey Vibrational Sound Healing at the Temple. Be transported to the celestial realms with Visudha de los Santos and her magical trio of gongs, in a celebration of life and renewal. The tones and overtones will lift your spirit and your energy. You are encouraged to wear white and to bring your highest intentions. Meet at the Temple West Gate at sunset (7:30pm) on Tuesday.
events.print_description: Be transported to celestial realms with Visudha de los Santos and her magical trio of gongs, in a celebration of life and renewal. *Temple West Gate*

events.title: Good Morning Black Rock City!!!
events.description: Who are the people in your playahood? Join us on the OKNOTOK stage for our morning talk show as we interview the most interesting people on the playa. YOU!!!
events.print_description: Who are the people in your playahood? Join us on the OKNOTOK stage as we interview the most interesting people on the playa. YOU!!!

events.title: Got Endometriosis?
events.description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does?  Join us for an Endo Support Group.  1 in 10 women have this horrible incurable disease which causes pain, infertility, scarring, and inflammation : You are not alone!  Come share your story, hugs, laughter, and tears.  We'll have books you may want to borrow and swag, too.  Wear yellow to support Endo Awareness!  Head to Horny Camp at Menagerie Village and ask for Prickly Pear (or look for horrible yellow leggings). See you there, EndoSisters.
events.print_description: Do you have Endo or know someone who does? You're not alone! Come share your story, hugs, laughter & tears. Wear yellow for Endo Awareness!

events.title: Go the F*** To Sleep Bar

events.print_description: Thirsty? Ready for Happy Hour? Come enjoy a drink and conversation at the Go the F*** To Sleep Bar.

events.print_description: Planet Earth holds another Goth / Industrial night in the Dark Room at Planet Earth from midnight to 4am!

events.title: Goth Night 2.0
events.description: While everyone else is enjoying white parties, and shiny burner hump day Stag Camp's C will be bringing the darkness once again. If your heart and soul are dark enough you may get a tasty treat, while treating your ears to mighty fine goth, industrial, IDM, synthpop, and futurepop music in the great lakes tradition. So drink C's Famous Black Russians while supplies last, and stomp your boots this Wednesday night!  21+ we check IDs

events.title: Grateful Thursday Happy Hour
events.description: Want a break from EDM? Want to kick back with Dead tunes? Want your cup to runneth over with one of our delicious mystery cocktails? Well then, friends, come on down to camp Golden Moments, spin the wheel of surprise and wonder, imbibe and unlock your destiny, enjoy a perimeter sunset, and make some golden moments...
events.print_description: Chill with Grateful Dead tunes, spin the wheel for a "carnival of colors" cocktail, and make some golden moments.

events.title: Group Hands-On Energy Healing
events.description:
The process is simple: a person gets up on the massage table and is surrounded by 3-5 "healers", who envelope the person in an energetic cocoon - it's a wonderful experience! A guide operate as a kind of "air traffic controller" during hands-on-healing sessions, while teaching the process to the others around the massage table. No previous experience is necessary...and you can learn the basic technique in about 30 minutes. Come join us if you need some help, would like to experience it, or would like to be part of the healing team :-)

We'll be repeating this event at:
- 2:00 pm on Tuesday
- 10:00 am on Wednesday
- 1:00 pm on Friday
- 12:00 pm on Sunday

Please help us in sharing and promoting this event :-)
events.print_description: Join us in an experiential exercise of channeling your energy, directed by your intention.  You can either receive or be part of the healing team :-)

events.title: Gypsy Mirrorball Sunset Dance Party
events.description: Witchy women, nomadic mystics, and those forever transient: Follow the traveler’s road to discover a Gypsy Dance Party of astrological proportions!  See your future in the swirling dust while dancing to the sorcerous mash-ups (music with lyrics!) of DJ LobsterDust (Bootie, LA & NYC). Join our vagabond tribe as we drink to good health and curse those who have done us wrong with enchanting gin & gingers (our specialty cocktail) or experience the magic crystals (alcoholic snow cones).  Palms will be read, spells will be cast and destinies will be changed. Don’t miss it… because when the sun moves on, so do we.
events.print_description: A Dance Party of prophetic proportions! See your future in the mystic mash-ups (music with lyrics!) of DJ LobsterDust. Palms read & spells cast!

events.title: Happy Belly Class
events.description:
Come join us in the Green Goddess Lounge on Wednesday morning, where we will offer fellow burners the opportunity to learn more about the benefits of probiotics foods, including how to make them for yourself at home!  All interested class participants will be able to receive a free “kombucha or water kefir starter kit” to use at home.
	Green Goddess resident Nutritionist, Jessica- will be talk about the benefits of incorporating probiotic foods and beverages (like those we serve) into your everyday diet, answer questions from fellow campers and share tips for making your own probiotics foods and drinks at home.
events.print_description: Find out how to have a Happy Belly on Playa and all year long! Learn about the nutritional benefits of probiotic food & drinks, DIY recipes & more!

events.title: Happy Birthday To You!
events.description: The Annual Birthday Party for Birthday Girl and Everybody Else!  If you are having a birthday any day this year, c'mon over to the  Ignite Your States Ski Lodge to get your birthday spanking , drink your birthday shot, and dance your birthday dance! Enter the dome in your birthday suit, and you may get a little something special from one of our Birthday Bitches! Exclusive appearance by Nurse Tata, with her elixir to treat symptoms of all sorts, especially Old Feller Snark.
events.print_description: The Annual Birthday Party for Birthday Girl and Everybody Else! Get your birthday spanking, drink your birthday shot, dance your birthday dance!

events.title: Harness the Vibrant Source Qigong
events.description: Harness the Source Qigong:  Access the infinite field of create potential that pervades the entire Universe, underlies all creation and resides within you. Activate your innate healing abilities, ground into the present moment, and feel your connection to all of life.Nourish the flow of source energy inside of you. Integrate your mind, body and spirit into wholeness. Cultivate your natural state of health, vitality, awareness and compassion, with this gentle practice of movement, sound and visualization. The ancient art of Qigong, pronounced "Chee Gong", which translates as the "Cultivation of Life Energy", combines elements familiar to Yoga, Meditation, Reiki, Martial Arts and Quantum Physics to provide feelings of presence, peace, relaxation, connectedness and well-being. Give your human mechanism/energy body and "oil change", and charge yourself up for your next Playa adventure.

events.description: Trauma from religious involvement or leaving religion can affect all of life. We will address teachings, share stories, and begin the healing process.

events.title: Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart
events.description: "Healing the Broken Altar of the Heart:  Guided Meditation and Ceremony"  In this journey, Colby will guide us into our inner sanctuary within and deep into the recesses of our heart space where the altar of wholeness resides.  Here we will be given the opportunity to accept our injustices, reclaim our disowned aspects, and renew our awareness and devotion to wholeness and love.  As the Light of Truth and Divine Love radiates from our hearts we will share in group and anchor in our bodies with physical relating exercises and dance.
events.print_description: Guided meditation to the altar of the heart to reclaim what has been disowned and to celebrate wholeness.

events.title: Health Division Hands Out Food Permits @Playa Info
events.description:
The Health Division will be handing out pre-approved food permits at Playa Info from 1pm-2:30pm from Sat. Aug 29th - Thur. Sept 3rd, with extended hours on Sunday and Monday beginning at 11:30 am.
The Nevada State Health Division will be handing out food permits for those who have applied and been approved to serve food at the event. 
Food permits must be obtained and be in-hand before a camp may begin to operate their food service. 
We will hand out permits at Playa Info near Center Camp during the following times-
-Saturday, August 29th : 1pm - 2:30pm 
-Sunday, August 30th : 11:30am - 2:30pm
-Monday, August 31st : 11:30am - 2:30pm
-Tuesday, September 1st : 1pm - 2:30pm
-Wednesday, September 2nd : 1pm- 2:30pm
-Thursday, September 3rd : 1pm-2:30pm  

We will not accept food service applications at Burning Man or approve food service on-site. To be approved to serve food, you must apply to the State Health Division by August 16th, and receive approval prior to the event. For more information on how to apply visit, http://dpbh.nv.gov/Reg/Temp-E/dta/Forms/Temporary_Food_Establishments_at_Special_Events_-_Forms/ 

If you have questions or concerns about food service at Burning Man, contact the Health Division at 775-623-6588.
events.print_description: The Health Div. will be handing out pre-approved food permits at Playa Info from 1pm-2:30pm from Sat. Aug 29th - Thur. Sept 3rd.

“Healthy Hour” from 2pm-5pm on Tuesday and Thursday 
	Enjoy healthy, fermented refreshments while relaxing in our lounge space, listening to soothing mantras and classical-infused electronic vibes.
“Healthy Hour” will offer: “shots” of Kombucha and/or Water Kefir (BYOC) and handcrafted pickles, sauerkraut sprouted, seed crackers (BYO Plate & Fork)

events.title: heartFUL Yoga w/Shannon Sahaja @ RhythmWave
events.description: Start the day with a body-prayer of deep relaxation and grace. Soften your form on the sweet bamboo floor and sound out a heartFul ‘ahhhhhh’. Prepare for another epic day on the playa with Shannon's simple, sweet way as she guides you to drop in and receive yourSELF!
events.print_description: Prepare for another epic day on the playa with Shannon's simple, sweet way as she guides you to drop in and receive yourSELF!

events.title: Heart-On! Body Art
events.description: Get your very own custom version of our now famous Heart body art. Why? Because "Everyone loves a Heart-On!" Choose from multiple colors of airbrush paint and stencil sizes, ink stamps, temporary tattoos, and of course those Welt-On!s done with our trusty heart riding crop - just the thing to fill all your HO desires! So, whether it's a cute lil' pink one or a huge purple one, our Fluffers will give you the Heart-On! you've always wanted, and they'll put it anywhere you like. Remember: "Your Heart-On! should last until you rub it out," and, "Multiple Heart-On!s are always fun," so sashay around BRC and wear your Heart-On! proudly!!

events.title: Heavenly Yoga - Divine
events.description: Divine is a mixture between the Hot Yoga poses and the Power Vinyasa asanas. A great combination of both practices and an excellent way to get into the flow routine and explore the benefits of movement and breath. Hot Fusion Yoga offers the perfect mixture of strength, flexibility and relaxation.

events.title: Heavenly Yoga - Joy
events.description: Joy is a very gentle Hatha Yoga class that holds poses longer and works with relaxing the entire body, while bringing awareness to all the muscles, joints, veins, tissues and organs. It also uses the breath to go deeper into opening restricted areas in the body and exploring the benefits of meditation. A truly joyful experience.

events.title: Heavenly Yoga - Paradise
events.description: Paradise is a series of 26 poses. Most Yoga poses (asanas) are performed twice and held for a minute or 30 seconds. This creates natural heat in the body, the fire in the belly to create positive change, which allows the body to go deeper and safer into the poses. It eliminates the risk of injuries, promotes sweating and helps to release toxins. This class uses the same routine every time. Hot Yoga is a way to experience paradise on earth.

events.title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
events.description: The art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki.  This performance was inspired by and arranged from the Japanese traditional tea ceremony. I named myself Hechi-Ken after the legendary master of tea ceremony, Hechi-Kan. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thought toward him for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make better and more enjoyable future throughout this tea ceremony.
events.print_description: I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me.A great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy.

events.description: Don't let camping in the desert get in the way of your self-love routine. Uli Baba's is pleased to invite you on a very special magic carpet ride. Bring your plug-in vibe, a towel and playa cup. We'll provide a selection of teas, electricity, and a comfortably furnished Moroccan tent for you to enjoy some personal time with yourself. events.title: Hobo I-Con Game
events.description:
Hobo Camp challenges you to keep your mind and eyes open as you wander about the playa, and play our "i-con game."  Take note of the curious markings known as "hobo signs" and come to Hobo Camp, located within Camp Conception. Correctly decipher 3 signs and you will be richly rewarded!

To cope with the uncertainties of hobo life, hobos developed a system of symbols, or a visual code. Hobos would write this code with chalk or coal to provide directions, information, and warnings to others in "the brotherhood". A symbol would indicate "turn right here", "beware of hostile railroad police", "dangerous dog", "food available here", and so on.
events.print_description: We challenge you to decipher the hobo icons we place all around the playa.  Come to Hobo Camp with 3 deciphered icons and get rewarded!

events.title: Home Sweet Dome presents Church of the 5th Element
events.description:
Home Sweet Dome presents the Church of the 5th Element theme camp at 7:30 and Carny.

Join us all week for a variety of interactive events, including sunset cocktails, popcorn, chill house beats, an open bouldering wall, workshops, and nightly lighting of our 8 ft. in diameter steel globe fire pit.

The ELEMENTS

FIRE: we'll blaze up our 8 ft.-in-diameter steel globe fire pit so you can watch the world burn before you burn baby burn! Popcorn included.

EARTH: monkey around on our rock climbing wall 

WATER: home-crafted, artisan libations and cold brew

WIND: Home Sweet Dome resident DJ beats in the air

The FIFTH ELEMENT: That's you of course, bringing all the love. ♥ 

SCHEDULE OF EVENTS

Monday 8/31	: 
Workshop: The basics of healing and energy work at 1 pm
7:30 Sector Neighborhood Welcome Party at 5 pm

Tuesday 9/01:
Morning Cold Brew at 10 am
Workshop: Lucid Dreaming at 2 pm
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Bouldering , all day

Wednesday 9/02
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Bouldering , all day

Thursday, 9/03
Sunset cocktails and Watch the World Burn Firepit at 5 pm 
Workshop: Fireside yoga with Risha at dusk 
Bouldering , all day

Friday, 9/04
Home Sweet Dome Salon with musical performance by Eitch, meditation, story talk and chanting. Sunset.
Bouldering, all day

events.title: Homojitoville Happy Hour
events.description:
Tuesday rolls around, and you know where to be found! Homojitoville Happy Hour of course, with those drinks and that SOUND?!  Duh! You think.  You thirsty fool! Make your way down the street, and come dance and be cool! Our lovable bartenders will treat you with a smile, and pull that penis tap to drain the Homojito river Nile!  Many have come before, and all have loved dearly, but with our new Catwalk and Genie Bottle, this Happy Hour’s ‘bout to make HISTORY!  Clearly…
AND SHOULD YOU FIND US OUT AND ABOUT, we're impossible to go without. Because amidst the dust and in from the blind, our caravan begins to arrive. Our color is FULL, and our energy BRIGHT! Thank heavens it’s the Homos coming into sight! We bring with us drink, the most refreshing to be found; A Homojito we call it, better than ANY around! Its succulent tartness with fresh pulled mint, you’re sure to enjoy each and every sip. Come with us and clown! We’ll be all around town! You'll see the fur coming while sweet music abounds!

events.title: Hotshots 1st birthday 10th Anniversary Spectacular
events.description:
Hotshot the Robot returns to celebrate the 10th anniversary of his 1st birthday. No singing, he hates that. Don't offer him a beer, he hates that too. 

Hotshot was born Friday during the 2004 burn near the 3:00 plaza.

It is with heavy heart he returns to the place of his birth after a nasty bout of losing himself in a search of fame and fortune. 

It was only after locking on to his self-reflection in a pool in the Hollywood hills, high on some kinda smack did he see what he had become. It was one of those infinity pools that seems like it falls away to the surrounding landscapes. They got really trendy in the middle to late 90's and this one in particular had really nice cultured stone placed to look completely natural almost...

A pool of robo-flection, falling away to nowhere...in this case it happened to be the gorgeous smog filled sky overlooking the 405 south and the 101. 

"What have I become?" he whispers to himself whispering back at himself.  
"Why am I wearing this amazing floral print burgundy kimono robe?" which was actually made for him personally by one of the finest seamstresses in the Sai Kung district of Hong Kong. 

He had been had by himself having been had. 

No more. It was time to get back to what mattered most in Hotshot's life. I mean after all, no skeezer in all of Orange County could tighten his nuts half as much as The Burn had in the past. Just because he doesn't have feelings, doesn't mean he doesn't have feelings. 

There is no shame in going.........home. 

Hotshot immediately logged onto his brand new Macbook Pro with the 13.3" HD Retina screen and made his first steps towards the playa and logged onto Stubhub and bought a ticket for $1175.00. After his friends said he couldn't fit his bean bag chair in their ride he went to ebay and purchased a car pass for $389 (free shipping) and folks the rest they say is history. 

Come say hello old friends and new friends alike. 3:00 plaza all week, only God knows when.
events.print_description: Hotshot the Robot returns to celebrate the 10th anniversary of his 1st birthday. No singing, he hates that. Don't offer him beer, he hates that too

events.description:
Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits 
Halcyon is a 17-year Burning Man participant and co-founder of Pink Heart Camp. He is the author of “Love more. Fear less.” and hosted the NBC.com web series “Fears. Regrets. Desires.” For over a decade he has hosted the Playa-inspired, Webby-award winning video podcast HugNation.com and frequently speaks about Gratitude & Gifting.
Halcyon is the co-founder of the San Diego-based “1st Saturdays” homeless outreach program and currently serves as Chief Wisdom Officer at a tech company in Ventura, California.
events.print_description: Halcyon will share lessons and learnings from his grandpa, life, and the playa that will help recalibrate our hearts and realign our spirits

events.title: Human Carcass Wash
events.description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience.

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed.

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along.

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.

events.title: Introduction to Thai Yoga Massage
events.description:
A 90-minute workshop introducing Thai massage theory and techniques to anyone who would like to enjoy being able to offer their benefits to friends and family. No bodywork experience is required.

Thai Massage is an ancient bodywork practice which combines acupressure, energy meridian stimulation and yoga-like stretching. This is an Ayurvedic version of Shiatsu which encourages great relaxation and rejuvenation. The recipient, fully clothed on a floor mat, continues to remain passive, while gently and fluidly, yoga-influenced stretches are applied to them. There are many positive effects including stress-reduction, increased flexibility resulting in injury prevention, muscle spasm relief and the treatment of a wide variety of orthopedic complaints. This work is also a conscious, meditational application of Metta (love and compassion) that leaves both the giver and receiver with a life-affirming feeling of peace and connection.

Jennifer Gillmor is a Senior Practitioner at Thai Massage Toronto, a Holistic Table Massage Practitioner and a Yoga Teacher at Yogaspace in Toronto, Canada
events.print_description: A 90-minute workshop introducing Thai massage theory and techniques.

events.title: 'I See You: the Art of Acknowledgment' Workshop
events.description:
There is no greater gift than fully seeing and honoring the people around us. 
How do we show up with full presence? How do we look, listen, and speak in a way that calls out the radiant beauty manifesting uniquely in every person we encounter? 

This workshop is a chance to learn simple tools to recognize and acknowledge the best qualities in ourselves, strangers, friends and loved ones. 
Come with open ears, open eyes, and an open heart. Leave with a smile, a glow, a new style of gifting and a way to elevate the default world to new levels of love.

Hosted and led by Sunyata & LoveBomb
events.print_description: This workshop is a chance to learn simple tools to recognize and acknowledge the best qualities in ourselves, strangers, friends and loved ones.

events.title: Jamrunner
events.description:
Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). 

Between evading pursuers, there is an interactive story that will unfold the longer a player remains in the game. The more resources I have available to me, the more enriched I can make this experience. I will need LOTS of printed materials, including maps and dossiers.

If you'd like to join (or know a person/camp who can help) let me know! See below for details.

The story:
Businessman and Nevada oligarch, Randall "Buck" Thurlough, is about to deal a deathblow to decommodification at Burning Man. The Order of Greywater Cockatoos is waging a subversive campaign against this corporate takeover. You are a member of this underground movement led by the elusive culture jammer, Darwin Sandiego.

Be careful! Thurlough's influence has grown to the point that he has successfully installed his own hired muscle at the festival. Private contractors of the notorious Pike River Security Firm roam the playa. If they catch you, they'll coerce you into turning on your fellow operatives.
events.print_description: Jamrunner is a "Journey to the End of the Night" styled game (ie: zombie tag, spy tag). It starts at the Duckpond!

events.title: KAREN Burmese Massage and Intitutive Bodywork
events.description:
Oasis 47 is very fortunate to have a unique body worker and healer trained in the art of Karen Burmese healing.

Ron Hod is one of only 3 non-Karen practitioners of Karen Burmese healing techniques, and has been practicing for 14 years. The church leaders who once offered the training no longer do so, so further training can only be achieved in Thailand or Myanmar (Burma). Ron is initiated, attuned, and aligned in the Karen Burmese art of Opendove Form (/Open Dove Form) modicum, a system of energy and body work that dates back over 1,700 years. Ron was recently realigned to the specific energy specifications required of practitioners,
events.print_description: A unique form of intuitive massage and bodywork originating from Burma which dates back 1700 years. Ron is one of 3 non-Karen people who can practice.

events.title: Kava Tasting
events.description:
Come and enjoy a relaxing sunset time with us to share our authentic kava tasting experience! Replenish yourself before the night takes on.

KavAquatic will be serving kava from late afternoon to the first hours of the night as is traditionally done in the Pacific Islands of Vanuatu, New-Caledonia and Fiji, in a setting taking you right back to an island paradise!

As a tribute to the magic of the Pacific Island experience and goodwill, our campsite will be a dedicated and epically tranquil chill-out zone. Kavaquatic will be an island paradise perfect for individuals or groups to relax, recuperate and connect. Coupled with traditional kava beverages served at sundown each evening, our campsite will make for the perfect escape from the hot, dry, dusty desert, and one that even the most experienced burner will seek out at some stage. This oasis-in-the-desert experience will be complemented by our camp's guiding principles of inclusion, self expression and camaraderie.
events.print_description: Come and enjoy a relaxing sunset time with us to share our authentic kava tasting experience! Replenish yourself before the night takes on.

events.title: KITTY TRIM by SIRE BUSHWHACKER
events.description:
KittyTrim is the Ultimate Female Hygiene Service for the woman who desires to feel totally pampered on the Playa. The service is for woman 18 year young and over, only!

If you have arrived on the Playa and feel you need a trim or desire to be smooth or even have a design done to show off, come by KittyTrim to have your wishes become reality. KittyTrim is the Ultimate Pampering Experience. The perfect place to get ready to enjoy the Carnival of Mirrors.

Sire BushWhacker was one of the first two people to ever offer this service on the Playa starting in 2002. After a period of a few years hiatus, the Sire has chosen this year to return to offer his exceptional service for the Wonderful Women of the Playa.

He does this shaving service using only electric and no bare blades. Those nicks from blades do not feel so great with Playa Dust. He uses 3 electric shavers and one of them is specifically designed to totally smooth those pubic hairs. A beautiful lady that does waxing came by for a KittyTrim one year, and her comment was that she felt this was the closest she had ever experienced to waxing.

Over the years Sire BushWhacker has had many recommendations by women to the point where for multiple years in a roll there was a 2 to 3 hour wait.

The Sire is limiting his time to 3 days only and only 4 hours per day: Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday from 12pm (noon) to 4pm.
 
He is also allowing you to sign up in advance via email (baymtns@yahoo.com) request to limit your wait time, so you may enjoy many of the other wonderful things on the Playa.
 
The times available are on every hour and half hour, so 12 or 12:30 or 1 or 1:30 etc.

Sire BushWhacker awaits to be of service to you, My Lady!
events.print_description: KittyTrim is the Ultimate Female Hygiene Service for the woman who desires to feel totally pampered on the Playa. The service is for women 18 & over.
events.other_location: Contraptionists Camp on the corner of 8 & B for a KittyTrim ask for Sire BushWhacker
