He uses 3 electric shavers and one of them is specifically designed to totally smooth those pubic hairs. A beautiful lady that does waxing came by for a KittyTrim one year, and her comment was that she felt this was the closest she had ever experienced to waxing.

Over the years Sire BushWhacker has had many recommendations by women to the point where for multiple years in a roll there was a 2 to 3 hour wait.

The Sire is limiting his time to 3 days only and only 4 hours per day: Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday from 12pm (noon) to 4pm.
 
He is also allowing you to sign up in advance via email (baymtns@yahoo.com) request to limit your wait time, so you may enjoy many of the other wonderful things on the Playa.
 
The times available are on every hour and half hour, so 12 or 12:30 or 1 or 1:30 etc.

Sire BushWhacker awaits to be of service to you, My Lady!

events.title: Knife Throwing Class
events.description:
We'll have two classes explaining and demonstrating on how to throw a knife. Part of the explanation will be on why this is NOT a martial art and why, despite what you've seen in the movies, no one in their right mind would ever throw a knife at a person. It should be thought of as more of a form of object manipulation, like juggling.
  We'll have one knife throwing wall and a number of floor boards for familiarizing yourself with the weight and balance of the knives. We'll have knives for practice but feel free to bring your own. Classes are Tuesday and Thursday 10:00 - 12:00
events.print_description: Knife Throwing Class & Practice. Two classes Tues & Thur at Gigsville explaining and demonstrating knife throwing. Maximum audience participation.

events.title: Kostume Gifting Experience
events.description:
Let Kostume Kult transform you with a new costume or accessory! Costume experts dress you & send you dancing down the runway. Silliness guaranteed!

Tuesday through Saturday from Noon until 5:00pm Black Rock City citizens can jump on the "K" (subway) Train with its outrageous ads and colorful graffiti to arrive at the platform of Koney Island’s best kostumery – the closed down mysterious K Station.  Kamp Karneys assist folks as they morph themselves with over TWO TONS of costumes. Exit through the gift shop onto the runway where burners strut their newfound finery rebirthed onto the playa - ready to participate with extra attitude. From the raised dance platform watch the daily fashion shows and ongoing esplanade carnival. Loved by the paparazzi and Cheered on by subway straphangers, live DJ music, and the infamous ring master MCs, citizens can show their freaky side on the runway under the watchful eye of the 25' tall King Kong. Hanging from the Empire State Building, even Kong gets his freakshow on with his Guinness World Record 45' pink tutu (Tutu Tuesday) and BRC Animal Control bling.

events.title: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1-on-1 Sensation
events.description: Do you want to try something completely new? We’re all looking for ways to have experiences that really rock our world and awaken our senses! Here’s your chance to experience something we guarantee you’ve never felt before! Eros Tangeré is a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument.  Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body. Shed of your clothes, you lay prone and robbed of your sense of sight, one of our artists will perform upon your body with the music in ways that you have never experienced. This is a unique and creative custom designed sensory performance. Not for the faint of heart. Eros Tangeré is a one on one, sensual adult event. Space is very limited so signing up for a session prior to start time is highly recommended. Check in at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures inside Spanky’s Wine Bar for more info and times. 18+, Ladies Only. This has become a hit-favorite at Burning Man, do not miss it. Appointments are limited.

events.title: Last Bar on Earth/First Bar on Playa
events.description:
Last Bar on Earth or First bar on Play, depending on which way you reach the trash fence. Located along the fence, like a mirage looming in the distance, out of the desert, from the dust: Ice Cold Margaritas. The Last Bar on Earth, past the Esplanade, past the Man, past the Temple… as far as a person can go in Black Rock City.
…or…
The First Bar on the Playa; depending on which way you are coming to the bar. For those trekking across the barren wasteland, evading the dozen or so security and law enforcement agencies, avoiding detection by radar and heat sensors, struggling to finally reach the perimeter fence; our Bar is there to offer you an ice cold beverage and welcome you Home with a hug, brother/sister, before contacting the proper authorities and turning you over to security.

For several years I have rode my bicycle with trailer out to the furthest point in Black Rock City with all the booze, juice, water, soda and ice I could fit in the 3 large ice-chests. I purposely set up at the remotest spot I can find, away from camps, sound systems, art vehicles and crowds.  Trying to provide a service to intrepid playa explorers, people out riding bikes along the trash fence, those reaching beyond the EDM to see the desert vastness. As they spot our stack of coolers along the fence, in they trickle and find Iced Cold Margaritas waiting for them. Every year we go through every drop of beverage we can carry out there, usually in under an hour or two. Hosted by Camp Threat.

Bring a cup and witty banter. Join us at the fence.

And, YES, most definitely, Daft Punk will be playing.
events.print_description: Last Bar or First, depending on which way you reach the trash fence, our mobile bar will be there to quench your thirst with ice cold beverages

events.title: Laughter Yoga
events.description:
Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet
new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional
laughter and Radical Forgiveness. This combination is extremely potent
and effective. This dynamic practice energizes, enlivens and brings us
greater confidence. Laughing Yoga has many health benefits among which
are a boost in our immunity and lowering stress levels. Forgiveness is
an ability we can develop to renew our relationship with our self and
others. Laughter is a by-product of the joy and heightened sense of
interconnectedness.
events.print_description: Laugha Yoga is an ancient yet new idea of combining the practices of yoga,  prolonged intentional laughter and Radical Forgiveness.

events.title: Laughter Yoga
events.description: Start your evenings with the most intense laughter you can experience. We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
events.print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of a good, long laugh!

events.title: Lecture:  OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE
events.description: The threat of nuclear war, the next extinction level event, climate change and economic enslavement, all point to the unsustainability of our current trajectory. With all of humanity's advances, why can't we achieve peace and prosperity for all? The underlying cause of our failure might be gender inequity:  women are our most underutilized natural resource. Past societies which overcame war and poverty were governed similarly to ours, with one difference-- the existence of a fourth branch, consisting of post-menopausal women only. Following this historical precedent, how can we restore women's voice in government? And, can we do it in time?
events.print_description: The underlying cause of our failure to achieve peace/prosperity for all might be gender inequity:  women are our most underutilized natural resource.

We will be serving our infamous LiBeedo cocktails (mojitos with honey) along with several badass DJs dropping tasty beats for us to get our Buzz on! Our new sound system will blow your stinger off and there will be a dance-off so bee prepared! Wear black and yellow to bee VIB (Very Important BEE!), you'll definitely want to join our hive for the day! 

Drinks & dancing start at 2:00 PM, then we are off to Swarm to Man at 6:00 PM, where we will buzz unsuspecting burners and delight them with the sweetness of our spicy stingers! Last year we had more than 100 bees on the swarm, this year will be sure to be even larger! Come make history!

events.title: Life Coaching
events.description:
IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty.
Our coaches provide daily life coaching workshops and one-on-one coaching to the people of the playa. We are offering 30 minute sessions, Monday thru Saturday 12-4pm to help you sort out your life.
Whether it's finding a job you love, fixing your relationship, losing 30 pounds or simply being ready for the next exciting chapter in life, the work you will do with your coach will provide immediate inspiration, serious results and lasting knowledge.

Our Life Coaches have been through a rigorous training process and utilize The Handel Method, which is also the foundation of the work we teach at MIT, NYU and Stanford.

Together we dig deep, play big and don’t stop until goals are fulfilled and lessons learned. We care, we love what we do and we walk our talk.
events.print_description: IMAGINEnation is a camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. We are offering 30 minute sessions coaching sessions!

events.title: Life-Force Dynamic: An Exploration of Human Energy
events.description:
" An introduction to human energetic system and how the ancient mystical traditions of India, China, and Europe interweave to create the foundational elements for an integral spiritual practice - the control of the human vessel through postures (asana) + breath control (pranayama)  + mental focus (mantra). Includes 2-hour physical practice of Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn.

There will be an explanation of Traditional Indian Medicine (Yoga/Ayurveda) and Traditional Chinese Medicine (Qi Gong/Taoism), two ancient healing systems over 2000 years old. There will be an exploration on the difference between the Indian Hinduism (Polytheistic) & Chinese Taoism (Monotheistic) theories and how we can integrate these two philosophies into our daily spiritual practice to empower ourselves.

The discussion will then be followed by a 2 hour Yoga & Qi Gong class which will blend together the elements of ancient India (Yoga) and China (Qi Gong) to provide a dynamic moving meditation focused on providing a balance of both Yang (active) and Yin (passive) elements, that will conclude with a healing Yoga Nidra (conscious deep sleep) meditation - leaving you empowered, focused, and energized - ready for the burn and the new year. "
events.print_description: An introduction to human energetic system using Qigong & Yoga that will prepare you for the burn (bring a yoga mat or towel) with Matthew Winke.

Whatever you would like to share, this is the place, at Life Rulez Camp... we are eager to learn, listen, watch, and receive.

events.title: Live Music with Cello Joe!
events.description:
Joey Chang aka CelloJoe is the world's only beatboxing, long distance bicycling, looping cellist.  He is the wildest beatboxing cellist in the west. By combining cello with beatboxing, he has created a unique genre: Classical Hip Hop. 

CelloJoe records live on stage with a loop pedal and produces intricate tapestries of harmony, melody, and rhythm. His beatboxing (vocal percussion) and funky cello grooves form a rich soundscape for intelligent lyrics and his music spreads love, joy, laughter and conscious vibrations.

events.title: LNT Outreach /BLM Compliance Team Training
events.description: In 2013, Earth Guardians volunteered to go out with BLM staff with GPS's and cameras to specific spots in the city, checking for oil drips, grey water spills, black water spills and burn barrel problems. BLM was checking for permit violations and we were along as both LNT advisors and cultural ambassadors.  It's a great opportunity to have 'boots on the ground' and share LNT love and we’re doing it again this year!  This is a training for our volunteers on the team, and a meal will be provided for the training.

events.title: Longevity Stick
events.description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for an early hour of low impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 low-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, and vitality, and open your points and channels. Bring your water or hydration liquid. We’ll provide sticks for you. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of war of the North Vietnamese. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health through LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with the proviso that no trainer could ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, and the world.  See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
events.print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, clothes optional. 1 hr of lo impact exercise for balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We’ll provide the sticks!

events.title: Mead Workshop @ the BuzzInn
events.description: Buzzinn to the dHive bar and delight in humankind’s original ambrosia!  Mead is the oldest alcoholic beverage known to man & we aim to share with you how easy it is to make at home. A honey based wine, mead requires a very small investment on your part. The variations of style are endless as you can make mead with fruit, ciders, herbs, different kinds of honey, dry or sweet, (i.e. has remaining sugar),  bubbly, (like sparkling wine), or still. We will explain how to make it, where to get it, and even have demo equipment available. 21+ and over can sample different varieties we've made and brought to share. You will come away with an understanding of:   Early Discoveries of Mead,  Mead in Religion and Culture, & the Techniques of Making Mead: -Overall concepts that mixing water, honey and yeast starts a reaction to convert the sugars in the honey to alcohol and release carbon dioxide gas. -The equipment needed such as a 1, 3 or 5 gallon water bottles, airlocks, tubes to siphon off the mead from the ‘lees,’ (sediment at the bottom of the fermentation container), bottles, and a few other items such as cleanser to keep everything clean. -Selections of honey to make mead and how the type of honey influences the end result flavor and the same for yeast selection. -Selections of ‘adjuncts’ which influence the flavor of your mead: the addition of spices such as cloves or cinnamon (known as metheglin), or the addition of fruits such as raspberries or strawberry (melomel).  We will finish up with tasting different styles! Bzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz!
events.print_description: Get your Buzz-On @ the BuzzInn & learn the homemade mead (honey wine) making process & what you need to ferment your own.  Sample Cyser & Melomels.

events.title: Meet the Artists Tour Broadcast on BMIR 94.5 FM
events.description:
Coming at you directly from the Playa on BMIR - Burning Man Information Radio!

An "unholy" alliance between the ARTery and BMIR, the Meet the Artist Broadcast will be hosted by Diablo, Dazzle! & G-Spot.

There is a record amount of AMAZING Art this year and we're gonna tell you about SOME of it, while interviewing a FEW of the incredible artists who dreamt up and created these fantastic works.


You can turn in to BMIR 94.5 FM while on the Playa, stream on-line worldwide at http://www.BMIR.org/ or (best of all) come follow the tour on your bike!

Which Art Car to follow?

None other than The Queen of BRC: "Christina" and Captain Flipper. Just look on the Esplanade near the ARTery/BMIR for a gorgeous 58' yacht with blue "waves" on her hull.
http://bit.ly/ChristinaArtCar

Have you ever stopped and wondered about some of the art out on the playa, and thought:
"What the Fuck were they thinking!?!"

Now you might just find out . . .

All YOU have to do now on Thursday August 28th just before 11:00 a.m. is remember to:


TURN ON!
~Your radio

TUNE IN!
~To 94.5 FM on the Playa
(or stream on-line @ http://www.BMIR.org/)

or
DROP EVERYTHING
~You Dusty Burner & come follow us out into the desert on your bicycle . . .

Thanks!
Diablo

events.title: Memorial for Johnny "Irish" Considine
events.description: Johnny "Irish" Considine was a superb example of "hail fellow, well met."  His friends weren't surprised to discover that he was loved and admired by an extended sea of humanity and that is what we most hope to celebrate. Johnny was an integral member of the New York City Burning Man community and a loving "playa mama" to his campmates at Love Potion and Duck & Cover. We plan to toast him with a Happy Hour at Love Potion, then migrate to The Man, where some of his ashes will be in The Man's heart. From there, we will erect our memorial to him in The Temple and, finally, travel to deep playa to scatter his ashes at sunset. It will be festive and filled with joy, just as Johnny was. For us, it will be as if he is joining us on the playa one more time! Bring bikes and booze!
events.print_description: Join friends of Johnny Irish as we toast the man, visit The Man, erect our memorial in the Temple and scatter his ashes in deep playa.

events.title: Men's Authentic Personal Expression
events.description: I am a  woman who has focused herself over the last year on providing empowerment to already successful male entrepreneurs and thought leaders, supporting the purity of what legacy they leave behind by helping them with everything from how they deliver who they are to the world, to working out their heart and personal logistics, I have developed the "50 Points of Attractiveness" and tested it to success. I have 18 years coaching authentic self-expression, including 4 TEDx talks. 22 years studying people / human interaction via songwriting (and expressing my findings artfully). 28 years as a performer in various capacities, especially singing. In my career I've presented music and talks for over 100,000 people. Also, I've spent the last full year doing a deep dive into femininity/polarity studies. I am an advocate for men being empowered (especially as women claim their power more and more), and attaining the capacity to leave legacies. This includes knowing how to navigate matters of the heart. Overall, I really LOVE showing men how to feel happy and free professionally, publicly, and personally by learning how to express themselves authentically. So much of this revolves around a man's ability to limit drama and distraction in his life.
events.print_description: What is needed for men to be happy and free, personally, professionally, and publicly? 18-year Authentic Public Speaking coach reveals findings.

events.title: Midway Grand Opening Procession and Extravaganza
events.description:
When: Monday, August 31 from 5:45 - 9pm
Where: from Everywhere Pavilion to the Man

Come one, come all, step right up!  All are invited to the Grand Opening of the Midway! Engage with our global community and discover the exotic delights of our carnival sideshow around the Man.
The festivities will kick off with a grand parade procession starting at 5:45pm at the Everywhere Pavilion at 6:15 and Esplanade and leading into the Midway at the Man Base, where our opening party will begin at 6:15 pm. Performers of all stripes invited! Performances and shenanigans await!
events.print_description: Procession starts at 5:45pm at the Everywhere Pavilion, 6:15 and Esplanade and goes to the Midway at the Man Base, where our opening party goes til 9.

Games, face painting, henna tattoos, and fortune telling to name a few! Amuse you, abuse you, that’s our plan. Be naughty, not nice, you'll fit right in. The Mighty Misfits are all about the sin. Tuesday through Friday, 2:00 to 4:00

events.title: Mikkeller Running Club
events.description:
A special edition of Mikkeller Running Club for those attending Burning Man 2015.

Time is TBA as it will depend on weather conditions; dawn is most likely for health reasons. We will meet at The Lost Penguin Cafe at 4:00 & Arcade. Mikkeller beer(s) are TBA.

Distance is 5 km (~3.1 miles). If you have a shirt from your local chapter, bring it with you so we can take a nice photo for Mikkel Borg Bjergsø.

We get fit through running while enjoying delicious beer and food. Come join us. We are a club for everyone. Bring your friends.
events.print_description: We get fit through running while enjoying delicious beer and food. We are a club for everyone. Bring your friends. Distance is 5 km.

events.title: Military Madness Manplay
events.description: You can ask but you don't have to tell at Down Low Club, open 24/7 all week @ 7:45 & D. Tonight it’s real man-to-man action for adult Gay, Queer, Bi & Curious men with a military theme. Our discreet, enclosed, air-conditioned Army tent is fully outfitted for adult manplay. Wear your best camouflage, BDUs, 13-button pants if you like. Or not. Soldier? Sailor? Marine? Airman? Come live your "in the service" fantasy or re-live those manly military days from your past. From foxholes to flight decks, barracks to bulkheads it’s all here, men! Remember, what happens at Burning Man stays at Burning Man…
events.print_description: Gay/Queer/Bi/Curious adult men live Soldier, Sailor, Marine & Airmen memories/fantasies @ 7:45 & D in Down Low Club's discreet, enclosed manplay tent

events.title: Mindful Hatha Yoga with CC
events.description:
I woud like to instruct 90-minute yoga sessions with an intention of self-exploration. I do not see myself as a teacher, rather a facilitator who
supports other people's journeys. I allow people room to be present and feel into their bodies, in that each posture is held for an extended period of time. It is not about appearances, our neighbors, the next posture. Each session would include an intention of focus that I would explain before beginning. What is more than being present? Presence itself.
events.print_description: Back to the body: An Iyengar-inspired Hatha yoga class including pranayama (breath work). Both beginners and advanced practitioners welcome!

events.title: Mindful Touch

events.title: Mind Melt
events.description:
Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds and the peace only found within the receptive mind and experience of every thought, feelings, sensations, and level of awareness through corresponding brain wave patterns.

Mind machines change your perception by stimulating balanced, abundant neurotransmitter production, expanding neural pathways, and programming desirable, ecologically sound behaviors. The use of mind melting can enhance physical healing and homeostasis, intellectual performance, and greatly improved a sense of well-being, which allows one to See beauty where others do not, and a new perception of life that is the Future for all Mankind.

Remember; nothing really exists, it’s all in the electrons of your mind.
events.print_description: Mind Melt lets your mind be changed from Fear of the unknown, to finding Hope in the Future, by experiencing 3-D Images of lights and sounds.

events.title: Mindwerk
events.description:
Use your brain waves to control music and lights and play pong!!!

Did you know that the collective firing of millions of neurons in your brain can create electric potentials strong enough to be measured at your scalp? Do you care? Either way, come visit Mindwerk, put on some technically advanced and extremely attractive brain-interface headwear, and you can use your mind to control ambient drone music and a colorful lighting display, and to play the video game pong! All brains are welcome!
events.print_description: Use your brain waves to control ambient drone music and colorful lights, and to play the video game pong. All brains welcome!

events.title: Mirror Movie Mashup and Popcorn by Liminal Labs
events.description:
Do you wish there were some middle-of-the-night place where you could grab a seat and let your mind be doubly warped? Liminal Labs has you covered! After dark, all night long starting at 9:15, Tuesday through Friday, we invite you to Mirror Movie Mashup, where daring cinephiles grab a seat and watch TWO movies at once on our luxurious 53 foot wide double screen / trailer! Think of it, BARBARELLA & LOGAN’S RUN! THE HUNGER & ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE! DUMBO & CAROUSEL! REPO MAN & PULP FICTION! ESCAPE FROM NEW YORK & THE WARRIORS! STAR WARS & STAR TREK! Or talk us into showing your own mirrored movie picks from our extensive roster of fine films, tv shows and ridiculous youtube videos. All this and free popcorn, too!  No playa cinephile will walk away unsatisfied.  A roster of movie pairings is available at: http://www.zorca.com/liminallabs/mirrormovies or goo.gl/pJy4Fh

Also, do mornings on the playa find you a little dazed and hazy? From 11AM-1PM on Tuesday - Saturday, we happily throw open the Liminal Pharmakon where you are invited to choose from an apothecary menu full of salubrious nostrums, elixirs and vitamin-rich restoratives.
events.print_description: All night long starting 9:15 T-F, let your mind be doubly warped watching 2 movies at once (i.e. Barbarella vs. Logan's Run). Schedule: goo.gl/pJy4Fh

events.title: More Carrot - Black Rock City's Farmers Market
events.description: One of the best parts of exploring any city is checking out the farmer’s market- and Black Rock City is no exception! At More Carrot Farmer’s Market you can nourish yourself and your crew on a wide array of fresh fruits and vegetables sourced from local farms on the outskirts of Reno and Sparks. Come eat your fill of the foods your ancestral human family has been enjoying for millions of years!
events.print_description: How long has it been since you've had a vegetable? All week? Come to More Carrot to nourish yourself on a wide array of fresh fruits and vegetables.

events.title: More than just one word on Plastics
events.description: Plastics: we love them and hate them. Rebecca Braslau, organic chemistry professor at UC Santa Cruz, will discuss the history of plastics, what they are made of, health, environmental and societal issues, and exciting developments in emerging biosustainable and biodegradable plastics.
events.print_description: Rebecca Braslau, Org Chem Prof, UC Santa Cruz, will discuss the history of plastics, their chemistry, issues and exciting biosustainable plastics!

events.title: Morning Calm Meditation with Jhana
events.description: Unlock the heart, the mind and begin your playa day with us.  Jhana will lead a morning meditation session based on True Meditation by Adya Shanti from the Bay area.   This is a meditation method that honors primordial silence that is within us.  No fancy mantras or visualization techniques or lotus position required.  All we need is our sincerity and willingness to close our eyes, breathe and surrender.  We will dive deeply into the collective silence allowed by the group and gain new perspectives and vantage points in life.  Come join us and let go of the things and ourselves that hindered us.
events.print_description: Unlock the heart, the mind, and begin your playa day with us.

events.title: Moving Meditation Contemplative Dance
events.description:
Dancing with the Mind of Meditation
This Contemplative Dance workshop offers you an introduction to a variety of movement meditation techniques. We'll sense and feel the way that energy moves through the body with Qi Gong practice. We'll explore somatic training and the Body/Mind practices of Developmental Movement and Experiential Anatomy. We'll investigate our relationship to form, space, and each other through Viewpoints Space Awareness and Mudra Space Awareness. 

This class is a laboratory where we'll be working with the energy that animates our bodies. We'll be exploring how energy moves when the body moves and how mind can direct energy. We'll learn to harness the power of the breath and focus of the mind to attain higher performance outcomes.

The work is toward attaining a greater depth of expression of personal energy, achieving grace and ease in a variety of movement patterns, developing an equanimity of all body parts as initiators and supporters of movement in space, and gaining the ability to dance ecstatically with great amounts of energy without loss of awareness of where you are and what is around you. 

Everyone is welcome from dancers seeking to bring contemplation into their dance - to those wishing to bridge their sitting practice to their walking meditation practice to the rest of their active lives - to people who have never danced or meditated before.
events.print_description: An introduction to Mind/Body practices. Sensing Feeling and Action. Experiencing the body. Qi Gong energy work. Space Awareness.

events.title: Mushrooms as Allies for Surviving
events.description: Paul Stamets will put the co-evolution of fungi and life on this planet into perspective and unveil the research that he and his team have conducted which makes a strong case that, by pairing with our fungal friends, we can restore habitats, clean water, support and renew foodwebs, and strengthen ecosystems at a time when habitats and humans are in collision.

events.title: Music as Spirit Quest
events.description: Music, whether experienced as player or listener, can be one of the most powerful modes we have of knowing and expressing the self. In this workshop, we will come together as players, listeners, and human beings to lift our hearts in song. One musician will share his relationship with music as a practice of self-exploration and invite others to share what it means to them. The result will be a mix of song and dialogue -- ideally, a union of the two. No musical experience necessary, just an open mind and heart!
events.print_description: As the sun sets over the playa, we'll lift our hearts in song as one musician shares his relationship with music as a practice of self-exploration.

events.title: Mutant Alternative Vehicles – bikes, scooters, etc
events.description: Did you know there are only 550 Mutant Vehicle licenses issued? What’s everyone else who can’t pull off an art car supposed to do? The next best thing that doesn’t need a license is a human-electric powered hybrid on 2-3 wheels. Gas scooters and electric with no human power are allowed, as long as they are stock, so they can’t be mutated. Burners are making amazing mutations with bikes and trikes. In this session, we’ll hear from some makers who stand out. This is a great way to learn how to hack your own mutant bike or alternative vehicle for next year.
events.print_description: Join us to explore how alternative transportation for the Playa is sourced and made. The hacks, engineering and technology behind it all. Show off!

events.title: Naked Oil Wrestling
events.description:
Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. It’s also one of humanity’s oldest and was among the major events of the original Olympics. Long before we were kicking balls around we were rolling around in the dirt, putting each other in headlocks! It doesn’t matter if you’re a complete novice who’s never tried it in your life or an experienced fighter, come along and experience this amazing bonding experience in Gymnasium, Black Rock City’s Ancient Greek wrestling school (7:30 Portal).

We will start warming up and a workshop on wrestling basics at 10:30. This will be followed by competitions starting at 11:30. Participants will be provided showers at another camp.
events.print_description: Wrestling workshop followed by oil wrestling competitions, in the buff like in the original Olympics. Great bonding experience and exercise!

events.title: Naked Philosophy
events.description:
Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, on reflection, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion? To be naked in 21st century western society demands intense self-examination, the questioning and reappraisal of conventional conventions and morality. In this sense, naturism, as the cultural and political movement of nudism is often known, is an inherently philosophical practice. 

And what better way to do philosophy than naked? We’re sure your college seminars would have been much more fun nude.

Come and join us for lively discussions, debates and story-telling. We’ll be discussing naturism, body image, sharing experiences, debating body modification, if and how laws should be changed – really everything related to the human body.
events.print_description: Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion?

events.title: Naked Piggy-Back and Barrel-Run Race
events.description:
Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you'll have to bear them on your back, bareback... or vice versa. Great bonding experience guaranteed!
The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) PS In ancient Olympics this would have been an equestrian event, but BMORG wouldn't let us bring horses...
events.print_description: Bare with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you'll have to bear them on your back... or vice versa

events.title: Naked Presence
events.description: As a group we will take off our clothing and leave any and all body shame behind.  A time for acceptance and non-sexual enjoyment of the human body.

events.title: Naked Pub Crawl
events.description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with icy libations prepared exclusively for the riders. This year’s host camps will be Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Duckpond, Cubhouse, Gaylactic Village, and Celestial Bodies, culminating in a legendary afterparty at Comfort & Joy hosted by a team of talented bartenders wearing nothing but hospitality. If you’re willing to meet the dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the playa. We aren’t making a statement or pushing an agenda; we’re just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends.  Oh yeah, and we’re naked.  Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
events.print_description: The name says it all. Host camps will have bartenders and icy cocktails waiting exclusively for us. Mugs for the first 500 riders. Our 12th Year!

events.title: Naked Sensual Body Painting
events.description:
Want to color up? Come by our colorful RV, brush and finger paint up any and every part of your and your friends bodies with body and MOOP safe paint.

We humans come in so many flavors, with such awesome variety! Join us as we decorate our bodies and visually proclaim who we are. With just a few splashes (daubs) of colorful paint, our living canvases become incredible expressions of our unique version of “human”, our personal “performance art.” Its a delight for the senses - especially touch - feeling brush or finger strokes over your skin can be a very sensual experience.

We will offer printed photo postcards to send a picture of your body art home to your friends, family or yourself as a fun memory.

events.title: Navigating Altered States & Ayahuasca
events.description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
events.print_description: Meriana will share tools on navigating altered states of consciousness & Aya which will enrich your psychonautic tool kit & empower your inner shaman.

events.title: "Now we dance! Now we fight" Dance/Fight! Party!
events.description:
Come dance, (pillow) fight, and dance again on rapid rotation to high-energy flamenco according to the whims of our Dancefightmeister B Riles! Also, drinks during intermissions. 

It started with a vision. A vision of Germans in a slightly alternate dimension. A dimension where the only way to dance to German techno was under the strict supervision of a leader. The leader would announce "And now we dance!" and they dance dance dance, only to be followed by "And now we fight!" whereupon a raging fist fight would break out. Soon enough, the leader barks "And now we dance!", fists are dropped, and they stomp dance once more. 

It was a very silly vision. And now we bring this vision to you. Join us and alternate between internal states of joy and (joyful) rage as rapidly as we alternate between dancing and (pillow) fighting. Pillows provided.
events.print_description: Come dance, (pillow) fight, and dance again on rapid rotation to high-energy flamenco according to the whims of our Dancefightmeister!. Also, drinks.

events.description: Stillness is an illusion, we are constantly moving at an atomic level.  Release your cosmic dancer with long flow vinyasa set to music.  These sequences are challenging but accessible, requiring you to leave your thoughts and mind at the door and become free to explore a sense of BEING in the moment.  Our mind has the capacity to limit our potential, are spirit the potential to set us free!
events.print_description: Stillness is an illusion, we are constantly moving at an atomic level.  Release your cosmic dancer with long flow vinyasa set to music.

events.title: NurtureDance
events.description: Nurturedance is a movement form that provides methods for making safe, loving, and nurturing connections between people. By holding, rocking, and cradling each other, a direct path is formed to deep and visceral experiences of nurturance. Some of the movements we do induce mutual trance states by using repetitive circular motion. A hug that evolves into a spiral that is so safe and supported that we enter graceful states of consciousness. If you are looking for ways to enhance your relationship with your partner, this may be useful. Relating in non-verbal, non-linear fashion can have an effect of breaking through barriers of relating on new and different levels. People report that using these methods deepens and re-invigorates their relationship.
events.print_description: Make safe, loving and nurturing connections in dance by holding, rocking and cradling eachother

events.title: Open Dungeon Play
events.description: we're very excited as this will be Playfully Yours 14th year on the playa. We have expanded our play area with more than doubling the size. We offer an outdoor play area, a covered open area, and new to our camp, an enclosed area offering privacy out of sight from passerbyers. We invite everyone but especially beginners and those curious about BDSM play to come and play in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment to learn and experience dungeon play. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, more sensual, and playful side of BDSM. The dungeon is well equipped with 3 St Andrews Crosses, a seated cross, 2 benches, a kneeling spanking/flogging bench, a standing spanking/flogging bench, a suspension station, 2 padded saw horses, a standing/kneeling stock, an 8' chain spider web, and a petting cage. We offer several toys to come and experience and play with such as feathers, a variety of floggers, paddles, crops, pinwheels, fur gloves, and a violet wand. Our personnel are available to provide instruction and demonstration on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise all play. We also have a lounge area where you can relax and meet our campmates while checking out our camp. The lounge has a spanking bike, a corn hole bean bag game, lounge chairs, a mini bar serving our cherry bombs for those over 21 years old with id, as well as, a spinning wheel to facilitate participation.  There are also daily scheduled classes with demonstrations and audience participation. We'll have an Intro Into Dungeon Play and a Shibari Sexy Body Rope Tying classes. We also have gifting of collars, paddles and patches. Our hours accommodate those coming in an play both day and night, generally from noon to about 3 am.
events.print_description: Open dungeon play. We expanded our dungeon play area and equipment and can provide instruction, supervision, and facilitate play in a safe environment

events.title: Opening the Third Eye
events.description:
Clairvoyance (clear vision) is a natural soul talent. Most people spend a good deal of energy trying to ignore the images that flood their internal screens, clutter their minds and stir up their emotions. But throughout the ages, there will always be creative people who practice opening the third eye in order to see into the depths of this world and to explore other dimensions. Craig will teach powerful ways of opening up one's awareness to higher vision to receive insight and to shine with healing light.
This workshop will offer practical techniques for developing an enhanced ability to see psychically while being supported by intuitive sensing, the inner voice, and sensory feelings for verification. You will also learn methods for seeing energy, viewing facial changes that reveal past lives, perceiving spiritual beings, and gazing into a portal to higher dimensions - all with your eyes wide open. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
events.print_description: If your third eye hasn't opened any by Friday, then maybe we should pry it open...or Craig's approach is gentler - and more effective ;-)

events.title: Opening your Heart
events.description:
A powerful mini-workshop with Craig Junjulas. Just as opening the third eye center can bring about amazing positive changes in a person’s personal and spiritual life, the act of opening the heart center can bring about an increase in understanding, compassion, empathy, self healing and enlightenment. An open heart allows you to feel protected without shutting down your emotions or closing yourself off to others. By expanding your heart and filling your aura with light, you are actually more protected and more open to the higher frequencies in any environment. Metaphysical techniques and energy demonstrations for bringing the body, mind and spirit into heart centeredness will be offered. 
www.higherselfdiscovery.com

events.title: Open Relationships as a Path of Love and Truth
events.description:
This workshop will explore how open relationships can be way to transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth. 

Many people in relationships struggle to reconcile their Love for each other and desire for deep partnership with their desire for the Freedom to connect intimately with others. The default model for relationship in our society, monogamy, makes explicit the underlying belief that Freedom and Love exist in opposition with each other.

But what if our desire for Freedom in relationship is covering a deeper desire, namely that we want to know, and be assured, that we can speak and honor our deepest Truths, and Desires, even, and especially, while in we are in Loving committed partnerships. So what if, instead of talking about Freedom, we talked how to create a relationship where it's safe to speak our Truths, including all of our desires (even for others), and know that we will still be Loved?

Join us for a conversation about how open relationships can be created from a place deep Love and commitment to Truth.
events.print_description: This workshop will explore how open relationships can transform the opposition between Freedom and Love into the mutual support of Love and Truth.

events.title: OUR FUTURE IS FEMALE
events.description:
The threat of nuclear war, the next extinction level event,
catastrophic climate change, corporate compromise of our
food supply, and economic enslavement, all point to the
unsustainability of our current trajectory. With all of
humanity's advances, why can't we achieve peace and
prosperity for all? The underlying cause of our failure might
be gender inequity: women are our most underutilized natural
resource. Past societies which overcame war and poverty
were governed similarly to ours, with one difference-- the
existence of a fourth branch, consisting of post-menopausal
women only. Following this historical precedent, how can we
restore women's voice in government? And, can we do it in
time?
events.print_description: How Women (and men) Will Save the World

events.title: Party Naked and Get Lei'd
events.description: Party Naked Tiki Bar is a clothing optional bar returning to the Playa for our seventh year to provide “Tiki Punch” libations to thirsty Black Rock City citizens 21 and over. You must be 21 or over to Party here and we do ask for and check ID's (it's always good to carry your ID while at Burning Man). We start the mornings with Bloody Mary's at 9:00am until we run out. We then dispense our "Tiki Punch" (yes, it has a punch) well into the night. Nudity is never required but at Party Naked Tiki Bar it is rewarded. This year we have 1800+ hand painted commemorative leis to give to citizens that "do it" (get naked). Make sure to come by early and get lei'd. We promote a no pressure relaxed atmosphere where you can get naked or not. Nude is not lewd so uninvited touching is prohibited. Come by for a cool drink where you can sit and chat or meet new people. Enjoy our classic rock atmosphere music and a little shade in the heat of the day. Be LNT friendly and bring your own cup please.

events.title: PEDALBUMP Derby Races under the BIG TOP
events.description:
RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. 

Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT!

 Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races!

PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. 

We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa!
events.print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP demolition Derby "Races" under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

Voted #1 comfort food at the Burning Man event 21 years running, Pedal Pies are celebrating their 2nd year on Playa, and firmly believe in the following 3 principles of the event: Look good, have fun, profit.

events.title: Perceptual Modulation and Prosthetic Environments

TEPEs use perceptual modulation, radical translation and human-AI teaming and have the potential to allow autistic individuals to become more independent, and the neuro-typical to better understand the unique and amazing minds of the neurally diverse.

events.title: Pinhole Project
events.description:
The Pinhole Project exposes 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper. We work with 12 pinhole cameras, created out of 50-gallon cardboard barrels. This size is uniquely suited for capturing the incredible scale and immense diversity of art and culture at Black Rock City. 

Under the red safelights of the darkroom, photosensitive paper is inserted into the camera body. Exposures range from 40 to 300 seconds, where concentrated beams of sunlight are funnelled through the pinhole and into the camera, creating a negative image of the recorded subject.

We maintain a desert darkroom in a shipping container, where we gather to processes, develop and fix about one hundred photographs each Burning Man. These unique images are then exhibited in Illumination Village, Center Camp Cafe, and off-playa.

The pinhole camp has been creating large-scale portraits with festival participants since 1999. The pinhole came about of the desire of four first time participants to contribute in a unique and lasting way to the ephemeral pleasures of the playa.

As we have grown, so too has our belief that this device is the reason that we make our annual pilgrimage. As we have evolved, so too has the camera, not only in functional and technical capabilities but also in its role as a seed of meaningful engagement with other participants.
events.print_description: Come and join the Pinhole Project expose huge 30 x 40 inch sheets of light sensitive gelatin silver paper in 50 gallon cameras.

events.title: Ploetry I & II
events.description:
Come meet the artists AND create next year's Ploem. Ploetry is inspirational prose cut out from planks of wood, hung from a 5-sided city-shaped tower, with color-changing backlight and custom seating. This year there are two towers, "I Am But Wood", a poem written from the point of view of the Man, and "Voice of the Temple", written from the point of view of the Temple. Next year, we want to add more Ploems, scattered as Easter Eggs around the Playa. Forms available to write and submit your own ploem 24 hours a day, and we'll post it on the Ploetry website.
Write a ploem, build an installation, or both - we'll show you how. This is a workshop - all building is done off-season, off-playa. But take your inspiration to write your Ploem while in Black Rock City! *** Please note that this event takes place at the tower in the Cafe, not the tower on the open playa. *** MWF 11-noon, TT 5pm-6m, in the large Ploetry installation in Center Camp Cafe.
events.print_description: Ploetry (Playa Poetry) is cut from planks of wood hung from a backlit tower. Meet the artists, join the team, write next year's "ploem". In the cafe.

One is in the cafe, the other on the open playa. Next year, we want to add more Ploems, scattered as Easter Eggs around the Playa. Forms, clipboards, and pens and a submission box available to write and submit your own ploem 24 hours a day.

events.title: Polyamory – Does this really work?
events.description:
Two Globe traveling 5 Rhythms and Tantra teachers who are widely practiced in the poly lifestyle come together to share their highlights, low lights, what they have learned along the way and what they wish they had not!

Come learn some pro tips and bring your questions. This is about sharing and listening to each other. We are all figuring this out and doing the best we can. Eugene & Mackenzie are as eager to talk about the challenges as they are to share in the joys.

We will have a little movement exercise to ground into presence in our bodies, as that is the best way to open to the true questions which reflect our heart's yearning and fears.

This will be a thoughtful, provocative and fun gathering. Let us learn from each other and in the end open to the possibility of more love, however it looks for us individually.
events.print_description: Let's talk about Polyamory - Come listen, learn some pro tips & have YOUR questions answered! Bring your curiosity and let us learn together!

events.title: Poly High Tea
events.description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
events.print_description: All you Polyamorous-poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues.

events.title: Poni Brendan Rockin On The Playa
events.description:
Female singer songwriter direct from Maui, playing upbeat funky tunes about love, partying, and living a semi normal life on planet earth. Poni Brendan approaches the guitar with a commanding attitude, while her femininity comes through in the raw truth, of her lyrics. From her personal love songs, to her thoughts of the world and its political turmoil. "Brendan has the ability to weave in and out of different styles not binding her to any one particular genre".

"Rarely do we find a female artist with both voice, and rhythm, who is also as prolific a songwriter."

events.title: Proper Fire Safety Discussion
events.description:
Some things really should be proper... stop by Camp Proper (7:15 and D) at 2pm on Monday for a short "Fire Safety" discussion. Want to learn what to wear before lighting up those new poi? Come on by! Want the best answer to the age old question -- my friend just lit someone on fire with his Dragon Staff, what should I do? We can help! Want to learn some tips on how to spin out properly on the playa? Or, here's an often-asked question: how far should I stand from my dip bucket while smoking? We've got you covered!

This will be an informal discussion and might be especially useful to those who are new to the fire arts.

High Intensity Interval Training involves doing 8 to 10 bodyweight exercises, 20 to 30 seconds each, at maximum performance level.  It is excellent for building athletic capacity and strength, improving metabolism, and burning fat.  Plus, with our sweet playlist of rockin' jams, this 30 minute workout will get you rocked and pumped!  Bring water, stay hydrated!

events.title: Raving Stick Workshop At The Castle
events.description:
Have you ever been at a festival and looked on in awe as some guy raves to his heart’s content while carrying a glittery lampshade on a stick? Maybe it was a branch of a tree with a piece of tinsel wrapped around it? Possibly you’ve been mesmerized by one of those floating jellyfish on Burn Night?

Well – if the jellyfish is your thing then you probably need to come back for the advanced class next year. But random objects hanging from sticks covered in lights and glittery things… that’s totally our thing! That, my friend, is what we call a “raving stick” and no self-respecting raver should venture out onto the playa at night without one.

Come for an interactive, playa punch-infused lesson in the art of raving stick making, featuring group discussions and plenty of one on one time with our experienced teachers. We’ll round off the afternoon with a delightful presentation on the history of the raving stick - you simply won’t believe some of the famous names you’ll hear!

Raving stick materials will be provided on the day by Celtic Chaos, but attendees are more than welcome to bring along their own personal additions. And the best part is that each person gets to leave with the raving stick that they make... but not until they partake in a collective stick-shaking rave-off inside The Castle!
events.print_description: Raving stick: the art of hanging colorful objects on a stick and proceeding to rave. Come play make and do, drink punch and then rave in The Castle!

Now is the time to reclaim the power of our sexuality, to reconnect with our feminine sensuality and to offer ourselves the gift of deep pleasure and embodiment.
events.print_description: Reconnect with the power of your sensuality and sexual embodiment through a series of guided movements and offerings. Women only.

events.title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans!!!
events.description: Black Rock City is a "Pack It In, Pack It Out", Leave No Trace city. There are no trash cans or recycling bins. You are responsible for disposing of waste properly. Do you want to reduce the amount of recycling you will have to pack out? Start by bringing all of your beverages in aluminum cans. Follow that by separating your your aluminum cans and other recyclables from any landfill trash. Bring your aluminum cans to Black Rock City Recycle Camp. We are located in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. The camp is "Open" and ready to accept your aluminum cans Monday through Sunday, 9am to 5pm. Bring your clean, separated aluminum cans only. We definitely don't want your trash. We do not accept any other recyclables, you can take them to one of the 24 hour recycling stations on your way back to Reno, check out your Survival Guide for more information. We provide a sorting area to check your cans for anything that isn't aluminum. You can ride the bike powered can crusher and crush your cans. After your cans get crushed, you will put your crushed cans into the large containers at the camp. All proceeds from the aluminum are donated to the Gerlach K-12 School in Gerlach, NV. Come join in the fun while doing a good thing for the planet and Black Rock City..!!!
events.print_description: Recycle Camp is in Center Camp at 6:00, directly behind the Cafe. We are open & excited to accept your aluminum cans 9am to 5pm Monday through Friday.

events.title: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP
events.description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH! Or Neither. Several Riders PEDAL AND DRIVE head-to-head around a 60 x 90 foot track under the gorgeous CIRCUS TENT with LIGHTS, MUSIC and ANNOUNCERS! Our BUMPER CARTS are custom designed and one-of a kind! It's like driving your own personal pedal powered art car for 3 minutes or however long you last. The TENT is a SHADY OASIS in the DAY and a LIT-UP BEACON of fun at NIGHT! Winners of each race are determined by a mysterious mix of whatever the announcers at the time deem worthy. Is it the number of rear end or T-bone collisions you make happen? or maybe how many crashes you nimbly avoid with expert driving skills. Or maybe your winning attitude. Or your crazy costume. Maybe you cross the finish line first. Maybe you cross it last or not at all. You might still be a WINNER. We're betting on it! KIDS tall enough to pedal are welcome. Adults of ALL AGES brave or timid welcome. ALL Spectators welcome too! Come into the center ring and heckle your friends in the races! PEDALING is FUN but BUMPING is EVEN BETTER! Seriously, the bumpers keep you safe and you will laugh your ass off with every bump, crash, skid or pass. We also welcome volunteers who want to help with PIT CREW duties! Wrangle the crowds, heckle the riders, keep the pedal carts repaired. Sign up for our newsletter on our FB page or just stop by anytime we are live on Playa! GUEST HOST CREWS SCHEDULED: GATE  CREW is Representing on Tuesday night. MYSTIKAL MISFITS are representing on Wednesday night!
events.print_description: RED NOSE DISTRICT presents PEDALBUMP Demolition Derby Races under the Big Top Circus tent. Is it a race? Is it a demolition derby? IT's BOTH!

events.title: Relating from Our True Nature
events.description:
Relating from Our True Nature

This workshop is designed to be simultaneously deep and playful. We begin with a deep dive into our truth—our true nature—which is simply a letting go and a knowing of who we always already are, beyond our ideas about ourselves and others: a simple direct undeniable knowing of our clear deep heart-mind-being. 
We will ground ourselves in this present moment and connect with our higher self and cultivate our intentions, desires, and wishes for the night.
Using movement, stillness, and humor we bring awareness and acceptance to ourselves and our conditioning.
Through simple spontaneous body movements you embody and express your truth(s) and your true being. 
Finally we move into connecting and relating with each other while staying connected with our self. This process will be facilitated with some simple relating exercises and is a chance to see through our ego and conditioned habitual ways of relating and being. We invite a sense of humor to simply seeing ourselves and the conscious and unconscious games we play. 
Bringing awareness to our patterns opens the possibility of playing with them and responding from our clear deep heart mind space, rather than reacting. Respond from awareness rather than react from habits. We live from our true nature rather than our conditioning. We dance.
events.print_description: Dive deep into your true Self beyond thoughts, words and emotions.Learn to live and relate from your truths and stop identifying with fear/lack.

events.title: Release Breathing Exercise
events.description:
Let the shade and soft music melt away the stresses of the week. We will move us through a relaxation exercise to help us gain ultimate relaxation. 
Experiencing this exercise in your birthday suit is amazing but we do understand that not everyone is comfortable that way. You will not be turned away for wearing clothing to class!
Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!
events.print_description: Move through a group breathing exercise that will help take you reach ultimate relaxation. Please bring your own pillow & sheet if desired.

events.title: Release from Bondage of Self
events.description: Bondage of Self is being a slave to the ego chatter and narrative.  It isn't even you.  It may be a part of a False Self generated long ago so you could 'be good'. Learn ways to gain release from this sad story line and be ultra present and the person you really are under all that fear.
events.print_description: Bound to an inner narrative that isn't any fun, puts you down, says you cant or why bother? Or need to 'be good'? Come learn how to kick this shit.

events.title: Releasing Energy Blocks
events.description:
Develop your own methods for releasing old energy patterns in your subconscious mind, aura and physical body. Craig Junjulas shares techniques for gradually releasing the compressed energy that blocks us from our higher potential. Advanced souls, star people, wisdom seekers, light workers, consciousness explorer, burners (or whatever creative people are called these days) brought down an abundance of past life talents (merit) at birth. Needing to hide these spiritual powers from society, they also brought down problems from the past lives, and chose childhood experiences, to block and hide these powers until ready to use them level-by-level. 

www.higherselfdiscovery.com
events.print_description: By Weds night, you'll be ready to let go of some stuff...Craig will help you to release energy blocks that are no longer serving you :-)

events.description:
An innovative blend of Hathaway Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual through the art of women's vitality practices using yogic principles.

RITUAL MOVEMENT ARTS (R.M.A) With Aradia Sunseri
An innovative blend of Hatha Yoga, Temple Fusion Belly Dance & Ritual Theatre. 

We will explore the art of women’s vitality practices 
focused on:
~Creating, cultivating & nurturing your personal practice: 
~Inner yoga’s 
~ Temple Fusion Belly dance
~Breathe work
~Meditation
~Mudras
~Isolations, drills,Layering
~Theatrical presence, flourishes

Focusing on dancing from the core. Opening the body with yogic principles to deepen your connection to your dance. With presence fluidity and slinky theatrical moves. Exploring intricate mudras, and choreography while activating the creative soul seat of each individual’s personal transformative power. Tune in with your inner archetypal energy and the art of storytelling through the eyes, hips, & heart. These vitality practices offer connection to ones own essence and cultivate enjoyment of the body in motion while sharing in a community of sisterhood.

events.description:

Create your own unique blend of coffee from our selection of international Playa-roasted coffee, grind your beans, and enjoy it served pour-over style.  Sit, relax and chill with friends new and old in our Arabian-inspired coffee house lounge. 
We will be roasting coffee at various times during the week so you won't find a fresher cup of coffee in BRC, or anywhere!!!  
If you would like, please join in and help us roast our next batch of Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux Playa-blend.  Ask about coming by and roasting your own on-the-Playa beans to bring back to the default world (a little Playa dust is the secret ingredient!), or help us gift coffee to the burners who serve our community.  
In the LNT (Leave No Trace) spirit, please remember to bring your own cup.  Or you may have to play a special carnival game to "earn" one...

events.title: Rootist Yoga Practice
events.description:
"What is Rootism?" My response to this in short: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs. These truths are different for everyone based on how they we raised and what we resonate with at the time of our learning. As a Rootist, we take the roots of various truths and incorporate them into our own mantra, our own way of living, to become the well rounded person that we wish to be. When you resonate with more than one truth, you are a Rootist. There are many different types of Rootist's. You could be a Christian Rootist, a Buddhist Rootist, or any type of Rootist. The moment you resonate with more than one truth & take the roots of those teachings as your truths, you become a Rootist.

Rootism is a lesson that I have learned and come to resonate with over the last few years. I am grateful to share this information with each of you. Please feel free to share this with anyone with whom you feel might be interested.

As an offset of Rootism, we have The Rootist's Way. A style of yoga that is in-tentful in it's design and sequences to help to facilitate a certain type of energy clearing and calling in of new energies.

Thank you for reading this and for wanting to know more about Rootism.

The 8 Principles of Rootism:

∞Principles of Rootism™

1. Release what no longer serves - nurture yourself & ground yourself
2. Embrace a Creative Vision
3. Move forward on your journey -Take Steps Fearlessly
4. Empathize and Feel what is going on within you & others
5. Motivate yourself & others by Truth – Check the Ecology of the Whole
6. Bridge the Mind & the Heart
7. Evolve a Pro-Sociality Lifestyle & Manifest a Greater Humanity - help others and give back
8. Revolutionize - Reveal Yourself! Open UP! Inner Knowing is Outer Showing

The acronym is "Remember"
events.print_description: Rootism is a belief that the truth of our learned existence lies in the Roots of all teachings/truths and beliefs.

events.title: Root the Body, Release Ego, Ignite Power
events.description: Gift yourself the opportunity to flow through Burning Man from a place of groundedness, liberation and power. By tapping into the vulnerabilities experienced within our bodies, we can discover where pain and triggers are stored by the ego, allowing for us the ability to see them for what they are, liberate ourselves from them, and fully fill them with the light and power already existing within us. Release your greatest self out onto the playa through guided touch, divine creation and ecstatic movement.

events.description:
A practical guide to the shortest path to your higher self through the loving (and sometimes critical) eyes of your beloved.

Learn how to use romantic love to unwind and heal your historical pain (and your partners) to reveal your true self - more magnificent than you currently have the capacity to imagine - and dissolve the boundaries between purpose and money, sex and creativity, partnership and self, and unleash the power of dyadic leadership (using duality the way it was designed to be used!)

events.title: Salacious Saturday Happy Afternoon
events.description:
Every day is a celebration! Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun. We’ll will be quenching your champagne thirst with a noon-3:00 happy afternoon. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski. 

SATURDAY: Come help us drink the rest of our booze. We ain’t carryin’ it home! Champagne and shotskis til the well runs dry. Bring your own cup!

events.title: SALON, a call to artist & art appreciators!
events.description: The event is conducted in an open-mic format. All types of art are invited, including but limited to: song, dance, poetry, storytelling, visual art.. Dont make art or don't feel like sharing? Come join in the fun!! Voyerism is participation. <3 intents

events.title: Salty Prom and Teen Pregnancy Practice Party
events.description:
By day Salty’s is your favorite neighborhood dive bar, but on Wednesday night things will get naughty-cal. The central dance floor will transform into a sea of grooving bodies at the inaugural Enchantment Under The Sea Party. You’ll enjoy our selection of cocktails at Salty Jack’s Oily Rig served up by the seamen and mermaids while DJs will be flooding the sound system with everything from midtempo breakbeat & electronic funk to classic soul, house & reggae. 

Stop by the on board “Bootie Bar” at Camp Salty where you make your own pearl necklace, or give one to that special someone (while supplies last). We’ve done the dirty work by digging up that rusty underwater treasure chest all you have to do is don your favorite seafoam bras and fish gill suits and get ready to go deep.
events.print_description: Things will be getting naughty-cal at Salty 's inaugural Enchantment Under The Sea Party! Join us for salty cocktails, groovy DJs & Bootie Bar treats

events.title: Salvador Dali Llama Live Psychedelic-Pop Band
events.description: Salvador Dali Llama is a psych-pop group from Sydney that formed in 2014 over a mutual love of wizard capes and Aretha Franklin. SDL have a reputation for a face melting live set and an eclectic mish mash of dreamy psych pop, gospel soul harmonies and eyeball spinning kraut jams. Whatever your vibe, SDL will help you float upstream.
events.print_description: Salvador Dali Llama: dreamy psych pop, gospel soul harmonies and eyeball spinning kraut jams. Whatever your vibe, SDL will help you float upstream!

events.title: Samba Stilt Circus Sunset Jams at JankyTown
events.description:
Catch our sunset jams everyday. Samba Stilt Circus is back at Jankytown this year. JankyTown is an all-artist live-music and circus-arts village consisting of Samba Stilt Circus, Cirque du Cliché, Fou Fou Ha, and Ministry of Flow.  

This year we will feature a mobile stage epic art car - the Jankasaurus!!!   Catch our sunset almost jams everyday near the Esplanade (7ish) as well as roving live music and performance art. If we're not at camp, look for us on the Esplanade (around 7ish).
events.print_description: Catch our sunset jams everyday. If we're not at camp, look for us on the Esplanade (around 7ish), or on our mobile stage, The Jankasaraus.

events.print_description: Come get your spin on - For all fire dancers to come make use of our interactive dance space! All props welcome, Please, bring your own fuel.

events.title: Saving the Planet
events.description: Earth is losing over 27,000 species per year in rain forest habitats alone. Globally there may be over 100,000 species sent to the brink every year. This isn’t because of planetary forces; this is because of us. There is one simple thing everyone can do, or else humans will take the whole world down.
events.print_description: Between 27,000 and 100,000 species are going extinct each year. There is a simple solution that every person can participate in.

events.title: Schoolyard and Mutoscopes
events.description:
Come and view the flicks at the schoolhouse, ratings PG-R from 9:00am - midnight and R-XXX from midnight to 9:00am the next morning. Flicks will be changed and rotated during these times so stop by and check out the new eye candy daily. Don’t forget to check out the mutoscope at Center Camp!
The schoolyard is yours for playing. Have fun posing with the sexual position cutouts, jumping rope with the assortment of provided jump ropes and hula-hoop your heart out! Please be sure to leave the playground equipment in the schoolyard for the enjoyment of all school kids.
events.print_description: Come and play your heart out with the playground equipment! While there, check out our mutoscope films that are changed daily.

events.title: Science in the Shade
events.description: Join us inside Zooplankton for SCIENCE!! We'll have specimens of Calocyclas monumentum, a microscopic species of protozoa which our macroscopic art is based off of for you to look at through a microscope. Inside Zooplankton we'll host science lectures throughout the week at 11am. Topics to include biology, climate change, archaeology, and the process of combining art and science to build Zooplankton. Other workshops and class schedules will be posted daily outside of Zooplankton and on a board at Zooplankton Art Support camp.
events.print_description: View microscopic plankton in a microscope and hear science lectures inside our macroscopic model of the same plankton. SCIENCE! Subjects posted daily.

events.print_description: Meet at Space Jam to begin the exploration of a lifetime. Bring a digital camera & bike. Prizes for creative & thorough scavengers!

events.title: Scotch and Hopping
events.description: Come one, come all and play historical, foreign and our own invented version of Hopscotch celebrating the fun of a simple children's game that shares a related name to a wonderful adult beverage, Scotch. How silly can a simple children’s game be. All ages welcome, 21+ for Scotch.
events.print_description: Play Hopscotch & celebrate the fun of a childs game that shares its name with Scotch! Hoppers get a tipple of scotch after hopping the course!

events.print_description: Entry requires a bottle of unique single malt scotch (no blends), once-a-year massive tasting that’ll blow you away. “Great minds drink alike"

events.description: Join us for a party that is sure to be an "Out of this World" experience. Earthlings and aliens age 21 and over are welcome to dress up and attend our second annual alien party. Come by before the party begins to participate in our antennae making craft party. Be sure to dress astronautical! Party is open to earthlings and aliens 21 years of age and older. Please, bring ID and your own cup.
