events.title: See Saturn!
events.description: View Saturn’s rings and up to 6 of it’s moons through our giant hand-made telescope at Black Rock Observatory! You’ll see a billion miles into the outer Solar System with our precision parabolic mirror that brings Saturn’s beautiful ring system and moons to deep playa. Stargazing till dawn. Saturn is visible to the naked eye after Sunset in the SW until about 10:30pm PST.
events.print_description: Peer across a billion miles to see the majestic rings of Saturn. Glimpse it's distant moons and  transport from deep playa to the outer solar system.

events.title: Self-Care Station
events.description: Stop by our Self Care Station for a moment of calm in this busy desert - stocked with sunscreen, earplugs, lipbalm, condoms, electrolyte drinks, flavored water and more. DanceSafe harm reduction services available throughout the week.
events.print_description: Stop by our Self Care Station stocked with sunscreen, earplugs, lip balm, condoms, electrolytes and more. DanceSafe harm reduction services available.

events.title: Sensory Toys Playtime
events.description: Awaken all your senses with our different toys (or bring yours!) - feathers, ice, leather, paddles, scratchy rope, vampire gloves, hot wax + more. Blindfolds for the advanced! We facilitate negotiations about boundaries, so you can explore your play limits and be safe.
events.print_description: Awaken all your senses with our different toys - feathers, ice, leather, paddles, scratchy rope, hot wax + more. Blindfolds for the advanced!

events.title: SenseDrink @ Panda Lounge (9:30&A)
events.description:
You are a social entrepreneur or one of their supporters? You had a tough year trying to make the world a better place? MakeSense invites you to its first SenseDrink on the Playa to connect & chill out on groovy beats at Panda Lounge :-) Much Panda Love!

(MakeSense - www.makesense.org - is a worldwide open movement that connects social entrepreneurs with supercool individuals ready to solve their challenges)
events.print_description: You are a social entrepreneur or one of their supporters? MakeSense invites you to have a drink to connect & chill out on groovy beats at Panda Lounge

events.title: Sensual Butterfly Transformation Yoga
events.description: The Butterfly is a high-vibrant, spiritual creation. It is sensitive to its surrounding and is vibrating in the same wavelength as the particles of niverse, as well as the life on earth. It lives in symbiosis with nature, mostly in flowers, becoming one with the Beauty All Around. The Butterfly symbolizes the Universal Spiritual knowledge and deep Wisdom, and creates its life in the perfect alignment of non-attachment, in a dance of flow and Ease. It has a life filled of transformation, from the day of birth until re-birth, between stages, outer and inner form, with ease and grace moving further, without attaching to its old shape, heart wide open for the life in front of Her. This Yogic Journey is dedicated for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a travel of transformation, through your body and senses. Bring a Mat (if you have), soft clothing, yourself, as the beautiful and whole being you are.
events.print_description: Yogic Journey for you to connect with YOUR inner Butterfly, through a journey of transformation through your body and senses

events.title: Sensual Sunset Partner Yoga
events.description:
I believe that loving relationships and friendships need constant nurturing, and loving attention.
This fun and playful Sensual Sunset Yoga class combines intimacy, connection and exercise and is so a perfect date for a Friday evening at Burningman.
Partner meditation, visualization and eye gazing will guide you to a place of complete awareness and presence. Powerful breath work, sensual opening poses and fun creative partner poses help to raise your sexual energy, build trust, teach us how to surrender and enhance our communication skills. 
There is no previous Yoga experience needed... Just an open heart and the willingness to connect with your friend or partner. Join me to this fun and sexy class!
Bring your friend or partner or join us alone and we’ll match you up!

events.title: Shabbat Celebration
events.description:
Join us to welcome Shabbat with ecstatic singing, creative ritual, and a hot veggie meal.  All denominations are welcome to join hands and hearts. BYO plate!

Come to our large dome as the sun sets; you welcome the sabbath while a sea of twinkling stars envelopes you, our public shade structures transforming from daytime misting cloudscapes to light installations. We fire up our sound responsive LED beacon to help guide anybody who hasn’t found their way, and our singing voices set it to a communal pulse of light.

After the service we guide you to our dining area and seat you at a communal bedouin-style table. We fill your cup, nourish you with a multi-course meal, and ease you into the embrace of a subtle sound environment. Later, once our souls and stomachs have been nourished, we transition into celebratory dance.
events.print_description: Join us to welcome Shabbat with ecstatic singing, creative ritual, and a hot veggie meal. Everyone is welcome to join hands and hearts. BYO Plate.

events.title: Shady Lady Saloon Happy Hour
events.description: Come meet the neighborhood and get acquainted with the Shady Lady Saloon! We'll be fixing up delicious bourbon cocktails to kick off the week! Venture back in time to the early 1900’s and get a peak into how prostitutes lived in the red light district of New Orleans. We’ll showcase real “ladies of the night” by having framed pictures of women hung throughout the bar. We’ll ask insightful questions of our guests in hopes to get them thinking about the lives and personalities that inspired our beloved camp theme. Also, we value Radical Inclusion and it is our hope to build a cohesive and connected neighborhood. In an attempt to establish community, we’ll promote our first happy hour as a “get to know your neighbors” event. Throughout the day, SLS members will venture out into the community, greet the neighbors and request their presence and attendance at our first event.

events.title: ShART Tank - get funding for your art project
events.description:
Step up in front of a panel of millionaires and pitch your next art piece! Suggestions, comments, and funding will be offered. This is your chance to get in front of some of this year's most famous millionaires and sell yourself! This is one of the many services that millionaires can offer the playa and we are happy to host this event without requiring a wristband for access.

We understand you - you are a millionaire. People complain about you. You're vilified in burner media, and you just don't get it. Well, good news...*we get you*! You've paid your $15,000 camp dues, flown into the desert, and want service dammit! We at millionaire camp understand your expectations and are here to provide you with the amenities you deserve while you are out here in the desert.

Millionaire lounge is open 24/7 to provide you the latest in playa pampering. From our exclusive reserved seating, complimentary fragrances, Segway parking, free wifi, phone charging stations, and secured location only accessible by wristband, Millionaire lounge offers the amenities you deserve while you are in the desert.

Please stop by one of our exciting hosted events over the week, or join us for a cocktail anytime, day or night. You never know who you'll meet at Millionaire Lounge!

events.title: Shut Up and have a better Relationship!
events.description:
Quit thinking that talk will improve your relationship.  We are way more advanced and ready to understand each other without so many words. Words are dangerous, but assumptions... WAY MORE DANGEROUS! and, MORE FUN!! So we will be exploring where assumptions come from and creating different pathways that have a much better chance for accuracy, and.... wait for it.... INITMACY! (yes that pot of gold we are looking for at the end of those playa rainbows!) In this space of curiosity, experimentation and practice, YOU WILL LEARN the emerging art of SUBTLE COMMUNICATION. You will be able to describe your month in Bali in seven (7) words or less in a way that creates more understanding, more curiosity and, yes, more intimate connection (every time) than your 90 minute slide show and endless stories. Really... 
Answer the tiresome question "How are you?" in three (3) words that will say more, build immediate trust and help you to purge more friends on facebook than ever before! We all have the ability to 'know' more without using the left side of our brain. We just aren't so practiced. So, with a bit of science, a measure of technique, the willingness to try a 'different way' and a whole workshop of practice! we will be ready to immediately upgrade any relationship, including the one with the hottie you will meet tonight outside the Pleasure Dome! Ready!?
events.print_description: Talk is cheap, but silence is golden. OK, not complete silence, but we WILL SEE how LESS (talk) CAN BE MORE (meaning)!

There will be special cocktails, performances, and information on our offerings for the rest of the week! Meet at the Silicon Village Tower and then follow the white rabbit through the adventure. Keep your eyes peeled for the weird and wonderful Wandering Maneads, roving Ali Bar Bars, Suanadomes and mystical Mindwerks. Other stops include HeartOn!, Pickle Me Elmo, Joyism, Otis Spankmore, Mist’R Cool, Hoopcasbah, BuzzInn, Happy Spot, and Sandho Pyro Department!
events.print_description: Meet at the Silicon Village Tower and follow the white rabbit on a journey through our village’s bars and spaces! Bees! Pickles! and Pyros! Oh My!

Davis will go over the steps for making the stove out of recycled tin cans and then have the supplies so you can make one for yourself to take back to your camp. Limited to 10 that can make a stove but open to all for instructions. Sign up at Earth Guardians.

events.title: Slapdash Sesshin
events.description:
Hello! My playa name is Turtle.

Burning man is amazing. You'll find yourself running around, completely absorbed by the flashing lights and the chaos, and yet completely unable to experience it all. Do you ever feel like you never quite got what you wanted, that you kept missing this or that you'd promised yourself to do? I do, and I love it.

I propose we set aside a time at the Harmonic Convergence Camp to sit together in silence, and in an intentional abandonment of pursuit. I did it once last year. I practically kidnapped a couple people who were spontaneous enough and kind enough to play along with the silliness. It was quite fun. Immediacy, right?

I'm no zen master but I can give you a couple simple pointers if you've never meditated before. I think it will be rejuvenating, relaxing, and pleasantly weird.
events.print_description: Learn a technique for meditation...

Overall we'll be demonstrating how to safely and effectively slap in the following scenarios:
Hand to Hand
Hand to Ass
Hand to Face (the classic slap)

Bring a friend and come get slapped.

events.title: Snow Cones @ Paradise Motel
events.description: Step right up, ladies and gents, children of all ages, for the best refreshment you’ll find in this entire Carnival!  Look out for the palm trees and pink flamingoes which tell you that you’ve discovered none other than the infamous Paradise Motel, where weary carnival goers are invited to stop by for the best snow cones in the world while lounging in the shade in our chill lounge enjoying the melodic beats of our world class digital music purveyors.   This year, you’ll find as our roadside attraction none other than a purveyor of prognostications as a teller of fortunes has set up a tent where you can find out what your future has in store!  Our opulent Motel will also include a concierge desk where you can discover all the goings on in this most flamboyant section of the carnival.  Gifts of (unopened) bags of ice are always appreciated.  And as always, if you show your junk, you get to cut to the front (of the snow cone queue).

Ramblers and Spectators try our pure maple syrup shooters over crushed ice! The ramble will be postponed in the event of rain / mud.

Explore your body's curves and experience the finer points of working, rolling, bouncing, ticking and popping that bootie. After this all-levels session, you'll know how to butterfly, willy bounce, jiggy, Nah Linga, hot wuk, and of course, twerk. Come for the class, stay for the ass (After Super-Session party..what did you think I meant?).

events.title: Social Artists: How Our Creations Impact The World
events.description: As artists, we remake the world in our image - our imaginings. Given that we have this gift, how do we receive it in a way that allows us to create a more connected, open-hearted, and spiritually authentic world? A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies, meet some of our "inner crew," become our own superheroes, and experience the oneness of our good ol' friend, the Universe.
events.print_description: A full-body/heart/soul experiential workshop through the four realms of human consciousness, where we will unlock our imaginal bodies...

events.title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
events.description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
events.print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!

events.title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
events.description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
events.print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!

events.title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
events.description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
events.print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

events.title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
events.description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
events.print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!

events.title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
events.description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
events.print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!

events.title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
events.description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those dried up playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from.
events.print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

events.title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
events.description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
events.print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

events.title: SORNE at Burning Man 2015
events.description:
Morgan Sorne, known in his solo music project as SORNE, is an American singer-songwriter, composer, multi-media artist, music producer, and actor. He is known for his supernatural vocal range and utilization of homemade instruments and found sounds to create sonic tapestries of layered vocal samples and unconventional instrumentation. His performances often feature an construct of self-made visual art pieces inspired by personal and cultural archetypes, a continual thread woven throughout his performance aesthetic.
SORNE performs and tours with a revolving cast of dancers, musicians and artists while working with local communities of peoples around the world to create unique participatory live experiences of his work, thus blurring the line between performer and audience member.  His musical style has been described as a combination of tribal, electronica, avant-garde, avant pop, alternative rock, and opera.
events.print_description: SORNE, known for his supernatural vocal range and mesmerizing performances sings at Burning Man.

events.title: Soul Garden - Music and Cocktail Lounge
events.description:
Throughout the week, Heroes & Super Villains operates our bar, Skullicious, a piece of artwork for the Burning Man community to enjoy, during afternoon and evening hours. We are a slow bar, designed to help the weary Burner take a load off, tell us some stories and make some new friends while we diligently craft signature cocktails. 

Concurrently, our resident sound curators spin smooth vibes that start off soothing our community from the daytime heat before energizing the revelers for the bacchanal of the Playa at night. 
Music & Cocktail Theme:
-Tuesday: Midsummer Night’s Playa Dream
-Wednesday: Space Dust - Outpost HSV
-Thursday: Mad Hatter’s Sunset Cocktail Party

events.description: Welcome to the Chapel of Love at the Stardust Lounge Casino! We will be open daily for drop-in weddings between Monday, 8/31, and Saturday, 9/5. Our hours are noon -- 6pm (sunset) and by appointment. Visitors of all genders can experience the joy of matrimony in a (non-legally-binding) ritual. Elvis, Drunk Elvis, or Mr. Stardust might serenade you as our beautiful showgirls celebrate your nuptials in Vegas fashion.  Not sure what kind of Playa wedding you want? Spin the Wedding Roulette wheel and find out! Need your Playa wedding annulled? We'll do that too! Don't forget to take a commemorative photo in our fabulous "head in hole" wedding cutouts before you leave. Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special Note: please feel free to contact us if you want to schedule a special ceremony outside our "regular" daytime hours. We're here for you!

events.title: STILT BAR COSTUMED COCKTAIL SUNSET PARTY
events.description:
ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume cocktail party @ sunset daily @ Red Nose District! Come by on stilts (or off) to revel in the beauty of ENHIGHTENED BEINGS on the Esplanade. This year, our Stilt Bar crew celebrates with a variety of circus/carnival themes from around the world and throughout time! Bring your Playa Cocktail cup (and your ID) and stilt up  to our tall bar for a refreshing cocktail. Gaze upon the beauty of stilters in costume against the backdrop of the beautiful sunset. All non-stilters welcome too. Come in costume. Those stilters need some short people to gaze up at them in wonder and their bravery and dexterity!

MONDAY- Our traditional formal night we celebrate the origins of the circus with a Commedia Del Arte party! Think Masks, gowns, pantaloons, jessters and harlequin!

TUESDAY- Menagerie-Circus Animals and their Trainers-We realize animal circuses aren't PC but they are historical and the trainer costumes..well hilarious!

WEDNESDAY- Freaks, FUN HOUSE and Side Show Carnies. We KNOW you have a FREAK in there somewhere!

THURSDAY- Classic Clown Brigade! Be Whatever style clown you like. Happy, sad, joyous, mad, funny, magical, slutty, evil....All Clowns and Klowns welcome! SPECIAL GUESTS our own Professional Clown Brigade! 

FRIDAY- The Devil’s Carnival- remember this creepy 2012 Movie? (yeah we don't either) but it combines circus and the & 7 DEADLY SINS!...what could be better?? Lost souls enter The Devil's Carnival where they are each faced with the sins they committed in life.
events.print_description: ENHIGHTENED BEINGS OF LEISURE Infamous Costume Cocktail Party @ sunset daily! CALLING all STILTERS to revel with other tall ilk of your kind!

events.title: Stories We Tell Our Selves
events.description: Bring stories of an experience in which you learned something new about your self, for a Moth-like storytelling slam. Prize awarded for second place!

events.title: Story Circle: House of Mirrors
events.description:
Have you ever encountered yourself, as if for the first time? Emerged from a maze to discover that really, nothing is as it seems? 

Each of us has a main stem of how we interpret our life story -- family, location, school, work, and religion are often included in this story -- this circle is about the moments when get a glimpse of some part of what that stem looks like, discovering ourselves through an encounter with another. 

Participants can think of a story before coming, and we'll also have a moment of reflection at the beginning, to help spark good stories, filled with the moments that make up great stories.
events.print_description: Have you ever encountered yourself, as if for the first time? Emerged from a maze to discover that really, nothing is as it seems?

events.title: Straya Day
events.description:
Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. 


Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems with Aussie Karaoke.


We will be throwing bangas on the barbie until sundown. You’d have to be mad as a cut snake to miss the official Aussie meet up on playa!

It's the official playa meet up for Aussies but all are welcome!

events.title: Strengthening Relationship & Expressing Desires
events.description:
Enjoy group conversation and participation while talking about emotional intimacy, boundaries, listening, and how to express your sexual desires and fantasies to your partner without fear.
Prize wheel spin off after class!

As you enter the schoolhouse, make sure to stop and get a class time snack 	
and some refreshing H2O to fuel your mind and body. 
Each attendee will also receive a souvenir that will be used to help us randomly pick lucky class attendees to spin the prize wheel. Each lucky spinner is guaranteed a great prize! Class participation is strongly encouraged. The School is a judgment free zone where everybody is welcome!

events.title: Sunset Temple Drum Circle
events.description:
It's a DRUM CIRCLE Revival hosted by Camp STEEP!
Join us at 7:00PM in front of the Temple on Wednesday for Drumming, Dancing, Howling, and TEA!
We aim to restore and revive those Tribal Roots by drumming up the heart and soul of Black Rock City! Wear your white, bring your drum, your dancing feet, a stool, your cup (for tea!) and your sunset howl!
We will drum the sun down, howl as he slips behind the mountain ridge, drum and drink tea until its dark and then disperse into the night!
We look forward to meeting you there!

-Camp STEEP

Camp STEEP is located at 7:45 and Ersatz (and this event is at the Temple, not our camp, just to be clear!)
Stop by M-Sa 12-4pm (and whenever else we feel like it) for a hot, iced, creamed or straight cup of customized herbal tea for your hangover, hydration and heart! Drink in the love!
events.print_description: Bring your Drum, a stool/chair, your Dancing' Feet, a cup (for tea) and all that SOUL! Its a Sunset Drum Circle Revival in front of the Temple!

events.title: Sun Tower Burn
events.description:
Friday 4 September at 1 PM
Come join us for the Daylight Burn of the Sun Tower

Bring a mirror of any size & dark sunglasses or goggles.

Just before burn time, we will be handing out some additional mirrors. When the word is given, the citizens of Black Rock City will use their mirrors to reflect sunlight at the center of the sun mandala at the top of the tower to try to start a fire in the cannon fuse placed there that will then set the rest of the tower ablaze.

It’s going to be BRIGHT! 
Bring Dark Sun Glasses

events.title: Swap Meat! with the Trustable Sluts
events.description:
Welcome to Swap Meat!

This event is organized by The Trustable Sluts: a community of sexually liberated socially responsible women.

This is a mixer for sexually liberated, socially responsible women* and the men and women (and everyone in between) who love them.

With Swap Meat, we turn traditional gender dynamics on their head and invite both men and women who want to date, relate and have sexual connections with women who identify as women* who are self-aware, sex-positive, love warriors.

WHO ARE WE: trustablesluts.com

There will be little structure and much fun. We will bring something to identify the "meat" and identify Trustable Slut Members.

# 1 rule of SWAP Meat is
you bring someone AWESOME
to SWAP Meat.

We want to be introduced to more amazing people who want to meet fun, playful, and open women, who are in alignment with our values.

Bring someone who you would recommend to date your best friend. Bring someone who is "available" to date. Bring someone who has good boundaries and knows how to communicate. Bring someone who YOU are 100% okay with sharing.

Who NOT to bring:
-Some random person off the playa
-Someone who is overly eager to hook-up (aka desperate).
-Someone who isn't emotionally available or at least self-aware.

Official Meat Policy:

1) Meat can be of any gender.
2) We encourage "available" meat. That word has many interpretations...it is whatever it means to you. However, here are some ways it means to us:
+ is single or in an open relationship.
+ their relationship agreements allow for dating.
+ has time to date, meaning not just interested in hooking-up.
+ has experience in our or some other community of sexy tribe.
+ has emotional intelligence and communication skills.

*NOTE: We are open to all gender orientations and sexual orientations. We are LGBTQ friendly.
events.print_description: The Trustable Sluts host a sex positive dating meet-up. Come have a drink and meet some lovely people. Maybe you'll get your meat swapped.

events.title: Swarm the dHive Bar @ the BuzzInn!
events.description: Swarm by for lavender lemonade & cranberry ice water, spelling bees, honey tastings, beengo, & deep tech house beats via DJ Drone. Learn about honeybees and other pollinators. Got no antennae?  We'll feeler you up!  Bee buzzy, pollinate your mind & get your proboscis wet! Hydrate before you playa-date! We bee inviting you to learn about nature's indicator species the pollinators--bats, bees, birds, & butterflies.  Waggle dance with us in the dust.  >'='<
events.print_description: Hydrate w/lavender lemonade & cranberry H20, beengo, spelling bees, flower hair-braiding, & deep house via DJ Drone.  Bee buzzy & pollinate your mind!

events.title: Sweat Your Prayers w/Huggy Bear @ RhythmWave
events.description: Kick off your Burn on the right foot (even if it’s your left). Sweat Your Prayers with Huggy Bear at RhythmWave as we bring this beautiful and dynamic dance/meditation to BRC for our 9th consecutive year! There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, and no way to do it wrong. The only requirement is a body that is still breathing, a heart that is still beating, and a mind that is still curious.

events.title: Sweet and Sour Treats (With Sausage!)
events.description: You know you love any grilled meat on the playa. But, you haven't lived until you have had the sweet succulent taste of Merguez lamb sausage and the sour crunchy taste of kimchi in the same bite. The Pickle Me Elmo crew will be serving this delicious combination to the lucky first few hundred guests from our gypsy wagon Tuesday afternoon.
events.print_description: Nothing beats the combination of sweet Merguez lamb sausage and kimchi. Served hot off the grill from our gypsy wagon. Yes, I said sausage!

events.title: Sweet or Savory Crepes!
events.description: Sweet or Savory?  We always aim to please with more than just filings…  With dozens & dozens of fresh eggs, 3 different kinds of flour and our secret French ingredient, Camp D’s crepes are by far, hands down, the best in Black Rock City!  You'll never know when our fabulous troupe, “Les Briquettes Coquettes” perform, but if you miss them, you'll certainly be treated with groovy beats from one of the many resident DJ's in the house.
events.print_description: Our international crew of Burners will show off their mad culinary skills serving crepes for 3 days (Wed – Fri), 9ish – noonish!

Check the schedule daily on-site and join us in our 26' stretch DangerYurt, complete with a sofa, stuffed animals, pillows, inflatable mattresses and crash space, and two hours each day of great conversation, advice, and presentations.

events.title: Tango In the Desert
events.description: Come dance with us!  Argentine Tango is a vibrant dance that came from the salons of Buenos Aires.  Stalk around the floor in a partnership, be elegant, precise, and passionate - and hopefully walk out of the class carrying some of that with you into your everyday life.  Our world class teachers will get you started, and you can bring your newfound dance skills to our evening parties!

events.title: Tantric AUM
events.description: The AUM (Awareness Understanding Meditation) Workshop is based on the understanding that in order to find its silence, the western mind first needs to express its tension and stress.The aim of the AUM Meditation is to consciously transform stress and negative emotions into positive creative energy, and to create personal well being and peace through a social process of Awareness, Understanding and Meditation.It is divided in twelve stages that allows you to experience all shades of your emotional life ‚Äì anger, love, sadness, laughter ‚Äì and to express these emotions in a protected and safe environment.Once emotional awareness and intelligence are mastered, it becomes easier to express emotions in a healthy way, resulting in more effective communication skills and a greater sense of personal empowerment. The fear of expressing all our feelings diminishes, freeing us to make a genuine choices about how we act. Unspoken positive and negative feelings can create blocks in our relationships with friends, colleagues and loved ones.Through experiencing the AUM, relating becomes clearer, more honest and more fun. the AUM also allows you to reclaim to joy of simply being alive.Bring a pillow or cushion
events.print_description: A high energy social meditation that allows you to express the full rainbow of emotions AND taste the deep awareness that holds it all of it

events.title: Tantric Puja
events.description: This is a space to see, feel, smell, touch the divine in ourselves and others. Choose to embody the masculine or feminine for this play and bring a partner of the opposite polarity just to balance the numbers - you have the choice to "see the one in the many" if you decided to move around partners to experience "seeing the One in the Many" or to stay with the same partner and go deeper into "seeing the Many in the One" - this will be a puja style ceremony unfolding deeper layers of intimacy.

events.title: Taste of Lithuania - Pancakes Afernoon
events.description:
In Lithuania we have a saying that 'men's love comes through stomach' but the truth is that every Burner will fall in love with Lithuanian culture after tasting Lithuanian potato pancakes.

Together with Lithuanian pancakes Burners will be asked to try other traditional Lithuanian snacks: fried bread or cucumbers with honey. Fresh cucumbers and honey are the best refreshment during hot afternoon at the Playa.

events.title: TEDxBlackRockCity
events.description:
“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” ~ Lewis Carroll (1871)  “Through the Looking Glass, and What Alice Found There” 

To peer “Through the Looking Glass” is to seek alternative perspectives, to imaginatively approach a traditional problem or line of reasoning in order to illuminate impossible solutions. This often requires a willful transformation of ourselves — a creative shape-shifting — so that we see the world with new eyes, new senses, a new consciousness. It is only in this way that a new world reveals itself — as strange, yes, but perhaps also closer to world in which we dream.

In 2015, TEDx BlackRockCity will be an opportunity to open and reflect ourselves in new ways, to a new world, in which we are all transformed by ideas that matter.
events.print_description: "Through the Looking Glass" - Lewis Carroll (1871) - TEDxBRC features Ideas Worth Spreading while celebrating our 5th year of this important program.

events.title: Telescope Viewing
events.description: Come to Black Rock Observatory to view the universe through our giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite. Using a precision parabolic mirror, we’ll show you space and time. Photons are travelling billions of miles at light speed through space just to meet you at the Observatory, will you be there to meet them? Get the big picture in the Macro Dome or see inner space in the Micro Dome. See Saturn’s rings, craters on the Moon and deep-sky wonders live with your own eyes after Sunset every night. Science talks, exhibits and special events happening all week.
events.print_description: View the universe through a giant hand-made telescope or get your hands on a real meteorite.  See Saturn’s rings or craters on the Moon live!

events.title: Tell-tale Reflections
events.description:
What do you see when you look in the mirror? What do you desire? What do you loathe? Take it all in...exhale, and again….What do you SEE when you look in the mirror?
 
A cascade of images, music and performance awaits as we gaze outward from the Esplanade and inward to our soul. Join members of the Vau de Vire Society, Bad Unkl Sista and Dustfish for a performance fusion evening like no other: ritual, fire, physical theater, circus all woven together. You don’t want to miss this show. Starts promptly at 8pm! Bring a small mirror.

events.title: The 48 Hour Film Project: Black Rock City 2015
events.description:
Camp Videogasm will again be host to The Black Rock City edition of The 48 Hour Film Project. Were groups of burners write, shoot and edit films over a 48 hour period while at Burning Man to be shown at Videogasm on Thursday night (9/3) at 11pm. We'll start with a retrospective of short films produced at Burning Man in previous years and then premiere the videos that will be produced at this year's Burning Man!

Filmmakers: If you have a team and equipment, start at your leisure and follow the instructions on posters found at PlayaInfo and Videogasm (in Snowflake Village). If you're looking to form a team come to Videogasm at 3pm on Tuesday (9/1) to meet up with other like minded individuals.
events.print_description: Make a short film at Burning Man following the rules found on our posters at Playa Info, and we'll show it on our two large screens on Thursday night!

events.title: The 4 'Missing' Laws of Attraction- Glimmer
events.description:
Explore the laws of Detachment, Polarity, Pure Potentiality, Sufficiency & Abundance. Put these laws into use to manifest what you desire.
Glimmer began her coaching experience as a HR Rep at Cisco Systems, Inc. She has now found a natural extension of her passion in supporting individuals with articulating their ideal life and creating a plan to achieve it. Through this work, Glimmer assists people in bridging the gap between their current existence and their dream life.

In addition to holding a BS in Psychology, Glimmer is earning her coaching certification through the QSCA. Through this year long program, her focus has been Law of Attraction and Light Body work.

Glimer sees her special talents as the ability to extract visions out of her clients and get them on paper where they can be evaluated and converted into working life plans and guides for daily decision-making.

events.title: The Canopy Tribe: Sleep in Temple Trees
events.description:
Remember the most majestic tree you have ever experienced?

Did you have enough time to celebrate it? To dream with it?

Majestic trees give living form to the most diverse places on Earth. When they disappear, unseen, the world flattens. These trees are becoming rare. And valuable.

The Canopy Tribe helps others to sleep in majestic trees. To have time to dream – and radically self express.

Three-minute crash courses in tree hunting, tree climbing, tree campouts, tree house building and tree circus.

Acrobats, architects, artists, arborists, tree huggers welcome.
events.print_description: Majestic trees are living mansions of the forest, pillars of evolution. Learn how to climb, sleep, build, dream, and radically self-express in them.

events.title: The Creepy Hamster Masquerade
events.description: Think you know your campmates or that new playa partner well? Can you recognize them like a hamster does-by smell? Try recognizing them with their face covered up in a frolicking hamster free-for-all, where boys could be girls, and girls might be kissing squirrels! Bring your creepiest mask, you creative DIY Burner, you. But if you don't, make one for the occasion in our mask booth. If costumed trickery is what you crave, come on down for our rodent masquerade!
events.print_description: If costumed trickery is what you crave, come on down for our rodent masquerade!

events.title: The Fur Trading Post
events.description:
Peruse and take home our fine freshly tanned fun fur OR
drop off some furs for others to enjoy
events.print_description:
Peruse and take home our fine freshly tanned fun fur OR
drop off some furs for others to enjoy

events.title: The Dusty Beavers’ Maple Taffy Stickeasy
events.description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. Come and experience this unique, sugar fueled ‘joie de vivre’.
events.print_description: For you, The Dusty Beavers will recreate the Quebec Sugar Shack tradition. Come and experience the unique taste of Maple Toffee on Snow!

events.title: The Dusty Bumm
events.description: Trade your dusty tookus for a warm drink and cold slap, plow it with a snowboardski or three, try your hand at Giant Beer Pong or Jenga, chill under hundreds of G-Strings!  Face it, out here, there's no escaping a Dusty Bumm! Specials daily 3-6. Bill Murray happy hour daily.
events.print_description: Warm drinks, cold slaps, snowboardski, Giant Beer Pong, Jenga, hundreds of g-strings. Specials daily 3-6. Bill Murray happy hour daily.

events.title: The Energetics of Yoga with Nina Mel
events.description: Focus on physical alignment, visualization, and breathing to achieve specific energetic results
events.print_description: Focus on physical alignment, visualization, and breathing to achieve specific energetic results

events.title: The Famous Lost Penguin Blues Jam!
events.description: Allegro Bob hosts the Famous Lost Penguin Blues Jam: On the playa with your guitar, bone, mandolin or drum? Here's where you should be today.
events.print_description: Allegro Bob hosts the Famous Lost Penguin Blues Jam: On the playa with your guitar, bone, mandolin or drum? Here's where you should be today.

events.title: The Festival of Bubastis
events.description:
Honoring the Catty Goddesses of the playa... this is the SWB celebration of the week!  The finest wines, elegant food, bdsm equipment, and music from the altars of heaven (DJ Goth Thug & DJ PJ). 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bubastis
This is a Festival of the Feminine... the Sacred Feminine... the Dominant Feminine.  The rules are simple:  Got a dick?  You're there to serve, worship, obey, pamper, and amuse the women.  Women should dress their sexiest.  Men shall dress for and be subservient, or be ejected and fed to feral cats!  Eunuchs will be on guard to ensure the rules are followed.  (and yes... women can worship women too)
events.print_description: Girls Rule, Boys Drool. Females are in control and males must obey at Spanky's annual adult-only FemDom party. Winner- “Best Party at Bman”!

events.title: The Fifth Grande Playastani Ball
events.description: This is it!  Simply the fanciest party on the Playa.  We'll be dressing to the 11's and pouring our most topest-shelf alchemies. Come connect with old friends and new as we dance out tails off the back end of the Pyrobar, docked at it's home The Enclave. It shall all happen as it typically does on Tuesday night in Black Rock City, NV, somewhere up the 9:00 Avenue. Bar opens at 8PM, impromptu ad hoc performances to be announced, perhaps, most likely not. So dust on your finest threads and bring your best expression fancy selves to revel in our shared absurdity.
events.print_description: We'll be pouring our fanciest special alchemies as we dance, perform, and revel off the back of our dear Pyrobar, docked at Home, the Enclave up 9:00.

events.title: The Four Faces Of Incorruptible Personal Power
events.description:
"Where are the positive archetypes of feminine power? Kali, who cuts off your head? Hera, who is the god form of holly homemaker: basically “Zeus’ wife” with a goddess-sized jealous streak? Wonder Woman, who battles evil but has no family and no love in her life? It’s time for us to tell a new story of femininity, with our choices, with our self-expression, and with our lives. There are too few positive examples of women who are in full command of their sexuality and its attractive powers. There are too few healthy stories of women who’s full creative expression is unbridled and uncontrolled.

Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining your highest vision into reality through your being, your words, and your actions.You will learn an unforgettable map of your own sources of power, some of which have been lying dormant for your entire life. Once you can locate and allow all four faces of incorruptible power to move through you, you can lead, inspire, and serve almost anyone.  For Men and Women who want to bring their full spiritual presence into the material world and be the bridge between our present reality and the future vision only you can see."
events.print_description: Learn how to harness the dual feminine forms and dual masculine forms of power in each of your interactions and become a true manifestor - brining you

events.title: THE FREE DESIGN
events.description:
Music sets spinning a combination of deep/tech/progressive house, breaks, funk, and hip-hop!

If you DJ or play live music or any kind, YOU ARE MORE THAN WELCOME TO COME AND SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS!!

JUSt let me know when and what and I'll throw you on the schedule!
events.print_description: Dance dance dance!

events.title: The Galactic Effect
events.description: The sounds and performances of The Galactic Effect blend many different realms and styles into one stellar glue. He will be performing dancy, future bass, music with glitch hop elements, live electric violin, and some vocals. His sound crafting technique incorporates vibrant synthesizers and future bass with orchestral vibes, strings, and other world elements. Arranging music which defies all barriers, genre’s and labels, creating in constant change and movement, leaving the audience curious for the next possibility plucked out of the infinite spectrum of the auditory universe.
events.print_description: Bringing in a cinematic twist to Electronic music.

events.title: The Game!
events.description:
LIke most carnival games, the risk is part of the fun.. This is a game with a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.  Is it ever really simple?  “The Game” requires a high degree of interactivity among all those involved, even those walking by may become drawn into the action and be participants. “The Game” has a tendency to create possibilities where there were once boundaries.  Choices where there were once obstacles.  “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and American's Got talent.. 
“The Game” is perfect for letting that INNER freak come out. Watch what happens when permission is given to the darker, more playful side of one's self. That part that stays just out of sight, watching from the sideline, wanting to take part, but doesn't due to social constraint or peer reprisal.
“The Game” is both a game of chance and boundaries.  Winning is all a matter of perspective. Everyone wins with the upside of personal insight, everyone loses what may have been a self-limiting perspective.  A new episode with each draw is guaranteed to amaze and astound!
events.print_description: Created for the 2013 burn, this is a game, played at the bar, has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written.

events.title: "The Game of Burns" - a fire dancers tribe
events.description:
The night is dark and full of pyros. 
"The Game of Burns" - a fire dancers tribe will ignite your night. Watch these pyromancers create magic with wild unique fiery toys.
events.print_description: The night is dark and full of pyros. "The Game of Burns" - a fire dancers tribe will ignite your night.

events.description: Resistance Flexibility unites physical therapy, yoga, Chinese medicine, psychology, and personality type theory. Self & assisted stretching.
events.print_description: Resistance Flexibility unites physical therapy, yoga, Chinese medicine, psychology, and personality type theory. Self & assisted stretching.

events.description: The Greatest Mutant Arts will launch another test run for this amazing future event that will feature the most unique, creative, uncensored parade in the world…lined with mutant art vehicles, theme camp entrys, marching bands, art collectives, performing troupes etc....to beome the largest Meet and Greet community event in BRC.
events.print_description: An event that plans to grow every year...into the most unique, creative, uncensored parade of mutant vehicles, marching bands, performing troups etc.!

events.title: The Gypsy Tent @ Paradise Motel
events.description: Fall off the path and into Paradise Motel’s Gypsy Tent. Lush softness and draped lavish fabrics entice you to take a break from the sun and have your spiritual pathway mapped out through the ancient art of Tarot. Get your tarot read, lounge in the opium den, or just watch the world swim by.
events.print_description: Wander into the Gypsy Tent to have your spiritual pathway mapped out through the ancient art of Tarot, while lounging in an unparalleled utopia.

events.title: The HAIRFARMERS LIVE!
events.description:

CHECK OUT www.starstarroadhouse.com for artist bios, photos, video, camp layout, class schedules and discover what Star Star is all about!
events.print_description: Come ROCK OUT with Grateful Greg and Guitar Doug at our incredible new stage and ROCKING sound system. DANCE with the legendary HAIRFARMERS live!

events.title: The Heart Line and its Significance in Your Life
events.description: Your hands show a concentrated map of your unique character & aptitudes. You can understand what makes these aptitudes thrive, and what stifles them.
events.print_description: Your hands show a concentrated map of your unique character & aptitudes. You can understand what makes these aptitudes thrive, and what stifles them.

events.title: The Hooping Hour
events.description: Bring out your hoop and get down with us. All levels welcome. Learn some new things and have a good time.
events.print_description: Bring out your hoop and get down with us. All levels welcome. Learn some new trick and have a good time.

events.title: the JanKyTowN OrQuestra plays the Jankasaraus
events.description:
Find the Jankytown Orchestra aboard the JankaSaurus! - our brand new mobile stage, roving the playa.  Live music and performance art.

Jankytown is an artist's collective featuring Cirque du Cliché, Samba Stilt Circus, Fou Fou Ha Clowns, and Ministry of Flow Fire Arts.

The Jankytown Orchestra features live music from members of Albino! Tracorum, the Nibblers, Samba Stilt Circus, Samba Da, Snail Trail, Danger Mon, Kill the Specialness, and Ms. Pussycat and Señor Puppydog...

Look for us near the Esplanade each day for Sunset Jams
events.print_description: Find the Jankytown Orquestra aboard the JankaSaurus! - our brand new mobile stage, roving the playa.  Live music and performance art.

events.print_description: Jankytown's annual live music and performance art party featuring live music by the Jankytown Orchestra and other special guests.

events.title: The Journey of a Conscious Entrepreneur
events.description: Having been both a blissed out artist and yoga teacher and a stressed-out tech executive, Michel Bayan has seen both sides of the "spiritual spectrum."  He'll share a bit about his journey then we'll open up for a group chat about how we all seek to find balance between going after what we want, without letting it overtake you, and seeking peace without mental apathy.   Come share, ask, or just listen.
events.print_description: There are two sides of the "spiritual" spectrum. The true challenge of our time is to find your own journey of balance between the two.

events.title: The LifeProfit Revolution
events.description: There’s a new measure of life success: our wealth of memorable experiences. Join this social movement for living a memorable life (on & off the Playa)
events.print_description: There’s a new measure of life success: our wealth of memorable experiences. Join this social movement for living a memorable life (on & off the Playa)

events.title: The Lighter Side of Spanking
events.description: Turned on by spanking (or want to be)? Soft or hard, clothed or not, your new techniques will quickly become a party favorite and have people lining up for their turn. In this Hands On workshop, Spanking Maestro BamBam and his assistant Sara Bee review the three critical components to guaranteed to leave them begging for more: the warm-up, the follow through, and the rub out.  Not necessary to bring your own paddle.  Starts at SUNSET!
events.print_description: Hands On Workshop Training: 3 critical components to guarantee pleasure with The Lighter Side of Spanking.

events.title: The Magic Lantern awaits you
events.description: Hookah, trading booth, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Come by for daily schedule. Scent spa and chill space open 24/7.
events.print_description: Hookah, trading booth, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Come by for daily schedule. Scent spa and chill space open 24/7.

events.print_description: Forgot your tutu? Didn't know about tutu Tuesday? The man has you covered. Join us at the 'the mans tutu' on Tuesday sunrise to be gifted one from his

events.title: The Meaning of Life
events.description: Why are we here? What is the Universe/Divine up to with this whole life and creation business? Drawing on a number of diverse traditions and perspectives, we will explore the very biggest of big questions: Life and Death, Good and Evil, How we got started on this journey and how it will all "end." :)
events.print_description: A brief overview of The Meaning of Life, drawing on a number of traditions and metaphysical sources from Ra to Merlin. Held in our Chakra Temple Dome.

events.title: The Mirror Hour: Staring and Laughing Contests
events.description: Who will blink first? Who will laugh last? Who will run away, screaming "Aaaugh!"? Take off your sunglasses and stare your way to victory.
events.print_description: Who will blink first? Who will laugh last? Who will run away, screaming "Aaaugh!"? Take off your sunglasses and stare your way to victory.

events.title: The Monday Night Party
events.description: You've been setting up all day and now you have noting better to do!  Come listen to good music, spin fire and kick off the week!!
events.print_description: You've been setting up all day and now you have noting better to do!  Come listen to good music, spin fire and kick off the week!!

events.title: The Monkey Tantra - an interactive fun mix of voic
events.description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with others who remind him of his magical abilities. We are indeed mirrors for each other, with opportunity to reflect as the embodied unique contribution and how to bring more love and gratitude in the world. The Monkey Tantra is an experimental application of this idea, connecting together via loving human contact, vocalizing, visualizing, and inhabiting fearless graces through movement play and voice. Elements of dance, yoga, breath, chanting, and more combing to engage the body as a complete sensory organism. A sensory body is alert, animated, and alive. It resonated safety, security, and competence. It is ready for anything! This is an investigation, an exploration, a collaboration, a seriously FUN limitation-busting experiential living as we are - as ONE.
events.print_description: In the story of Hanuman (the mighty monkey deity of Hinduism) is a being with numerous gifts, and a faulty memory. On his path, he connects with other

events.title: The Neuroscience of Partying - EntheoZen
events.description: How recreational drugs affect neurotransmitter in the brain, safety tips, how to nutritionally mitigate the depletion from party activities.
events.print_description: How recreational drugs affect neurotransmitter in the brain, safety tips, how to nutritionally mitigate the depletion from party activities.

events.title: The New Modern Café
events.description: Need to get some work done? Frozen drinks, pillows, and wifi! All the best of the default world far away from all the worst.
events.print_description: Need to get some work done? Frozen drinks, pillows, and wifi! All the best of the default world far away from all the worst.

events.title: The Nutty Confessor
events.description: Need to lighten your load?! Come to our confessional and let it all out and spin the wheel to repent for your sins! Don't be afraid to double down either! Things get a little more interesting ;) Please get a drink at our bar too! Let's get weird.
events.print_description: Need to lighten your load?! Come to our confessional, let it all out and spin the wheel to repent for your sins! Then sin again and repeat.
events.other_location: Arrow Dynamic (theme camp, but it wasn't listed above)

events.title: The Olfactorium
events.description: Burdened with useless swag?  How about something useful?  Stop by the Olfactorium and have a custom perfume created just for you by professional perfumer, Agent 11.  Scent evokes memories directly through the limbic system in a way no mere memento ever could.  You will leave with a mini perfume that is tailored to your tastes—something you can take back to the default world as an everyday reminder of your experiences at Burning Man.
events.print_description: Come to the Olfactorium for a custom perfume created just for you by our Mistress of Scent, Agent 11 so your beautiful burner-self will smell great!

events.title: The Orgasamator Experience
events.description: The legendary Orgasmatron first came to the playa in 2002, and it provided exceptional physical pleasure to thousands of women in an environment that was safe, comfortable, sensual and private.  Five years ago we completely redesigned the machine for even greater intensity and enjoyment, and gave it a new name: The Orgasamator.  When you visit, you will be in a private room with an operator who is experienced, very sensitive to your needs and concerns, who listens well and is deeply dedicated to giving you an amazing experience.  Your specific needs and desires will be discussed at the beginning, and the experience will be fine-tuned to give you exactly what you want.  No penetration is involved, but sexy talk and sensual touch are available options.  We want everyone to feel refreshed and respected when they leave.  We are strongly focused on cleanliness and health, along with fun.  Come solo, or bring a good friend (male or female) to add another dimension to this deeply immersive and wonderfully personal experience.  Wear as much or as little as you would like, you can stop any time if the pleasure becomes too intense.  If you are a woman, 18+, the Orgasamator Experience is something you won't want to miss. Lines are shortest early in the week, and early in the day.
events.print_description: The Orgasamator gives intense physical pleasure in a setting that's safe, comfortable, sensual & private. Exit refreshed & smiling. Female18+ only.
events.other_location: Located in Spanky's Village and Wine Bar at 4:00 and Carny

events.title: The Outer Body Paradigm
events.description:
Who are you?  Could it be possible that you are far greater than you imagine yourself to be?  What if you could connect with the entire World as your Self?  

What I've discovered thru practicing this very simple paradigm has rooted me far more deeply than I'd ever dug, to the taproot of our collective Source.  We'll do some simple exercises together that will shift your relationship with the World in deeply powerful ways, generating more and more synchronistic synergies around you.
events.print_description: The Outer Body Paradigm -- Synchronistic, Synergistic Connection with Your True Self.

events.title: The Path of Forgiveness:  Returning to Love
events.description: Come immerse yourself in the healing energy of forgiveness. A time for healing and returning to your essence, your soul, your true self.
events.print_description: Come immerse yourself in the healing energy of forgiveness. A time for healing and returning to your essence, your soul, your true self.

events.description: A BRC tradition- starring you! On Center Camp Café's Big Stage! Show off your Playa Fashions! Walk our Runway! Your hosts Dr. H.Owll & JustinCredible

events.title: THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
events.description:
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM

In Black Rock City there is much to see, always, in the way of art-- buildings and structures, Art Cars and installations... but there's another kind of art to see, as it strolls around the Playa...
It's the often unique way each of us dress (or undress) for the event!
And each year, there's one gathering place where Playa Fashions shine their brightest.
That's the Big Stage in Center Camp Café. The day is Saturday, and the time right before the Burn, starting around 5:30 PM.
The PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW, a tradition since 1987, is the place to see and be seen, as the amazing creations worn on the Playa have their moment before our audience on our Runway.
Join your hosts, Dr. Howland Owll and DJ Justin Credible, as we present this year's highlights of YOUR Incendiary Couture!
Fantastic outfits, puppets, body decoration or just one's signature Playa clothing-- anything and anyone may appear. Models assemble backstage.
Come and watch... or even better, be a part of it!
events.print_description:
THE PEOPLE'S FASHION SHOW @ Center Camp Cafe
Saturday, Day of the Burn, 5:30 - 7:00 PM

events.title: The Randomized Postcard Project
events.description: In the lead up to the burn we'll be collecting names and addresses of folks who would like to receive a postcard from the playa. Then once we're out in the dust we'll be recruiting random passersby to write a message on those pre-addressed postcards. Once you've written a postcard to a random you'll be able to fill your own address in (or a friend's) so that someone can write you a postcard! Feel free to get in touch with us to submit your info or just come find us on playa.

events.title: The Red Party
events.description:
Join Flirt Camp for our 1st Annual Sexy 'Red Party'. 

Grab your creative red outfit and come dance, flirt, play and enjoy a special cocktail on the last night at Flirt Camp 2015.  

We have excellent music, beautiful people and a sweet Bar-&-Lounge. 

Something you won't want to miss is our EPIC flash mob dance by the Sky Dancers. It's amazing.  ;)

This party is designed to travel!  We will walk out to the Man Burn together and for our "4th Annual Hot Dog Cookout", where we will grill hot dogs while we watch the greatest pyrotechnic show on earth!  The MAN BURN!

We will continue with the Red Party after the MAN BURN and play more excellent music.  Look out for the red LED light balloons strand.

events.title: The Reincarnation Location
events.description:
Come be reborn into the world of the Playa.  Confess your sins, then spin the Wheel of Penance!  This will indicate what you must do, as detailed in the Book of Penance - though you will be able to choose a G, R or NC-17 rated version.  Once completed, you will have been cleansed of all your sins and can be reborn anew.  You'll then rid yourself of all your worldly belongings (take your clothes off), and from within our dome with a pair of legs - you'll crawl out through a 6' vagina, where someone in hospital scrubs will spank you and give you a rebirth certificate - onto which you'll put your thumbprint and Playa name before we laminate it.
This will be our 5th year on the Playa since 2000.

events.title: The World Congress for a New Civilization
events.description: The United Nations, for all its good, it not enough.  We need a new, more representative global meeting ground for those seeking to replace our current civilization with something better. In 2016, delegations of current and future leaders from every nation on Earth will gather together for a week to develop a set of common principles for a politically and environmentally sustainable society in the 21st Century. Come learn more from Jim Clark, the founder of the World Congress for a New Civilization. Jim is the founder of the World Technology Network, a former director of a Bill Clinton presidential campaign, a former Harvard faculty member, and TEDx Black Rock City speaker.

events.title: Tighty- Whitey Take-Out
events.description:
While carnival boardwalks and midways are perfumed with the smell of Coney dogs, and funnel cakes, and dotted with souvenir shops, we transform the people into the attractions for others to enjoy.  There is a juxtaposition of who receives the excitement and who gives the excitement with an ample supply of tighty-whitey under pants in various styles.  The inner artists can express their creativity and dusty taints through colored markers then don the one-of-a-kind art. Snap a picture (instant camera on site) for our “Taint Wall of Freaks” then take your art on a traveling show - the living canvas of “the self”.
Monday/Tuesday – Foreplay! To get one excited and invigorated.  “Manifest it Monday”, “Free for all Tuesday”. You call it; it’s yours, especially our bartenders.  Monday and Tuesday are the days we establish our regulars!  We play “The Game” until we just can’t stand it anymore (In a good way of course).  It’s all about introducing ourselves to our neighbors and making friends for the week, friends for a lifetime.
events.print_description: Watch as people become mobile art, visual masterpieces! Using underwear as a canvas, manifest your creativity with colored markers. Wear away!

events.title: (Touch) Rugby in the Buff
events.description: Rugby is a rough game, but it's not only for buff dudes – just no touchy-feely please, even though it's a touch rugby we'll play. Join us if you please! Why naked? For a great bonding experience, plus it's hot on the playa... and your costume would be destroyed in the game otherwise! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is :) Come to the playa around 7:30 Portal and look out for bouncing balls!

events.title: Transcending Shame, Guilt & Envy
events.description:
There are many things you 'could' do, but there's nothing you 'should' do. I suspect there's no such thing as a 'should'. A should is a 'could' with shame smuggled on top of it. Come explore shame and its cousins: guilt, envy, anger and jealousy. All these emotions have one thing in common, they usually hide their tracks and are hard to admit. Learn to transcend your shame with cutting edge subjective tools. We'll investigate the nature of shame & shaming, look at the adaptive advantages of them and how they serve & do not serve our development.

Join love coach Annie Lalla for some powerful exercises that will help you move beyond past shames and show you how desist from laying down new ones. This is a forum to discuss how to experience our emotions, especially the difficult ones, so they stop haunting your psyche.  You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.
events.print_description: Learn to transcend these often hidden emotions using cutting edge tools from Annie Lalla. You will leave shameless or at least shamelessly.

events.title: Transformational TEA TIME!
events.description: Join Camp STEEP for afternoon tea! Hot, Iced, Creamed, Straight, for your heart, hangover and hydration! We've got all your tea and apothecary needs covered! Come by for a totally customized cup of tea or pick from one of our signature blends. Along with a great cup of tea we are a space for transformational conversation; we might also have some other fun things going on to keep you entertained while you steep and sip. Art projects, card readings, body painting... you never know what might be happening around STEEP! We look forward to seeing you! Open Daily M-Sa 12-4pm and whenever the heck else we want. Drink in the Love!
events.print_description: Stop by for a hot, iced, creamed, or straight cup of tea for your heart, hangover and hydration! Drink in the love!

events.title: TransTalks Hosted by Gender Blender
events.description: Gender is a challenging topic for almost any community to talk about. We as a community often let assumptions and misunderstandings trump compassion and empathy. Gender Blender will lead an open discussion about trans life and experiences, exclusion.
events.print_description: Gender Blender will lead an open discussion about trans life and experiences, exclusion. Bring an open mind.

events.title: Trans Tea Time
events.description: This is a classic Gender Blender event. Join us for a cup of tea and meet other trans, genderqueer, agender, gender nonconforming, and gender variant folks. Let's talk about our trans experiences on and off the playa. Let’s share our stories and support each other. Our goal is to create a space to feel comfortable being our true selves; we will listen, share, hold heart space, and bring our fullest selves.
events.print_description: Over tea let’s talk about our trans & genderqueer experiences on & off playa. Share stories, receive support, and enjoy our safe space.

events.title: TRAPEZE electroswing & burlesque dance party
events.description: San Francisco’s infamous electroswing/burlesque party returns to the playa for a feverish full-throttle freakeasy of highfalutin fulsomeness and low-down dirty deco bass. Doll up and dance to the haunting hoopla of the West Coast’s premier electroswing pioneers: DELACHAUX, THE KLOWN and The GENTLEMEN CALLERS of LOS ANGELES. And indulge in hypnotic undulations with international burlesque sensations TOSCA RIVOLA, IDA FOCHT, KITTY OAKS, VIOLET D’VINE, IVIZIA DAKINI, TANA THE TATTOOED LADY, BRITTANY WALSH, and those fabled fiends and floozies FOU FOU HA! Plus ferocious Femcee MISS EMMMA! This joint WILL jump. Equal parts Weimar cabaret and wild speakeasy rave, Trapeze lures a bevy of underworld flappers, vipers, vamps and villains to a bass-fueled night of jazz age abandon. The jungle drums are getting louder…
events.print_description: Internationally acclaimed electroswing dance party and burlesque showcase takes the playa by storm. Details & add'l BRC dates: TrapezeSF.com

events.title: Trash Fence Bike Race!
events.description: A good chunk of our camp comes from Portland and that city loves bikes almost as much as BRC. It is with that passion in mind that we are hosting our first annual Trash Fence Bike Race! Meet in front of our Porch and then we will all ride together to the 2:00 point on the fence for a race around the perimeter of our fair city. Prizes and honor for the first three to place and guaranteed shenanigans.

events.title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
events.description:
There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self

When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering...

...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. 

This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. 

I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. 

Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.
events.print_description: Tantra Heart Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing & being seen. Open to the possibility of falling in love with yourself through the eyes of another.

events.title: Tribal Tantra Medicine Dance
events.description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!
events.print_description: Intuitive Movement Practice which invites us to tap into our innate magic & embody our capacity to heal & be healed. Come dance your divine!

events.title: Tribal Tantra w/Eugene Hedlund @ RhythmWave
events.description:
We will warm up with Movement Meditation to arrive in our bodies and listen to the wisdom within. As we dance, we will awaken the elemental spirits within our physical bodies as we invite that sacred tremor which frees our hearts to love to move us so that we may release that which has held us back and shed any limiting beliefs so that we may invite new gifts and possibilities into the empty space within. 

By embodying this ritual, we attune our body to tend toward our highest good while making space to step with clarity into what is next. 

Then we will offer the healing practice of Medicine Dance to melt some of the walls to giving and receiving that love within.

From that place, we will dance in the cultivated energy of the tribe - a full wave to ground all the gifts, shake loose any layers ready to release and make even more space to be empowered to our birth right to love and be loved, starting with the Self.
events.print_description: Ground your gifts, shake loose the layers ready to release, and make space to love and be loved, starting with the Self.

events.title: U2 Batterd And Brused Tour Of Sadness MemorialBurn
events.description: The art piece of the band U2 will be moved to the burn foot print of the man for a memorial burning on Sunday September 6th at 12 noon.  Our team will have food and beverages for all,  please come and bring a friend to honor the loss of the bands tour manager Dennis Sheehan.  Drummer Larry Mullin JRs father passed away this year also.  Last year Bono had a bike wreck in NYC and sufferd many injurys and is unable to play the guitar on this years tour,  lead guitarist "The Edge" fell off the stage in Canada this year and was hurt also.  The burning of the art piece will lift the bad luck the band has had to endure and also honor the memories of those who have pass away.   We are going to produce a video of the event for the U2 nation to share in the event on youtube.  Thank you,  Viper.

events.title: Up Your Game with Sexy Skills!
events.description:
Imagine, you’ve just met someone you’re highly attracted to. You’re having a wonderful conversation and you feel the excitement building in your chest.  You’re at the point where you know you want to take it to the next level. It’s the moment of no return. This moment of tension is both one of the hottest moments of attraction and potentially one of the most awkward.  

How do you know if the other person is at the same desire level? How do you assess their openness to touch, to a kiss, or more? A kiss or initial touch is relatively low stakes, but what happens when things heat up? What happens when you’ve just overstepped a line and can feel their withdrawal?  

These nuanced moments of initial sexual attraction can be the hottest of our lives. But we’re never really taught how to navigate highly sexually charged moments with someone completely new.  What does it mean to fully take responsibility for these moments so that when we’re done everyone involved feels totally awesome?   

In this workshop you will get a much deeper understanding of the nuances of initiating and negotiating hot and sexy connections. 

-Boost your sexual self-confidence
-Know how to feel your “fuck yes!” and your “Oh no!” and everything in between.
-Understand when and how to bring up "the conversation" so you don’t deflate all the sexual turn-on!
-Gain clear sexy communication skills to keep it hot while still conveying important information.
-And learn the number 1 reason why these skills will make you the sexiest person on earth!
events.print_description: Navigating New Sexy Connections: From “Fuck Yes!” To “Oh No!” and all those "Maybes" In Between! Held in the Chakralicious Camp Temple Dome.

events.title: Vinyasa Flow
events.description: Take a deep breath in. Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures both high and low, fast and slow, light and dark. Come find your voice, your rhythm and your dance through vigorous movements, grounding stillness and heart opening chanting. Guided meditation and breath work weaved in and out of this movement we call vinyasa yoga will open doors to parts of your body and mind unknown and will create a little more space both physically and subtly. Come take the leap, the ever graceful rise and fall and ascension into the sky. Come sweat it out and get ready for all the night has to offer.
events.print_description: Fill the space between the earth and the sky with the light of your energy. Let the rising and falling of the breath move you in and out of postures.

events.title: Vinyasa Flow by Lisa
events.description: We will be going through a series of poses that will move you through the power of inhaling and exhaling. Vinyasa movements are smoothly flowing and almost dance-like, with synchronized breath and movements. Vinyasa has both mental and physical benefits. Physically, sweat expels toxins and re-energizes your body and can be an easy to challenging physical workout, mostly depending on you and where you take your practice. Mentally, the synchronized breathing relaxes your mind and helps to release any blockage of energy flow throughout your body.

events.title: Vow of Promise
events.description: Experience the creation and renewal of vows at the Temple of Promise!  The Temple Guardians would like you to come share your joy with us as we host a ceremony for those who wish to commit and promise themselves, either newly or renewing, at the Temple of Promise.  The ceremony will be just in time for sunset on Thursday September 3rd.  We’ll have a ceremony with live music, a welcome group message, individual and/or group vows, exchange of rings, an embrace (plenty of photo opportunities!), and a closing.  Don’t forget a meaningful gift that you can exchange with other participants who stood next to you during this ceremony.  Participate or come to celebrate with others, it’s open to all.
